I carry these in my purse, and have them stashed all over the house....misting my face many times a day....voila....clear and moisterized skin!  They really do work wonders on sensitive facial skin, and they keep mine from being red and itchy, which makes me very happy

product_name: Evian Travel Trio: Beauty
title: Evian spray
review_text: These are just great for cooling of quickly without a sticky feeling...unable to find them in the stores.

product_name: Evian Travel Trio: Beauty
title: Excellent product, but hard to find in stores!
review_text: Love this for hot summer days, dry winter days and hot flashes :) A must have for catching the vapors also good when out in the sun..

product_name: Blinc Kiss Me Mascara: Beauty
title: Great smudge-proof mascara
review_text:
I don't have excessively oily skin, but I've never been able to wear mascara without smudging.  Waterproof, smudgeproof, expensive, drugstore, you name it I've tried it.  Every single one left dark shadows under my eyes within 2 or 3 hours.  I'd given up on mascara completely, but thought I'd try one more time with this (with the money back guarantee from spalook, what's the risk?)

This mascara lives up to it's name as smudge-proof.  Even wearing sunscreen on my under-eye area, it doesn't transfer.  Even in 100+ deg Phoenix heat, it stays.  I *love* it for this reason.  It also comes off easily at night; no problems there.

However, I'm giving it only 4 stars because it does flake a little throughout the day.  Not a lot, and not enough to make me stop using it (the first truly smudge-proof mascara I've found), but it is there.  Since it's advertised as smudge and flake-proof, I can't give it the full 5 stars

product_name: Blinc Kiss Me Mascara: Beauty
title: Marvelous
review_text: Ever wished you could rub your eyes while you're wearing your make up?  Now you can.  You can't be rubbing at your eyes too much or it will start to flake off, but this mascara takes quite a beating before it will budge and will never, ever smudge.  One might be led to believe this means it is difficult to remove at night, but all you need to remove it is water.  This stuff is practically worth getting just to ponder the chemistry involved

product_name: Blinc Kiss Me Mascara: Beauty
title: Great mascara!
review_text:
This mascara is great, it's easy to remove with a little warm water, but the best thing about it is that it won't give you 'racoon eyes'. There's no dis-coloration of the skin around the eyes. It also keeps looking great all through the day, no need to re-apply it.
The only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is, that even though they come in different colors, they all look more black than colored when dry. So the color doesn't stand out enough.
Still, I can highly recommend it

product_name: Philosophy Hope In A Jar For Dry/Sensitive Skin 2oz: Beauty
title: Fairly good :-l
review_text:
Philosophy products are very eye catching.  Their smart, clean looking bottles and the cool names given to each.  I work with skin care products and don't always believe what they claim.  There are usually far too many claims to be made that simply can't be done to someones skin.  
This product however, is pretty good.  It's a fairly good moisturiser that could honestly sell for less considering the cost of the product, but it does do the job it promises.  The only problem I have with it, is that for someone with sensitive skin, there is far too much frangrant extracts in here.  It cannot be good for sensitive skin.  I'd recommend this to Dry skin people only

product_name: Philosophy Hope In A Jar For Dry/Sensitive Skin 2oz: Beauty
title: FINALLY!
review_text: I have suffered from rosacia for the past nine years. As I was fairly young to be starting through a change of life, I had no idea what was causing my complexion problems. Not understanding (or expecting)what was happening to my skin, I made many many mistakes during the first year or so, trying to remedy the symptoms with countless products formulated more for adult acne or aging tired skin, bad idea. If you have rosacea or very sensitive skin, you know that sometimes it seems that all you need do is touch your skin the wrong way and you break out, let alone slathering some chemically based, perfumed, or exfoliating (ground pits and the like) product on your face. This becomes especially discouraging when you are also beginning to see the normal signs of aging but sensitivities won't allow you to take advantage of some of the great treatments out there to nourish your skin and stay a step ahead of the wrinkles, not to mention feeling starved for the moisture which is the real key to younger, healthy looking skin. After awhile I was afraid to try anything else, so I just stopped. I washed my face gently and left it at that. Well it only got worse and I felt like a dried up prune. Enter Philosophy hope in a jar for dry sensitive skin. It's as if this product was made just for me. Now instead of people asking me "what's wrong with your face?" they ask, "what type of skincare do you use?" Since I've been using The Philosophy skin care line, I find I guite often feel comfortable going out without makeup, something I had rarely done since my twenties. Since sun protection is so important, Philosophy offers a product called, When hope is not enough with spf 20 for daytime which comes in a bottle, but I have found that my skin responds much better to the Hope in a jar-dry sensitive formula, then followed by Philosophy's seperate sunsreen called Shelter-spf 15. This is because "Shelter" does not contain vitamin C or peptides and has a slightly lower concentration of sunscreens, contrary to the spf-20 moisurizer combo. You may be able to get by with the combination product and save a few bucks, but the aforementioned ingredients in it do not agree with my sensitivities, especially the vitamin C. As for the much needed exfoliation dilemma, try philosophy's, Micro-delivery peel pads or their "Peel kit" both are soothing and non-abrasive. Hope this helps and enjoy your new skin!

product_name: Pre de provence Gift Box with nine 25g Assorted Soaps: Beauty
title: SHEER  INDULGENCE!!!!
review_text:
I LOVE everything about these sops!!!  They are luxurious and delicious at the same time......one thing I need to indulge in.
The scents last for days after you've used them.....my bathroom still smells like a mix of verbena and honey-almond!!!! Just scrumptious!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Not to mention how your skin smells and feels afterwards!
These are amazing soaps that EVERYONE should use.  I feel exquisite using them and the gift sets are a fabulous thing to give to friends or even aquaintences.  They are sure to think of how thoughtful you were to give it to them everytime they use this wonderful soap!!!!!!

product_name: Philosophy Kiss Me: Beauty
title: Wonderful Lip Balm!
review_text:
With just a hint of sheer red color, this lip balm in a tube is one of the best I've tried. The smell is intoxicating, the feel divine. What's best to me: 1) the subtle shade of red color, sheer but sexy, moisturizing but not greasy or gloppy and 2) it lasts FOREVER. I have never before paid $10 for a tube of lip balm, but I will gladly do it again. For those that wonder who it looks good on: my opinion is everybody! I am a dark-brown haired, light skinned, brown-eyed girl, with no pink or rosy color to my natural dead-white skin color/coloring. I burn easily and freckle, too. My sister has brownish-auburn-hair, medium-toned beige skin color with hazel-brown eyes and it looks great on her, too. She tans easily. My niece is blondish-brown haired, has light brown eyes and fair skin with a bit of pink in it and tans easily. It looked great on her, too. 

Buy it and enjoy it

product_name: ZIRH RESTORE Herbal Eye Cream: Beauty
title: a wake-up call for your eyes
review_text: someone turned me on to this eye cream and it's been like getting an extra hour of sleep a night ever since. The best trick? keep it in the FRIDGE. Apply after you shower - you can feel it "tightening" away

product_name: philosophy amazing grace gift set (2 piece): Beauty
title: AMAZING!
review_text: Wonderfully light and clean scent!  Both men and women have asked me what I was wearing hours after I thought the scent was gone. It does not overpower when layering lotion and spray.  It's a beautiful fragrance, I love it

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka: Beauty
title: Sweet smell
review_text: This is one of my favorite perfumes.  I love anything vanilla and this has a great combination of it with violets, musk and iris.  It is a strong smell, so go easy on it. One spray lasts all day.

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka: Beauty
title: Lovely scent
review_text: I have had this for many years, lasts a long time and doesnt seem to get that old smell even after five years.  It is very unique and the scent has a 'rich quality' to it.  The scent seems to change as the day goes on, I really like it

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka: Beauty
title: Ethereal and sensual
review_text:
This has been my everyday scent for the last six years. The predominent note is a sparkling anise, an anise that affects a cold, even metallic, chemic artifice. Swirling about this shivery base note are hints of moss, violet, and vanilla-like tonka, lending an aura of both forest and fantasy. 

Though this is a relatively popular scent, Lolita eschews convention. There are no white flowers, no rose, no peach, none of the banal and cloying sweetness that plagues so many scents. This perfume is instead sensual yet apart, not at all come-hither but insinuating and dark as a Grimm's tale. The tonka is sweet and powdery, gently seductive, while the more prominent anise intoxicates.

The bottle is stunning; I never throw out a spent one.

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka: Beauty
title: Like nothing else!
review_text: This perfume isn't comparible to anything - finally a totally unique scent! It's sweet and sexy, and the scent changes with you. I'm addicted to it. So are the men! ;

product_name: Bourjois Pump Up The Volume Mascara: Beauty
title: Brilliant mascara
review_text: I used the same mascara for years, i came across bourjois pump up the volume on an internet site so i thought i'd give it a go, it really does pump up those lashes and it stays put for most of the day too, i use this mascara all the time now, i think its great

product_name: CURIOUS For Women By BRITNEY SPEARS eau de parfum: Beauty: Britney Spears
title: SMELLS GOOD AND LASTS.
review_text: I got this as a gift last christmas and I loved it. The scent is very nice and actually lasts. I give britney credit for this one. I need to replace it already thats how much ive used it its almost gone. I recommend this one.

product_name: MAC Studio Fix Powder Plus Foundation NC30: Beauty
title: The BEST ever!
review_text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!  This powder/foundation has THE best coverage out there!  I don't like to wear liqued foundation because it makes my skin feel real oily.  This powder foundation is better than any out there

product_name: Tisty Tosty Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Make charming little gifts
review_text: I love to include one of these with gifts......people love them.....makes a bath really special.....little rosebuds floating in the water.....just charming

product_name: Tisty Tosty Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Calming Violet/Rose Bath
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
Orris Root powder has a scent similar to violets although in this Tisty Tosty bath bomb, even with the addition of rose oil, it is not an overpowering fragrance. I think they could add double the rose oil, but you can add in rose and ylang ylang if you are in the mood. The Tisty Tosty heart-shaped bath bomb is perfect if you enjoy blending your own essential oils or prefer a mild/calming bathing experience. 

I'd suggest using this one for skin calming and also adding in a "Romance In a Stone," "Sex Bomb" or "Chelsea Garden" bath bomb to add a little more romance to the bath. 

I did feel emotionally calm (rose balances the emotions) and my skin loved this bath bomb, but it was not as sensory as I'd hoped. Following this bath with the "It's A Pleasure Treasure Massage Bar" is fun, also heart-shaped. 

You may want to try the "Violet" soap with this bathing experience. The next time I try this, I might mix it with an "Elixir" bath melt and a bit of the "Bathos" bubble bar, also scented with violet. 

As far as this being a magic spell, you just never know who might call you when you use this bath. Probably right when you are in the bath. So, if you think this will work instantly, you might want to keep the phone by the tub. It was funny, but when I was in the bath, my husband was trying to call me and said he let the phone ring and ring. Did he really think I would leave the pleasure of a Lush bath to answer the phone? 

Personally, I think they should scent this bath bomb like the It's a Pleasure Treasure Massage Bar. It is blissfully delicious and almost seems edible - looks like white chocolate (it is mostly cocoa butter) and has a heady scent of orange blossom honey and neroli. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Tisty Tosty Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Good
review_text: This smells good and the heart shape is cute. But, it lost it's scent when it dissolved which was dissipointing and the flowers turned the water darkish. I liked it but it's not one of my favorites.

product_name: Tisty Tosty Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Isn't it romantic?
review_text: If you love roses, this is a romantic bath luxury, with seven rose buds for your bathing delight. For a candlelit bath with romance, let it dissolve unencumbered. For scent but no mess, put it in a mesh bag first, because little flower bits will be all over the tub. At least it has no glitter. The scent is not particularly strong, but it is full of a natural rose scent that smells wonderful

product_name: Tisty Tosty Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Bath Time Rituals~
review_text:
I have been using Lush products for a few years now. First introduced to them when I was in Australia.
I always keep some in my linen closet as it gives a faint wonderful scent to all the sheets and pillowcases.

Try all of the bath bombs. I use the Tisty Tosty whenever I need an evening of self indulgence. Put the water on and watch the heart-shaped bomb fizzle and send hundreds of rose petals floating to the top of the tub.
Put some fluffy bath towels to warm on a rail.
Place some Dr Haushka's oil to heat by a radiator.
Pour a glass of champagne.
Surround the tub with lots of  tea lights.
Put on some Rahman music.
Get in and imagine a private Ganges.
When you get out its very eassy to scoop up the petals- take the pre-warmed towels and wrap yourself in one.

 By then the oils will be warm and pour in palm of hand and rub on body. 
I also like to put some  bath bombs in guest bedrooms with the towels- 
If you haven't tried the Karma soap do try it ......alone or with someone special..

product_name: Tisty Tosty Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: lovely and romantic
review_text: This is the one you give to someone you love. The wonderful rose scent is very light, not overpowering at all. And the pretty little dried rosebuds are so charming. I love lying in the tub with those rosebuds floating around me. It makes me feel like I'm lying in a beautiful garden

product_name: Hugo Boss Hugo: Beauty
title: HUGO GET IT!!!!!!!!!!!
review_text: Well for startes this is one of the best cologes out there.  The smell is chrisp and will last a long time.  It is a great cologne for any acasion.  I have many colognes and this one is on the top of my list, very masculine but girls love it!!!!

product_name: Laura Mercier Metallic Creme Eye Colour: Beauty
title: Absolutely Fabulous
review_text: I had read about these new creme eyeshadows in one of the magazines within the last few months. I decided to go to the counter at the Bloomingdale's near my house. The SA at the counter said she thought based on my coloring and eyes that the rose gold would be a good choice for me. I was looking for a shadow that could be good for daytime and also nighttime. I took home the rose gold and it was really really beautiful on. Not only that, but it is long-lasting and doesn't crease. I may have to invest in one or more of the other colors available. Definitely a worthwhile purchase and the tube will last you a long time.

product_name: Olivella Virgin Olive Oil Liquid Face & Body Soap: Beauty
title: excellent product!
review_text: I love this soap! It smells so fresh and my skin feels great after I wash with it! I am definetely ordering more of this soap

product_name: Mustela Stretch Marks Double Action: Beauty
title: Bless this product! Relief finally!!
review_text: This product is great! I had always been a non believer but in the eight month with my second pregnancy when I could not take the strecth marks, the itching the pain the red skin, I used it and it was like magic. Three days of use and I am a new person with soooo much better skin, getting better everyday

product_name: Mustela Stretch Marks Double Action: Beauty
title: It Really Works!
review_text: I am 5'11" tall, and have stretchmarks everywhere from growing 8 inches in one year as an adolescent.  So I thought I'd get even more of them during my pregnancy and 40 lb. weight gain.  I bought the Mustela lotion as a "might as well" gift to myself, not really expecting anything.  I am thrilled to say that after using this cream every day on my breasts and belly during the last 6 weeks of my pregnancy, I didn't get ANY new stretchmarks anywhere.  I still can't believe it -- and I was looking closely for them just to be sure.  The lotion is quite rich, so a little goes a long way -- the tube lasted 8 weeks.  I'm completely sold on Mustela products, and use the super soft and fragrant baby wipes on my new little girl.  No diaper rash at all so far

product_name: Mustela Stretch Marks Double Action: Beauty
title: My mom had a lot of stretchmarks and I DIDN'T!  That's proof 4 me!
review_text: I started using this cream during my 2nd month of pregnancy.  I think it's important to start building the elasticity of your skin early on, which could be the reason I had success with it.  While the cream is kindof expensive-- when you think about avoiding stretchmarks, no price is too high. I used about 4 tubes for the duration.  I expected to get stretchmarks because my mom had them with me, so I was happy to get anything less than hers.  Anyway, I didn't get any at all on my stomach until the last two weeks (my baby was 8lbs. 8oz.) and they are really small.  I put the cream on my breasts and abdomen every day after a shower, but because it was expensive I skipped my sides (love handle area) and did get stretchmarks there which were darker than the ones on my stomach. Since my stomach has gone down, the ones on my stomach are very light and will probably go away enough to satisfy my ego.  I highly recommend giving the Mustela cream a chance

product_name: JUST ME For Women By PARIS HILTON eau de parfum: Beauty: Paris Hilton
title: Seasonal wear
review_text:
I first tried this when my Mum bought a bottle during her holiday in November. The weather was cold, wet & dark at home. When I sprayed some on my wrists I wasn't impressed.

Come June & sunny, hot & bright days, I found myself trying `Just Me' in the shops & buying a bottle (which I'm quickly making my way through).

Lighter & easier to wear then `Paris Hilton', I'm using it all the time. Scent wise; the strongest note for me is the pink peppercorn - sharp & tangy. It contrasts nicely with the floral notes, so neither individual note overpowers me.

Overall `Just Me' can be worn anywhere during the day; work, shopping or lunch.
For evening and autumn/winter look elsewhere.

product_name: philosophy falling in love luxurious bubble bath: Beauty
title: Great Customer Relations
review_text: I experianced a small problem that was completly resolved to my satisfaction. What a great company to do buisness with

product_name: Clinique All About Eyes: Beauty
title: excellent to moisturize your eye area but not reducing any circle!
review_text:
I'm 18! Well you will think what does 18 have to do with this cream.

I don't have any wrinkle. My skin has been really good until I get into college. My eyes become really tired and I start to have a lot of dark circle plus puffiness.

After reading a recommendation from a fashion magazine, which says everybody at every age need an eye cream. Ok, fine, I will get one. I chose the one got the highest rate!

Overall quality, it is very good to moisturize my eye area. This means it is easier to apply foundation/concealer/eye makeup. But my puff is still here. I still have dark circle! No reducing! I know that I need to have a better schedule to have enough sleep but still, I expected higher on this product.

About the size, the small little teeny tiny one is good enough for you to use for months. Usually I will use it at night. When I have to apply concealer, I will apply another time.

product_name: Clinique All About Eyes: Beauty
title: Ditch the Smile Lines
review_text: Don't be afraid to smile, and don't cover up those smile lines.  You can eliminate them with this amazing product from Clinique

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns flavored lip shine: Beauty
title: Cinnamon buns... mmmm...
review_text: I received a tube of philosophy's cinnamon buns flavored lip gloss for Christmas (along with other philosophy products). I was super excited to try this because I've been told by numerous people that philosophy's products are spectacular. First, I must point out that there are sparkles in this lip gloss. Although they're very subtle on your lips, if you're the type of gal who hates sparkles and shimmer in your makeup, I'd stay away from this product. As for smell, it DOES smell like cinnamon buns. It certainly does not TASTE like it however (which is a good thing... I tend to lick off my lip gloss if it tastes good... this lip gloss does not taste good). It's very sticky and thick so you don't have to use too much. It also stays on your lips for a good amount of time. Would I suggest this product? If you're looking for a good-smelling, long lasting lip gloss, I'd definitely recommend this. However, if these two things don't matter to you I'd suggest you skip this ($10 for a tube of lip gloss isn't cheap after all) and go for a drugstore brand lip gloss

product_name: ERA FACE Spray On Foundation: Beauty
title: The most wonderful product ever!!!!
review_text: I was pretty wary of buying this because of the price, but it really is worth it. The can has lasted me almost a year, and it's not even empty! It's wonderful! I have very oily, acne prone skin with rosacea, and this stuff makes me look like I have a flawless, beautiful complexion. And I'm not exaggerating. It feels like I'm not wearing makeup. I just can't say enough about it. This is the one thing that I couldn't live without. You need to try it!!!

product_name: philosophy amazing grace best sellers 4 piece collection: Beauty
title: The first scent I LOVE
review_text:
I have been looking high and low for a fragrance that wasn't strong.  I have tried so many perfumes and body sprays it is ridiculous.  I have finally found the one I will use for more than a week.  I love it!  

The smell is so clean and simple.  The first day I wore it I had 3 seperate people tell me I smelled good.  I have NEVER had even one person tell me that, let alone 3.  I was amazed.  Also, I noticed that they told me I smelled good.  They didn't say your perfume smells good.  

I am not sure how to describe the smell.  It reminds me of that out-of-the-shower fresh smell that we wish we could have all day.  I will never use any other fragrances but Philosophy fragrances.  I plan on trying all their other wonderful scents as well

product_name: Mirenesse Secret Weapon Mascara: Beauty
title: Great color and performance
review_text: I have very sensitive skin and this product does not irritate by the end of the as other products have.  Also my coloring is very fair, red hair and blue eyes, even with brown/black mascara I always looked a little off-matched.  The brown in this line is a beautiful color and looks more natural than any I have ever used.  The ease of removal is the icing on the cake

product_name: Mirenesse Secret Weapon Mascara: Beauty
title: A Different Kind of Mascara
review_text: Most waterproof mascaras are designed to come off with an oil-based remover.  Stupid idea;   our skin has oil in it.  After a couple hours we end up with "racoon" eyes."  DOH, who needs that?  Mirenesse mascara only comes off with soap AND water, in combination.  Better living through chemistry!  Since I happen to be one of those people with a little extra oil in their skin in adulthood, I especially appreciate this fact, plus they make it in Brown/black  I'm a redhead, and am so sick of   searching for something other than black-black mascara!  It is simply too dark if you are not a brunette or blonde.  I need something with some brown in it, and this mascara fits the bill, perfectly.  For those who find it too clumpy, well, learn how to apply mascara--tweens!  This mascara goes on best with one coat, so make your first application count.  You don't need a second coat.  It won't look good, so do one coat, period.  If you can't get it right the first time, you need some practice and a mirror with a higher magnification.  If you think you need more mascara than that, think again.  Unless you are walking Sunset

product_name: Calvin Klein Eternity Summer: Beauty
title: So Great
review_text: It is my first time to buy fagarance....The smell is so refreshing.... enhance my feminine~ and it do cheer me up~ i like it v.......much~~ and will use this fagarance in the rest of the life..........

product_name: TOMMY GIRL For Women By TOMMY HILFIGER cologne: Beauty: Tommy Hilfiger
title: A Pungent Hint Of Grapefruit
review_text:
I really loved the clean, citrus scent of Tommy Girl. It has a grapefruit-like scent--very clean and pungent.

Unfortunately, after I became pregnant and had my son, my body chemistry changed. Now, it stinks on me. :o(

Still, it smells great as a scent, but you may want to try a tester before buying it. This is one of those fragrances that I think are a bit risky to buy "sight unseen"...unless you're sure your gal absolutely loves clean, citrusy, pungent scents. (But remember, that doesn't mean it will smell good on her...

product_name: philosophy guru exfoliating gift set: Beauty
title: G'ma of  17
review_text: This product is the best.  My youngest daughter used it at my home and said she wanted the Margarita, then my oldest daughter said the same.  I like them both equally.  Do follow the directions

product_name: Vera Wang For Men: Beauty
title: Love it
review_text: The first thing you notice is the clean burst of citrus. It's yummy and fresh and sexy. Then the fragrance reveals its deeper layers and you are drawn in. This is a wonderful fragrance for men. Both of Vera Wang's fragrances (for men and women) are top quality, multi layered, emminently pleasing, and would make fabulous gifts. Buy this for your man and enjoy

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Cover Up Dark Circles
review_text: Put the "light" back in highlight without that greasy feeling.  Your dark circles will be concealed, and you'll look wide awake

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: THE BEST!!
review_text: This is truly the best in highlighting products and I have tried many high end and cheaper products out there.  This is so light and just doesn't get all cakey and greasy.  I have tried so many brands that claim to look natural, but they just don't.  This really does and don't let the price fool you either.  It only takes alittle and lasts a long time, so well worth the price for the look it gives.  I love this!

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: !! Loooove This Product !!
review_text: I've been using Touche Eclat ever since it came out. I still love it. Cannot believe how rested I look after I put this on. My dark circles are minimized & I look radiant. Till now, no other concealer can beat YSL's Touche Eclat. Can't live without this product!

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Fabulous item
review_text: Well worth the money, and considered on the the most timeless and staple classics for your makeup bag

product_name: Brenda Christian Universal Brow Definer: Beauty
title: Universal brow definer
review_text:
I'm giving this product 4 stars for how well this pencil blends with any brow color....I would think for people who use and like to define brows with pencil, this is a perfect neutral color.I subtracted one star because i
prefer to apply brow definers with brow powder and a brush. I think it looks more natural..  Brenda Christian makes a brow powder which I prefer over pencils but the color of this pencil is far superior to any powder
I can find.  Sometimes I mix the two. I start with the pencil and add a bit of powder.  All all, it's the color of this pencil that is superior to all other eyebrow pencils

product_name: Urban Decay Sparkler Pen For Lips: Beauty
title: Good color, smell, staying power, so-so value
review_text: I like that the gloss isn't goopy or sticky, and that it provides a sheer wash of color that seems to stay put for a while, but you don't get much product. I bought Flare and love the color and the way it somewhat stains your lips with a light wash of color, so even when the gloss wears off you still have some color on your lips. I wasn't really thrilled with the small amount of gloss you actually get in the pen. But overall, I do like it, but don't know if I'd buy it again

product_name: Philosophy Waffle Cone: Beauty
title: Wonderful Philosophy
review_text: I bought this item as a gift, but I have used Philosophy products in the past.  They are wonderful and have an amazing fragrance!! And they produce amazing lather

product_name: Prada Prada Amber Pour Homme: Beauty
title: Prada
review_text: i found this sent the most amazing.  i found it in the december 2006 issue of GQ,  i was determined to find it.  i found it.  i was so excited.  i work at a fast food restraunt and i put PRADA AMBER on before my 8 hour shift and tords the end of my shift people could still smell this fragrance.  i was so excited.  i would recomind this to anyone.  who wants to feel safistacated.

product_name: Prada Prada Amber Pour Homme: Beauty
title: PRADA cologne will make you want to smell him.
review_text: Bought this for my boyfriend, and I can't stop smelling him because it's unlike any other cologne I've ever come upon.  It's so intriguing that I find myself sniffing him just to get another whiff of it.  I can best describe it as a soft-suede with hints of amber, vanilla, and wood. It smells better after it's been on the skin for a while.  It does  have a slight feminine scent, however, this makes me like it more, and makes me want HIM to wear it more.  It's definetely for a confident man

product_name: Calvin Klein Eternity For Men: Beauty
title: Lives up to it's name these days...
review_text:
Eternity was signature scent of the late 80's early 90's and has been around long enough to gain a rightful, classic status now.
It is one of the best on the market, it smells classy, clean, zingy and has more than a touch of the erotic about it.
Always worth having a bottle handy even if you don't wear it everyday, it is a yummy, scrummy scent

product_name: Bourjois Multi Shimmer Loose Eye Shadow: Beauty
title: Love the stuff
review_text:
I absolutely love this eyeshadow. I have it in three different colors, as after my first one (the Illuminateur), I got addicted. I've since bought the Ambre and the Bleu Swimming Pool. It can be hard to tell from pictures on this site, or any other, what the color of this item is really like. That is it say, it changes depending on the light. My white Illuminateur looks purple in some lights, shiny white in others, and a light blue in others. It's really amazing on its own, or layered. All of the colors have a lot of "oomph" to them. Make sure you shake the bottle before using for best color results (as mentioned on the packaging).

As someone who doesn't own a lot of makeup brushes, I love that it includes one. However, I have noticed with these, and with other brands of eyeshadow that have similar packaging, if you're not careful, you can bend some of the bristles backwards (and they may stay that way) when reinserting the brush. Simply solved by not rushing. :

product_name: ARMANI CODE For Women By GIORGIO ARMANI eau de parfum: Beauty: Giorgio Armani
title: GLAMOROUS, MYSTERIOUS, SEDUCTIVE
review_text:
Glamorous, mysterious, seductive all describe Armani Code, a captivating orange blossom based scent from Giorgio Armani Fragrance.

	As one would expect from this master couturier the bottle itself is a gem.  Tapering from a weighted base the slim flacon seems to glow as lacquered shades of blue sweep from an early dawn at the bottom of the sleek holder to midnight nearing the top.  Adding to the fragrance's intrigue is an oriental effect achieved by  lace embroidery on the glass.

	The scent  is sweet yet sensuous with a sparkle provided by orange zest.  With orange blossom at its heart Armani Code is enhanced by Sambac jasmine, Madagascan vanilla and honey.  The man in my life called it "delicious," and I do, too.  It's now high on my list of favorite fragrances.
 
         - Gail Cook

product_name: Clinique Total Turnaround Visible Skin Renewer Cream: Beauty
title: great product
review_text: i've used this cream for years.  i like the way it feels and makes my skin look.  i'd recommend it to anyone.

product_name: Fresh Supernova Mascara: Beauty
title: fabulous
review_text: this is by far my favorite mascara, and i've tried "hundreds' I have very few, and very short lashes. this mascara pumps them up, makes them look twice as long!.. love love lov

product_name: Lancome Hypnose Mascara Waterproof: Beauty
title: Glamorous
review_text:
I don't know how many mascaras I own but there's always about two or three that I hold as my favorite or just for different occasions. One of those is Hypnose and I really like it for when I go out or just looking for that dramatic look.

Postive:
1.) The look: I've never neccessarily wanted to wear fake eyelashes but they do look almost perfect. Unbelievably, Hypnose gives you that look. It's amazing just how feathery your eyelashes look.
2.) Flaking: This mascara never really flaked on the bottom of my eyes. That's really important to me.

Negative:
1.) This mascara starts out great but after about two and a half weeks it starts emptying out on you. This might just be because there were days when I reapplyed it or simply because I just used it pretty well (1 coat just about everyday because of how much I liked it).

Summary: If you want that natural yet "are those real lashes?!" look, then you'll like this mascara. I'm giving it four stars instead of five simply because of how long it lasts but if you use it once it a while, then it will last you a while

product_name: Laura Mercier Eye Colour: Beauty
title: Cashmere Texture
review_text: I was very impressed with the texture of these shadows. They slip on softly with a great feel and last all day or night with no creasing. I also like the way the colors will go on subtley with a light touch or with a heavier hand build up for more intensity. The color selection is gorgeous. Just one word of warning -- you can't really go by the color samples. It's better to see them in person. I bought Lilac Mist which is beautiful on the brow bone and was very close to what I was expecting. But Paris By Night looks like a gray but is actually a deep mauve. I was dissapointed until I tried it. It contoured my eyes beautifully and while intense is very natural looking. This is about the fourth time I've bought Laura Mercier products and I've been totally pleased with the quality.

product_name: Laura Mercier Eye Colour: Beauty
title: Natural Shadow
review_text:
Like the powder blush, this eye shadow is silky not chalky.  It goes on sheer and looks natural but beautiful.  All of the colors I've tried are very nice.  Toasted Almond is a wonderful ivory.  American Coffee is a rich brown (but doesn't go on too dark -- you can layer it for more drama), Caramel is a creamy beige.  
This is a great product for everyday.
NOTE:  You will need an eye shadow brush for this just as you need a blush brush -- it does not come with one

product_name: Clinique Superpowder Double Face Makeup 04 Matte Honey: Beauty
title: All In One Face Powder and Foundation!
review_text: I have used this product for the past 16 years. It is wonderful!The Super Double Face Powder is actually a foundation and matte powder all rolled into one product. The product comes with an application sponge, goes on dry, gives superb coverage! I don't even use my Clinique concelar when I wear this product, it is that good! This product works best with those individuals who have normal or combination skin.

product_name: Clinique Superpowder Double Face Makeup 04 Matte Honey: Beauty
title: Best No-Foundation-Needed Face Powder Ever!
review_text: As someone who really dislikes making up, but needs a bit of cover in her face powder, I have found Clinique's Superpowder to be just the right product. I have been using it for nearly ten years. In between Superpowder purchases I have tried other lesser brands and have always returned to this product. It is truly no muss, no fuss. No foundation, or concealers, just a nice simple matte powder that sets in naturally. No powdery bits sitting on the skin surface, no flaking ... and stays on all day with nary a touch up ... just perfect

product_name: Laura Mercier Eye Basics: Beauty
title: Wonderful stuff
review_text: This is a fantastic product and lasts forever, so the relatively steep cost is not so bad.  This is a great product for using under eye makeup, because it makes the eye makeup slip on better and stay on longer, or alone, for a natural but still 'put-together' look.  I love this product more than mascara, and haven't found anything like it in other product lines.

product_name: Clinique Perfectly Real Compact Makeup: Beauty
title: Amazing Everyday Makeup
review_text:
I have never found a compact foundation, cream or powder, that looked and lasted even remotely as well as a liquid foundation with a dusting of powder over it. Until now. This is an amazing makeup, and the best part is that it doesn't take a whole lot of product to achieve perfect coverage. My skin tends to be red, but this doesn't even hint at it. Plus, it's a nice matte without being too dry. 
For everyday, this is my time saving, face perfecting miracle.

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: FOR A SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy! 

Gail Cook

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: A MIRROR SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy!

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Best Gloss on the Market
review_text:
MAC LipGlass is the absolute best. There are plenty of colors to choose from, SUPER-Shiny, and the gloss is thick, stays on and doesn't run. 
The best colors are....
NICO for a cute lavender pink color with a glittery shine. 
OYSTERGIRL is a shimmery baby pink.
OH BABY is the perfect gloss for any earth toned lipstick.
CHAI looks amazing with black smokey eyes. It's the perfect neutral earthy gloss and has no glitter or shimmer - just pure shine

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Vanilla scent not so bad!
reviewer: Lindsey Justice "MAC addict, and reader of many things"
review_text: I'm REALLY anal about scented/flavored lipglosses- especially ones scented or flavored with vanilla, but MAC LipGlass isn't that vanilla-ish at all!  It's got very pigmented color, it stays on a LONG time for a gloss, and each tube lasts a long time...  Don't let what the other reviewer said about the vanilla scent throw you off

product_name: philosophy lavender pound cake shampoo, body wash, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: Smells good to me!
review_text: I thought this stuff smelled fantastic, and very similar to a lavender poundcake. I guess smell is very subjective, though, so if you're not sure about this one, you might want to have a sniff at your local Sephora or department store before purchasing

product_name: Karma Natural Dusting Powders by LUSH: Beauty
title: Very nice.
review_text:
I received this as a gift, and love it.  I don't normally use dusting powders, but this is light and silky.  The scent is very patchouli, which I happen to like.  Sort of reminds me of the head shops from the 60's-70's.  

I especially like the fact that all LUSH products are natural without a lot of chemicals

product_name: L'Occitane Almond Shower Oil 8.4oz: Beauty
title: L'Occitane Almond Products
review_text: This product is amazing! I have very dry skin and this just soaks in,leaving my skin soft and rejuvenated for days.I even have used it for my  shampoo @ times with good results there,too.

product_name: L'Occitane Almond Shower Oil 8.4oz: Beauty
title: Good...very good.
review_text: A time saver.  Slap in on while still wet right after your shower; instant moisturization if you've got to jump in, jump out, and go.  And it smells delicious

product_name: Sephora Complexion Extractor with Lance: Beauty
title: Pretty handy tool...
review_text: This tool is great for removing whiteheads and blackheads both.  As a RN with dermatology experience I have used many tools, I like this one as it saves you from bruising, or squishing your skin. So it solves the problem with a minimum of damage.  If you haven't used anything like this it may take some getting used to, but it's way better than using your fingers.  I gave it 4 of 5 stars as it can be a bit difficult to line up because the hole is so small

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: Delicious and classic!
review_text: I love this scent - it's so fresh yet so distinctive.  Light enough to wear to a ballet or other event where you're in close qurters with others, but distinct enough that people notice it.  Every time I wear it I get compliments on how great I smell.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: Beautiful
review_text: I really smell the peach in this, and thats why I love it. I love how its mixed in with the powdery florals. Its not heavy, its sexy without trying too hard and there is something old fashioned about it but it has a modern twist. I love this perfume

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: Sensual Maybe Baby
review_text: Soft, sensual -  made me feel feminine and attractive - My husand agrees

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: A Feminine Scent for Everyday
review_text: I am so sick of all the fragrances out there that smell like chocolate, pie or cake. Why people want to smell like food puzzles me. That's why I was so glad to find a feminine floral scent with a little tease to it. Maybe Baby is delightful, not too heavy but making its presence known. The complements will flow. It's sweet (not too sweet though) and innocent while at the same time being flirty. If I had to pick a season it reminds me of it would be Spring. I can't describe a frangrance anymore than I can describe a wine but with all the stinkers out there I just had to put in a good word for this very wearable scent.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: Classic femininity!
review_text: If you love the scent of the Bathina line, Benefit has finally come out with an eau de toilette with the same scent. I wear this scent everyday and I always get compliments. I love to put the scent in my hair because it lingers in hair longer than skin. Many scents smell different on different skin types, but Maybe Baby is a pretty true scent. I guaruntee you will absolutely love this perfume and so will everyone around you. :

product_name: The Body Shop Hemp Lip Protector Tin: Beauty
title: BEST CHAP STICK
review_text: Ok I have really large lips and for years I have tried everything to protect them. Get this tin, for some reason the stick doesn't work as well, and your lips will be unchapped for the whole day. It's pricey but worth every penny if your like me and your lips chap easily. Trust me I have tried everything, even pricier chapsticks and this one does the trick

product_name: L'Occitane - Lavender - Eau de la Recolte Bleue: Beauty
title: Lovely, fresh, light and relaxing!
review_text:
L'Occitane combined their famous lavender note with touches of peach, marigold and freesia to create a lovely, fresh and relaxing scent.  It's a nice one to wear before bed, too, not overpowering.  In the summer, I look for fragrances that contain natural notes mosquitoes do not care for and lavender is one of them.  The peach note in some fragrances also turns funky on my skin, but I have not had this problem with Eau de Recolte Bleue.  I prefer this over their Lavender Harvest fragrance, which I think would smell better on men (JMOP.)

Here is a description from their website:

"Eau de la Rcolte Bleue exudes all the pleasures of Provence. Both fresh and as light as air, it captures the celebratory feel of the Lavender Harvest.

Composed from a blend of the green scent of leaves and A.O.C. Lavender essential oil, Eau de la Rcolte Bleue is accompanied by the delicate notes of freesia, marigold and frosted peach. Woody and musky aromas then leave a lingering and sensual, fragrant trail."

All in all, I find this soft, gentle and thoroughly wearable.  Especially enjoy it on a summer evening.

product_name: Murad Age Spot & Pigment Lightening Gel: Beauty
title: Great results, good value for your $
review_text: I have been using this cream for almost 2 months now and the results are amazing. My sun spots are lightened and it has also decreased the redness on my face. I will continue to use it and highly recommend it.

product_name: Murad Age Spot & Pigment Lightening Gel: Beauty
title: Amazing!
review_text: Growing up worshiping the sun had finally taken its toll on my skin. As of late I have noticed sun spots on my face, chest and hands (yuck!). My Esthetician recommended I try Murad's Age Spot and Pigment Lightening Gel. In about a month I noticed the spots beginning to fade! It is super light weight and soaks in fast too!  Now all I have to do is remember the sunscreen..

product_name: Laura Mercier Foaming One-Step Cleanser, 5 fl. oz.: Beauty
title: SIMPLIFY, SIMPLIFY, SIMPLIFY !
review_text:
Simplify, simplify, simplify! That's what I try to do with my beauty routine. Hence, I was first attracted to LAURA MERCIER'S facial cleanser by its name "ONE-STEP CLEANSER." 

I'm staying with it because it works. No more separate purchases for eyemake removers or "deep cleansers. 

"ONE-STEP CLEANSER" removes all traces of makeup even from the delicate eye area and leaves my skin feeling clean, supple and nourished. It's both easy and effective

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Cover Up Dark Circles
review_text: Put the "light" back in highlight without that greasy feeling.  Your dark circles will be concealed, and you'll look wide awake

product_name: Klein-Becker StriVectin-SD® Eye Cream: Beauty
title: works well
review_text: I like this product, but am not sure it is worth the money. I have bought other products for $5 at my local store and I seem to have similar results

product_name: Pre de Provence 250g Honey Almond Shea Butter Enriched Triple Milled Soap: Beauty
title: Great
review_text: I decided to try it out and have found the only soap I want to use.  The fragrance is great, it does not overpower.  I guess the milling process gives the soap it's texture which removes the need for all those bath/shower accessories.  And 1 bar lasted over 2 months.  I will definitely be ordering more and trying other products this vendor carries

product_name: Pre de Provence 250g Honey Almond Shea Butter Enriched Triple Milled Soap: Beauty
title: Gentle, fragrant and long lasting
review_text: The ground almond hulls are gentle enough for daily use of the soap directly on the skin without being scratchy. The scent is strong, but not overpowering and both the soap and scent are long lasting. This soap is also so moisturizing that my  skin doesn't require lotion as it does after most store brand soaps and shower gels. This particular soap is my main shower bar and my great experience with it convinced me to return to bar soap after years of being a Bath and Body Works shower gel and lotion fiend.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Body So Fine: Beauty
title: LOVELY, DELICIOUS, PERFECT
review_text: "Body so fine" is the most beautiful and luxurious cosmetic I ever had. I recommend it because the description of benefit is absolutely real. It's the most delicious, velvet and beautiful balm for the legs and the arms. Also the retro - chic and vintage box and can are romantic and beautiful. PERFECT for me

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Body So Fine: Beauty
title: So cute and feminine
review_text: I got some of this body balm yesterday. The lady at the Benefit counter said that it would make my skin look luminescent like a Victoria's Secret model. She put a sample on one of my arms and I held it up to the other arm. The difference was amazing! The arm with the Bathina looked smoother, silker, and had a pearlized look. I can't stop raving about this stuff. It is slightly expensive, but the tin is really big (and adorable) and the supply of the balm is huge. It should last a really long time. This balm is one of the best products that Benefit has

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Body So Fine: Beauty
title: Hmmmm....
review_text:
Benefit claims that this is all you will want to wear, and I am starting to think this might be true...

First, I have to say that the texture is intriguing.  It's a balm, but it feels much more velvety, and the slight shimmer gives you a sheen.

Second, I am a sucker for the packaging and presentation.  It comes in a little tin box, with the signature Bathina (very retro chic) and a black powder puff that has a pink ribbon holder.  It makes you want to apply the product in public, just to have an excuse to show off the set.  Also, it ups the feminity factor of applying a product with the little puff (very "I adore being a girl...")

Then, there's the scent.  It's a floral, sexy fragrance that doesn't overpower.  It's clean and a big plus is that it doesn't make me sneeze, like some other scents.

I think that a little goes a long way, and thus, I can say that even though it's a "boutique-brand" product, it is very affordable.  I think that as warmer weather sets in, and you want to show off a little more skin, this is a product that would enhance a tan.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Body So Fine: Beauty
title: Replacement for Stockings
review_text: I couldn't resist the very feminine and retro look of the packaging. And it does look cute in the bathroom. That being said this is great to add a layer of sheen to the legs. Your calves look great without stockings. I find it too waxy to use on the rest of the body but there's nothing better on bare legs. To add a glow to the skin, especially to a tan, try Benefit's Flamingo Fancy

product_name: philosophy strawberry milkshake body souffle: Beauty
title: Yums...
review_text: I've seen lots of negative feedback on the strawberry milkshake scent, but I have to say I love it.  This lotion takes me back to my child hood.  It's got a strawberry quick/bubblegum smell to it.  I think it's fun for summer days

product_name: Clinique Colour Surge Bare Brilliance Lipstick: Beauty
title: Wonderful!!!!!!
review_text:
Clinique's Bare Brilliance is one of my absolute favorite lipsticks ever!
It has a fairly sheer finish with lovely little sparkles in it.  I have Berrylicious(sheer grape) and Cherry Quartz(sheer, true red--doesn't look like it does on the color swatch) and neither overwhelms my pale skin.  I wouldn't be caught dead without a Bare Brilliance lipstick in my makeup bag or purse!

product_name: Youngblood Loose Mineral Blush: Beauty
title: Beautiful!
review_text: I use the Dusty Pink, and I have never ever used a blush that looks so natural, and makes my skin glow so healthy.  With or without the mineral foundation from Youngblood; just lovely.  Highly recommended

product_name: Hard Candy Lip Gloss Ring: Beauty
title: Cute gloss in a cute ring ...
review_text: I loveee this ring soo much .. it looks cute on my mdidle and index finger and the gloss is moisturizing with a touch of glitter .. all in one word: glam!!

product_name: Hard Candy Lip Gloss Ring: Beauty
title: A SPARKLER FOR A STOCKING STUFFER
review_text:
Here's a gem of an idea for a small gift or stocking stuffer for the preteen girls on your list - a cute lip gloss ring from Hard Candy.

     The ring is heart shaped with a flip top filled with a lightly tinted sparkly lip gloss.  It comes in three shades and glosses - Heartbreaker, which is a peach; Kiss Me, which is hot pink, and Yummy, which is baby blue.  All are fruit scented.

      Boxed in a ring box with a faceted lid (presentation, you know), it's finger fun

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Takes practice....
review_text: Mastering the stencils does require some practice...but the color is good for blondes.  I also follow up the powder with an eyebrow pencil to make my eyebrows look a little more defined.  I think my eyebrows look better since using this product

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Brow Ex-press Easy to use
review_text: I loved this product.  The Stencils are easy to use and the instructions are easy to follow.  The Browns are a bit dark so if you have red in your hair like I do you might want to start out light you can always go darker if you need to

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Harder than i thought
review_text: After watching Anastasia do eye brows on TV i decided that i needed to get this item and try to do better shaping of my eye brows.  After receiving this kit, i found that is is quite hard to do by yourself.  Holding the stencil in the proper alinement is difficult for one person to do on themselves.  I do however shape my daughters brows.  In conclusion i think that it takes a lot of skill and i think it would be better to go to her personally or some other experienced person.

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Fantastic - very happy :-O
review_text:
One time while in Los Angeles, I had the forward thinking enough to book an appointment with Anastasia because I'd seen her on Oprah and in magazines and knew she was Queen of the eyebrows.  I thought if I had one appointment, I could maintain them afterward myself.  If you live nowhere near Bev Hills or aren't going to be in LA, this is the next best thing.  It's like having her in your home permanently.
The kit is fantastic.  There are different colours to choose from and it's easy to use.  It does look a little weird at first if you use the colour where there are no brows, but I don't know if everyone can tell, or we girls are just a little more fussy when it comes to ourselves.
This is the best way to get the perfect shape and it really DOES make a difference to your face.  You'll look better and ultimately feel better.  The stencil is the best invention and I highly recommend it

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: should have  bought straight from sephora
review_text: I LOVE THE PRODUCT, AS AN AFTERTHOUGHT THIS WAS SENT FROM SEPHORA WHERE WITH EVERY PURCHASE YOU RECEIVE A BONUS SAMPLE AND EVEN FREE SHIPPING IF YOU QUALIFY. WISH I'D WENT TO THEIR SITE, SINCE I'M A FREQUENT SHOPPER THERE ALSO, OH WELL AMAZON IS WHERE I WILL BUY BOOKS, DVDS   ETC..

product_name: Clinique Stay-Matte Sheer Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: love this powder
review_text: This powder is great. It has great coverage without looking cakey. I also have sensitive skin and this has never bothered me. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it's still a little dark for very light skin and it needs to be "touched-up" a little more often than other powders I've tried, but it's worth it

product_name: La Mer Creme de La Mer: Beauty
title: Excellent for problem skin
review_text:
If you have smooth skin, this product is not for you. 

My skin had no human quality about it; after I went through many procedures of bleaching and laser treatments. I suffer from extreme skin dryness, uneven and dull skin. Other lotions made my face look greasy, or failed to give it that moisturised look.

I have tried many products, for my extreme dry dull skin issues, and this is the first product that has worked for me. Now my skin looks hydrated and normal. It is quite a feat

product_name: Kerastase Resistance Bain Volumactive Shampoo Volumizing - 8.5 oz.: Beauty
title: Kerastase Volumactive Shampoo
review_text: Wonderful shampoo.  I have color treated hair and my color stays shiny and my hair is thicker after I shampoo.  I use the shampoo daily and no longer have scalp problems from product buildup

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Great product!
review_text: This is a great moisturizer for my hair and scalp.  Very light and smells great

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Mimosa Hair Honey
review_text: I was recommended this product for my son's hair and have had many recommendations over the years, since he has beautiful thick curly hair that can tend to be dry and frizzy.  I used a little of this product in his wet hair and it leaves it shiny with less frizz and more curls.  He is 10 and not crazy about the smell, but I think it smells nice.  Fantastic product

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Kansas City User
review_text:
I purchased this product based on the reviews, and I can't begin to tell you how glad I am to have the Hair Honey.  It is wonderful!!  It leaves my hair looking absolutely healthy and bouncy.  The smell was overwhelming at first but the benefits of what the product does for your hair are far greater.

I will be using this for a long time to come

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Wonderful
review_text: I just started using Carols Daughters products but I really like the Hair Honey as an everyday moisturizer for my ends and to smooth my natural hair in the front. I just use a little water and hair honey, tie a scarf for about ten minutes, and my all-natural new growth is smooth, soft, and exactly where I want it to be without using harsh gels, sprays, or spritzes. I am using this and the CD Healthy Hair Butter as a leave-in. I love the fact that its all natural ingredients that are really great and yummy for the hair.

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Honey is Worth The Money
review_text: Forgive me for the rhyme, but the sentiment is true.  This product is rich, but at the same time light.  After opening the jar, I loved the way the Hair Honey smelled, it has a sweet aroma but I didn't detect the "cirtus" smell in the product description.  I am only sorry I didn't get the larger size.

product_name: philosophy buttercream frosting ultra-rich 3-in-1 shampoo, shower gel and bubble bath 16 oz: Beauty
title: smells awesome!
review_text: really enjoy using this as body wash.  the smell is divine, but the bubbles don't last long if used as a bubble bath or shampoo.  moisturizing to my dry skin

product_name: philosophy buttercream frosting ultra-rich 3-in-1 shampoo, shower gel and bubble bath 16 oz: Beauty
title: Subtle scent, rich and creamy foam
review_text: I originally bought this item because I was hoping for the same scent that Yankee candle produces in their candle line.  The smell is nice, although it doesn't reach out and grab you like true buttercream.  Still, it's nice to shower with and you won't be disappointed with the lather.  I put a quarter sized amount on my shower puff and still had to ring out foam from it after I was finished.  Also, the lather is creamy and it just feels like it is moisturizing your skin.  All in all, I am happy with my purchase.  I only gave 4 stars because I like a stronger scent, but if you like more subtlety I'm sure you'll enjoy it

product_name: Clinique Acne Solutions Concealing Stick Shade 01: Beauty
title: the best acne cover stick I have tried
review_text: This concealer comes in a pencil form, so it is very precise and offers very good coverage.  It stays on well.  It is more waxy and not as soft and creamy as most concealers, so you can put it in a small, precise spot and it will actually stay there.  I have tried many concealers for small blemishes, and this is my favorite.  It comes in enough shades so you can find a good match, which is important

product_name: Lancome Bi-Facil Non-Oily Instant Cleanser Sensitive Eyes 125ml/4.2oz: Beauty
title: Lancome Bi-Facil Non-Oily Instant Cleanser Sensitive Eyes
review_text: wear make up every day, and I usually wear foundation, eyeliner, mascara, eyeshadow and lip gloss. That's my every day make up. By the end of the day I have to get it off in order to sleep well. Lancome make up remover helps me a lot. Its very easy to use,it takes off make up quickly and without scrubbing. It's gentle and not irritating. It also smells nice. Though it's kind of expensive, it's a good product.

product_name: Rene Furterer Complexe 5 (1.7 oz. Bottle): Beauty
title: Activate Micro-Circulation
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
The emotionally healing benefits of orange oil and lavender become immediately apparent when you apply this to your scalp. If you can find someone to give you a head massage with this product, then you can truly relax. If applying this yourself, it works well as an at home hair treatment to nourish the hair follicles and promote healthy hair growth. You will also notice your hair becoming stronger and retaining a much deeper shine. The essential oils in this product help to activate micro-circulation which may cause a slight tingling and warming of the scalp. Leave this in for about 5-10 minutes and then wash your hair as normal. You may find you need less conditioner when using this product. Many hairdressers will use this product when giving a conditioning head massage and that is where I first found out about this product. I bought my first bottle the day I had the massage. I was that impressed and I keep buying this product. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Rene Furterer Complexe 5 (1.7 oz. Bottle): Beauty
title: Great for oily scalps!!
review_text: I use this everyother day before shampooing. My hair is much less greasy after using it!! I've also noticed that my hair seems to have more body at the roots. It also has a very pleasant orange/citrus scent. This product is worth every cent. I definitely recommend it for those with oily scalps and thinning hair

product_name: Bourjois Le Petite Black Dress Eye-sentials ($50 Value): Beauty
title: 5 STARS+_+_+_+_+
review_text: this is a MUST MUST MUST i love this kit all of the items included are awesome a must have you will probly not be disappointed gives the best smokey eye loo

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Fun and zesty way to wash my hair
review_text:
For those bored with the same old bottles of shampoo an hair products at their local drugstore this is a fun new way of washing their hair with no chemicals and natural botanicals that truly do wonders and enhance every single hair.

This solid shampoo bar works wonderfully; I had my doubts just like everyone else, and was worried that this would remove the build up but leave the hair overly squeaky clean and stripped, and if it would later at all. To my surprise this small disc turns into an avalanche of bubbles once I wet it and rub it between the hands. I also wet my hair and rub the bar all over, working with the lather form my hands and the lather from the wet bar. I have to admit that this produces more lather than liquid shampoos and washes the hair without leaving it feeling like it was tortured, instead its slippery and wonderfully light. Afterwards I follow with the American Cream conditioner (probably the best hair scented product in the universe) also from Lush for a head of hair that feels rich and buttery soft, with a fresh light fragrance that lingers on.

The scent itself is wonderful, citrusy and earthy, with Patchouli Oil, Orange Oil, Lavendin Oil, Pine Oil , Lemongrass Oil , Elemi Oil , Gardenia Extract and the Roman Chamomile Flower. I often find that all the oils and rich botanicals nourish the hair and leave it feeling happy, organic and natural products have been of high interest to me lately because of the results they deliver for bouncy hair and supple skin. After using drugstore and even expansive brands of hair products and skin potions, I find that my skin and hair never really benefited from all those preservatives and unnatural products derived from mineral oils and god knows what else. Lush and Burt's Bees, Jason and The Body Shop made me change my mind and seek out products that are as good as they smell, and that truly transform me from a sleepy duckling in the morning to a happy princess by the time my morning routine is over.

- Kasia S.

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: OMG
review_text: I JUST got out of the shower a minute ago, and I must say this is the best shampoo I've ever bought. My scalp hasn't felt this clean and fresh in a long time. Washing my super-thick and waist length hair didn't feel like a chore for once, and I actually look forward to my next washing. The smell reminds me of the hippie shops on Haight Street in San Francisco. I love it

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: A MIRROR SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy!

product_name: Deep Steep - Bubble Bath: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text: For the price this product is great - the bubbles were thick and rich and lasted a long time.  The scent was light and fragrant, not over-powering like some other products.  For those who love their bubble baths - highly recommended

product_name: Deep Steep - Bubble Bath: Beauty
title: Good bubbles, fading scent
review_text: I've been pleased with both the quantity and quality of the bubbles, but the scent fades rather quickly.  If the scent lasted longer, it would be much improved

product_name: Deep Steep - Bubble Bath: Beauty
title: Honey, make a bee line for your tub with this one
review_text: I received this a a gift for Valentine's Day this year.  It's a nice bubble bath with lots of foam (rather than big, double bubbles).  It's chock full of natural ingredients and no SLS so it's very gentle- even for little ones.  I do however prefer the Deep Steep in the calming lavender chamomile or energizing rosemary mint.

product_name: Deep Steep - Bubble Bath: Beauty
title: Yummy relaxing scents
review_text: I love the scent of the Grapefruit-Bergamot bubble bath.  This combination is suitable for men or women.  Deep Steep products are really first rate.  The foot scrub and lotions are well worth the money

product_name: Britney Spears Surprising Twist!: Beauty
title: fantasy
review_text: i bought this but the perfume side was a clear color not purple colored and there is no color in the lip gloss it's ust glittery but i love i

product_name: Iman Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: The best for women of color and ethnicities
review_text: I used to sell Iman when it was in a major department store.  This stuff would fly off the shelves.  Too bad it was hardly ever in stock which made many customers go to something else.  I stuck with it for 10 years now and would not dare use anything else!  Buy it - you will not be disappointed

product_name: Iman Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: Very Nice!
review_text: I have been using i-man line of products for the past 5 years, and have been a very happy customer. This is my first time shopping for i-man makeup online and I realize that Amazon.com has it for half price. This is a fantastic deal and the product is beautiful for all skin tone. My friends comment that I look flawless.

product_name: Vera Wang Truly Pink: Beauty
title: Truly Pink . . .
review_text:
Knowing how I love everything pink, a dear friend of mine gave this to me as a present. I love the scent, it's not overpowering but has that lovely and alluring smell. It's so fragrant and I feel like I'm forever in a garden full of freshly-bloom beautiful pink roses. 

One of the simple pleasures in life - Truly Pink by Vera Wang. 

Leave a scent of you behind. 

Wholeheartedly recommended.

product_name: H2O Plus Face Oasis® Hydrating Treatment: Beauty
title: Great stuff
review_text: For a guy who never paid attention to the face cream he used, I found H2O Plus to be amazing stuff.  Non-greasy, no heavy scents -- it's worth every penny

product_name: H2O Plus Face Oasis® Hydrating Treatment: Beauty
title: Amazing product!
review_text: Face Oasis isn't like any other moisturizer I've tried - One application makes my skin appear plump and well-hydrated even if I've neglected to drink my 8 glasses of water that day.  It isn't at all greasy, absorbs quickly, and serves as a great base over which to apply my makeup. The guys I've introduced it to have raved about it as well!

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Wave Creating Spray: Beauty
title: Get easy beach waves!
review_text: I have thick in-between wavy and straight hair that is also dry and frizzy. Other curl enhancing lotions I have tried have made my hair feel crunchy, hard and sticky, yuck! Not this one. After I wash and condition my hair I apply this spray to almost dry hair, scrunch it and let it air dry. It gives my otherwise limp, frizzy waves definition, lift and bounce. It even adds shine and smells great, sort of like watermelon. It also looks more natural and is much easier than having to use a curling iron. The spray is easy to use and you can't really use too much of it, which is a problem I've had with other products. In between washes I just spray my hair with water and scrunch it to reactivate the waves.

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Wave Creating Spray: Beauty
title: Raves About Waves
review_text: I always liked the way my hair looks after a swim in the ocean and drying in the sea breeze. Unfortunately I couldn't do that every day but now I can get the look with Fekkai's Wave Creating Spray. The underneath part of my hair has some natural curl and waves. I spray it on damp hair, scrunch and air dry and although it doesn't dry in a toussle of Renaisannce waves and perfect (bong!) ringlets, it really amps up the curls and waves and gives me that beachy look. There' not a crunch factor either although if you keep spraying it on dry brushed out hair the hair can tend to get dryed out. It does add spring and holds well. I don't know how it would work on very straight hair since the top part of my hair doesn't want to respond much. But it works nicely on enhancing what Mother Nature gave you.

product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Eye Recovery Complex 15ml/0.5oz: Beauty
title: Visable result quickly!
review_text: So I was a little suspicious of this product at first; eye creams seem to be the most benign things on the market.  When the beauty consultant put this on my face I let her just to be obliging not really expecting anything.  We continued to talk about her products and I realized that I was feeling burning under my eyes (not painful just noticeable) and she said :"See look it is working already!"  I looked and saw nothing but it felt good and she was kinda high pressure so I bought it.  When I got to the car and looked at myself I could see a definite improvement.  The skin under my eyes was tighter, it was still dark under my eye but without all the baggage it was much improved.  So I think that if I use this product and put my concealer on over it I am going to notice a huge difference.  Highly recommended

product_name: Imju Fiberwig Fiberwig Mascara: Beauty
title: miraculous mascara
review_text:
i'm so happy that this product finally made its way here in the states. i was introduced to this particular brand a few years ago by a friend when i went to visit her in osaka, and i've been hooked since.

i'm one of those unfortunate few who for some reason or the other always end up with "panda eyes" at the end of the day due to mascara run-off. i've tried everything from cheap to expensive, and from regular to waterproof mascaras to no avail. somehow though, this mascara, because of the unique properties of the fibers will not smudge on the skin, no matter how humid or wet the day is. the cool thing about it is that if you rub your eyes the fiber will fall, but not stain the skin, thus eliminating the panda eye effect. the fibers will coat the eyelashes and dry up, forming a sort of tube around the lashes and are surprisingly easy to clean at the end of the day, no special solutions needed. when you clean your eyelashes you can actually see the fibers loosen up and leave your lashes without any residue.

i am also a contact lens wearer and this product, unlike many other mascaras, doesn't irritate my eyes and lasts practically forever.

this has to be the best mascara i have used yet, and that is saying something. even the expensive department store and specialty mascaras pale next to this. and i even bought it at a local japanese drugstore!

never leave home without it; it's possibly the last mascara you'll ever need

product_name: Godiva Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Absolutely Amazing!
review_text: I was a bit weary at trying a Shampoo Bar, but as soon as I took a whiff of this little hockey-puck of sunshine, I was sold.  The scent is strong - so watch out if strong florals give you headaches - so strong, in fact, I can smell the jasmine and honeysuckle wafting out of the shower at this very moment.  When I had it in the bag, fresh from purchase, it scented the entire living room!  The conditioning agent isn't enough for people who use deep conditioners -  I recommend following up the shampooing with a seperate conditioner.  But the Fragrance and ease of rubbing a bit of soap onto wet hair, achieving masses of luscious lather, a quick rinse and go - Priceless!  This is definately a little gem that everyone should try

product_name: T for Toes Dusting Powder by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great for making feet feel nice and fresh... for a whole working shift!
review_text:
I work retail so I'm on my feet for hours at a time.  Throughout the day, my feet sweat (yes, gross I know... but there's no smell), so gave LUSH's T For Toes a try.  I noticed a huge difference the first time I tried it.  For my whole shift, I wasn't able to feel any moisture on my feet at all!!  My feet and toes felt as fresh as it did when I first started work.  

The dusting powder is made with real Tea Tree oil, so it works as an antibacterial agent as well.  It's supposed to handle stinky feet as well, and my boyfriend swears by it.  He works construction and uses it everyday and loves it because it's not girly smelling and even the packaging is not girly, so he doesn't mind leaving it at work.

T for Toes is a wonderful product and you only need to use a real little bit

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: Shave like your grandpa did.
review_text: Like most others, I fell for all the hype that convinced me that every couple of years, I had to buy the latest, greatest design in razors.  With each new design, the blades got more and more expensive until I realized that it was just a gimmick to get more of my hard earned money.  About a year ago, I bought a Merkur razor and have not regretted it.  If you are a newbie to this type of razor, you may want to start off slow and make minor changes to your technique.  Then, enjoy your smooth shave and think about what to do with the extra money in your pocket

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: Great blades
review_text: I have hard facial hairs (Thanks Dad!!) and after being Gilette user (last used Mac 3), I finally decided to go back to classic style of shaving with Double Edge (DE) razor and blades. Merkur are the first ones I have used after the multi-edge blades and after 4-5 shaves, I am getting closer shaves (w/ no irritation) than by using mutli-edge ones. Also, to get better results, I would recommend a "Badger" brush which really softens the skin before these DE blades with a good heavy razor (Merkur is a good one) can smoothly get your facial stubs. Good luck !

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: Best blades, best price
review_text: This is the second time I have ordered these blades for my husband. He has a very heavy beard and says these are the only razor blades he's ever used that last anywhere near this long, regular blades dull almost right away (sorry he's not here or I'd ask for the details from him, I don't know how long "a long time" is) but at 50, he's tried a lot of blades!
