I talked to the girl at the counter several days ago about this and I had a huge cyst that was very painful. She told my to use the oxygen peel 3 times in a row and that should help. I would be using all the extra gel that was made and would see more results. 
I went home that night and did just as she said. I was amazed to see that the painful cyst had risen to the surface and I was able to relieve the pressure. This is a truely amazing product and would recommend it to anyone who has this same proble

product_name: Laura Mercier Illuminating Stick: Beauty
title: FOR A NATURAL GLOW
review_text:
For a touch of the sun without risking  skin damage the always innovative and practical  Laura Mercier came up with the "Solar Flair" Collection.

	One of my favorites in this line is the Illuminating Stick, an easy way to achieve an instant glow.  The stick is available in two shades, Golden Honey Glow, which provides a subtle bronze luster, and Golden Rose Glow, which very much resembles a natural blush.

	With earth minerals for a lovely luster and shine, the color is applied directly to the skin with fingertips or brush.  It blends smoothly and leaves a soft, velvety texture.

	There's no limit to where it can be used - as a blush on the apple of the cheeks or across forehead, brow bone or chin for a "just in from a day at the beach" look.  For evening my preference is the Honey Glow applied across shoulders as well.

	Key ingredients include Vitamin E, Vitamin C, Vitamin A, and Bismuth Oxychoride, which acts as a light reflector by sun or moonlight

product_name: Merkur Progress Double Edge Safety Razor: Beauty
title: All-around best razor
review_text:
Having shaved with everything from cheapo disposables to Thiers-Issard straight razors, I have to say that the Merkur Progress is probably the best all-around razor available today. It has excellent heft and balance, and the adjustment feature is simple and straightforward. (Although I do agree that the numbered adjustment seems to perform a little differently depending on the blade used.) It is easy to keep clean--assuming you don't mind unscrewing it and taking the blade out to wipe off the head and frame. Having also used a venerable old Gillette "fat boy" from the 1950s, I'd still have to rate the Progress as a better razor; the screw operated adjustment makes it constantly adjustable, not just in steps. 

Since this is a safety razor, its performance is significantly dependent on the blades used. I've tried both the Merkur blades and the Japanese "Feather" blades, and would say that it's a toss-up. 

And since it is an adjustable safety razor, it is perfectly suited to two-pass close shaving. A higher setting is excellent on the first pass with the grain of the beard, and a lower setting for the pass against the grain. The adjustment also allows you to adjust the razor to the conditions of your skin and beard. If you've let yourself get a day's worth of stubble (c'mon--don't we all?) you can set the blade high to mow that hedge. If you need a quick clean-up before a night on the town, you can set it lower for a "Once lightly, James."

So if you want a really well-made, no-nonsense but very versatile razor that will last for a good long time, this is a good bet. The only problem might be preventing pals from swiping it, or reminding your wife/significant other to take it apart to clean it after she smooths up those pretty pins you love so well.

One recommendation: Shop around. You can get these for under $40.00 if you bargain-hunt, likewise full 20-count boxes of carded Merkur 10-blade refill sets

product_name: Fantastic Four Bath Bomb Gift Set by LUSH: Beauty
title: This stuff smells great!
review_text: I bought this on a whim because I just remodeled my house after Hurricane Katrina and now have a huge jacuzzi tub...nice to take long baths in so of course I needed some bubble stuff.  The bath bombs smell wonderful.  My whole bathroom smelled of the bath bombs until I used them all.  I even put the box they came in into my closet and it made my closet smell wonderful (for about a week)!  The bombs each have something special inside of them that you find out about when they dissolve.  The fizzing is fun and the smell lingered on my skin until the next day.  I loved them and will definitely buy more

product_name: Tarte FRXtion: Beauty
title: My Lip Fix for Sweet, Kissable Lips
review_text:
This was my fisrt foray into lip scrubs.  I like the dual concept, with a scrub on one side and a lip balm on the other.  I also like the fact, this slips into you purse or pocket easily, so it's convenient for those on the go.  I took mine skiing in Vail, and it was the first time I didn't come home with chapped lips. 

The textures are good.  The scrub side is slightly grainy, more of a polish than a scrub.  I would not recommend it for heavily chapped lips, but it works well for weekly maintenance. The lip balm side is a little waxy, but moisturizing with vityamin e.  It's quite long-lasting and provides a sweet, natural shine.  This smells of spun vanilla, sweet and sugary. 

Why only 4 stars?  I think Tarte should have added SPF 15 sun protection.  Doing so would provide sweet, kissable lips and the protection you need

product_name: Tarte FRXtion: Beauty
title: Love the scrub, and the balm is great, too.
review_text:
I got this as a present, when it finally came back in stock.

The scrub part of the stick does a great job, but you need to have lips that aren't in dire need of help for it to really work.  To do that, just use a moist, soft toothbrush, and gently scrub.  The scrub side will sometimes leave a little sugar behind, so you might have to wipe your lips off a little after you use it, but I found that this doesn't happen all the time.

The balm side goes on smoothly, and feels great.  It's silky feeling, but does not provide a lot of moisture, so, if you lips are on the dryer side,  this is not going to replace your regular gloss.

This stuff is great for on the go, and I will be buying it again when mine runs out

product_name: HAPPY For Men By CLINIQUE cologne: Beauty: Clinique
title: Happy for Men smells good!
review_text: Forget all those other so-called good colognes out there. Happy for Men is the best smelling one of them all! It may be expensive, but it is well worth it. Example: I sprayed down a shirt with it and send it home with my girlfriend at her request! She requested this because she wanted have something of mine that she could sleep with it while we are apart. That is how good it is! Enjoy

product_name: HAPPY For Men By CLINIQUE cologne: Beauty: Clinique
title: A distinct scent...
review_text: for me, Happy has a subtley orange undertone and evokes a sense of vibrancy and youth. As with the signature female clinique scents, you don't need much to cause a stir and it always leaves a lingering, subtle trail of sophistication

product_name: Kerastase Masquintense for Very Dry and Fine Hair - 16.7 oz 500 ml: Beauty
title: Worth every penny - your hair will fell like silk & smell great!
review_text:
I'm not kidding, it's worth every penny (though I must admit that I get it at a lower price from a secret supplier in Asia). After using this, you'll swear that you just got a hot oil/deep treatment done from a professional salon. 

I have chemically treated hair (relaxed, double process - colored & fine hair equals damaged hair), and this is the only conditioner that works for me. Another plus is, this is the only conditioner that elicits "your hair smells sooooo good" reaction from my boyfriend & daughter.

Surprisingly, even if it moisturizes my hair excellently, it still leaves it bouncy & with enough volume.

This lasts about 6 months if you use it once a week, so it's really not that expensive, especially if you substitute this for your regular deep conditioning treatment at the salon.

If you're still wary, try a smaller bottle

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Luminous Green
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
The Avobath bath bomb turns water a lovely luminous pale green. Avocado, olive oil, lemongrass, bergamot, rosewood oil, gardenia extract makes this a skin calming, soothing, moisturizing dream. The "green luster" makes this bath especially beautiful and gives it a mermaid mood. I loved this one so much, I'm ordering two the next time. 

The scent is lemon/lime, but by the time you get in the tub, the floral scents are more prominent. You can add in some bubbles, but they don't seem to last very long - well, I was using a bath gel. 

So, you may want to find a bubble bar because the olive oil seems to make them disappear pretty fast. At least, that is my theory because I've noticed bath oil does the same thing. Avobath goes well with Whoosh products or the Happy Hippy Shower gel. If you are in the mood, you might want the amazing "Godiva" shampoo and conditioner 2 in 1 bar (has a magical quality - makes hair super shiny) or the "I love Juicy" shampoo and "Veganese" conditioner. The last two also have a citrus scent and are especially delicious. 

When I use Lush products, I'm in a good mood all week long. It is truly amazing how happy and content I am as long as I have some Lush products around. :)

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: An uplifting lemongrass fizzer!
review_text:
This cheery green bomb releases the uplifting scent of lemongrass blended with some other elements that make it well-rounded and fruity - the reviewer who likened it to Froot Loops cereal wasn't too far off base! Add a sizzling lemony-herbal top note to Froot Loops and you have this bomb's scent.

Since lemongrass oil is good for uplifting the spirits, this is a great bomb for those tired or grumpy days we all have sometimes.

There is the mildest shimmer to it, that you really have to look for in the water itself, and it gives the lime-green water a lovely depth and sparkle. But it isn't glittery and you won't end up with anything you can see on your skin. It is more an in-bath pony trick!

This is a great bomb for cheering you up on a wintry day, and one I keep a small supply of and use often

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: IT'S NOT EASY BEING GREEN, UNLESS.....
review_text:
As we've heard, it's not easy being green.  It's more than easy, it's delightful if you're an Avobath Bath Ballistic.  Infused with avocado (hence the name) and olive oil it moisturizes skin.

     The fragrance is fresh,  rather citrusy, thanks to lemongrass and rosewood.  Bath water is a lovely shade of green, rather like new spring grass.

      If there's glitter in it I didn't find any, which was as I wished.  It's suggested for morning - I'd relax with an Avobath any time of day

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Sparkly citrus
review_text: I love the fresh scent of the Avobath, there's just nothing like it. It smells like springtime to me. I have yet to notice any glitter in an Avobath bath (and I've taken about 10) so if you're glitter shy, don't let that stop you from trying this one

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Avocado Bath Heaven
review_text: I like to eat avocados, I like avocado face masks, and now I can bathe in eau de avocado!  This bath bomb is possibly my favorite - very softening, great color (turns your tub into a nice green lagoon), and great lemony scent.  I didn't find the glitter to be very noticeable, so don't worry about that.  Stock up on this one

product_name: Kai Gift Set: Beauty
title: Heaven full of Beautiful Flowers
review_text: Kai is like lying in a meadow in the warmth of the sun, with a gentle breeze, and the aroma of a million sweet flowers embracing you. Oh, how I love it

product_name: Sugar Cosmetics I Scream 4 Sugar Mini Lip Gloss Set: Beauty
title: Sweet!^_-
review_text:
O.k,these glosses are just plain yummy!

Actually,they don't taste like lipglosses at all,which is a good thing.No one wants waxy or 
chemical flavored gloss that 
makes you want to throw up,right?

All the flavors are amazingly delicious.Each one tastes just like sweets.

The colors are sheer and radiant without looking cheap or tacky.

They go with any eyeshadow or blush color and make your lips sparkle.

I wish the  tubes were just a bit bigger and the glosses were less sticky.

Overall,nice glosses but a bit overpriced for such lil tubes

product_name: Sugar Cosmetics I Scream 4 Sugar Mini Lip Gloss Set: Beauty
title: Yum!
review_text: I am absolutely addicted to this lip gloss. I own over 300 different brands of gloss, and this is by far one of my favorites. It's a pretty good deal, at only $28 for so many colors. I like the small size because it easily fits into any evening bag or pocket. It's fun to layer the different colors as well, and there are an infinate amount of combonations between all of the different colors and flavors. They also taste amazing, each embodying a yummy taste exactly like sugar. It goes especially well with the Aquolina Pink Sugar fragrance, for a sugar-themed cosmetic experience

product_name: Lancome Primordiale Optimum Eye 15ml/0.5oz: Beauty
title: i love it
review_text: I bought this cream after I tried about a dozen other brands and I loved it. It a bit pricy but it worth every penny. I am 24, so I bought it to smooth out starting lines that i had and prevent new ones. It worked! Now I look like I am 20 again

product_name: Burberry Burberry London: Beauty
title: Burberry London- I'm a Convert
review_text:
Was using philosophy's various light scents, discovered this Burberry London sample in my last Sephora shipment. Went to Macy's and bought the set for under $77-lotion, shower gel and 3.3 oz fragrance. Fretted over price until I actually used the products-layering them. Recieved SO many compliments! Not "an old lady's perfume"- not strong nor weak- it has an elegant floral fragrance. 
top notes: rose, clementine and honeysuckle.
heart notes: tiare flower, jasmine and peony.
dry down notes: sandalwood, veil of musk and patchouli. All my favorites

product_name: Burberry Burberry London: Beauty
title: Light and Fabulous
review_text: One of the best perfumes I have tried in a long time... my boyfriend goes crazy over it

product_name: Reincarnate Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Amazing!
review_text:
I've tried several shampoo bars and had finally given up hope that I could ever use them - they had always left my hair feeling gross and gummy - no matter how much I rinsed or tried vinegar/water mix rinses after (as was suggested).
But - this one had had some good reviews so I gave it a go. It was awesome! It lathered rather well, and rinsed out very easily. I used it in conjunction with the american cream conditioner - and my hair's very very silky and soft right now. (it had gotten very course over the period of a week with using avalon organics shampoo and conditioner)
I'm excited - now that I've finally found a shampoo bar that works, I can finally say goodbye to bulky shampoo bottles and same some space

product_name: Reincarnate Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Smells /so/ good.
review_text: Reincarnate can be a hard shampoo to get used to, especially if you're not already using LUSH products. It doesn't 'sud up' much, and feels a little bit muddy and grainy. Don't fret though! It will certainly clean your hair, and will also leave it smelling like wonderful spices (almost as good as "Arabian Bright"). The highlights are not something that come with one or two washings, but with many many washings, and they are /very/ subtle but there. The only reason I don't give this product five stars is that it was not as conditioning as it states it is, and I needed to use another conditioning product with it

product_name: Bliss Glamour Gloves: Beauty
title: So Soft
review_text: I bought these with the also great socks and was completely pleased by the way they left my hands, hydrated and soft. After leaving them on for half an hour with the Glamour Gloves Gel my hands felt reborn. I couldn't get over how the moisturizers had penetrated. I've had these for a couple years and was almost sure they would stop working but they're still doing the job. I've recently seen less expensive gloves on the market and don't know how well they work but these are very high quality

product_name: Comptoir Sud Pacifique Vanille Abricot: Beauty
title: Awesome Sensual Fragrance
review_text: I first caught a waft of this fragrance in a magazine as a tester. I fell in love with the sweet, sugary light smell of it and so did my husband. It's perfect for all seasons since it's light and it definitely makes people ask you what you're wearing. I've been told it smells everything from edible to kissably sweet. Now I want to try some of their other fragrances. If they are half as good as this, they win in my book

product_name: Hylexin (Serious Dark Circles?) .78oz: Beauty
title: Awesome stuff
review_text:
I have been using this product for about 3 months.  It is great!  Not only have I noticed a difference, but I get comments from people all the time about how refreshed I look.  I had a baby about 5 months ago and decided that I need to pamper myself a little.  I came across this product in January and was very cautious about purchasing another eye cream.  Nothing has worked in the past.  However, I decided to give it a try.  I noticed changes after a couple of weeks, but wasn't sure if it was just me wanting it to work or it actually working.  Well, now after 3 months, I can totally tell the difference.  I look so much better even without makeup.  I don't even need to put concealor under my eyes any more!!!  Plus, I receive so many great comments from people.

Thank you Hylexin.  Finally something that worked for me

product_name: Bobbi Brown Bronzing Powder: Beauty
title: Best bronzer I've ever used
review_text:
This is the first bronzer I actually finished. This gives the most natural finish and blends really well. I like that it's matte because I'm not a fan of sparkly bronzer. Ever since I started using this, I'm just addicted and can't live without it. It gives the skin a really natural, healthy-looking flush.

I've got medium/olive skin and I use "Light". My skin doesn't look orangey or dirty. Try it and I'm sure you'll like it. Make sure you use a really good brush.

product_name: Kai Perfume Oil - 1/8 oz: Beauty
title: Memories of Hawaiian Gardens
review_text: I love this fragrance!  It reminds me of some of the most beautiful and fragrant flowers of Hawaii.  If you've ever visited The Islands and smelled a pikake lei or walked past luscious jasmine bushes, and thought to yourself, "What is that heavenly smell?"  THIS IS IT!  There is not a scent out there on the market that evokes such memories and enjoyment as Kai.  My only concern about this fragrance line is the $cost$, but how I feel and think when I am wearing it makes it all worth it

product_name: SkinCeuticals Ultimate UV Defense SPF30: Beauty
title: Great sunscreen although a bit expensive
reviewer_location: SF Bay Area, CA United States
review_text:
While most sunscreens these days protect against sunburn, did you know that very few of them actually protect against photodamage? Only two sunscreen ingredients protect against the long UVAI rays that cause photodamage (brown spots, wrinkles, etc); zinc oxide and Parsol 1789. Zinc Oxide protects a broader range of these rays than does Parsol 1789. 

This Skinceuticals sunscreen has zinc oxide and it goes on without any white film or greasiness-perfect for daily use on the face. While Neutrogena Dry Touch suncreens feel more invisible on the skin (you can't even tell it is on except for the smell) and is a good alternative (has Parsol 1789), I still prefer the Skinceuticals for the added protection and virtually no scent whatsoever. Since it's expensive, I tend to use it just on the face and use a cheaper (like Neutrogena) sunscreen on the body when out in the sun.

product_name: Shiseido Pureness - Matifying Moisturizer Oil-Free 50 ml/1.7 oz: Beauty
title: This product is amazing
review_text: This mattifying moisturizer is GREAT!  It definitely helps with my oily skin and works all day long.  I can't say more than enough positive effects this moisturizer has had on m

product_name: Zhen Light Diffussing Foundation w/SPF 8: Beauty
title: Very good quality for a good price
review_text: I am satisfied wih both the product and the delivery time. I would order it again

product_name: Zhen Light Diffussing Foundation w/SPF 8: Beauty
title: Qualtiy foundation for moderate prices!
review_text:
This foundation provides a flawless finish and natural look, while also giving a good coverage.  I've been using this foundation for years, all year long, and it is one of my favorites.  Not too heavy and not too light, it's the perfect foundation.  

Being Asian American and with a light complexion, finding a good color match had always been a problem unless I spent $40 for a bottle of makeup.  Zhen is one of the best deals around - clean but stylish packaging with a superior product inside

product_name: Tweezerman Fast Lash By Tweezerman (Alcone): Beauty
title: Look out Bambi!!!!
review_text: This product is truly amazing!  The application method can be a bit tricky and the performance varies depending on the type of mascara you use, but if you follow the directions and find a good mascara formula then you WILL have long, long lashes.  My lashes are medium length, but when I use this people who know me thing I am wearing falsies.  This stuff rocks!  I've never been able to find a mascara that can do what this does

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: You get what you pay for...
review_text:
Is so true of this product.  I have to admit when I first saw the price tag of this product, it was half out of curiousity that I purchased.  I mean could a pair of $20 tweezers be THAT much better than the ole $1.75 or $3 pairs at home?  

Well if your asking yourself that question, YES!  These things have amazing grip and can pull the tinyiest of hairs.  Things that you would have to dig with normal tweezers until you finally rub your skin raw.

Without a doubt, you will get your moneys worth from this product as well as be amazed at their performance.  It's the type of "WOW" that makes you feel like, "How did I ever get along without these before".

Worth every penny and I'll never buy another cheap tweezer again.  These have lasted for years and still retain their fine point.

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Best tweezers I've EVER used!!
review_text: I had an Amazon reward certificate and was looking for something practical to use it on.  It so happened that I needed new tweezers.  I read the reviews and thought I'd give these a try.  Wow, I can't believe the difference in quality from any other tweezers I have ever owned.  They almost seem to adhere to whatever your are trying to grasp.  It is so easy to precisely and almost painlessly remove even the finest eyebrow hair.  Tweezerman Tweezers ROCK!

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Long lasting
review_text: I'm sure that you don't need any more assurance, but just to let you know, I've had my tweezerman's for over 5 years now. They are still sharp! Plus if you ever were to drop them, they probably wouldn't be significantly damaged. These tweezers are a must have.

product_name: LORAC Croc Palette: Beauty
title: The Best
review_text: I purchased this one month ago and I will never use anything else. Blends wonderfully, great colors. I bought it for my daughter from amazon/sephora as well. Great product

product_name: Boscia Fresh Blotting Linens: Beauty
title: These are a summer necessity
review_text: These are great for removing excess oil when you can't stop and wash your face or don't want to disturb your makeup.  I prefer this brand because they unfold to twice their size when you pull them out instead of the size of a half-dollar like the rest of them

product_name: Calvin Klein Obsession: Beauty
title: Still a Hit!
reviewer: Jeannette Davis "Mom to Carson, Parker, and Wyndser"
review_text: I have been wearing Obsession since 1986, and it has definitely not gone out of style.  Every day I get a comment from someone about how good I smell.  My boss even bought some Obsession for his wife because he likes it so much on me.  This is my favorite perfume

product_name: Calvin Klein Obsession: Beauty
title: This is an obsession
review_text:
I have been wearing Obsession by Calvin Klein since it was first launched in 1985, the year I first arrived in California. It seems I am one of those people forever stuck in a time warp and prefer this classic instead of trying new scents. While I prefer the eau de parfum spray I have both variations. Although at first this tends to have a strong aroma, this doesn't last after being applied to your skin. I love the blend of vanilla, mandarin orange, peach and lemon that make up the scent of Obsession.

My preference is more of a racy, provocative, alluring scent instead of brimming like flowers. With my skin irritations, asthma and allergies I have no problems with spraying my body parts with Obsession. The color is quite appealing, reminding me of Spiced Rum with the brown, amber and gold tones. Obsession cologne is suitable for both day and evening wear, indoors and outdoors and those luscious intimate settings. 

This is definitely a feminine scent, sweet, sexy and not too fruity or powerful.   There is a gold toned rim with the cap snapping on and pulling off most of the time with ease. Sometimes the lid does not go on just right and then the cap part becomes undone and this makes two pieces.

Once the scent has set in for awhile on my skin I detect a hint of floral with wood combination and have read on fragrance.net that Obsession has oriental spices. It really is a winning combination that has captured my interest over the years. This is a scent that is recognizable by men and women and can be worn through out the seasons. 

I would not say this is a musk scent but more of a spicy tingle that needs to be only administered once a day for long lasting appeal. The appeal of Obsession seems to run from girls in their early twenties to those of us in our early forties, from conservative ladies to party animals. 
 
Although it is a darker color than most fragrances, there is no staining on clothing, but I do not wear sweaters, whites or turtlenecks. When I do use the glass jar I have noticed frequently when standing over the sink the yellowish/brown tint left in the sink and have to rinse it off as well as my finger tips. 

Obsession is a potent and romantic perfume for evening. The prices of the assorted sizes of Obsession range from forty to sixty dollars.

product_name: Mania by Giorgio Armani for Men 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: BEST COLOGNE EVAH!
review_text: I'm a cologne junkie, and of my vast collection, Armani Mania is clearly my #1.  I'm into my 3rd bottle of this potion, and it continues to bring on the compliments, and inquiries of "What's that cologne you're wearing, it smells fantastic!"  You cannot - repeat - CANNOT go wrong here.  A modern classic

product_name: Komenuka Bijin All-Natural Hair Care Set: Hair Shampoo & Hair Treatment / Conditioner: Beauty
title: Truly the Best!!
review_text: This is by far the best Shampoo and Conditioner set I have used.  I have very fine, very straight, and very long hair that breaks easily but not with this shampoo and conditioner.  This set makes it smooth, but not oily and so when I brush my hair there is no yanking going on.  My hair is noticeably more shiny and soft.  It has a very pleasant scent and it is all natural.  What a great way to pamper yourself!  Definitely worth the extra investment

product_name: Tocca Beauty Scented Candle: Beauty
title: Havana scent
review_text: I was a bit apprehensive to purchase a candle this expensive, but I was very pleased with the scent, clean burning, and look of the candle and the packaging it came in. The Havana is a scent that both my husband and I enjoyed

product_name: Mistral Shea Butter Soaps - 7 oz.: Beauty
title: LUSCIOUS AND LOVELY
review_text:
Mistral, as many know, is a powerful, gusty wind that blows across the south of France.  Mistral, as I was happy to discover,  is also the name of a line of bath and body products, all French inspired, all lusciously lovely from scented soaps to soothing lotions to rejuvenating body butters.

	Matthew Tilker, founder and president of Mistral,  utilizes Shea butter, which is an efficacious natural healer, in a myriad of must-have forms.  Derived  from the nuts of the African Shea Tree (according to sacred custom the nuts are  harvested primarily by women), this butter  is  highly emollient,  a boon for those with dry skin, chapped lips, any number of skin irritations.

	The pure Shea Butter soap comes in a plethora of inviting fragrances, all milled six times (while others boast being  triple milled).  South Seas is a particular favorite - it's as fresh as an ocean breeze and as calming, soothing as a tropical island.  The marine scent is accented with a touch of grapefruit, white flowers and soft woods.  An irresistible combination.

	South Seas is a fragrance with which you wish to surround yourself - made possible by the shower gel, body lotion, massage bath and body oil, bath salts and candle all available at very accessible prices.

	Highly recommended

product_name: Bremenn Research Labs Hylexin(TM): Beauty
title: If it worked for me, I believe it will work for you
review_text: The cream is great. It instantly gets absorbed  after application and i believe helps over time close up leakage of blood capilleries (which causes black circle appearences). I suffered from chronic dark circles. This cream after 1 month of application has considerably lightened my dark circles and has reduced puffiness. I would suggest anyone who is looking for an effective cream give this product a shot. considering my condition i still have light dark circles left and hope this cream will continue to benefit me. I still have doubts on this cream totally brightening my skin tone around my eyes, but never the less I find it effective

product_name: Bremenn Research Labs Hylexin(TM): Beauty
title: I would have paid so much more than $95....
review_text:
Through luck of genetics, I have dark circles. I've had them since as far back as I can remember. No amount of sleep, eat well, or generally good lifestyle choices changed my dark circles. 

I was pretty hesitant to try it out, since, woah... $95 is a lot of money, but I gave it a shot. I used it exactly per the instructions.

I was actually pretty discouraged because I didn't see a change, but then BAM, in the 3rd week of using it, I woke up and my circles were soooo much noticably lighter. I could cry. It's hard being so young and having dark circles under your eyes, but now I  look more my age. And I'm still only in the 3rd week, so I have a lot of hope for the product. 

I feel badly for the people who didn't get a reaction, but as they state in their pamphlet, it will not work on 100% of people. Like anything, really, won't work for 100% of people. 

But it worked for me, and I'm so very happy. I would have paid sooo much more for these results.

product_name: Bremenn Research Labs Hylexin(TM): Beauty
title: buy it
review_text: have had dark circles caused by pigmentation for four years and have tried everything.have been using hylexin for just five days and honestly its been amazing.i saw all the bad reviews and im glad they didnt stop me.for the first time in years i dont need a concealer.will continue to keep you posted as i hope in the nxt week or two not to have any circles at all.(if it continues this way) i think mayb the product doesnt work for hereditery circles

product_name: Avon ANEW RETROACTIVE+ 2-in-1 Cleanser: Beauty
title: Great Cleanser!!!!
review_text:
I love how this product works and feels on my skin!! Does an excellent job off removing makeup and cleaning the skin with out drying your skin out! Makes skin feel cool and clean!!

I have very sensitive skin an was concerned that this product was going to break my skin out OR be very drying because this product tones as well as cleanses the skin. But that  wasn't the case. My skin didn't break out, nor is this product drying. Highly recommend!

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 2 - Normal, Thick, Coarse Hair: Beauty
title: Better than Most!
review_text: I used this relaxer for the first time after using many brand name ones. I was impressed with the results. It leaft my hair with much needed moisture, and very shiny. I normally apply the realxer myself at home, but I choose to go professional to really capture the promises that this product states. The smell was not noticeable, which was good since most chemicals are so harsh and strong. It didn't burn my scalp like most have. The quantity was ample considering that most relaxers are cheap with the amount they give I think that it was worth the price! I'll be buying it again

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 2 - Normal, Thick, Coarse Hair: Beauty
title: Breaks the bank--but I'll never use another!
review_text: This is by far the most expensive relaxer I've ever used and it is worth every penny.  I first heard of it as being Oprah's relaxer so I decided to hunt it down.  One of the best things I've ever done.  I have very coarse, thick "horsehair" that usually defeats most over the counter perms after a few washings.  Not Phytospecific's relaxer.  My hair stayed soft AND STRAIGHT no matter what the weather or I did to it. And it's the healthiest it's ever been.  No other relaxer ever did that for my hair.  In fact they usually made it worse! I absolutely love the Phytorelaxer and I am officially addicted.  If it were less pricey, it would get 5 stars

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 2 - Normal, Thick, Coarse Hair: Beauty
title: too pricey, but i wouldn't use anything else
review_text:
i'm black, have kinky hair, and i've been relaxing my hair for about 25 years. i've used many many types of relaxers to my dismay:- hair falling out, breaking, dry, etc.
so i let my hair "rest" for about 5 years then i tried the relaxer thing again after i found phyto. i've been doing my own hair now for about 1 year, and it's been great!- except for the price. my hair still feels as if it has life in it, it it is not breaking, it is not falling out. it burns like regular straightener. i use vinegar to neutralize it, then use the neutralizing shampoo with indicator to check for pink. please, there's not enough neutralizing shampoo to get rid of the staraightener.
the price is scary, but i'm more afraid of having my hair fall out and having to fix that. 
soon, i'll have to get a hairdresser though, because my hair has now been retaining it's length and growing - and it's harder to straighten it myself.

product_name: Dior Dior Logo Palette - Lips: Beauty
title: EASY TO MIX...SWEEEEET !!
review_text:
THIS IS NOT STICKY LIP GLOSS. 

THE ROSE TONE IS EASY TO WEAR .

IT'S SWEET AND NATURAL TONE. 

YOU CAN MIX COLORS AND THAN CREATE NEW COLOR ON YOUR LIPS !!

YOU DON'T NEED TO SHOP TONS OF GLOSSES AND LIP STICKS. 

THIS IS IT !   PLUS   THE PALETTE CASE IS CUTE

product_name: Un Jardin Sur Le Nil by Hermes 1.6 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Not Like Any Other Summer Scent
review_text:
I'm a big fan of "non-traditional" perfumes - I don't care for sweet floraly scents, and I have been known to poach my man's cologne occassionally, just to enjoy the scent all day. So if you like citrusy/woodsy scents, you MUST try this one - it has an unusual top note and dry-down that are hard to describe, but anyway it never fails to get compliments from men, and the "WHAT are you wearing?" from women.  

It's intense, but it's not overpowering the way some Orientals can be.  But it's also summery-light.  I can't explain it - just try it.  A couple of times.  And for something even more unusual, try Jardin Mediterrenne (sp?) also by Hermes - the only perfume I've ever given 5 stars

product_name: AVEDA Shampure Shampoo 8.5 fl oz/250 ml: Beauty
title: Love the Aveda Shampure shampoo & conditioner
review_text: I *love* this formula for my thick, naturally curly, slightly hilighted hair.  It does a great job cleaning without stripping, and this is the first conditioner that did a good job tackling my naturally curly hair without weighing it down.  I did get a good deal at my salon - $9 for the shampoo and a little more for the conditioner

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: Best product for straight, shiny hair!
review_text: To tell you the truth, I have tried everything on my hair to take away the frizz.  Nothing really worked at all...but Biosilk is a miracle!  The first time  I tried it, I noticed a major difference in my hair.  Just add a little bit to your hair, and it will immediately smooth it out, adding shine and softness.  It will also not weigh your hair down or make it too greasy..just don't use that much of it.  I mostly use this with my flat-iron, and I get amazing results.  I happen to like the smell of it...it reminds me of being in a salon!  Try the shampoo and conditioner as well

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: You are lucky if you have discovered this product!
review_text: I have wavy and coarse hair and I have a whole lot of it. I use this product after shower on damp hair and then blow-dry. This product really works and makes my hair soft and silky and it gives the hair nice movement and makes it easy to style. My hairdresser who has similiar hair as mine recommended me this product and she said she loves it. I am very happy to find this product before wasting a lot of money on trying others that don't work. It is a bliss

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: Excellent product!
review_text: My hair stylist first introduced me to this product a few years ago and I've used it ever since. It makes your hair really soft and shiny and even smells good. Just a little of biosilk goes a long way. Gets rid of the frizz and dryness and really improves the look and feel of your hair. I definitely reccomend it

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: I love it
review_text:
I was hooked on Sebastian's shine serum forever.  Then I switched to this after hearing all the rave reviews.  It makes it just as shiny as the Sebastian, but for my thick wavy hair, it is easier to apply.  I only need about a quarter size amount, way less than any other product.  It has a nice soft finish.  
So if you like Sebastian and Redkin's shine serums, you'll like this.  
I'm not going to go as far as to say it's a miracle worker.  It makes your hair shinier.  It helps a little with my frizz, but doesn't depouf.

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: Your hair will thank you
review_text: I have straight hair, but it is super-long and thick, past my waist, so I have problems combing it and keeping it smooth.  Biosilk is the best stuff I have found to detangle after washing, and keep my hair soft after it is dry.  I have tried everything else, and I mean everything, and nothing compares.  I'm so hooked I have bought it by the gallon, and believe me, that is not cheap!  It even smells great, it's not greasy, and it is fantastic for giving or receiving massages, too

product_name: H2O Plus Hand and Nail Cream - 8 oz: Beauty
title: I love this product!
review_text: This is truly one of the best hand and nail creams out there.  It is quickly absorbed and not at all greasy - I put some on before I walk out the door in the morning and again before bedtime and it has made a real difference in the softness of my hands and the health of my cuticles.  Hangnails have always been a problem for me but this product keeps them under control as long as I apply it regularly. Love it!

product_name: Lancome Definicils High Definition Mascara Black/Noir: Beauty
title: My favorite
review_text: I really like this mascara. I only gave it 4 because it is clumpy and I have to spend a little time with my eyelash comb getting the clumps out.  Otherwise, it is the only mascara that doesn't cause me to loose a ton of lashes.  Everything else from Estee Lauder, Bourjois to Great Lash causes me loose a lot of lashes.  I also like that if I cry, I don't wind up looking like a raccoon, it subtly melts away; no mess! It washes off easily with soap and water and is flexible, not flaky.

product_name: Lancome Definicils High Definition Mascara Black/Noir: Beauty
title: Absolutely the best!
review_text: I have been using mascara since I was a teenager and this is absolutely the best ever. Ocassionally I have read reviews about other 'fantastic' mascaras and strayed and tried them, only to be disappointed. Now I wouldn't even bother trying anything else even when given in free gift packs. I have very long fair eyelashes and use black. The brush is easy to guide and you do not end up with big thick, clumpy patches especially when the mascara is new. It parts and separates the lashes perfectly. For night I apply 2 coats for a more dramatic look. It never smudges and is easy to remove (I use Clinique 'naturally gentle eye make-up remover'). And yes, it may be a little expensive but it lasts for ages (doesn't dry out like other mascaras)and the quality of the product surpasses anything else. Also my eyes tend to be a little sensitive and I have never had any problems even when accidentally getting the mascara in my eye. Try it, you won't be disappointed

product_name: Lancome Definicils High Definition Mascara Black/Noir: Beauty
title: Stays put all day long
review_text: This mascara is great.  I've tried many and this is the only one that doesn't smudge all over the place.  The only drawback is the price.  It's triple what drugstore brands cost

product_name: Komenuka Bijin All-Natural Skin Lotion (Toner/After Shave) with Rice Bran - 120ml: Beauty
title: Calming and Deep Cleansing
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
Follow the cleanser with the Komenuka Bijin Skin Lotion and you may wonder why you are suddenly catching the scent of SAKE. In fact, this cleansing toner does contain SAKE along with Rice Bran, Seaweed, Aloe, Yeast, Glycyrrhizate, Orange, Lemon, Matricaria, Algae, Luffa Cylindrica and Fountain Water.

The toner completes the process of removing impurities and also has the added benefit of contracting the pores so they look smaller. Men may also enjoy this as an aftershave lotion. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Bliss Softening Sock Salve: Beauty
title: Works Great With the Socks
review_text: This salve is just perfect under Bliss's Softening socks. It's amazing how much you can smear on, leave on with the socks for at least half an hour and have all those great softening agents completely absorbed when you take off the socks. It leaves feet renewed. Use it once or twice a week to tame tough tootsies

product_name: philosophy falling in love layering set three piece set: Beauty
title: light and clean
review_text: This is for sure one of my new favorite sets.  The scent is nice and clean.  The lotion and gel left a very nice scent also..

product_name: Bvlgari Pour Homme: Beauty
title: Perfect prefume for a man
review_text: I bought this perfume for my husband, and both of us love it. Very sexy, and yet a clean scent at the same time. It's light enough to be perfect for the man who normally doesn't wear perfumes, yet elegant enough for the man who does

product_name: Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor: Beauty
title: One Razor to Rule Them All!
review_text: I received this razor as a birthday gift from my brother a couple of weeks ago. I thought, "Hmmm...Handsome looking vintage piece, but there's no way in hell I'm gonna put that meat cleaver to my face!" Well guilt got the best of me, I figured the razor looked expensive so I'll give it a go and hope that if I die from blood loss the police will figure out that my death was from shaving with a new razor and it's not from suicide. I'll tell you after a few times shaving with this razor I am now going to retire My Gillette Fuzion. It's takes a bit longer to shave with this razor than with a conventional multi-blade but the results are undeniably better. My wife can't wait to kiss my cheek with school girl glee right after I shave! I have a beard that is as tough as sandpaper and I've never had a closer shave than with this Merkur. I don't have the same spots to go over and over again and therefore my face is less irritated. I use a brush, a glycerin based shave cream and always shave in the shower and that makes a significant difference as well. Factor in that blades for this razor costs so much less then Mach 3 & Fuzion's (I buy cryogenically tempered blades that last 2x longer than store bought) and the way to opt out from expensive razor marketing ploys becomes clear. Don't sit on the fence on this one ditch whatever Mach, to the nth power, razor you're using and pick this Merkur ASAP

product_name: Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor: Beauty
title: A life-long investment
review_text:
This razor rocks... the proper technique is easy to learn: short, light strokes, down, then up (if you want a closer shave). This gives me hardly any nicks compared to the Gillette Mach 3 and is way easier to unclog than the Shick Quattro. 

The sample blade continues to last with about 2 shaves a week since Dec. 2006. Typical razor cartridges wouldn't even come close to that longevity, and they cost about 4 times as much as the replacement Merkur blades, which are 50 cents each.

I am just doing facial shaving with it at this point; hopefully it will fare just as well with head shaving. I expect I'll be using Merkur for the rest of my life

product_name: Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Excellent Razor
review_text: My very first DE razor after many recommendations, and I must say that I am yet another one of those enthusiastic supporters of the Merkur HD DE Safety Razor.  I may eventually decide to upgrade, but if I ever do, it will only be after much practice with this razor and simply for the sake of having the adjustment feature, which may or may not be necessary for some individuals depending on the toughness and thickness of your beard.  When used in conjunction with a badger hair shaving brush, some excellent shaving cream (Proraso was my first, and the only thing mildly unpleasant is the scent, and even that grows on you after a while...check your local Target near the women's spa section) and the highest quality DE razor blade, changed every so often, of course, this razor provides an excellent, close, irritation-free shave.  After using this marvel, I vow never to return to the cheaply made, ridiculously expensive (when the cost of replacement cartridges is considered over the course of a man's shaving lifetime) multi-blade systems of Gillette or Schick.  Just be a little more careful of your technique, and getting an outstanding shave from this razor should be a cinch.  Highly recommended

product_name: Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Great solid razor.
review_text:
I'm a first time DE shaver and this razor is great.  My grandfather used these types of razors, and it feels wonderful to be able to enjoy shaving rather than scraping my face with a Mach III.

Only advice is, try a couple different blades.  Depending on your skin type/beard you'll need a different type of blade.  One blade doesn't fit all.   And always remember, this isn't the Mach III, don't apply pressure

product_name: Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor: Beauty
title: The Only Way to Shave
review_text: This razor returns one to an Augustinian sense of progress and history.  It is similar to what my grandfather used to shave with, and is simply the best way to shave, so long as you have a decent brush and soap at hand

product_name: Veganese Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Best conditioner for my hair EVER
review_text:
I have very fine, poker straight hair that is not dry or oily.  Then I got this conditioner and BIG shampoo and my hair regained it's shine, but more importantly -- I got bounce!  I never had any waves or body in my hair before but this conditioner did it.

I have used the BIG shampoo with other conditioners and it was not as good for me.  I like Big shampoo, but this VEGANESE conditioner is the real key to my newly bouncy hair.  VEGANESE just works perfectly for me and my hair has never looked better.

One thing -- I kind of hate the smell and I do not think it is lemony at all.  It smells...I don't know, too much like an "granola girl" or something -- almost patchouli-like to me.  HOWEVER it leaves my hair looking super, so really, who cares if it smells good in the shower

product_name: Veganese Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Soft soft soft
review_text:
This conditioner leaves hair ultra-soft and doesn't weigh it down. If you have trouble with conditioners leaving a strong residue on your hair, this one won't.

The ingredients contain rosemary infusion, lavender flower infusion, seaweed and fresh lemon juice. The lemon is great for washing the hair clean of residue. It's a great conditioner

product_name: Veganese Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Light Conditioner for Combination/Oily Hair
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
If your hair alternates between various moods every day of the week, then a good supply of conditioners and shampoos should keep you happy all year long. The lemon oil in two of the Lush products work together especially well. Veganese Conditioner and I Love Juicy shampoo could not be a better solution if you need to deep clean your hair. Like after you have put too much hairspray in your hair or you went swimming or say you fell in a mud puddle (In that case, also reach for Happy Hippy body wash). 

You just never know what may occur and one must always be prepared. The Veganese is also a lovely vegetarian product that can be enjoyed by anyone. It has a very clean, happy energy and a lemony scent. The slippery conditioner slicks across your hair, making it shiny and manageable without weighing it down.

This also contains rosemary infusion, lavender flower infusion, seaweed and fresh lemon juice. Will be appreciated by anyone trying to lighten their hair. 

If you use the henna products by Lush, these two products might slightly lighten your henna results. This could be desired or you may want to go back to using Rehab and American Cream if you want to keep a deeper henna shade.

If you want to feel light and breezy, this conditioner won't weigh you down. My hair feels fluffy and deliciously light and bouncy. I have this strange urge to go wander in lemon orchards, run through mud puddles and pick flowers by the side of the road. 

Now officially in the mood to make lemonade! 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Veganese Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Decent
review_text: I used Veganese for quite awhile, quite happily.  As there is no artificial fragrance, or strong natural fragrance oils in the product, it has a ho-hum scent.  This actaully was a nice break from all the overwhelmingly perfumed hair products on the market.  I felt Veganese adequately conditioned my hair, did not irritate my scalp.  I liked that it had no animal products and is not tested on animals.  Those who try to avoid chemicals may not like sodium lauryl sulfate in this product

product_name: Philosophy Pure Grace Shower Cream 16oz: Beauty
title: Pure Grace
review_text: This is my favorite scent from Philosophy.  It is clean and crisp, never over done.

product_name: Pumice Stone with Nail Brush: Beauty
title: help for your feet
review_text: I purchased this pumice stone to help remove the dried skin on my feet and ankles that appears as you get older.  It does a good job and comes in its own small case.  I use it frequently and find that I have much less dry skin in that area now

product_name: philosophy oxygen peel kit: Beauty
title: FOAMY FACE!
review_text: You use the peel kit by mixing a clear gel capsule with water and smear that onto your face.You then  put some cream on top of the gel on your face which mixes together creating a shaving cream beard. After using the creams you then scrape it off using a tongue depressor look alike to shave off the foam. After a quick rinse my skin looked less dull,  and helped clear  blotches.4 stars because I ran out of the cream, and still have some unused gel capsules

product_name: philosophy oxygen peel kit: Beauty
title: Effective and simple to use.
review_text:
I really like this peel.  It is very easy to use and I have noticed a difference in my skin.  It is clearer and the redness and discoloration is fading.  I even noticed my clogged pores are diminishing.  I recommend this peel to anyone.  I have very sensitive skin and it did not cause irritation.  I use this one about twice a week.

I also recommend the microdelivery vitamin C peel.  That one I use once a week.

Jennife

product_name: philosophy oxygen peel kit: Beauty
title: New, brighter, smoother, softer skin awaits you.....
review_text:
Calling this a peel doesnt seem quite right. When I think of the word peel I imagine the old gel type peels that you would let dry on your face and then take off like a mask. Or I think of something that is harsh or abrasive. While this works like a peel it is gentle and goes far beyond what you would expect a facial product to do.

You need this product if you
- your skin is prone to break out and is very congested  
- your skin is sun damaged  
- your skin is aging rapidly  
- you enjoy in-office medical peels 
- you have a big event coming up and want your skin to look great  
- you want to maximize penetration of your treatment products 
- you want baby soft skin 


Also if you smoke! I first tried this years ago when I was a smoker and it made such a difference in the texture and clarity of my skin. 

This is a truly amazing product and completely different and unique to anything else on the market. Try it and you'll see.

This product also lasts a surprisingly long time. You only use half a capsule for each treatment which gives you several months of usage out of it

product_name: Tarte Inside Out Vitamin Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: The PERFECT Lipgloss!
review_text: I wanted to try a new lipgloss because all of the colored ones that I have are horrificly sticky and if they aren't sticky they do not stay on for long.  This one however, manages to combine my love for lipgloss with all the needs of a chapstick.  The color (apple a day) was intimidating looking in the tube but looks perfectly on and doesn't go anywhere.  It also has NO STICKYNESS!  YAY!  I love this gloss and is the perfect gloss for all of my needs!

product_name: Givenchy Organza: Beauty
title: Decadent!!
review_text: The first time I smelled this intoxicating scent I knew I had to have it for myself.  It's heady, rich, very exotic, dark and mysterious....when I wear this perfume, I envision a room filled with beautiful brown skinned women with dark black hair and richly colored silks of red and purple covering their bodies laying around on organza and brocade covered chaises eating sweet dark fruit and sipping red wine from cobalt glasses

product_name: Caleche by Hermes for Women 3.3 oz Soie de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Feel like an international world traveler
review_text:
Though I have never traveled the world, this perfume allows
me to feel like a veteran globe trotter It is sophisticated
without being obnoxious. I genuinely feel like a woman of
intrigue and experience. Though fanciful, it is fun for a
homegrown rose.

product_name: Caleche by Hermes for Women 3.3 oz Soie de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: best of the best
review_text: Caleche is an absolute classic.  I'm often stopped and asked what I'm wearing.  Pretty much everything at the department stores smells the same (LIKE CHEMICALS).  Caleche is the real thing and the Soie de Parfum lasts. Make sure when purchasing that you don't accidentally buy Caleche Eau Delicate...it's a completely different frangrance, guaranteed to make you gag.  Why do marketers keep coming up with subtle twists to existing fragrances (Miracle, Happy, Pleasures, Poison)?  Once you try Caleche, you'll no longer look for anything else; I highly recommend the lotion and shower gel, too

product_name: Clinique Different Lipstick: Beauty
title: Just about the best
review_text: lipstick going. This review is for the Guava Stain shade. I first bought this lipstick, I believe in the mid to late eighties. I was delighted with it then and am now. It is sheer, light, non greasy and the color never changes. The color is NOT neutral, but I find that I can wear it with almost any color of clothing except primarily pink or red outfits. Over the years it has become just about the only lipstick shade I wear. I would buy different brands,different shades and wear them maybe once then back to Guava Stain. It along with Clinque's soft pressed blush in New Clover, orginally bought about the same time as the lipstick have become my favorites, and the one's I reach for time and again. They are my dependables. Daytime wear for sure, not night, this is a subtle sheer color

product_name: Get Fresh Body Butter Trio - Lemongrass Lavender, Mandarin Ginger and Starfruit Pear: Beauty
title: wonderful!
review_text: i love get fresh products, especially the lemongrass lavendar scent. i use the hand sugar scrub (which is very moisturizing and gets rid of cooking odors on hands). it is very light and pleasant, as are the others. i love the look better naked kit and the relief for tattered tootsies kit. i am a beauty junkie and i have used much more expensive products but i never seem to like them as much as these. great gift- the hatbox design is very cute

product_name: The Body Shop Shimmer Cubes: Beauty
title: KISS AND MAKE-UP!!
review_text:
OOOHH, SPARKLIES!!!!!

You can put this on your face.

Make you very much pretty.
Turn the heads of boy types.
Stops traffic!!

product_name: The Body Shop Shimmer Cubes: Beauty
title: For bronzed, goddess like eyes
review_text:
I have always carried a soft spot in my hear for shiny metallic eye shadows and metallic browns, chocolates, coppers and vanilla such as in this quad for look fantastic on pretty much any complexion. Each prismatic color cube is in it's own tiny little clear box with a tiny lid on, those I discard and simply keep the top four squares open unless I out the entire top lid on once I'm done doing my makeup.

I love to sweep the palest shimmery vanilla on the entire brow bone and my whole lid, I usually wear black liquid liner right under the lash line and right on top, creating a black back drop that make applying any eye makeup on top easy and gives it great depth. Then I use the darkest color with a short brush I cut on an angle to blend the dark color on top of the liner for a smoky and glowing effect. The other two colors I layer on top in between the vanilla base and the dark smoke, but I don't feel the need to use all four colors at the same time. I also wet the brush sometimes, Visine is good for making liquid liner type of a finish when used on a brush and then dipped in some shadow.

The colors have deep intensity to them and they sparkle like melting precious metals in the sun. Wonderful for any makeup novice or artist for their ease of use and the dramatic and breath taking effect they so easily produce.

- Kasia S.

product_name: Un Jardin En Mediterranee by Hermes 2 Piece Set Includes: 1.6 oz Eau de Toilette Spray + 0.5 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: South of France in a Bottle
review_text: I've never smelled anything like this.  If you've ever been to the Mediterranean coast, you will be instantly transported by this scent.  It goes on strong, lasts long, and dries down to a wonderfully woodsy-citrusy finish that definitely has a bit of ocean air - but not the "Yankee Candle Ocean Water" type scent... this is the real thing, like an aromatherapy treatment you can take with you!  Rejoice, all women who are tired of sugary-syrupy womens' perfume!  This is it

product_name: Un Jardin En Mediterranee by Hermes 2 Piece Set Includes: 1.6 oz Eau de Toilette Spray + 0.5 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: The Mediterranean does not smell THIS  wonderful
review_text:
This fragrance takes you on holiday to a place you may never have been.  It is a warm environment, smelling of salt water and warm skin. There is a tang in the air of citrus, maybe grapefruit.  This blend is absolutely delicious, inspring a hunger for more. I simply can't get enough of Un Jardin en Mediterranee. 

The Eau de Toilette is very light and subtle.  Fresh but not girly. Tangy, not sweet. This fragrance is for women who understand the allure of salt and warm skin. 


I purchased this fragrance 3 weeks ago and have worn nothing else since; it will remain one of the four or five fragrances I wear.  I look forward to when the line expands to include body cremes or lotions, or bath products

product_name: Bobbi Brown Foundation Stick: Beauty
title: Swear by it
review_text: An awesome product that sells out - and that's the only problem!  I had to call around the US to find it in a department store, in stock and that would ship.  Amazon's supplier was sold out.

product_name: Proraso Eucalyptus Shave Cream 150 ml.: Beauty
title: dedicated wet shaver
review_text: Proraso Shave Cream is the best bang for the buck in hi-end, non drugstore shave creams.  I've tried them all and keep coming back to proraso.  The texture, consistency and effectiveness of the cream are first rate - and you don't need a badger hair brush! I initially missed using a brush at first, but don't miss all the product I wasted that were left behind in the bristles.  Couple proraso with a good safety razor (may I suggest Merkur) and you'll get a shave that trounces anything a Mach III can throw at you. Trust me

product_name: Proraso Eucalyptus Shave Cream 150 ml.: Beauty
title: Excellent Product!
review_text:
Bravo Pronto Prego
Very nice product great shave and the Eucalyptus is divine

product_name: Bvlgari Pour Femme: Beauty
title: baby powder
review_text: This is a nice smell that turns babypowderish on me.  My fiancee LUVS it.  He is also a huge fan of Chanel No.

product_name: Bvlgari Pour Femme: Beauty
title: The only fragrance I wear
review_text: As a dentist I am in very close physical contact with my patients.  This is the only fragrance I wear because it is light yet feminine and does not bother my patients.  I receive so many compliments every time I wear it.

product_name: Beyond Paradise by Estee Lauder for Women 1.0 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Love this one!
review_text: I typically don't wear much cologne or perfume but this one is a winner! My husband bought this one for me for Christmas, I'd never even seen it before but he liked how it smelled.  What a great guy! I couldn't have been happier with this gift. I love this scent...clean and fresh...you can wear this scent day or night, not heavy or overwhelming.  The unique beauty of the bottle is wonderful too.  Highly recommend Beyond Paradise

product_name: Beyond Paradise by Estee Lauder for Women 1.0 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Flirty and Feminime!!!
review_text: Beyond Paradise is a wonderful, flirty, floral scent that isn't too overpowering. I recommend wearing it whenever you want to feel extra feminine

product_name: Clinique Quickliner for Eyes: Beauty
title: Love IT
review_text: I bought this last month in purple.  Looks awesome and it doesn't hurt when you put it on.  Best of all it stays on and if you set it, it will stay all day.

product_name: Laura Mercier Lip Glace: Beauty
title: Beautiful and Long Lasting Lip Gloss
review_text: This lip gloss is super!!!  Not only does it glide on your lips, it has staying power.  The colors are so subtle and pretty.  It is worth every penney and I will not waste my money on cheaper, sticky and short-lived lip glosses

product_name: Laura Mercier Lip Glace: Beauty
title: Beautiful Colors, High Gloss, Long Wearing, But Very Sticky
review_text:
I bought the Laura Mercier Kit: Mini Glaces with six glaces including: champagne glace, rose glace, bare beige glace, ambre rose glace, petal glace and violet glace. 

My favorite was Rose, but all of the colors are very beautiful. I also have a full size of Melon, another of my favorites. While the colors are beautiful, provide lots of shine and are long wearing, they are very sticky. MAC Lip Glass is much stickier, so if you don't mind that, they might be right for you. Also, the good thing about the kit is that you get to try lots of different colors, but the tubes are quite small, with a steep price. So, if you are willing to put up with a sticky gloss and a high price tag in exchange for some of the most beautiful colors, this might be the right gloss for you.

product_name: Laura Mercier Lip Glace: Beauty
title: A SHIMMERY, SUMMERY GLOSS
review_text:
Lips need a little shimmer in the summer, which is why I'm a fan of  Laura Mercier's Lip Glaces.  While they do come in 14 luscious shades, my two current faves are "Cancun Coral" and "Miami Pink."  The "Cancun Coral" is a soft coral which I like for day wear, and the "Miami Pink" has all the sparkle and pizzazz of hot pink - perfect for evening (especially with Mercier's Pressed Powder Bronzer).

	All the shades are abundantly blessed with Vitamin E, Lanolin and Mineral Oil to soften and smooth lips.  These glaces aren't at all heavy or sticky - they're light, go on easily, evenly, and don't bleed over lip lines if you take a bite of something good.

	Glaces can be worn alone or over lip color if you want to give added gleam to a favorite lipstick

product_name: Curve by Liz Claiborne for Men 4.2 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Dimond in the rough!!!!
review_text: All right for starters, i always have thought curve to be a very cheep crappy cologne. But i had never smelled it, i had always hurd it from friends and family that it sucked. Well the other day i was at work and some girl that has always liked me gave me two samples of curve. I tried them out and loved the origanal curve the smell is sweet but still masculine, girls love it, all the time girls say, you smell really good and ask what i'm wereing, and i always say " that smell is all me baby" But really i have curve to thank for all the action i've been getting, you have to try it out for your self.     I LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

product_name: Curve by Liz Claiborne for Men 4.2 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: The women love it
review_text:
I've generally been a one-cologne guy -- I had settled into using Acqua di Gio for a number of years, after having used Nautica for a number of years as well. When she got pregnant several months ago, my wife confessed to me that she really didn't like Acqua di Gio (this after two years! Pregnancy does heighten sensitivity to smell, though). 

I still had some Nautica around, plus the original and no-longer-made Zegna scent from Spain, so I used those for a while. I then bought the newest Zegna cologne, "Z", after my wife smelled it and found it unobjectionable.  

Well, no sooner had I bought the Z then my wife found a scratch and sniff of Curve in some magazine and said that I really should be using that. The next day we happened to be at K-Mart -- K-MART!!! -- for some household odds and ends, and my wife came across a display of Curve. She insisted on buying it for me. 

Ever since then, my wife goes nuts when I use it. I don't use it during the week, really -- I'm a somewhat older guy, and it has a sweetish overtone to it that's not very serious -- but whenever I do, my wife always tells me how absolutely wonderful I smell, indeed, how DELICIOUS I smell. Today was casual Friday at work, so I figured, okay. I leave for work very early, before my wife is awake. Sure enough, she calls me at work this morning -- "you used Curve today, didn't you? I can tell because the bathroom smells wonderful!"

Every woman I know who has commented on it loves it on guys. So it's less expensive and available at K-Mart. And yes it is a little bit sweeter than most colognes I'm personally used to. But it does have a pleasant smell, and if the women love it, well . . .

product_name: Curve by Liz Claiborne for Men 4.2 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Awesome
review_text: Almost every time I wear "Curve" I get comments from the ladies, a very good thing.  I currently have 10 different types of cologne and I wear this one a lot.  It seems good and the scent lasts throughout the day without having to drench yourself in it

product_name: Tweezerman Point Stainless Tweezer in colors: Beauty
title: the best
review_text: these are absolutely the best they get every hair easily..the points are soo sharp these are worth the money trust me id recommend to anyon

product_name: Clinique Moisture Surge Extra Thirsty Skin Relief: Beauty
title: Best facial moisturizer ever!!
review_text: I have an oily T-zone, or I should say "had".  I started using this product because I was breaking out a lot due to the extra oil my skin was producing to keep my face moisturized.  Not only has my face cleared up, but it has a nice healthy shine to it all day.  No makeup necessary.

product_name: Clinique Moisture Surge Extra Thirsty Skin Relief: Beauty
title: It is a really great moisturizer
review_text: It is definitely a great moisturizer.  If you're looking for something that is thick but NOT greasy and won't make you look like you're frying an egg on your forehead, this is definitely it!  The texture also makes it easy to apply makeup on afterwards.  I use it everyday in the morning time after I wash my face.  The only thing to be careful is, if you have EXTREMELY dry and parched skin and are exfoliating daily to the point where your skin is aching, then try to stay away from this moisturizer until your skin heals.  I was overdosing my skin with benzoyl peroxide, AHA acids, and retinol a few months ago, leaving my skin extremely sensitive.  When I put on this gel, it would make my skin burn.  But other than that, you're safe using it on a daily regular normal routine

product_name: Clinique Moisture Surge Extra Thirsty Skin Relief: Beauty
title: Works Great!
review_text: This product is worth the price! I use it every day especially my whole eye area and I love it! It does not leave my skin feeling or looking greasy either.

product_name: Murad Acne Complex Starter Kit ($44 Value): Beauty
title: It's no miracle product, but it seems to work.
review_text: I have been using this starter kit for almost a month and I am beginning to see results. My experience with this product has been that my skin definitely got worse before it got better. For the first few weeks, my skin seemed to explode with more acne than usual... however, last week it started to clear up rapidly. I'm still having blemishes pop up daily, but they disappear within a few days, and overall my skin is much smoother and my (many, many) scars are less visible. I have struggled with moderate to severe acne for 6 years and have tried more products and treatments than I care to remember, and decided to try Murad after it was suggested to me (I'd never heard of it before). It certainly is no "miracle" product where you see results instantly (especially if you have a moderate to severe acne problem), but I just re-ordered the starter kit and am hoping the results will continue to improve. This product is definitely worth a shot

product_name: Murad Acne Complex Starter Kit ($44 Value): Beauty
title: Good but not perfect
review_text: Murad promises the miracle cure for acne. While the product is good, it's not a miracle. I've been usines Murad for two months and while my skin has improved, it's not flawless. I still get break outs and they still take a while to heal. I'll keep using it because it's a skin routine as good as any other and who knows, maybe my skin will improve

product_name: Mistral Scented Bar Soap: Beauty
title: True Gardenia Scent
review_text: This is my favorite soap in the world.  A new bar will scent my bathroom for weeks, and the scent lingers on my skin as well.  The soap is gentle and long-lasting. I recommend it highly

product_name: Mistral Scented Bar Soap: Beauty
title: heavenly soap
review_text:
I'm an admitted soap snob so I've probably tried just about every soap there is. Mistral soap is right up there with the best.
First of all I have to mention the customer service. I had bought another brand of soap that came in a very pleasing scent combo that Mistral didn't offer. I emailed Mistral's customer service asking them to consider making it. I got a reply right away and after a few email exchanges was told they would see what could be done. I like that--being responsive to the customer.
 What do I like about the soap? For one thing, the size. It's huge at 7 oz. I also like the scents offered: Very pleasing combinations that stay on the skin in a subtle way once you rinse and dry. Best of all is how it lathers up on the skin and once rinsed off leaves no residue. It does leave the skin soft.

product_name: Buffy Skin Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Shower Staple
review_text:
Naturally, with a name like Buffy, I would have tried this.  Whether I like it or not I get these on a regular basis from friends and family who see my name splattered all over it.  Lucky for me, I like.  

Ever heard the expression 'soft as a baby's butt'?  Erm, no? 

Easy.  Simple to use, obviously.  No messing with jars or bottles.  Just go to town massaging those pesky areas - I'm convinced it works wonders on orange peel skin, and cannot be persuaded otherwise.

product_name: Buffy Skin Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: This is THE best.
review_text:
I have some dry bumpy bits at the top of my arms that have been resistant to any scrubby product I've ever tried to use, but buffy got my skin so smooth! Amazing, and highly recommended. Soak in the tub/shower/whatever so the hot water softens up your skin, then scrub away. The small bar lasts 2 or 3 uses; the large is twice as big. The small one is more reasonably priced for people who just want to sample the stuff.

This thing has lots of great little scrubby bits in it. Ground rice, ground almonds, AND adzuku beans. Not just one, but three, and they are all super-scrubby. You'll be a little red when you're done, but it's SO worth it once you've cooled off and your skin is as smooth as a baby's bottom.

The only downside is that it makes your tub look like somebody dumped sand into the bottom of it once the thing drains. The bar melts at around 'hot water' temperature, and you're not supposed to use any moisturizer after using this stuff - but you really don't have to! The moisturizing oils in the bar really do work very well. I'll definitely be picking up a couple more of these.

The cocoa butter/lemon/lavendar scent is really amazing as well. Soothing AND refreshing, it can wake you up in the morning or calm you down at night before you go to sleep. Definitely try this thing, though, if you're looking for ultimate exfoliation plus moisturizing

product_name: Fantasy Britney Spears(tm) Eau de Parfum Spray, 3.3 oz: Beauty
title: Surprised
review_text: I am 40 and fell in love with this scent right away.  The nice thing is you don't need to douse yourself with it to get the effect.  My mother,who is 75, never mentions my perfume, noticed it right away and kept asking me about it.  I just ordered her some for her birthday

product_name: Fantasy Britney Spears(tm) Eau de Parfum Spray, 3.3 oz: Beauty
title: Very Surprised that I love this scent!
review_text: I am in my mid 30's.  I am not a Britney fan at all.  I received a department store sales flyer in the mail a few days ago and it had a sample of Fantasy in it.  Out of curiosity, I opened it and could not believe I liked the scent.  My husband and I are both picky about perfume.  I decided to order a sample size off of Ebay before buying the full monty - because the last perfume we both really liked was Sensi - but it made my husband sick after a bit.  Well, I got it yesterday and I still really like it.  I am shocked the sweetness that it starts with does not give me a headache.  I think I will buy a full sized bottle once my sample is gone

product_name: Fantasy Britney Spears(tm) Eau de Parfum Spray, 3.3 oz: Beauty
title: Sweet and long lasting
review_text:
I just got this perfume for Valentine's Day.  I love it!  Yes, it is sweet smelling, as another reviewer mentions, but it's a pleasant sweetness.  Cotton candy does describe it, actually.  But who says grownups don't like smelling yummy??  There's a hint of vanilla as well and overall, I think the combo is fantastic!

I love Curious, and now I love Fantasy, too!  They are two very different perfumes, so it's easy to understand why a person can like one and not the other.  I will say, though, that Fantasy lasts far longer than Curious.  You can apply it in the morning and still smell it when you go to sleep!  Which, I don't mind at all...

I recommend this, of course, but I recommend you sample it before you buy.  Just because you liked Curious doesn't mean you will like this one

product_name: Carol's Daughter Almond Cookie Body Butter: Beauty
title: Carol's Daughter Almond Cookie Body Butter
review_text: This body butter is yummy.  It smells good.  It feels good on.  It is a must for dry skin.

product_name: Carol's Daughter Almond Cookie Body Butter: Beauty
title: True Advertisement!
review_text: The smell is great the feel on the skin is great!  Just like the other reviews suggest!

product_name: Demon In The Dark Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Wake UP!
review_text: This is a minty fresh soap that keeps its fragrance by being topped with a black wax layer (hence Demon in the Dark.) Before you put this in the shower, cut off the wax. Then enjoy the tingling soap. Very invigorating

product_name: Demon In The Dark Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Demon in my bedroom.
review_text: I purchsed this product for my husband and he hates beauty products. When we got it the minty scent was soooo strong in the box. When we opened the box it was like a minty apple juice drink. He used it and I was all over him and the minty smell gave him just the right energy to "bring it"

product_name: Philosophy Hope In A Jar 2oz: Beauty
title: This is an amazing product
review_text:
I have been struggling with dry skin and mild acne for years. Recently, I revamped my cleansing routine and my makeup. I bought the Philosphy Purity cleanser and Hope in a Jar. It has made an unbelievable difference in my skin! My skin is smooth, not a dry flake anywhere. It is as soft as a baby's butt.

It is worth noting that a little goes a LONG way. You only need a very small amount (about the size of a dime or less) for your whole face. It is a very light texture, almost like a mousse, and glides over your skin and absorbs quickly. If you use too much (I did the first few times)then your face could look greasy. If you remember that less is more, then you will get a perfectly moisturized, yet matte, complexion.
