After using the Philosophy cleanser and Hope in a Jar, I use the Bare Escentuals mineral makeup (bought the Light/Fairly Light starter kit). My skin, for the first time ever, is flawless. No acne. No dry skin. No reddish areas. Just a perfectly smooth complexion. I keep looking in the mirror, thinking "Is this my skin? Really?" I cannot believe what a difference this product (and the mineral makeup) has made. 

I have heard of others being allergic to some ingredients in the Hope in a Jar, so it is not for everyone. I suggest getting a sample size to make sure you won't have a reaction

product_name: Philosophy Hope In A Jar 2oz: Beauty
title: I literally just put it on minutes ago
review_text: First of all let me preface this by stating that I literally just put this product on minutes ago. I have had a chemical peel over a week ago and was given Retin A and therefore my face was peeling so horribly, that I thought I couldn't leave the house. I mean my makeup would literally come right off. I was horrified! I tried several moisterizers sometimes multiple ones but could still see the skin flaking off onto my desk, so I researched this and went to Sephora and bought a kit. I washed my face, did the serum and added this product and I honestly do not see 1 single flake of dry skin, it does tingle but I think it's because my face is raw and so dry but it feels as if my skin is drinking it up like a cold glass of water. I am anxious to see what happens in the weeks to come. I have mild cyctic acne and have struggled with it for years. I decided to see a dermatolist and then got chemical peels it helped to rid me of the bad acne but then I was so dry for 2 wks I couldn't bare to even look at myself. My skin doesn't hurt anymore, for allthe sensitive people, there is a sensitve version but if you have dry skin from the crazy acne treatments they make us do or peels or just dry winter heat, this is the product for you. If it seems strong then use it every other night until you skin can adapt. Or just once a day. I hope you find this product helpful like I did becaus I am still looking in the mirrow that's at my desk

product_name: Estee Lauder Daywear Plus Cream: Beauty
title: Great moisturizer
review_text: Best face cream ever, but even though Cosmetic Mall .com had it for less, the three week shipping, and Poor service from USPS from China, I'll pay the extra buck and get it from Nordstom again next time

product_name: Dior Fahrenheit: Beauty
title: I really like it
review_text:
Fahrenheit by Dior has a fragrance like no other... I've been fascinated by this fragrance ever since I can remember.

It is bold and fragrant... generally people seem to either like it a lot or hate it. It seems a little overpowering at first but as I said, you either like it or hate it.

the fragrance is masculine no doubt and it's not something that I'd use in summer... essentially a night fragrance.

product_name: Lancome Juicy Tubes Lip Gloss Ultra Shiny Spring Fling: Beauty
title: Gloss that rocks
review_text: Lancome's Juicy Tubes in Simmer tastes like my beverage of choice, Orange Julius.  When you apply it, it feels like you're rubbing the tip of an orange creamsicle ice cream pop onto your lips (minus the cold, minus the cream).  The color is a very subtle pink-ish beige, but it provides enough glossy shimmer to keep your lips a-simmer!  This is my 4th tube of juicy (also a big fan of Spring Fling & Berry Bold) and so far this is my favorite flavor

product_name: Lancome Juicy Tubes Lip Gloss Ultra Shiny Spring Fling: Beauty
title: The Best Lip Gloss Ever
review_text:
I used to use Mac's Glass lipgloss before Juicy Tubes were around. Any time the wind blew I had hair stuck to the incredibly sticky gloss which, as you know, is extremely unpleasant and annoying. Juicy tubes stays on, but doesn't have the overly-sticky feeling which is wonderful.

I don't wear much makeup and find Juicy Tubes to add that "something special" to a dewy face. I recommend Daiquiri or Berry Bold for the most natural looks. Daiquiri is more of a straightforward shine while Berry Bold gives you that red lipped childlike look we all used to have naturally. You will adore this gloss. I can't live without it

product_name: Lancome Juicy Tubes Lip Gloss Ultra Shiny Spring Fling: Beauty
title: Best Lip Gloss Ever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review_text: Oh my gosh!  I love this lip gloss so much.  I first bought one last year, and it was the best item of makeup I've ever bought!  It goes great over other lip gloss/lipstick or alone.  All of the colors are great, but I'd start our with pink first.  My personal favorite is "Spring Fling" because it's not so bright, but it's still juicy.  You will deffinetly not regret buying one of these.  It's worth every penny

product_name: Bourjois Strengthening And Smoothing Nail Polish: Beauty
title: Amazing!
review_text: This nail polish is by far the best nail product I have ever purchased! I stumbled accross it in France two summers ago and have been dying to find it ever since. The brush is great, depositing the polish smoothly and thinly, the product dries quickly and lasts a long time. It is AMAZING

product_name: Mustela Stretch Marks Intensive Action: Beauty
title: No change!
review_text: I have been using this product religiously since I gave birth in February, unfortunately I have not noticed a difference - I mean no change at all.

product_name: Mania by Giorgio Armani for Men: Beauty
title: kinda expensive, but worth it!
review_text: My boyfriend has this cologne and I love it!  It smells so good.  Even if he is wearing the deodorant and not the cologne, it smells as if he was.  It may be a little on the expensive side (not as expensive on amazon.com as Macy's or other department stores), but it's well worth it.  Just be sure to correctly select the item you want because the picture shown is of the cologne

product_name: Truefitt & Hill 1805 Shaving Cream 5.8 oz: Beauty
title: Fantastic
reviewer_location: New Haven... but I wish I was home in Seattle, WA
review_text:
If there is a better shaving cream out there, I couldn't find it. I've not had any problems and a year later, I'm still on my first purchase with about 40% left. 

Fantastic stuff

product_name: SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic - 1 oz: Beauty
title: Serum for true skin health and glow!!
review_text:
I love this stuff!! Five months ago I was diagnosed with having AK's (Actinic Keratosis -- lesions that can develop into squamous cell carcinoma/ skin cancer). My dermatologist recommended I use Skinceuticals CE Ferulic every day as it prevents thymine dimers (DNA mutations associated with skin cancer) with a medium exfoliator for a few months before taking more drastic measures to eradicate the AK's. My skin has never been healthier!! The lesions (which were scaly, itchy, and red) are healed and the overall apperance of my skin has improved dramatically and is much more even. My pores are smaller and I have a healthy glow. The CE Ferulic also is packed with antioxidant protection to help fight free-radical damage and provides photoprotection. 
HIGHLY recommended for those with AK's, uneven skin tone, large pores, or blemished or dull skin. 
LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT!!!

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns shampoo, conditioner, & shower gel: Beauty
title: Philosophy's Cinnamon Buns
review_text: After hearing so many good things about Philosophy's Cinnamon Buns, I just had to try it out for myself. I found it to not really smell like cinnamon buns, but more like water mixed with sugar. If you use it on your head, it will leave a lingering smell, but it won't last long on your body after taking a shower. I think this product is a nice way of treating yourself, but I definitely do not think it smells like cinnamon buns, which left me slightly disappointed. Overall, a great product

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns shampoo, conditioner, & shower gel: Beauty
title: Nice for the holidays
review_text: I put this in a bathroom soap dispenser for Christmas, and it adds a nice touch during the holiday season.  Smells nice and lathers well

product_name: La Mer The Lip Balm 0.32 oz: Beauty
title: An ok lip balm
review_text: I am a huge fan of the creme, but not of this lip balm. For the price they want this should've been much, much better. It goes on nice and has a neutral taste and moisturizes ok. My L'Occitane Lip balm or just plain shea butter does a much better job moisturizing my lips than this does.  Save your money and do not buy this.

product_name: philosophy muffin man lip shine .5 ounce: Beauty
title: Delicious lip balm that WORKS
review_text: I have been searching for years for something to keep my lips from chapping, and this is it.  It's absolutely amazing, better than anything I have tried, and I have tried so many lip products.  The lemon custard flavor is delicious, too.  Put it on at night and in the morning your lips will be soft and smooth--This is the ultimate conditioner for your lips.

product_name: RALPH LAUREN BLUE For Women By RALPH LAUREN eau de toilette: Beauty: Ralph Lauren
title: Best Fragrance Ever!  Attracts guys too!
review_text: I first got a whiff of Blue in a magazine advertisement, when it came out and, it was love from that moment. I went out and purchased it and, this is all I wear now. It is all I want to wear. Nothing else compares to this, for me. I get so many compliments! I had one coworker once, who would walk by me just so he could smell it. He told me what he was doing, of course, he just loved the smell. People want to know what I am wearing and where they can purchase it. I feel great when I'm wearing it and, I will keep using it as long as they will make it

product_name: RALPH LAUREN BLUE For Women By RALPH LAUREN eau de toilette: Beauty: Ralph Lauren
title: GORGEOUS!
review_text: This is by far the most delicious scent ever, NO OTHER PERFUME COMES EVEN CLOSE, I use it everyday and it is worth every cent

product_name: RALPH LAUREN BLUE For Women By RALPH LAUREN eau de toilette: Beauty: Ralph Lauren
title: A Must Have perfume
review_text: Definitely A-Must-Have perfume! The smell is just awesome. Not too strong...not too mild and stays for long. I strongly recommend this. It is also a great gift.

product_name: RALPH LAUREN BLUE For Women By RALPH LAUREN eau de toilette: Beauty: Ralph Lauren
title: Exotically Rich, Romantic & Evocative of Good Memories
review_text:
This fragrance took me quite by surprise when I first tried it from a magazine sample, so much so that I knew I had to try it at a department store - this was a little over a year ago. Then I sampled it at a department store and all my nose could think was "Wow!" - gardenias from my grandmother's garden, the suntan oils & tropical perfumes that I smelled as a little girl at the beach, with a few more florals blended in that make this fragrance even more exotic and sensual - I knew I had to have it! I bought myself a bathgel and lotion set and put the large bottle of cologne on my X-mas list, which my sweet & generous boyfriend got for me. 
In my opinion, this is probably the most alluring fragrance for women that I have ever smelled. I feel very alluring every time I wear it for my boyfriend - and he loves it! So this would be a great gift for a man's wife or girlfriend, or for a woman's best friend, sister or cousin (as long as you wear it for your own man, too!), but a slightly awkward gift to give to your mother, aunt or grandmother - it's that enticing. But if your single older relative or friend simply must have it as one of her gifts, then have it given by one of her female friends, sister, cousin or "Santa". That way there won't be any awkwardness at gift-giving time. Believe me - this fragrance is the olfactory equivalent of French lingerie or a string bikini!

product_name: Carol's Daughter Almond Cookie: Beauty
title: DID NOT REGRET BUYING THIS PRODUCT.
review_text: A GREAT PRODUCT FOR DRY SKIN, WITHOUT LEAVING A GREASY FEELING.  NOT ONLY DOES IT MAKE MY SKIN FEEL SOFT BUT IT SMELLS WONDERFUL.

product_name: Carol's Daughter Almond Cookie: Beauty
title: EXCELLENT PRODUCTS!!! A MUST BUY!!
review_text:
I'VE SEEN CAROL'S DAUGHTER ADVERTISED IN COUNTLESS MAGAZINES..I'VE ALSO SEEN IT ON "TYRA'S" TALK SHOW AND, AFTER HEARING SO MANY WONDERFUL THINGS ABOUT HER COMPANY... I'VE BEEN DYING TO SEE HOW GOOD IT IS FOR MYSELF...
WELL....TODAY I RECEIVED MY CAROL'S DAUGHTER PRODUCTS AND I AM THROUGHLY PLEASED!!!..THIS ALMOND COOKIE FRAGRANCE SMELLS SO DELICIOUS!!! I LOVE HOW IT FEELS ON MY SKIN!!!...FINALLY A PRODUCT THAT WORKS AS GOOD AS IT SMELLS!!!

product_name: Carol's Daughter Almond Cookie: Beauty
title: I gotta have it!
review_text: I absolutly love ALL of Carol's daughter's products.  Everything to me is true to description.  I recieved my Almond Cookie gift set in the mail and I couldnt wait to open it. The smell is to die for, sometimes I open my Shea Souffle' just so I can smell it. I also love her labels and containers.  I will forever be a customer of Carol's Daughter and I look forward to the day where I can walk into one of her stores. Her prices are worth every dime. Remember you get what you pay for

product_name: Carol's Daughter Almond Cookie: Beauty
title: Finally
review_text: I thank God for Carol's Daughter. I have finally found a quality product that makes me feel like I'm at the spa in my own home for a a resonable price. I rather pay $25.00 any day for spectacular service and a fantastic product any day than $10 so-so product filled with water and vaseline. I am a Carols daughter member so are my kids and most of my family. Kudos to Lisa Price for setting that much needed standard in the beauty industry.God Bless You Al

product_name: Eclipse Halo Lighted Wall 5X Mirror: Beauty
title: Dim light but solidly built
review_text: This product is very well built.  The mirrors are clear and free from any distortion.  Magnification level is just right.  The only negative about this is the light is very dim and not adjustable

product_name: Eclipse Halo Lighted Wall 5X Mirror: Beauty
title: Easy to install mirror
review_text:
The mirror was very easy to install.  After using the mirror a couple weeks, the plane and magnifying mirrors are very clear and easy to adjust to the correct distance for great viewing.
The only negative is that the halo light does not provide sufficient brightness, but not an issue if mirror is used in a well lighted area

product_name: Eclipse Halo Lighted Wall 5X Mirror: Beauty
title: HAPPY
review_text: Was very happy with the service of delivery, and I use the mirror every day

product_name: Mario Badescu Seaweed Cleansing Soap: Beauty
title: Mario Badescu JUNKY
review_text:
Gone are the days of overpriced department store products that do absolutly nothing for your skin! Gone are the days of spending too much money for a product that sits in your bathroom and collects dust!

This is stuff is kick ass!
If you are the type to buy a product that is endorced by a celebrity, then you can be satisfied here, and if you go to the Mario Badescu website you can see all the celebrities who have gone to the spa and used the products.

If you are looking for a product that makes your skin feel clean and fresh, without spending your paycheck, then you have found the perfect company!!!

I have been using the products from Mario Badescu for three years now, and I have gotten my Mom, Mother-in-Law, Sister, and other friends and family to become Mario Badescu junkies too.

That all said, if you want something to pamper yourself look no further.

(Try the Seaweed Soap, and the Orange Protective Cream. And if you have a problem with Pimples then look for the drying lotion, but beware its strong stuff.

product_name: Mustela PhysiObebe: Beauty
title: Another great product from Mustela!
review_text: I love this product.  I use it when my son spits up and it either goes on his face or body.  Sometimes it still stinks from the spit up after wiping with just a wipe so I pump a little of this on a wipe and it does the trick.  I have various Mustela products and they all work great

product_name: Mustela PhysiObebe: Beauty
title: Baby Windex!
review_text: I got this product as a gift at a baby shower and wasn't sure how I was going to use it--I was a little unclear as to exactly what it was. . .is it soap? (no) is it astringent? (no) what the heck is it?  Answer:  it's a baby Windex! I have used this going on 4 years and 2 babies.  It removes any lingering stink from diaper changes, cleans spit-up off skin and leaves a nice fresh scent, removes macaroni and cheese and chee-tos from hands and faces, not to mention kool-aid, chocolate, spaghetti sauce residue. . .you name it, Physiobebe cleans it up.  Just pump some onto a cotton pad, wipe, or napkin, and clean off your kid.  I highly recommend it

product_name: Mustela PhysiObebe: Beauty
title: great product
review_text: This is a fabulous product.  I use the whole Mustela line.  This is great for sponge bathing when your newborn arrives home.  I also use it on a cotton ball after baths to make sure my baby is extra clean.  This is great for helping babies complexion

product_name: Fair Trade Foot Lotion by LUSH: Beauty
title: oh so soothing....
review_text: I love this product!  I look forward to the end of the day knowing that I can soothe my tired feet with Fair Trade Foot Lotion!  I've seen this product work wonders prior to this purchase--when my husband was in the army his feet were extremley worn and torn when he came home from Iraq--after using this product for several days, his feet looked and felt brand new

product_name: Fair Trade Foot Lotion by LUSH: Beauty
title: soft footies
review_text: I actually got a sample from the LUSH store in San Francisco and just tried it-it's fabulous on my cracked and peeling heels

product_name: Pink Sugar by Aquolina for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Delish!
review_text:
This is my all-time favorite perfume, BAR NONE! I get millions of compliments when I wear it; most people think it smells like baking cookies or marshmallows - but not a little girl scent - definitely a grown up girl scent. Men love it because it smells like food - a definite turn on! LOL :)
You truly cannot go wrong with this perfume, it is absolutely faboo

product_name: Mistral Bubble Baths - 8.4 fl. oz.: Beauty
title: Heady, aromatic and succulent bath
review_text:
The bottle itself is a real looker, with thick rich smooth glass encasing golden rich amber jewel like liquid on the inside. Fancy shmancy I said as I took it out of the delivery box. 
I opened the bottle to take a whiff and my oh my, it's definitely worth the price tag.
The real test of course came at bath time, and this sure delivered beyond looks alone.

The bath water turned bubbly and luscious with earthy aromas of warm, primrose vanilla and the rich, juicy and creamy finish of the apricot. This should be eaten, not bathed in!
Insanely delicious as it would make a wonderful present for any friend or relative, but better yet for yourself.

 Apparently this can be used as a body wash, and I am really looking forward to using it in the shower, as I'm a shower person in the morning, and this would make a tantalizing shower experience for sure. I have reviewed a few of these bath items today, and now I feel so sweet and sleepy after my bath that I feel extremely happy for getting this bubble bath. It's little delectable products such as this one that bring you calm and pleasantness after a long day, and nothing can replace some nice relaxation alone in the tub. Even my boyfriend loved the scent as he used it the other day, so it can be for both men and women, but I might have to hide it in case he secretly likes it too much!

product_name: The Body Shop Vitamin C Intensive Night Treatment: Beauty
title: a little goes a long way, what a price!
review_text:
I purchased this product over the summer 2006 when I became concerned about sun damage.  My only question about this product is whether the vitamin C in it is stable (i.e., should the product be refrigerated to maintain its potency?).  Regardless, it has a sufficient amount of vitamin C for the product to be worthwhile (10% - woo hoo!), and other vitamin C creams are much more expensive.  

The nice thing about this product is that a little really does go a long way.  You squeeze a small amount onto your finger (hygienic packaging!) and spread onto your face.  As the product spreads, it absorbs and has a silky finish.  I'm not sure why, but I have taken to mixing this product with a little bit of Cetaphil moisturizer and I love the result.  It does have an orangey citrus smell, but I am not bothered by it (which is rare).

product_name: Aveda Be Curly Curl Enhancer (6.7 oz): Beauty
title: Love it
review_text: This is a great finisher - use after you've drenched your hair with leave-in conditioner, and focus on the ends which tend to spread out and fly away and the little wispies at your temple and nape.  Smells great but doesn't compete with the smell of other products.  Only con: a little bit does NOT go a long way.  It's expensive to stock up

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: A MIRROR SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy!

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Best Gloss on the Market
review_text:
MAC LipGlass is the absolute best. There are plenty of colors to choose from, SUPER-Shiny, and the gloss is thick, stays on and doesn't run. 
The best colors are....
NICO for a cute lavender pink color with a glittery shine. 
OYSTERGIRL is a shimmery baby pink.
OH BABY is the perfect gloss for any earth toned lipstick.
CHAI looks amazing with black smokey eyes. It's the perfect neutral earthy gloss and has no glitter or shimmer - just pure shine

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Best Gloss on the Market
review_text:
MAC LipGlass is the absolute best. There are plenty of colors to choose from, SUPER-Shiny, and the gloss is thick, stays on and doesn't run. 
The best colors are....
NICO for a cute lavender pink color with a glittery shine. 
OYSTERGIRL is a shimmery baby pink.
OH BABY is the perfect gloss for any earth toned lipstick.
CHAI looks amazing with black smokey eyes. It's the perfect neutral earthy gloss and has no glitter or shimmer - just pure shine

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Vanilla scent not so bad!
reviewer: Lindsey Justice "MAC addict, and reader of many things"
review_text: I'm REALLY anal about scented/flavored lipglosses- especially ones scented or flavored with vanilla, but MAC LipGlass isn't that vanilla-ish at all!  It's got very pigmented color, it stays on a LONG time for a gloss, and each tube lasts a long time...  Don't let what the other reviewer said about the vanilla scent throw you off

product_name: Calvin Klein cK One: Beauty
title: A fresh, clean scent
review_text: I reach for CK One on days that I want a crisp, fresh scent.  Intended to be a unisex fragrance, it is not at all sweet or flowery.  However, it does have a softness to it that I personally believe makes it better suited to a woman than a man; I find it to be slightly musky without being masculine.  Overall, this is a really nice, neutral fragrance for everyday wear

product_name: Calvin Klein cK One: Beauty
title: CK1
review_text: CK1 is a very nice Toilette spray.  It has a very good smell to it.I gave it as a gift and now I am going to have to purchase it for me to

product_name: Ralph by Ralph Lauren for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Addicted
review_text: I love this perfume, it's the best that I have in my collection.  It's not too strong but it's enough for everyone to notice.  I practically wear it everyday, and this size will usually last for a while

product_name: Ralph by Ralph Lauren for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: great lush scent
review_text: This is an amazingly fresh fragrance...It's a light, lush, and sparkling floral-fruity blend.  A lot of people asked me what I was wearing.  I highly recommend it for someone looking for a nice scent that they can wear all day.

product_name: Lancome Hypnose Mascara: Beauty
title: Perfect Product
review_text: I use both this mascara and Lancome Flextencils  when i'm going out, Flextencils first then coat with Hypnose.  My lashes look HUGE and not too clumpy.  Flextencils add great length, while Hypnose adds volume.  I use Hypnose by itself on just an average day.  Great Product! Makes my Lashes big and not clump

product_name: Lancome Hypnose Mascara: Beauty
title: great mascara
review_text: I've always used Lancome mascaras, before Hypnose, I used Denfincils.  Hypnose is a great mascara.  Never clumps, the non-waterproof version is easily removable, and your lashes look amazing.  Definately give this product a try

product_name: Lancome Hypnose Mascara: Beauty
title: Happy with Hypnose
review_text: So far this is the best thickening mascara I have tried that are either sold in drug stores or at department stores. It is not sticky or gloppy and you won't look like Tammy Fay with spider lashes. I do however, have to apply two coats to bring out the more sparse areas of my lashes, but I have finally stopped my search for thickening mascaras. My journey ends here

product_name: Almond and Aloe Liquid Soap for Hands and Body: Beauty
title: A UNIQUELY BENEFICIAL CLEANSER
review_text:
Tried and true might well describe the products offered by Caswell-Massey as generations have relied upon them for both quality and efficacy.  Established in 1752, it's America's oldest Chemist and Perfumer.  My grandmother enjoyed their products, and I do, too.

	Their Almond & Aloe Liquid Soap is a boon because it not only cleanses well but moisturizes as it does so.  Far too many soaps leave skin feeling dry and itchy.

	Almond, as we  know, has a lovely distinctive fragrance as well as skin softening properties.  Combine it with aloe which contains healing properties, and you have a uniquely beneficial cleanser.

	Other ingredients include Vitamins A and D for nourishment.  This soap is particularly useful for those who wash their hands frequently during the day and for those with normal to dry or sensitive skin.

	Other items in Caswell-Massey's Almond & Aloe line include Body Balm, Bath Seltzer, Cold Cream Soap, Hand Cream, Hand & Body Emulsion, and Almond Body Splash

product_name: Creamy Candy Bath Melt by LUSH: Beauty
title: YUMMY and fun
review_text: This bath melt was nice.  It smelled great but it is pretty sweet.  It didn't do anything spectacular to the water, just kind of made it look soapy.  The melt took it's time melting and the smell lasted throughout the bath.  I took the melt after it sat in the water for a while and rubbed it directly on my skin which made my skin smell nice.  It also moisturizes well and makes the water feel smooth and silky, but the smell didn't linger on my skin once I was out of the water

product_name: Creamy Candy Bath Melt by LUSH: Beauty
title: Mmmmm!
review_text: If you haven't tried Lush or Creamy Candy, do it! Creamy Candy smells delicious and leaves your skin silky soft. For soap to match, try Rock Star. Mmmmm!!! I can't place the fragrance; it's cherry, but not, cotton candy, but not - it's VERY sweet smelling and the scent lasts and lasts.  Enjoy

product_name: Philosophy Microdelivery Peel Kit: Beauty
title: Takes off the years
review_text: This is the best micro peel I have ever tried!  The thing I noticed first was that when I applied "when hope is not enough" and "the present"  they went on so smoothly.  They absorbed equally.  In my mid-30's, my young skin is fading, but this really brought it back.  I won't say I am 19 again, but I am sure the difference is obvious.  I am a hairstylist and my customers have been making mention of how great my skin looks since I added this to my bag of tricks.  It is a lot more effective that I would have thought, and I have not had a microdermabrasion since I started using this 2-4 times per month

product_name: Fashion Tape by Hollywood Fashion Tape: Beauty
title: I love, love this product!
review_text: I love, love this product. I can't believe how much I actually used it; I ran out of my box within two months! All those tops that have a wide open neck needed the bra strap to sit on the edge of my shoulder--this kept my straps in place all day and night! A few of my work tops have buttons that stop short towards the bottom; I use the strips to close the flap in place so it's smooth all the way down. Tip: in some cases I cut the strips in half; even half a strip holds my bra straps in place. This product holds things in place or down, it does not lift and hold--its not ducked tape.

product_name: Chanel Double Perfect Compact: Beauty
title: Great powder foudation
review_text:
The powder/foundation is excellent for skin which is oily and large-pored.
It is one of the best around for no-caking, no-oil, smooth surface skin.
If you can't stand the feel of cream or lotion foundations, Chanel does it best!!
Also, my seller was terrific

product_name: Chanel Double Perfect Compact: Beauty
title: Best one step Foundation
review_text:
I love this foundation.  It is a easy one step process. I don't like to use liquid.  I need something easy, quick and foolproof. I am always in a hurry with 3 kids I don't have time for multi steps.  I also have acne and red cheeks.  This evens out my skin and covers my acne. My skin looks flawless. I have tried so many products including MAC, Bare Minerals, Lancome, Origins, Shiseido etc..  My only problem with this makeup is...
It is so expensive.  What do you expect, it's Chanel. Pure perfection

product_name: philosophy exfoliate kit: Beauty
title: In Love.
review_text:
I absolutely love this kit. It keeps my dry, slightly acne prone skin so soft, smooth & blemish free (for the most part).

I use both everyday, along with an intense moisturizer, & my complexion has improved GREATLY

product_name: philosophy exfoliate kit: Beauty
title: Awesome
review_text: I absolutely love this kit. I love that I can use THE GREAT MYSTERY every morning and it isn't harsh on my skin and I love using THE GREATEST LOVE at night and when I wash it off it just melts into my skin I don't even have to put on a moisturizer. For something really nice try using THE GREAT MYSTERY and then put THE GREATEST LOVE on top of that. It's really amazing. The only caution I would have is when using THE GREATEST LOVE don't rub it in you have to massage it very lightly otherwise it will irritate your skin and can cause breakouts or make you feel like you have a sun burn.

product_name: philosophy exfoliate kit: Beauty
title: Exfoliate Saved My Face
review_text: I suffered from a severe case of shingles that affected the right side of my face.  The infection left scars on half of my face.  I started using the Exfoliate Kit regularly. After four months, my face now looks normal, and I'm able to go without makeup again.  Thanks Philosophy

product_name: philosophy exfoliate kit: Beauty
title: Fabulous!!!
review_text: Best skin care line I have ever used.  Frequent air travel wrecked havoc on my skin, and the exfoliate kit revealed a complexion I never knew I had.  I'm currently using other Philosophy products, and have recommended them to family and friends.

product_name: H2O Plus Oil Control Blotting Tissues: Beauty
title: H2O
review_text: This is a great prodduct at a reasonable price whenever I need these I order and the arrive timel

product_name: Sea Vegetable Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Mmm!  I love this soap!
review_text: I absolutely adore this scent!  It certainly is not just for men!  Anyone who loves the smell of limes will love this!  The sea salt is amazing!  I literally haven't been able to use any other soap since discovering it two years ago, and I used to be a body wash person!  Never again!  Give it a try! It'll wake you right up in the morning and keep your energy high

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Apple Cider Clean Conditioner: Beauty
title: So Clean!
review_text: This is such a nice, lightweight conditioner. And makes my hair smell super clean and fresh

product_name: Shiseido Pureness Foaming Cleansing Fluid 150ml/5oz: Beauty
title: Long time user
review_text: I have been using this product for years.  I have a really oily T-zone, and I find that this product keeps it in control.  It is a very good cleanser that removes the oil without drying your skin.  No matter what color your skin tone may be, I think you will like this product!

product_name: Seki Edge Stainless Steel Antibacterial Blackhead Remover SE-46: Beauty
title: works as advertised
review_text: Product works well.  It's a whole lot better than using your fingers =

product_name: Papier Poudr Oil Blotting Papers - Rachel: Beauty
title: PAPIER POUDRE
review_text:
This product is absolutely brilliant. In the past I have always had to go to the bathroom and blot with tissues and get my powder and puff out. Taking too long. Plus ending up with a cake face as the day goes on.
 With these powder papers, I can do it anytime discreetly, without having to use a mirror or a puff. Just a fresher face with a slight dusting of powder. Perfect

product_name: MenScience Eye Rescue Formula 1oz. Ultralight. Oil-Free. Matte Finish.: Beauty
title: reduce eye wrinkles
review_text: Terrific for the area around the eyes. Gets rid of dryness, and doesn't sting the eyes or feel greasy.

product_name: Tend Skin: Beauty
title: This is only thing I have found that works for ingrown whiskers
review_text:
About 10 years ago, I began getting ingrown whiskers on my neck from shaving.  Not only did they not feel good (they'd itch, and were sensitive) but they looked horrible. The front of my neck was red, and I would have horrible red and white bumps all over the skin where whiskers would curl and grow back down into the skin.  I was totally self concsious, because it looked horrible.  The only thing I could for the longest time was pluck them with tweezers.  That took a lot of time, and digging into my skin to pull the hairs was very uncomfortable, and really didn't work that well.  I tried switching to an electric razor with little success.  I could not have a close shave on my neck without getting the horrible ingrown hairs.

I searched the web for months to try and find something that would work.  I found some advice for a few different things, but none worked.  I finally ran across a website of a distributor that was selling Tend Skin.  By that point I wasn't sure anything would work, but I was desperate for something, so I bought it.  I am SO glad I did.  It really works when you use it as directed, and you see results by the time you have to shave again.

I apply Tend Skin with a cotton ball or pad to my neck after I shave and dry my face.  I will then apply it again in the evening, and repeat each morning and night.  It does not take much at all.  I always buy the largest bottle for fear that one day Tend Skin will disappear!  If you have ingrown facial hair from shaving, you NEED to get this.  It is the only thing that I have found the works, and I am 100% happy with it.  It is rather pricey, but I never hesitate to buy because it is worth every penny to me.

The only small "complaint" I have about it is that it smells just a tad funny to me.  My wife says it smells fine to her, so I don't worry about it.  I wonder if they could make it with a slightly nicer smell - or none at all.  It really doesn't matter, though, because Tend Skin is AWESOME and I don't know what I'd do without it.

I can't speak to how effective it is for ingrown leg hair, etc. but I would imagine it would work the same

product_name: Tend Skin: Beauty
title: Nothing Else Works!
review_text: I have used Tend Skin for around three years now for razor bumps on the bikini line. Before I started using it, I had tried everything else and resigned to the fact that I'd always be stuck with bumps along the bikini line. A friend of mine told me about Tend Skin and swore by it, so I bought a small bottle. It seemed like it was expensive, but that first bottle lasted well over 6 months. It does smell like alcohol at first but the smell goes away when it dries. As far as the other reviews on here, I've only had stinging when I used it IMMEDIATELY after shaving...I think b/c the pores were still open from the shower. For me, it's been a skin saver when I'd already given up the search. I hope that the negative reviews on here don't discourage people from trying it. Everyone's skin reacts somewhat differently. Of the millions of bottles of Tend Skin sold every year, I think the half dozen people on here who didn't like it are the few unhappy rarities, not the average who, like me, thank goodness it's around.

product_name: The Body Shop Vitamin E Cream Cleanser: Beauty
title: Love it!
review_text: This cream cleanser is wonderful! I have used the Clinique 3 step program since I was a teenager until I went to an at home Body Shop party and tried this cleanser. I have been using it ever since. It is so soft and creamy, feels great going on my skin, and leaves it feeling clean, smooth and moisturized. Its great at gently removing make-up in the evenings and is a nice pick me up first thing in the mornings

product_name: Lucky You by Lucky Brand for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: A fun fragrance!
review_text: This fun fragrance comes across to me as soft and slightly sweet, with a feel that's both young and a bit sexy.  The scent is quite pretty, with a bit of floral, and the lightness of it makes it a perfect everyday scent (although it works well for romance, too!).  As mentioned above, the scent does have a youthful, fresh feel to it, and although I've heard some say that the fragrance is best for teens, I'm almost 40, and I enjoy it on days that I'm looking for something lighthearted and fun (granted, I probably wouldn't wear it everyday).  Lucky You comes in a cute pink bottle with a unique rubber stopper, and it has good staying power, although the scent grows more subtle over time.  Recommended for women of all ages who are young at heart

product_name: Lucky You by Lucky Brand for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Very Sexy
review_text: This is a very suttle fragrance, that lasts for hours. Slightly floral,however is a very intimate scent, most people need to get very close to notice, which can be good, but also a sign that you need to spray yourself all over. I would recommend picking this up if you want something to carry around in your purse to spray here and there. It last for hours but is not an "all day" perfume

product_name: Lucky You by Lucky Brand for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: A Touch of true femininity!
review_text:
I bought this perfume about one year ago with a gift certificate.
I was skeptical about purchasing perfume online but I was not dissapointed. This perfume is absolutely fabulous! When you first put it on the floral freshness and ruby grapefruit awakens your senses as the top notes. The middle notes included a powdery musk that is sensual yet not to woodsy. And the bottom notes of jasmine are so graceful yet grasping.
Buy this perfume. You will fall in love with it

product_name: Lucky You by Lucky Brand for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: MY SIGNATURE
review_text: I LOVE THIS PERFUME. IT HAS BEEN MY SIGNATURE EVERYDAY SCENT FOR SEVERAL YEARS NOW. ALOT OF PEOPLE ASK WHAT YOU ARE WEARING BECAUSE IT SMELLS SO GOOD... AND GUYS LOVE IT TOO

product_name: Chanel Mascara - Extra Cils Super Curl Lengthening: Beauty
title: The best
review_text: Of all the higher end mascaras I've tried, this one is by far the best.  Your lashes look longer and thicker with just ONE coat and looks like natural great lashes, not made up.  The creamy gel formula goes on smooth, never clumps or feels sticky-and true to form, your lashes will curl up nicely.  Although not a water proof mascara, it has incredible staying power, cleans off easily.  I LOVE this mascara, won't look elsewhere

product_name: HSuan Wen Hua Hair Treatment by LUSH: Beauty
title: HSuan Wen Hua is WONDERFUL!
review_text:
I have this product working in my hair right now. It is simply wonderful! 

First off, it smells like lovely Victorian rosebud-almond pudding. It has a similar consistency. I can get about three to four uses from each container and I have very thick hair. 

My hair was preciously quite dry and abused. I had dyed it twice in the last six months. After ONE use of this product my hair felt better than it had in YEARS. Silky, strong and shiny. I love this product! I highly recommend it.

product_name: HSuan Wen Hua Hair Treatment by LUSH: Beauty
title: Works great but smells a little odd
review_text:
I've been a fan of this product for a couple of years, since I have very long, wavy hair. It moisturizes really well and I use it every ten days or so. It smells like a weird salad dressing when you put it on, kind of vinegary and spicy, but when you wash it out the scent is toned down a bit. It still smells unusual (spicy and vaguely nutty), but not unpleasant.

I warm a good handful of this in the microwave, put it on my dry hair and tie it in a bun, wait 20 minutes, then shampoo it out using a liquid shampoo and condition with a light conditioner, like Coolaulin or a small amount of American Cream. If you have short hair you probably won't need this deep of a treatment, but for those of us with a lot of hair, or who have damaged or very thick hair, it is great. It makes my hair shiny and tangle-free again.

It doesn't have any of the silicones that commercial conditioners have, so if you are looking for that slick feeling you get from Pantene you won't find it here. But the ingredients in this don't build up in your hair the way silicones do, so for those of us who are making a conscious choice to avoid silicone buildup in our hair, this is a great deep conditioner

product_name: HSuan Wen Hua Hair Treatment by LUSH: Beauty
title: Extremely great conditioning treatment!  :)
review_text:
HSuan Wen Hua Hair Treatment is one of the best hair treatments I've come across... and I'm a huge hair junkie and have tried MANY things.  Ever since finding LUSH several months ago, I have not even touched another brand of hair care.

HSuan Wen Hua Hair Treatment is made with fresh ingredients like bananas, avocadoes and fresh olive oil.  

You use this BEFORE you wash your hair, so apply it to DRY hair.  I usually put my hair up in a pony tail and only do the ends because that's where the damage is.  Then I twist my hair up in a bun and rubberband a plastic bag over it.  I try to leave it on as long as I can (overnight if I'm lucky), shampoo my hair and condition like regular after.  Because this is a treatment and not so much a hair conditioner, you still need to use a seperate conditioner.

The results are amazing and my hair is so much softer and in such better condition after use.  Since I only do the ends, it's easy to feel the difference between the ends of my hair that was treated and the rest of my hair that was not.

HSuan Wen Hua Hair Treatment is a M-U-S-T for my hair regime.  Definately recommended

product_name: HSuan Wen Hua Hair Treatment by LUSH: Beauty
title: Simply Amazing
review_text:
This treatment works extremely well!  I looked on here and saw that there were no extrememly helpful reviews, so I decided to write one. I have long, golden, untreated hair. However it was as dry as straw so I decided to try this. Here how it is: the smell is amazing (it smells like pumpkin pie or gingerbread cookies) after use the hair looks soft and shiny, however it makes hair flat. This product is a deep moisturizer therefore the hair does not have any "pouf" to it. It is still worth the money though! Rehydration of the hair is supremely important and this rehydrates well. Just after shampooing do not use a conditioner (unless that just doesn't work well for you), which helps the flatness. 

A few helpful tips:
1. This goes on DRY hair
2. After putting lots of this treatment on, try putting a bag over your hair and keeping it shut with a clip. The heat that your head produces allows the hair cuticles to open and fully absorb the treatment. This works 2Xs better than Lush's intstructions (my mother is a hairstylist).
3. Leave the bag tight around your head for 20 to 40 minutes
4. Afterwards shampoo like normal, but I still recommend not using a conditioner for that day.

Hopefully this helps anyone with questions. This really is an amazing product and should be used about twice a month (more if you'd like but that's probably not necessary). Enjoy your beatiful shiny hair!

product_name: Talika Eyebrow Lipocils .34 oz.: Beauty
title: I would recommend this and 6 weeks of no plucking!
review_text: I love this product.  My eye brows are growing, but not all over in the areas where I'm putting the product.  The hair has become darker, but nothing extreme, just in a way where I'm able to see it now (I'm naturally a toehead).  I would recommend this to others, but I'm saddened that it's so hard to find, and I was unable to do so in a store

product_name: Wash DHT Daily Shampoo 32oz: Beauty
title: My favorite shampoo!
review_text: I love this shampoo.  My husband bought it but I definitely use it more than he does:)  Anyway, it smells amazing and really works well with my unruly hair

product_name: Polo Black by Ralph Lauren for Men 4.2 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Impressive
review_text: I am a fan of Ralph Lauren and check new products from this brand. I liked this scent, although I am probably more used to Polo Blue, which is also great. It is better to get an idea in a store because it is not quite possible to decide from reviews. Anyway, it is worth checking especially if you are looking for a new cologne for St. Valentine's day

product_name: Polo Black by Ralph Lauren for Men 4.2 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Good scent, lightens as you wear it.
review_text: At first spray, this can be a pretty potent cologne, but after 1-2 minutes this fades into a nice rosey spice scent that is much lighter than it's green original polo brother. lasts all day long and into the night. Worth checking out if you are a fan of cool water and lotto, or lighter scented cologne.

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lip Balm SPF 15: Beauty
title: Tastes good but doesn't last
review_text: If you like the citrusy scent of other Fresh products (as I do) then you will probably really like this lip balm. It has a lovely lemony taste, and a soft, smooth texture. It's not waxy or greasy, and my husband likes to kiss me when I have it on! The only reason that I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is because it doesn't last as long as I'd like. My lips tend to get pretty chapped in the winter, and I put balm on at night to condition my lips. This one is gone after about 30 minutes to an hour, so I need a much more concentrated lip balm (like Bliss balm) for night use. But if you're looking for a light, yummy balm, this might be it

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lip Balm SPF 15: Beauty
title: Saved my lips!
review_text:
This has to be by far one of the best lip treatments on the market.  Pricy...yes.  But well worth every cent.  In as few as two uses my lips have gone from cracked to whole.  Tastes as good as it smells.  Lemon...brownsugar..like the body scrub of the same name.  
My only complaint: it doesn't have the longevity of say Prada's lip balm (which I use when running)

product_name: Cleavage Cupcakes Gel Bra Inserts 1 set by Her Look Enterprises: Beauty
title: Cleavage Cupcakes
review_text: I love these inserts!  I had trouble finding ones this size.  Not too big, not too small.  They definitely help me to fill out my bras!  I would suggest putting them in bras with pockets for inserts.  I tried just setting these in my bra, but if I moved my arms up and my bra moved around, I was afraid that the cupcakes would fall out.  These are a great product though

product_name: Clinique Different Lipstick: Beauty
title: Just about the best
review_text: lipstick going. This review is for the Guava Stain shade. I first bought this lipstick, I believe in the mid to late eighties. I was delighted with it then and am now. It is sheer, light, non greasy and the color never changes. The color is NOT neutral, but I find that I can wear it with almost any color of clothing except primarily pink or red outfits. Over the years it has become just about the only lipstick shade I wear. I would buy different brands,different shades and wear them maybe once then back to Guava Stain. It along with Clinque's soft pressed blush in New Clover, orginally bought about the same time as the lipstick have become my favorites, and the one's I reach for time and again. They are my dependables. Daytime wear for sure, not night, this is a subtle sheer color

product_name: Trichomania Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Awesome shampoo!
review_text:
This is a great item from LUSH.  It works so well, lasts a very long time and is worth every penny.  First off the scent.  It is dead-on fresh coconut.  Not the fake sun tan oil/beach smell you'd expect.  It makes a TON of creamy, thick lather with only a few swipes through (soaking) wet hair.  It cleasnes really well and rinses clean.  For me, there was no residue left behind, only softness.  As I said, it does last for ages BUT you have to make sure you leave it in a well ventilated soap dish with a drain.  If it's left in water, say goodbye to it in a couple of days, as you will be left with a mushy mess half the size of when you left it.

Try it at least once, if it doesn't work for your hair... it's also great to shave with

product_name: Trichomania Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: I love the product...
review_text: but it definitally did not work as it was intended. It is intended to moisturize hair. I have long, fine, oily hair, and I received Trichomania as a gift. I love the smell, but when I first used it, it left my hair very dry which I consider a good thing considering the state of my hair. It just didnt do what it was supposed to. However, if you have really oily hair, this is the thing for you. No problems with lathering either, especally if you rub the bar in your hair, not in your hands. Doesnt leave white flakes either

product_name: Trichomania Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Hair Make-Over
review_text:
If you have dry hair, Trichomania is for you. 

It smells like real coconuts, not that synthetic crap in suntan lotions, and works wonders on my dry, colored, and generally abused hair. Plus, it lasts forever. All of Lush's solid haircare lasts much longer than bottled stuff and contains no silicones. They do take some getting used to but once you adjust, everything else will smell so chemical and you'll wonder why you ever used them.

product_name: Laura Geller Eye Spackle: Beauty
title: Best Eye Makeup base
review_text: I've tried several eye shaddow bases including Laura Mercier and find the Laura Geller Eye Spackle to last the longest.  I generally have my makeup on by 6:00AM and keep in on until 9:30 PM.  It looks as great at night as it did in the morning.  I definitely recommend this product

product_name: Paloma Picasso by Paloma Picasso for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Very sexy fragrance!
review_text: I first smelled this perfume on a colleague of mine, about a year ago. Every time she walked by me I got a whiff of this heavenly scent that she wore nearly every day. So, I finally stopped her and asked what she was wearing. I'd never heard of it, so I jumped online and looked it up, found a bottle and bought it. I couldn't wait to try it out, so when the perfume finally arrived I put it right on. Imagine my disappointment when I smelled a scent totally unlike the one I'd experienced. On me it was overpoweringly musky, nothing like the seductive fragrance I'd smelled on my colleague. But, an odd thing happened. I didn't wash it right off, and when I smelled it again about 30 minutes later it had become the alluringly sensual perfume I'd fallen in love with. In fact, the longer I wore it the better it smelled. Obviously it depends on your body chemistry to achieve it's bloom. Now, I wear it when I go out in the evenings, and people comment on how wonderfully sexy it smells. If you buy this perfume don't judge it too quickly, as I did....give it a little time and you're sure to love it. You only need to use a little, and it lasts for HOURS.

product_name: Paloma Picasso by Paloma Picasso for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Paloma Picasso Perfume
review_text: This is the best perfume that I have ever used.  I tried Estee Lauder, Lancome, and I always come back to Paloma.  The scent is wonderful and it stays on your clothes for a long time.  BUY IT TODAY

product_name: Murad Acne Spot Treatment: Beauty
title: Murad Acne Spot Treatment Review
review_text: Works exceptionally well.  Clears pimple faster than other types of treatments I have used and reduces the redness very quickly.  My 2 teenage daughters love the product as well.  Because such a small amount is needed a tube will last a long time.  Will definitely buy it again!

product_name: Murad Acne Spot Treatment: Beauty
title: This stuff works!
review_text: Murad Acne Spot Treatment really works to drive away those unsightly blemishes!  It heals even the big nasty pimples in a few days, with the smaller ones healing in hours.  It really does help to minimize the appearance of most acne after I apply it, too.  Overall I would say it is a great produce for anyone who, like me, considers even minor acne to be a major annoyance

product_name: Marc Jacobs Perfume Solid: Beauty
title: yummy
review_text: i love this portable perfume...it's really sleek and easy to carry around to reapply. the smell is delicious and it leaves a nice shimmery sheen on your skin

product_name: Ojon Hydrating Thickening Spray: Beauty
title: great results
review_text: i have very fine hair and this is one products that thickens without weighing the hair down.  it leaves hair soft not stiff yet easy to style and keep the hold

product_name: Hard Candy Super Shine Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: only lacks a flavor
review_text: I have this lip gloss in Sweetie and will be trying other shades.  I am very pleased with it!  I wear it over stay-on type lip colors in other brands, and it keeps my color on all day (even after eating)!  It doesn't really feel too sticky if you blot after application.  I only wish it tasted as good as it smells (not that it tastes bad, it's just blah)!

product_name: Hard Candy Super Shine Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Hard Candy Super Shine Gloss
review_text: I love this lip gloss, the cake batter taste/smell is totally addictive.  The colors are lacking though, all of the colors are light, very sheer shades. I bought the color Babydoll which is a light pink.  It goes on sheer and I love the smooth texture too. This product is supposed to have glitter in it but I didnt' notice any, and/or its not too glaring, which makes it fine for me to wear it at work.

product_name: Classic Detachable Head Long Handled Bath Brush: Beauty
title: perfection
review_text:
I am a true believer in the phrase if it is not broke dont fix it.
its hard to improve on perfection keep up the good work.
             until next time ! Mike Michalsk

product_name: Classic Detachable Head Long Handled Bath Brush: Beauty
title: Great bristles, detachment problems
review_text: These bristles have just the right combination of softness and strength.  However, since I only use this as a back scrub brush, the detachable design is not optimal for me.  After a few months, the brush-handle attachment point became compromised (probably from all the exposure to water), and I found that the brush would often detach from the handle as I scrubbed my back.  At this point, many more months down the road, the brush no longer stays mounted to the handle at all, so I am looking for a (non-detachable) replacement.  Even so, I recommend this product because of it's great bristles, and also because the handle was great while it lasted.

product_name: Classic Detachable Head Long Handled Bath Brush: Beauty
title: Good Item - price considered
review_text: The tounge-and grove way the handle detached make it easy to use in the shower (dont have my glasses on).  The detachable brush has medium soft bristles and will be easy on the skin.  The strap on the brush is cotton, so this probably isn't a once-in-a lifetime purchase, but very good for the price.  Everybody needs one

product_name: Mustela Facial Cleansing Cloths With PhysiObebe: Beauty
title: Work well, but stink!
review_text: The wipes work well; they do not irritate my daughter's face.  BUT they STINK!!!!!  I usually use them before she goes to bed so that I don't have to smell her skin as it makes me nauseous

product_name: Hot Tools Spring Ceramic Curling Iron 1in.: Beauty
title: great purple iron
review_text: great iron and its purple! heats up fast, stays hot, variable hotness levels..great i own this and the next size up and love them both

product_name: L'Occitane - Lavender Harvest - Matte Face Lotion: Beauty
title: relaxing, natural summer lotion and makeup primer for oily skin
review_text:
L'Occitane's Lavender Harvest Matte Face Lotion *really works* to mattify oil and makes a nice makeup primer. 

I don't have oily skin, but tried some samples over a night serum I was using with avocado oil to mattify it, so my face wouldn't be greasy on my pillow.  It left my skin feeling satiny and smooth.  Avocado is one of the heavier, thicker oils and did wonders for my dry skin, but I hated the feel of it, so finding this was a real bonus to fix that problem.  

Lavender oil also has relaxing aromatherapeutic properties, is a natural antiseptic which helps prevent blemishes, and mosquitoes don't like it, so if you have oily skin and live in a humid climate in the summer, you should try this! 

Note: I have had good luck shopping with L'Occitane through Amazon, but called first to make sure what I was ordering was in stock on their website.

product_name: Kai Body Glow: Beauty
title: I love this!
review_text: This is the only fragrance I have found that truly smells "tropical".  This is my boyfriends favorite scent, and he thinks all perfumes "stink".  The four stars is because it takes this spray awhile to go from greasy and oily to dry.  You have to wait awhile before you get dressed.  But it smells great

product_name: Mistral Soap in 25 Scents, 200 g: Beauty
title: A LUXURIOUS SOAP
review_text:
Mistral, as many know, is a powerful, gusty wind that blows across the south of France. Mistral, as I was happy to discover, is also the name of a line of bath and body products, all French inspired, all lusciously lovely from scented soaps to soothing lotions to rejuvenating body butters. 

Matthew Tilker, founder and president of Mistral, utilizes Shea butter, which is an efficacious natural healer, in a myriad of must-have forms. Derived from the nuts of the African Shea Tree (according to sacred custom the nuts are harvested primarily by women), this butter is highly emollient, a boon for those with dry skin, chapped lips, any number of skin irritations. 

The pure Shea Butter soap comes in a plethora of inviting fragrances, all milled six times (while others boast being triple milled). South Seas is a particular favorite - it's as fresh as an ocean breeze and as calming, soothing as a tropical island. The marine scent is accented with a touch of grapefruit, white flowers and soft woods. An irresistible combination. 

South Seas is a fragrance with which you wish to surround yourself - made possible by the shower gel, body lotion, massage bath and body oil, bath salts and candle all available at very accessible prices. 

     - Gail Cooke

product_name: Mistral Soap in 25 Scents, 200 g: Beauty
title: Very nice soap
review_text: This is very good soap, however it's too expensive to buy on a regular basis unless you are rich.  Very good quality though and I would buy it again if I had some money

product_name: NeoStrata Oily Skin Solution - AHA 8 3.4oz: Beauty
title: Great Keratosis Pilaris Treatment
review_text:
I have searched far & wide for a product that aids in the treatment/management of keratosis pilaris (little red bumps on the backs of my arms).  It is estimated that 40-50% of the population has a form of keratosis pilaris and there is no cure for the skin condition.

However, this Neostrata AHA 8 significantly reduced bumps and redness after only 2 weeks.  After 4 weeks, it had almost vanished.  The only drawback is that after 2-3 weeks of non-use the bumps tend to resurface.  But, if you keep the application up, the bumps stay away!  I use it religiously over the summer or if i have any upcoming special occasions where I want to look my best.

I found the product in SELF magazine, suggesting its use for keratosis pilaris management and have nothing but rave reviews!!  Finally, something that works

product_name: Kerastase Resistance Masque Volumactive for fine hair 200ml: Beauty
title: Adds Beautiful Body
review_text: Although this is supposed to be used as a deep conditioning treatment I used it several times a week and loved the way it made my hair look and feel.  Only drawback is the price, and the container, which you have to be very careful with in the shower!  But all in all, it's a wonderful product for fine hair and I've come back to it again and again!

product_name: Murad Acne Complex Kit ($80 Value): Beauty
title: Excellent!
review_text: I've been using this kit for several weeks now, and I am absolutely amazed at the results!  I've had severe acne scarring due to a birth control pill I was taking.  They were bright red, and no concealer on the market would cover them.  After one week of using Murad, I've noticed the scars fading!  I thought nothing on this planet would fade them, but Murad is!  I've also been blessed with good genes in having oily skin.  Murad drastically reduces the amount of shine I have.  I highly recommend this product to everyone

product_name: Murad Acne Complex Kit ($80 Value): Beauty
title: Totaly works!
review_text: This product made my skin look absolutely great! I use it twice a day and within one week I saw a huge difference. I've been now using Murad for a month and the improvement is astonishing. I get compliments on my skin every day. I highly recommend it

product_name: Murad Acne Complex Kit ($80 Value): Beauty
title: Murad is great stuff!
review_text: I've been using Murad for about 3 weeks now, and it has made a huge difference! I am in my early 20's and have had problems with mild breakouts since my teens. I've tried drugstore products, wich never seemed to make any difference, and Proactive which was so harsh it actually burned and made my skin much worse. Murad is gentle enough for me to use twice a day, and has left my skin breakout free! It has also improved the texture and feel of my skin, and makes my pores nearly invisible. I recomend Murad to anyone whose skin is breakout prone but too sensitive for the benzoyle peroxide formulas in other acne products. The only complaint I have about Murad is the price - it can be a little much for a poor college student - but the results are worth it if you can afford it!

product_name: Murad Acne Complex Kit ($80 Value): Beauty
title: sure this is 2 month's worth???
review_text: yes, i've had murad for about 2 weeks now and i've seen huge improvement! murad is a godsend! anyways... i was just wondering if the kit is really supposed to last me 2 months? i use it every morning and night. thats 120 times! umm... dont know if im gonna have any left... i know for sure the cleanser i will. (step 1) but steps 2 and 3 are very small quantity... and hopefully i wont need a lot of acne spot treatment usage cause they'll be all gone :) i definately recommend murad to everyone. like others, i've tried proactiv, but murad seems to work better with my skin. just try the one month starter kit first

product_name: Murad Acne Complex Kit ($80 Value): Beauty
title: Murad Acne Complex Kit is the  Best
review_text: I discovered the Murad Acne Complex Kit about six years ago and have been using it since... It cleared my acne up within weeks and has kept the acne away. Some products I tried dried my skin out but Murad Acne Complex leaves it feeling clean and hydrated without all the chemical smells. I recommend anyone with acne try Murad Acne Complex to see if it will work as well for you.

product_name: Carol's Daughter Tui Hair Oil: Beauty
title: must diagree with Nycole B
review_text: I love this product. It takes only a few drops to make my hair shine. It is light, smells quite nice and is not at all overpowering or strong smelling. I don't buy cheap fragrances, so I don't know what "bad perfumes" reviewer NycoleB is comparing this with. I suppose everyone's body chemistry is different. I haven't found any other product that does what this does so I'll be buying another bottle when this one is done

product_name: Carol's Daughter Tui Hair Oil: Beauty
title: The greatest product!
review_text: I was amazed by the quality of this product when I first purchased it in the summer of 2006.  It gives my hair a perfect sheen and softness that I have never achieved with such lightweight hair oil before and my hair has acheive lengths that I have not seen in years!  Tui Hair Oil has a beautiful scent which does not change over the course of wearing it in your hair for a day or two, or even longer if you wish.

product_name: Jonathan Product Redo Freshen-Up Mist For Hair & Skin(R): Beauty
title: works great for me!
review_text:
I think that this product does what it promises to do.  It is a "freshen-up" mist.  I use it everymorning (I shower before bed) before I blowdry my hair and it creates volume and makes my hair look awesome!  It is only short of the full 5 stars because it does not last all day, but it is definitely good for a few hours.  Even after it wears off, my hair is not flat.  It still has enough texture that I can just put my hands through it to get the "messy" look.

I don't think that it smells bad.  The smell actually reminds me of some spa products taht I use

product_name: Jonathan Product Redo Freshen-Up Mist For Hair & Skin(R): Beauty
title: Florida Gator Girl
review_text: What is wrong with everyone reviewing these products?  This is for your HAIR and SCALP, not the face.  Again, after experimenting a few times, if it doesn't work, just say so and state the facts, not hype and your feelings for Jonathan and his show on television

product_name: Jonathan Product Redo Freshen-Up Mist For Hair & Skin(R): Beauty
title: GREAT product!
review_text: This is a great idea for a product! For those of you who don't wash your hair every day, this is a great way to keep it looking and smelling fresh on days you don't wash it. I used this after 5 days without washing, and while it might have worked better within 3 or 4 days, it still freshened my hair and made it beautiful! Well done

product_name: Jonathan Product Beauty Water Shower Purification System(TM): Beauty
title: Immediate difference!
review_text: I moved to an area with city water (which I was not used to), not too long ago.  I noticed that my hair and skin seemed to turn dull and gray after some time.  No matter what hair and skin products I tried using, the result was the same.  After reading about this product in a health magazine, I decided to give it a shot since it received such high praise.  I am thrilled with my purchase!  I saw almost instant results.  My skin has never felt softer.  The filter system itself was very easy to install and required no tools.  For anyone with harsh, chlorine laden city water, I highly recommend this product

product_name: Jonathan Product Beauty Water Shower Purification System(TM): Beauty
title: So far, so good!
review_text: I purchased a Beauty Water Shower Purification System and have used it about 5 times now with fantastic results. I have very hard water in my home and am tired of constantly having to blow dry my hair or having to use tons of products for it to be manageable and not frizzy.  My hair felt very soft and manageable using this product and I am hoping it helps my highlights last longer.  I did not experience that 'slimy' feeling people usually associate with soft water.  I'm even able to let my hair air dry and not be frizzy with this product.  I am curious to see how long this filter lasts.  I called Jonathan Products and was told that they do have a replacement filter that costs $55 so you can save a bit of money when you need to replace the filter

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Add Moisture Moisturizing Conditoner(TM): Beauty
title: Was skeptical, big fan now!!
review_text: I watched Blow Out and figured the product was flying off the shelves because of the show's popularity.  I ordered some because the ingredients sounded nice, plus he did seem sincere when formulating, etc.  I have blonde hair, color treated, thick, long lengths.  I've bought high-end hair products for 20 yrs from beauty salons and stores and have never used anything that made my hair feel like Jonathan Product.  You can immediately tell it's stripping and cleansing your hair.  Then, the conditioner,  with it's exotic fragrance,  is the most wonderful conditioning treatment I've ever used.  My hair looks cleaner and has more body than ever before with just shampoo & conditioner.  I'll use it as long as it's available to me

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Add Moisture Moisturizing Conditoner(TM): Beauty
title: great hair
review_text: My hair has gone from unruly frizzy to smooth and silky.  I always use good products from the salon, but this is the best I have used

product_name: American Crew Fiber 3.53 oz: Beauty
title: Perfect
review_text:
Some highlights are the all day long hold, ease of use, resistance to moisture (rain won't ruin your hair), low shine, strong yet natural hold, and good smell (which is rare).

I've used numerous hair products before but now, this is the only one I ever consider using

product_name: American Crew Fiber: Beauty
title: Excellent hold and no gloss
review_text: I am a big fan of this product.  My hair is very strong.  It needs a product which can keep it tamed.  However, most products that have that level of strength also come with high sheen or gloss which, in my opinion, is a bad look for today's fashions.  The matte look is more flexible.  American Crew Fiber gives me pliability and a matte look with a very strong hold.  It also smells nice.... not to strong and not too girly

product_name: American Crew Fiber: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text:
I have been using this product for over 5 years as an alternative to gel or bed head.  The results are great. No unwated shine, no gooiness, very easy to wash off. 
Your hair wont feel stiff and wont get damaged. Reasonably priced and more available every day.

product_name: American Crew Fiber: Beauty
title: Smells good, goes far.
review_text: This is a great product for getting the bed head look.  I can use approximately a dime size worth in my palms and go wild!  Trust me, the results are great.  If you apply too much, you're hair will get oily. The good thing is that this product washes out easily with any Shampoo

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Curl Curling Serum(TM): Beauty
title: Great Products
review_text: I love using Jonathan Product. It makes your hair feel soft, look beautiful and the products smell great.

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Add Moisture Moisturizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: Very impressive :-)
review_text:
Well I am very impressed with this.  I also have tried so many different shampoos and this is one of the best, if not the best, I've used.  I say that because whether I straighten my hair or leave it curly, this shampoo makes it feel and look and smell great.  It feels so nice and clean.  I don't rinse twice with this because it's unnessesary.  
I tried this because of watching Blow Out and on my last trip to America I bought a couple of bottles.  It's one of the best purchases I made.  Most girls buy shampoos etc based on packaging and smell and let me tell you, not only does it look and smell great, but what it does for your hair is amazing and apparently it's very low in damaging chemicals.  I won't hesitate to buy more of Jonathan's products next time I go.  I love this and can't say enough about it

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Serious Volume Volumizing Conditioner(TM): Beauty
title: Great product
review_text: I got a sample of this conditioner when I bought a similar product by another company.  I didn't care for the one I purchased, but the sample was awesome and I am going to buy the Jonathan conditioner.  I have always had fine limp hair and tried lots of volume products.  I used this for a week and this is the only thing I have ever seen any kind of difference with.  I love it!

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Serious Volume Volumizing Conditioner(TM): Beauty
title: Works Great!
review_text: After reading the other reviews I was a little worried about using the product I had already ordered.  After using it for a few days now my hair has never looked better, I truly feel like this shampoo/conditioner was meant for me.  I have fine, super straight hair, middle to short.  It feels clean and sleek. The conditioner smells like pina coloda, yum!  I would definatly recommend this for my hair type.  Would maybe recommend to lather the shampoo in your hands first then work thoroughly( it doesn't lather as well as some shampoos that have lots of glycerine in them) and only apply the conditioner towards the end of your hair and leave in for a few min.  Hope that helps

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: Very good :-)
review_text: This is the second product of Jonathan's I've used and I'm equally happy with it.  I have thin hair when it's straight, and something in the middle when it's curly.  Either way, I'd like it thicker, and this foam certainly helps.  It's great and I've found it does what it promises.  It smells good and you don't need to use too much.  It feels nice in my hair and the fragrance lasts most of the day.  It doesn't matter if your hair is curly or straight, hopefully you will find this as effective and as helpful as I have

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: Jonathan Volume Thickening Foam
review_text: I heard about Jonathan products from watching QVC. I was a bit skeptical at first about buying his products because the price was a bit high.  I usually use Paul Mitchell or Matrix products.  Well rest assured, this was the absolute best product I have ever used to create lots of volume in my hair. My hair is fine and straight with a little bit of natural wave in the back. Other products I used would create a little volume but this stuff really made a huge, visible difference.  My boyfriend also commented how thick my hair looked.  This goes on nice and light and the scent is terrific, not a heavy smell, a light fresh smell.  I highly recommend this product and will definitely buy it again.

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: Good stuff!
review_text: Not too heavy for fine hair. Leave hair soft and managable with plenty of volume

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: It smells GREAT !
review_text: It has a clean soap smell! I also recommend the volume shampoo & conditioner it made my hair feel very soft

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: new hair style, new styling product
review_text: I just had my fine, processed hair cut into a short layered wedge.  It was shoulder length before and I used a Revlon thermal-air styler to make it acceptable.  After using Dirt, I no longer have to spend ANY time styling it!!  I just blow dry, scrunching my hair with my fingers and when almost dry, I turn my head upside-down and apply about a dime size amount of Dirt into the roots. Flip up and I'm ready to go all in less than 3 minutes.  I find it important to rub Dirt between my palms to warm it up before applying.  Use a little first...you can always add more. It gave my hair great body and control. Hope this product works for you too

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: Best Hair Product I've Ever Used
review_text: I'll admit, with a well receded hair line I still tried to get what's left to be manageable and look good - everything else I've used left my hair dry, flaked off or didn't hold.  Jonathan Dirt has solved this long-term issue for me in just the first few days of use.  Dirt provides the manageability, hold and look I've strived for and even smells great with its almond scent.  I recommend this without reservation

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: You must be doing something wrong!
review_text:
I love this product!  My mother is a hair dresser so I have tried every product there is, and this one is my favorite.  If you use it properly then it's amazing.  It's a texturizing paste, not super glue, you can't expect amazing hold out of it.  And because it is a PASTE, it's extremely thick so you only need a tiny amount.  I have short, thin, wavy hair that I flat iron, and I just rub my fingers along the top of the paste to just get a thin layer on the tips of my fingers and apply it to my roots, it works amazing for volume, and I've never had a problem with it weighing my hair down or looking greasy!

Don't expect miracles from this product.  It does exactly what it claims to do!  Plus, it smells amazing!  Oh, and also...I am NOT in love with Jonathan nor his TV show, I bought this product before I had even heard of him or his TV show...I honestly find him a little annoying, but this product definitely isn't

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: Mah-velous Product!  :)
reviewer_location: pomade-for shine, manipulator-for flip, and aquage paste-for volume
review_text: Dirt has proven to be an amazing product...I'm "wowed" with how great it works!  I have a layered, razor cut that flips out and, before, was using three other products (pomade-for shine, manipulator-for flip, and aquage paste-for volume).  I just received Dirt last week, and after putting on just a bit, got the look that I was wanting, without all the hassle of three different products.  Yes, it's a bit pricey but well worth it (considering you only have to use a little, you're sure to save $$$).  and the smell, ::sigh:: is so great!
