(Even if it hadn't worked as great as it does, I think I would still purchase it just for the delicious scent)  :)  I love that I can run my fingers through my hair and it's soft and manageable, even at the end of the day, and without the sticky "gunk" feel.  I definitely plan on purchasing other Jonathan Products

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: People!  People!  People!...Make sure you are using it right!!!
review_text: Awesome product.  As an old product used to use the slogan "a little dab'l do ya", it is true with this product.  Don't over do it or you'll have a greasy mess.  Start with a little and add more if you need to.  Always melt by rubbing hands together first.  Smells great too!  My only beef is the price.  Most of us aren't used to paying those Rodeo Drive prices, Jonathan.  $26 may not be a lot to you, but....  :)

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: Miracle-worker
review_text: I have huge curly Jew-fro hair, and this is the only product I have found that can really tame it

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: Efficient Vanity?
review_text:
As a working mom in her mid-forties, I am ever hopeful when it comes to product claims of time savings and beauty enhancement.  And so, when I read about the T3 Tourmaline Ionic Hair Dryer, I just had to have one.  With a price tag of $200, I figured the claims just had to be true.

The T3 is a sleek, beautiful and lighweight hairdrying and styling tool.  With its ionic particle things, it sounds so scientific, too.  But does it do what it says it will do?

For me, it's hard to tell.  It does dry at least as fast as my old 1800 watt hair dryer but with seemingly less heat.  So arguably, it is faster.  Less heat also means less hair damage.  So arguably, that is a beauty enhancement.  Is my hair sleeker and shinier?  Again, hard to tell.  No one at the office the next day seemed to notice any change.

One thing that I do notice, however, is that I like the idea of using an ionic hair dryer.  For whatever reason, I do think it is good for my hair.  And I suppose that in and of itself is enough to make this purchase entirely worthwhile

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: Unbelievably Fast - Worth every penny
review_text: I did not believe the hype but read the other reveiws.  I have long hair and it would normally take me 30 minutes to dry my hair with my $15 drug store purchased hair dryers...I was pretty much used to that.  Often times I would let my hair dry naturally rather than blow dry it because of the hassle and time - not because it looked better, it looked terrible.  This dryer dries my hair in 15 minutes (fully blown under and styled), on top of that my hair is shiny when it's done and not dry.  I just bought one for my mom and would recommend this blow dryer for anyone that normally spends more than 20 minutes drying their hair, you will absolutely cut the dry time 50%.  Great purchase!

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: big improvement over regular dryers
review_text: I have long, thick, wavy hair that loves to frizz up.  I have tried every anti-frizz, hairstyling product out there, and they either didn't work or weighed my hair down.  I didn't want to like this hair dryer and was hoping it wouldn't live up to the hype... BUT, it's excellent on my hair.  After using the dryer (with no styling product) my hair was straight, shiny and felt great.  For me, it didn't change the amount of time I dried my hair, so if your considering buying it for speed, don't, unless you have thin or short hair.  Is it worth the $200.00 price tag?  Depends on you personally, but I recommend you shop around because there are better deals out there

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: Lovely Tresses
review_text:
I had stopped using a regular hair dryer a few of months ago as I felt that my hair was becoming brittle and looking damaged.  However air drying my hair seemed to take forever. It was then that I heard about the T3 tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer from my hairdresser.  Initially the $200 price tag did put me off and I pushed the idea aside. But somehow it remained somewhere in the corner of my mind and one fine day after getting late for a meeting yet again, I decided to bite the bullet and buy the hairdryer. 

And I tell you, I have never been happier using a hair dryer. My hair started looking better and less damaged in the first few weeks itself. It has become smooth and silky and has a healthy glow.  Though the weight and the time taken were almost similar to my old model, the after effect is worth the price paid. The product does come with a 4-year warranty which is an added advantage to justify the exorbitant price. Though the sales brochures uses a lot of scientific terms like ionic mineral and blah... blah... I am not going to bother about it much as far as my hair appears healthy and saves me time so that I don't have to deal with being late for meetings. I   recommend this product to all who would love to have a mane to be proud of

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: couldn't believe my eyes
review_text:
i hate blow dryers.  I never used on because they took too long, and my arm would get tired.
This dryer is incredible.  my hair was done in 15 minutes. I only have to go over each section once. I was truly amazed. It is worth every penny

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional X-Large Barrel Brush: Beauty
title: A necessity for girls who blow (hair out)!
review_text: I absolutely love this hairbrush! I have curly hair and like to blow it out often and until now I have not been impressed with any brushes. This brush holds the hair in pace when blowing dry and also lets you move it with your hair and dose not hurt as some can or get stuck. You will not be sorry if you are looking for the perfect brush to go with your perfect dryer (the featherweight)! Oh another thing I like is it extremely easy to keep clean.

product_name: Too Faced Fat Kiss: Beauty
title: Do you love lip gloss?
review_text: Bazooka bubble gum with a touch of cinnamon. The sent/flavor is not too much. The gloss is not very hot, less than "venom" closer to "the balm" in hotness. I did't see any lip changes but I never do with any lip plumper glosses. The container is beautiful. Love the rollerball tip. This stuff brings me back to my 80's bonniebell days

product_name: Too Faced Fat Kiss: Beauty
title: The Uber Gloss
review_text: As a lip gloss addict, I have easily over 200+ glosses. Too Faced Fat Kiss is by far one of my favorites. The superb shine makes my lips look so good! Although it doesn't really plump, it still tastes like cinnamon, and it will warm you up in winter. I have two different colors, because I like it so much! I strongly reccomend getting a couple, so you can keep them in your purse, make up bag, car...Everywhere! This rocks sooo much

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Straighten Or Curl Iron: Beauty
title: great, hot, fast, but gaps
review_text: The T3 Tourmaline Ceramic Iron is a wonderful product. Gets hot fast. Straightens and flattens my big curly hair with ease. Narrow so can get sideburns without fear. Terribly easy to use even for a novice like me.  Only problem, some gaps at top of straigtening area that catch stray hairs and usually pull them out. Luckily I have plenty of hair.

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Serious Volume Volumizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: Love this product!
review_text: I have been using the volumizing shampoo and conditioner for 2 weeks.  I love this product!  No build up, No dandruf.  Make sure your hair is wet, not just damp, and you should not have a "lathering problem".  I purchased this from QVC and I will definately be a repeat customer.  I have short hair, so this will last me a while.  I loved it so much I bought some for my daughter.  This is my new shampoo

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Serious Volume Volumizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: cautiously optimistic, pleasantly surprised
review_text:
After reading the reviews of Jonathan's products, I wasn't completely sure I would like them, but wanted to try the shampoo, conditioner and Dirt after seeing him demonstrate Dirt on TV.  I have very fine, bodyless hair that is short and  high- and low-lighted.  I usually use Aquage products because they don't weight my hair down and especially  like the thickening spraygel for body.

Jonathan products smell great.  Additionally, I had no problem with the size of the bottles.  The quantity is probably the same as any other good product.  First the volumizing shampoo:  it lathered just fine and I used only a small amount.  I could feel the volumizing effect right after rinsing, after which I used the volumizing conditioner.  Again, no problem.  I decided to forego the thickening spraygel that I usually use in order to give Dirt an honest try.

I think I need a little more practice with this product since I am not a hairdresser.  I used the smallest amount and my hair was slightly damp.  I also need a haircut at the moment.  Next time I will put it on completely dry hair and apply it from the bottom going up and underneath.  It worked okay, but I need to get used to it.

Bottom line:  try it...you'll like it.  Sandra in Tuls

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Serious Volume Volumizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: The Best!!
review_text: My hair will do anything I want with this shampoo and the volumizing conditioner, whether I'm in a dry climate or a humid one.  And the water in the city I'm in doesn't make a difference either.  I can't believe how great it is!!  It really is the best I've ever used

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Even my boyfriend commented!
review_text: He said, "Your skin looks really nice." And he never notices anything! I told him it was makeup since he actually bought it for me at my request and I wanted him to know it was money well spent. I like to use it in conjunction with Benefit's Dandelion powder for a fresh, natural glow. I really do feel younger and prettier with it on, and I can't say that about many/any other comsetics I've tried. Totally worth it

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Exactly what other reviewers described
review_text: I was skeptical at first when i saw the manicure-like bottle. However, when i tried it on, it wasn't sticky and left my skin glowing naturally

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Magic Little Must-Have
review_text: BeneFit's "supermodel in a bottle" lives up to the hype. You only have to use a tiny bit of this in key places to attract light and create an ethereal glow... this is the perfect little potion to use when you really want to make an impact. It is a pearlized light pink that blends easy, stays put and adds a little drama. One of my all-time beauty favorites

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: It's good!
review_text: High Beam is really pretty!  I love using it as a highlighter on my "big night outs".  I swipe it on my nose to make my nose seem slimmer, right above my blush on my cheeks, and above my eyebrows near the arches.  It really gives my skin a dewy and glowing look. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it's very goopy and sticky.  It actually scared me a bit to put it on my face because the product is so thick that if you turn the jar upside-down, it won't run!  But overall, I still think this is a terrific product

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text:
I love the Benefit line, everything I have tried works great (not to mention they have great packaging and catchy names for all their products!). 

That said, High Beam is simply amazing. It only takes a little dab to add a nice glow/shimmer to my face. I especially like to use it on the cheek bones as it leaves a nice soft glow. High Beam works so much better for me than other products I've tried that either left my skin sticky or chalky. Not to mention those other products cost a lot more!

If you are looking for a little glow, a little shimmer, High Beam is the answer

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: A Youthful Glimmer
review_text: I have used a similar product in a compact by Chanel and paid $50. It wasn't too long before I saw the end of it either. Now with Benenfit's High Beam I can get the effect for less than half the price so I'm a happy customer. I put this on my cheek bone and brush blush over it for glimmery, dewy cheeks. It's a very youthful look. It's not unnatural but it's better than natural. It's supernatural. Since I started wearing it people don't know exactly what I've added but they comment that my skin looks particuliarly good. You can control the highlighting effect by how much you use but I like to use a generous amount. My skin really does beam.

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Amazing Product
review_text: I recently discovered Benefit products. This is a great product if you want to add a little glow to your skin. I use it to highlight my cheek bones. You can use it any where you want a glance to linger. The best thing about this product is the smallest amount makes a big difference in your skin. I suggest you try this product. It works wonders.

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Wet or Dry Iron: Beauty
title: dry your hair FIRST!
review_text: I am a professional hairstylist and use this iron...I think it works the best, leaves the hair shiny and soft, however I have no idea why the company would recommend using it on wet hair, unless you want to spend all day doing your hair!  Dry your hair prior to using and get unbelievable results that last

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Wet or Dry Iron: Beauty
title: IT WORKS!!   IT WORKS!!   IT WORKS!!
review_text: This is by far the greatest thing I have ever seen.  I have struggled with curly/frizzy hair for 40 years.  I have tried all the serums, smoothers, and spent 30-40 minutes blowing out (15 with the iron once you get the feel for it), only to have it only last a day.  I use this with NO PRODUCT.  My hair is slick, smooth, silky (Jennifer Aniston-ish).  I put a bit of leave in conditioner just on the ends when I'm done.  Sleep on it, wake up ready to go...last several days.  P.S.  It's also muggy and humid here and it still looks great

product_name: American Crew Pomade: Beauty
title: Simply the best
review_text: Having wild and uncontrollable hair as a woman is a well-documented problem, but what about if you're a guy?  After years of using cheap gels that left flakey residues in my hair, and/or smelling feminine, I was introduced to American Crew in the little brown jar by a stylist.  I now swear by this stuff.  Even on my knappy head (I have very thick wavy, but not curly, hair) American Crew keeps my hair in place and natural-appearing without lookling like I'm using Brill's Cream.  A thick dime-sized dab is enough for keeping my short haired coiffure in place and de-poofed all day. The trick is to work it in while my hair is moist from the shower but not dripping wet. Yes, it costs way more than gels but it's worth every penny.  One 4 oz jar lasts me about 6 weeks. The other benefit to American Crew is the smell - my wife absolutely loves the way my hair smells

product_name: Jonathan Product Beauty Water Shower Purification System(TM): Beauty
title: Just buy the Aquasana cause that's what it is
review_text: If Jonathan wants to sell environmentally concious products he should promote it in his other hairstyling products. The aquasana shower filter  is an excellent product which i use .Whats it matter who's name is on it. It is what it is and it will leave your skin and hair feeling fresher.

product_name: Jonathan Product Beauty Water Shower Purification System(TM): Beauty
title: Immediate difference!
review_text: I moved to an area with city water (which I was not used to), not too long ago.  I noticed that my hair and skin seemed to turn dull and gray after some time.  No matter what hair and skin products I tried using, the result was the same.  After reading about this product in a health magazine, I decided to give it a shot since it received such high praise.  I am thrilled with my purchase!  I saw almost instant results.  My skin has never felt softer.  The filter system itself was very easy to install and required no tools.  For anyone with harsh, chlorine laden city water, I highly recommend this product

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Add Moisture Moisturizing Conditoner(TM): Beauty
title: Smells really good
review_text:
Well first off, I'm a guy with very short hair...so I don't know whether or not it really works. But I'm bored and decided to rate it anyway. So here goes:

Cons

Conditioner is really thick and difficult to get out of the bottle. The best solution for this is to let the bottle sit upside down. 

Pros

Smells DAMN good. I'm not a big fan of fruity/coconut aromas, but I like this particular smell so much that I might need to go to rehab sometime in the future. 


Bottom Line: Although this conditioner is difficult to get out of the bottle, it smells really good. Whether or not it will work for your hair, the only way to know is to try it. And even if ot doesn't work for your hair...it's worth the 20 bucks just to open it up and smell it every now and then. =)

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Add Moisture Moisturizing Conditoner(TM): Beauty
title: great hair
review_text: My hair has gone from unruly frizzy to smooth and silky.  I always use good products from the salon, but this is the best I have used

product_name: Too Faced Fat Kiss: Beauty
title: Do you love lip gloss?
review_text: Bazooka bubble gum with a touch of cinnamon. The sent/flavor is not too much. The gloss is not very hot, less than "venom" closer to "the balm" in hotness. I did't see any lip changes but I never do with any lip plumper glosses. The container is beautiful. Love the rollerball tip. This stuff brings me back to my 80's bonniebell days

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Add Moisture Moisturizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: The best shampoo EVER!
review_text: This is absolutely the greatest shampoo ever! I've been abusing my hair for at least 30 years, and I have never had my hair looking and feeling as healthy as it does now. There is no better product for your hair on the market. All others are full of damaging detergents and chemicals with a dose of silicone thrown in to make you think your hair is clean, but you're killing it. I admire Jonathan for not treating us like idiots by being THE ONLY shampoo that doesn't tell you to lather, shampoo, and rinse twice, but you do need to. And you need to use no more than a dime-size amount of the Jonathan conditioner. My hair has never looked or felt so good

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: Jonathan Volume Thickening Foam
review_text: I heard about Jonathan products from watching QVC. I was a bit skeptical at first about buying his products because the price was a bit high.  I usually use Paul Mitchell or Matrix products.  Well rest assured, this was the absolute best product I have ever used to create lots of volume in my hair. My hair is fine and straight with a little bit of natural wave in the back. Other products I used would create a little volume but this stuff really made a huge, visible difference.  My boyfriend also commented how thick my hair looked.  This goes on nice and light and the scent is terrific, not a heavy smell, a light fresh smell.  I highly recommend this product and will definitely buy it again.

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: Good stuff!
review_text: Not too heavy for fine hair. Leave hair soft and managable with plenty of volume

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: Love Jonathan Create Volume Thickening Foam
review_text: It's the best product I've used to create volume and hold.  I didn't notice it after blow drying, but, while using the curling iron and styling - my hair had a lot more volume and great hold.  I have straight, fine, limp hair and it is very difficult to get it to hold a style.  I truely noticed a big difference.  I plan to purchase the other volumizing products, once they are in stock.

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: I love it!
review_text: I have tried just about every hair product on the market and this very much surpassed my expectations! I wasn't sure when I put it in my hair, but as I was styling it, I was amazed. It created a lot of volume and my hair stayed shiny. I am ready to try the rest of the product line

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Straighten Or Curl Iron: Beauty
title: great, hot, fast, but gaps
review_text: The T3 Tourmaline Ceramic Iron is a wonderful product. Gets hot fast. Straightens and flattens my big curly hair with ease. Narrow so can get sideburns without fear. Terribly easy to use even for a novice like me.  Only problem, some gaps at top of straigtening area that catch stray hairs and usually pull them out. Luckily I have plenty of hair.

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Straighten Or Curl Iron: Beauty
title: Amazing!!!
review_text: T3 is worth every penny. It is very easy to handle . My hair is soft and shiny. No more frizz. It cut straightening time to half. No hair pulling and it is lightweight. PLUS 2 YEARS of WARRANTY hellooo!!!  Bye bye Chi

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Serious Volume Volumizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: cautiously optimistic, pleasantly surprised
review_text:
After reading the reviews of Jonathan's products, I wasn't completely sure I would like them, but wanted to try the shampoo, conditioner and Dirt after seeing him demonstrate Dirt on TV.  I have very fine, bodyless hair that is short and  high- and low-lighted.  I usually use Aquage products because they don't weight my hair down and especially  like the thickening spraygel for body.

Jonathan products smell great.  Additionally, I had no problem with the size of the bottles.  The quantity is probably the same as any other good product.  First the volumizing shampoo:  it lathered just fine and I used only a small amount.  I could feel the volumizing effect right after rinsing, after which I used the volumizing conditioner.  Again, no problem.  I decided to forego the thickening spraygel that I usually use in order to give Dirt an honest try.

I think I need a little more practice with this product since I am not a hairdresser.  I used the smallest amount and my hair was slightly damp.  I also need a haircut at the moment.  Next time I will put it on completely dry hair and apply it from the bottom going up and underneath.  It worked okay, but I need to get used to it.

Bottom line:  try it...you'll like it.  Sandra in Tuls

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Serious Volume Volumizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: I have no idea what half you people are talking about
review_text:
After watching Blow Out and seeing how passionate Jonathan was about his product, he sold me. Anyone who is that determined to make the best product on the market, obviously will do whatever it takes to make it happen.
After seeing how much the product was, I cringed at the fact that a bottle of shampoo would be that much. I later, literally dragged myself to Sephora to purchase this shampoo/conditioner after knowing that I was willing to take a risk that could eventually end up in my closet.
I bought it, went straight to my bathroom, and washed my hair. The shampoo did not lather, which I expected considering there is no harsh detergents or sodium lauryl sulfate. The conditioner was a very light, thin substance. Definitely not thick. 
Finale-Dried my hair, and right there, I knew that this product is definitely the BEST hair product BY FAR, that I have ever used. My hair, is very damaged, brittle and FULL of split ends. This product made my hair, very very full, FULL of shine, and very soft. My hair was beautiful for days....
Last test.. going to work. As soon as I put my hair down from a pony tail (I'm a waitress), INSTANTLY everyone noticed my hair. They asked "what did you do?? your hair is soo beautiful".. I told them "40 dollar shampoo and conditioner" WELL WORTH THE COST. Definitely a salon in a bottle. Now my worst fear is that it will be discontinued for any reason. And if so, I am willing spend 1k to stock up and save as much as I can. There is no other product like it

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Serious Volume Volumizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: The Best!!
review_text: My hair will do anything I want with this shampoo and the volumizing conditioner, whether I'm in a dry climate or a humid one.  And the water in the city I'm in doesn't make a difference either.  I can't believe how great it is!!  It really is the best I've ever used

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Serious Volume Volumizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: Works Great
review_text: After reading the other reviews I was a little worried about using the product I had already ordered.  After using it for a few days now my hair has never looked better, I truly feel like this shampoo/conditioner was meant for me.  I have fine, super straight hair, middle to short.  It feels clean and sleek. The conditioner smells like pina coloda, yum!  I would definatly recommend this for my hair type.  Would maybe recommend to lather the shampoo in your hands first then work thoroughly( it doesn't lather as well as some shampoos that have lots of glycerine in them) and only apply the conditioner towards the end of your hair and leave in for a few min.  Hope that helps

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Leave-In Gloss Creme: Beauty
title: Finally, I Just washed my hair and I CAN do something with it!
review_text: I thought I was just going to have to put up with fly-away hair the rest of my life.  This product is not for baby fine hair that goes limp when anything touches it.  It's serious taming for seriously stubborn, coarse, or frizzy hair.  Mine falls into the first two categories.  Don't use too much!  I use it after I've dried some of the moisture out with light blow drying then gently sweep it through my hair - even combing it gently in to reach every strand.  For the first time in years my razor-cut layered hair is smooth

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Leave-In Gloss Creme: Beauty
title: USE... SPARINGLY
review_text: LIKE ANY OTHER LEAVE-in creme, conditioner, ANYTHING, if you PUT TOO MUCH OF IT ON, it WILL attract  DIRT.  I know this because I have baby fine hair and had to model in the DRY DRY deserts in the middle of summer.  Needed ANYTHING leave-in to keep my staticy hair down.  Yes, the more you use, to more dirty you get....  (but in photos you can't really see this, but it felt nasty!)    SO.  Wash your hair.   Well.  Condition.  Towel dry.  APPLY SPARINGLY.  Like a TOUCH.  And smooth into hair. It's not rocket science.  If you need a little more later, add a little more

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Even my boyfriend commented!
review_text: He said, "Your skin looks really nice." And he never notices anything! I told him it was makeup since he actually bought it for me at my request and I wanted him to know it was money well spent. I like to use it in conjunction with Benefit's Dandelion powder for a fresh, natural glow. I really do feel younger and prettier with it on, and I can't say that about many/any other comsetics I've tried. Totally worth it

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Exactly what other reviewers described
review_text: I was skeptical at first when i saw the manicure-like bottle. However, when i tried it on, it wasn't sticky and left my skin glowing naturally

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Excellent highlighter for porcelain skin
reviewer_location: it'll look like you have pink nail polish on your face
review_text: High Beam is a nice subtle highlighter. However, be sure to blend it very quickly and well or it will look unnatural in certain lighting (it'll look like you have pink nail polish on your face). It also has a tendency to emphasize pores. So only use it on areas of your face where you don't have any, like on the top of the cheek bone and under your eyebrows.

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Magic Little Must-Have
review_text: BeneFit's "supermodel in a bottle" lives up to the hype. You only have to use a tiny bit of this in key places to attract light and create an ethereal glow... this is the perfect little potion to use when you really want to make an impact. It is a pearlized light pink that blends easy, stays put and adds a little drama. One of my all-time beauty favorites

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: It's good!
review_text: High Beam is really pretty!  I love using it as a highlighter on my "big night outs".  I swipe it on my nose to make my nose seem slimmer, right above my blush on my cheeks, and above my eyebrows near the arches.  It really gives my skin a dewy and glowing look. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it's very goopy and sticky.  It actually scared me a bit to put it on my face because the product is so thick that if you turn the jar upside-down, it won't run!  But overall, I still think this is a terrific product

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: A Youthful Glimmer
review_text: I have used a similar product in a compact by Chanel and paid $50. It wasn't too long before I saw the end of it either. Now with Benenfit's High Beam I can get the effect for less than half the price so I'm a happy customer. I put this on my cheek bone and brush blush over it for glimmery, dewy cheeks. It's a very youthful look. It's not unnatural but it's better than natural. It's supernatural. Since I started wearing it people don't know exactly what I've added but they comment that my skin looks particuliarly good. You can control the highlighting effect by how much you use but I like to use a generous amount. My skin really does beam.

product_name: American Crew Fiber 3.53 oz: Beauty
title: Perfect
review_text:
Some highlights are the all day long hold, ease of use, resistance to moisture (rain won't ruin your hair), low shine, strong yet natural hold, and good smell (which is rare).

I've used numerous hair products before but now, this is the only one I ever consider using

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Wet or Dry Iron: Beauty
title: dry your hair FIRST!
review_text: I am a professional hairstylist and use this iron...I think it works the best, leaves the hair shiny and soft, however I have no idea why the company would recommend using it on wet hair, unless you want to spend all day doing your hair!  Dry your hair prior to using and get unbelievable results that last

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Wet or Dry Iron: Beauty
title: IT WORKS!!   IT WORKS!!   IT WORKS!!
review_text: This is by far the greatest thing I have ever seen.  I have struggled with curly/frizzy hair for 40 years.  I have tried all the serums, smoothers, and spent 30-40 minutes blowing out (15 with the iron once you get the feel for it), only to have it only last a day.  I use this with NO PRODUCT.  My hair is slick, smooth, silky (Jennifer Aniston-ish).  I put a bit of leave in conditioner just on the ends when I'm done.  Sleep on it, wake up ready to go...last several days.  P.S.  It's also muggy and humid here and it still looks great

product_name: Jonathan Product Finish Hold Firm Hold Spray(R): Beauty
title: The perfect  hair spray
review_text: Finish firm hold spray is absolutely perfect for my needs.  It has a firm hold yet isn't heavy or "hard". I don't have a complicated hair style but my hair tends to go flat after just a few hours.  This product prevents that

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: Best Hair Product I've Ever Used
review_text: I'll admit, with a well receded hair line I still tried to get what's left to be manageable and look good - everything else I've used left my hair dry, flaked off or didn't hold.  Jonathan Dirt has solved this long-term issue for me in just the first few days of use.  Dirt provides the manageability, hold and look I've strived for and even smells great with its almond scent.  I recommend this without reservation

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: You must be doing something wrong!
review_text:
I love this product!  My mother is a hair dresser so I have tried every product there is, and this one is my favorite.  If you use it properly then it's amazing.  It's a texturizing paste, not super glue, you can't expect amazing hold out of it.  And because it is a PASTE, it's extremely thick so you only need a tiny amount.  I have short, thin, wavy hair that I flat iron, and I just rub my fingers along the top of the paste to just get a thin layer on the tips of my fingers and apply it to my roots, it works amazing for volume, and I've never had a problem with it weighing my hair down or looking greasy!

Don't expect miracles from this product.  It does exactly what it claims to do!  Plus, it smells amazing!  Oh, and also...I am NOT in love with Jonathan nor his TV show, I bought this product before I had even heard of him or his TV show...I honestly find him a little annoying, but this product definitely isn't

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: Mah-velous Product!  :)
reviewer_location: pomade-for shine, manipulator-for flip, and aquage paste-for volume
review_text: Dirt has proven to be an amazing product...I'm "wowed" with how great it works!  I have a layered, razor cut that flips out and, before, was using three other products (pomade-for shine, manipulator-for flip, and aquage paste-for volume).  I just received Dirt last week, and after putting on just a bit, got the look that I was wanting, without all the hassle of three different products.  Yes, it's a bit pricey but well worth it (considering you only have to use a little, you're sure to save $$$).  and the smell, ::sigh:: is so great!  (Even if it hadn't worked as great as it does, I think I would still purchase it just for the delicious scent)  :)  I love that I can run my fingers through my hair and it's soft and manageable, even at the end of the day, and without the sticky "gunk" feel.  I definitely plan on purchasing other Jonathan Products

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: People!  People!  People!...Make sure you are using it right!!!
review_text: Awesome product.  As an old product used to use the slogan "a little dab'l do ya", it is true with this product.  Don't over do it or you'll have a greasy mess.  Start with a little and add more if you need to.  Always melt by rubbing hands together first.  Smells great too!  My only beef is the price.  Most of us aren't used to paying those Rodeo Drive prices, Jonathan.  $26 may not be a lot to you, but....  :)

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: Miracle-worker
review_text: I have huge curly Jew-fro hair, and this is the only product I have found that can really tame it

product_name: American Crew Pomade: Beauty
title: Simply the best
review_text: Having wild and uncontrollable hair as a woman is a well-documented problem, but what about if you're a guy?  After years of using cheap gels that left flakey residues in my hair, and/or smelling feminine, I was introduced to American Crew in the little brown jar by a stylist.  I now swear by this stuff.  Even on my knappy head (I have very thick wavy, but not curly, hair) American Crew keeps my hair in place and natural-appearing without lookling like I'm using Brill's Cream.  A thick dime-sized dab is enough for keeping my short haired coiffure in place and de-poofed all day. The trick is to work it in while my hair is moist from the shower but not dripping wet. Yes, it costs way more than gels but it's worth every penny.  One 4 oz jar lasts me about 6 weeks. The other benefit to American Crew is the smell - my wife absolutely loves the way my hair smells

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: Efficient Vanity?
review_text:
As a working mom in her mid-forties, I am ever hopeful when it comes to product claims of time savings and beauty enhancement.  And so, when I read about the T3 Tourmaline Ionic Hair Dryer, I just had to have one.  With a price tag of $200, I figured the claims just had to be true.

The T3 is a sleek, beautiful and lighweight hairdrying and styling tool.  With its ionic particle things, it sounds so scientific, too.  But does it do what it says it will do?

For me, it's hard to tell.  It does dry at least as fast as my old 1800 watt hair dryer but with seemingly less heat.  So arguably, it is faster.  Less heat also means less hair damage.  So arguably, that is a beauty enhancement.  Is my hair sleeker and shinier?  Again, hard to tell.  No one at the office the next day seemed to notice any change.

One thing that I do notice, however, is that I like the idea of using an ionic hair dryer.  For whatever reason, I do think it is good for my hair.  And I suppose that in and of itself is enough to make this purchase entirely worthwhile

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: Unbelievably Fast - Worth every penny
review_text: I did not believe the hype but read the other reveiws.  I have long hair and it would normally take me 30 minutes to dry my hair with my $15 drug store purchased hair dryers...I was pretty much used to that.  Often times I would let my hair dry naturally rather than blow dry it because of the hassle and time - not because it looked better, it looked terrible.  This dryer dries my hair in 15 minutes (fully blown under and styled), on top of that my hair is shiny when it's done and not dry.  I just bought one for my mom and would recommend this blow dryer for anyone that normally spends more than 20 minutes drying their hair, you will absolutely cut the dry time 50%.  Great purchase!

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: couldn't believe my eyes
review_text:
i hate blow dryers.  I never used on because they took too long, and my arm would get tired.
This dryer is incredible.  my hair was done in 15 minutes. I only have to go over each section once. I was truly amazed. It is worth every penny

product_name: Jonathan Product Redo Freshen-Up Mist For Hair & Skin(R): Beauty
title: works great for me!
review_text:
I think that this product does what it promises to do.  It is a "freshen-up" mist.  I use it everymorning (I shower before bed) before I blowdry my hair and it creates volume and makes my hair look awesome!  It is only short of the full 5 stars because it does not last all day, but it is definitely good for a few hours.  Even after it wears off, my hair is not flat.  It still has enough texture that I can just put my hands through it to get the "messy" look.

I don't think that it smells bad.  The smell actually reminds me of some spa products taht I use

product_name: Jonathan Product Redo Freshen-Up Mist For Hair & Skin(R): Beauty
title: Florida Gator Girl
review_text: What is wrong with everyone reviewing these products?  This is for your HAIR and SCALP, not the face.  Again, after experimenting a few times, if it doesn't work, just say so and state the facts, not hype and your feelings for Jonathan and his show on television

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Curl Curling Serum(TM): Beauty
title: Great Products
review_text: I love using Jonathan Product. It makes your hair feel soft, look beautiful and the products smell great.

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Curl Curling Serum(TM): Beauty
title: SWEET CANDY
review_text:
I LOVE JONATHAN PRODUCTS.  AND ESPECIALLY HOW IT MAKES MY HAIR
FEEL, SO SOFT AND SEXY LOOKING.  KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK JONATHAN

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Serious Volume Volumizing Conditioner(TM): Beauty
title: Works Great!
review_text: After reading the other reviews I was a little worried about using the product I had already ordered.  After using it for a few days now my hair has never looked better, I truly feel like this shampoo/conditioner was meant for me.  I have fine, super straight hair, middle to short.  It feels clean and sleek. The conditioner smells like pina coloda, yum!  I would definatly recommend this for my hair type.  Would maybe recommend to lather the shampoo in your hands first then work thoroughly( it doesn't lather as well as some shampoos that have lots of glycerine in them) and only apply the conditioner towards the end of your hair and leave in for a few min.  Hope that helps

product_name: Murad Essential C Night Moisture: Beauty
title: No New Wrinkles
review_text: I'm at an age where wrinkles develop and would be a very unhappy camper without this night cream. Fortunately I started using it a few years ago and have not noticed new wrinkles. Since I'm buying into all the hype about vitamin C, I choose this particular formula. Besides the documented benefit of vitamin C this cream is great in general. I love the consistancy, rich but not too rich. And I don't get blemishes from it even though it contains shea butter, which gives it a fantastic feel. It is packed with other great ingredients like vitamins A, E and K and anti-oxidants like grapeseed extract. There is another skin care company that bases its whole line on grapeseed extract alone. It has phospholipids which binds water to the skin. Also anti-inflammatories like extract of orange, geranium and lavander. There's been recent research by those such as Dr. Perricone, for example, about the damage inflammation does to the whole body, the skin included. It really leaves the skin feeling soft and hydrated. It's nice to wake up in the morning to treated skin. I try new brands a lot but based on its track record I'm staying faithful to this night cream. It works

product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Eye Recovery Complex 0.5 oz: Beauty
title: Mom loves it!!
review_text: my mom loves this eye cream!very velvety and not greasy like some other eye creams

product_name: Spa Sister Cotton Moisture Gloves: Beauty
title: I love these gloves
review_text: I purchased these gloves not for moisturizing my hands, but to protect them when I'm driving or riding my bike in the sun. My main concern was that they would be heavy or clumsy, but they fit like a second skin, are lightweight, grip well, and are extremely comfortable. I wear them for hours at a time without noticing I have them on, so I imagine they would be easy to sleep in. They wash like a dream. Will definitely buy  more

product_name: Creative Nail Design Stickey: Beauty
title: Keep Your Polish
review_text: Don't feel like you're wasting money on a manicure any more.  This product will keep your polish from chipping and crashing, no matter what torture you put your nails through

product_name: Mistral Travel Candle in 10 Scents, 2.8 oz: Beauty
title: great bon voyage present
review_text: I added this item to qualify a gift order for supersaver shipping.  I was hesitant to order a scented candle on line, but I am glad I did.  I sent a book and this candle to a friend who was going to visit her husband who had been completing a fellowship in another city.  She really liked the scent--orange blossom green fig.  (I went to the Mistral site to read more detailed descriptions of the scents.)  She also liked the screw-on cap, which she thought would make it very secure in transit.  I would order this again.

product_name: Andis Super Select Cord/Cordless Clipper: Beauty
title: Works great for me!
review_text: I purchased the Andis clipper and trimmer combo offering.  My primary need was for a cordless clipper and Andis appeared to be about the only one available that  Icould find.  The purchase was a bit pricy but I'm totally happy with how they function.  The products are quality made and handle very nicely.  There is more power provided when the clippers are plugged in, but for my needs, real close cut every 2-3 days, they work perfect.  I recharge my clippers once a week.  The instructions suggest that every 60 days you let the clippers run until the battery runs out.  I did this once, but got tired of waiting for the clippers to stop, so my impression is that I could probably go for 2 weeks between charging the battery.  Overall I consider them to be a very nice set of clippers/trimmers

product_name: Still Life Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Smells Glorious--But What a Mess!
review_text:
Exuding citrusy aromas, the Still Life Bath Bomb smells GLORIOUS. Bath Bombs are made of sodium bicarbonate, so they're like "alka seltzers" for the bath.

Some of the LUSH Bath Bombs contain petals and other plant parts and Still Life is no exception. Mine was FILLED with sunflower petals--even a complete flower and a leaf! 

Although bathing with such Bath Bombs are luxurious, the clean up can be quite messy. (When my husband came into the bathroom while I was bathing, he exclaimed "What the heck is THAT?!" Why, it's sunflower petals, my dear...)

I had a first rate mess on my hands after the bath. I had to keep clearing the drain for the water to go down. THEN I had to do it a few more times before I could finally RINSE the tub!

If you don't mind the LUSH Bath Bombs that include petals and other flora and fauna--and you love bright, citrusy scents--you'll likely LOVE Still Life Bath Bomb. It smells heavenly, and tints the water with a golden hue.

However, if you don't like plant parts floating in your bath--nor the clean up involved afterwards--steer clear of Still Life

product_name: Bare Escentuals Beyond the Basics ($110 Value): Beauty
title: Super addition
review_text:
to the bareMinerals starter kit ! Cute little jars allow you to try the Bisque and Summer Bisque Multi Tasking Face, I use both shades for concealers on all areas of my face.  I take my time and apply a little then go back and apply more if needed.  Being able to apply after the foundation works very, very well.  All blend together, no tell tale signs of "concealer".  My under eye area looks more natural as well, covering the dark circles and veins.

The bare Radiance All Over Face Color has too much shimmer for me so I gave that to my daughter.  But the Glee is perfect.  I use this in place of the Warmth and am happier with the color.  Just a different tone to use, especially if you already have a red/ruddy complexion.

Faux Tan All Over Face Color is something I plan on using this summer, perhaps mixing with Glee for a sun kissed look.

The brushes included with the kits, really are Strokes of genius and worth every penny!  I find no comparison to any other brushes (Mary Kay, Estee Lauder etc) that I own.

I am so glad that Amazon and Sephora offer a wide variety of bareEscentuals products. [...]

product_name: Bare Escentuals Beyond the Basics ($110 Value): Beauty
title: Compliment Your Skin
review_text: This lightweight makeup will make your skin look brighter and younger.  You'll love all the compliments you get on your skin

product_name: Bare Escentuals Beyond the Basics ($110 Value): Beauty
title: From Mary Kay to Bare Escentuals... yes its true!
reviewer: Sherry A. Paris "Always Hunting For Good Deals!"
review_text: I've looked at this makeup for the 2 years I have been a Mary Kay consultant and I cannot believe how I love it!!!  Moisturize is the most important thing for your skin but I love the skin care of the easiness that is involved in looking and feeling great!  It really does what it says!  I am adding to my collection of items to have what a beautiful woman needs in her collection

product_name: Bare Escentuals Beyond the Basics ($110 Value): Beauty
title: Best makeup EVER!!!!!!!
review_text: After being a die-hard MAC makeup user for years, it was time for a change.  I tried this and absolutely LOVE it.  I get so many compliments on how pretty my skin is.  I really LOVE this makeup!

product_name: Bare Escentuals Beyond the Basics ($110 Value): Beauty
title: make-up skills
review_text: I love Bare Escentuals and the only reason I gave this product a 5 rather than a 5 is probably based on my application skills.

product_name: StriVectin-SD Intensive Repair, 6-Ounce Tube: Beauty
title: Wow!  Worry line banished!
review_text:
I have been using Strivectin for 2 1/2 years, faithfully every morning and evening.  The crease that was between my eyebrows is gone!  Also the "marionette" lines around my mouth have lessened quite a bit - also much less feathering of lipstick.  I only use it on my trouble spots, before applying moisturizer.  It's terrific.
And it lasts forever

product_name: StriVectin-SD Intensive Repair, 6-Ounce Tube: Beauty
title: StriVectin for Men?
review_text: Being a 55+ year old male, I decided that if it "works for women", then why not men? The product seems to work OK, but I think that I would probably need to use it a little longer, since I have only been using it for 3.5 months

product_name: StriVectin-SD Intensive Repair, 6-Ounce Tube: Beauty
title: Finally, somehting that works!
review_text: There are so many products to choose from and I have tried many of them, most recently Rejuvinol and the other being AlphaDerma CE that just dried my skin and I ended up breaking out from them. It was horrible. someone at my office recommended Strivectin and I gave it a try. It not only completely cleared up my skin but got rid of my crows feet and forehead wrinkles. And to think, I've wasted soooooo much money on other products that didn't work!!

product_name: StriVectin-SD Intensive Repair, 6-Ounce Tube: Beauty
title: Unbelievable product
review_text: I am so happy I found this product. I had alot of acne scars that made my life miserable and now most are gone. I can finally have a social life. Thank you.

product_name: Britney Spears Curious Britney Spears: Beauty
title: Pretty, light burst of Louisiana Magnolia!
review_text: I'd like to start off by saying it's how it makes you feel and how long that feeling will last - not the person who put his/her name on it. Get over the hype and indulge yourself in this very pretty scent! It's truly a fun burst of many magnificent scents all blended together to form this cute, playful perfume. If you're looking for a light, flirtatious find - this is the perfume for you and I recommend it highly to the more than picky souls out there. My only concern is how long this lasts, as it tends to fade a little more than Britney's recent perfume, Fantasy - Otherwise, this will have your co-workers 'curious' as to what exactly you're sporting - It's definitetly worth it

product_name: Britney Spears Curious Britney Spears: Beauty
title: A new classic...
review_text:
When I first saw CURIOUS while on holiday, I bought it without trying any. I just wanted the pretty bottle. When I opened it up back home I didn't have high hopes, impulse buying rarely works out does it? So what did I think?

I love it. My first thought was; Sophisticated and classic. CURIOUS can be worn for work, shopping, evenings out - anywhere at any time! 

On the first spay you notice the top notes of magnolia and lotus flower, then the dreamy base of vanilla-infused musk, which lasts throughout the day. The best surprise of all?   After you've worn it for a few hours, you are surprised with the mouth-watering aroma of tangy pear.

product_name: Bobbi Brown Long-Wear Gel Eyeliner: Beauty
title: It really lasts!!!
review_text: All my life I looked for a liner that would last all day and not smudge.  I tried everything, from Chanel to Maybelline and nothing worked.  I don't like liquid liners because I find them hard to apply.  I found the answer to my problems with this gel eyeliner.  I found it much easier to apply than liquid eyeliner, and it lasts for ever!  I own it in 4 different colors and I don't think I'll ever stop using it.

product_name: Truefitt & Hill Trafalgar Shaving Cream 5.8 oz: Beauty
title: Makes shaving enjoyable .....
review_text: This shaving cream was very enjoyable to use. You only need an amount the size of a nickel or quarter in your palm to get a good lather. I do not use the badger hair brush yet but my shave is very comfortable and it smells good. It also has made shaving a more enjoyable experience for me which is worth a few bucks right there ! I tried the T & H West Indies Lime and the 1805 traveler size as well. The 1805 also smells good and the West Indies Lime had a bit of a musty, lime scent to it. You may want a more distinct lime scent but I have not tried any others with this smell.

product_name: Truefitt & Hill Trafalgar Shaving Cream 5.8 oz: Beauty
title: Great Cream for a Great Shave
review_text:
I have been using soaps and creams for a few months now. I started to use soaps and creams mainly because they provide better value for the money and they help my sensitive skin.

I have always had sensitive skin and shaving never helped. I recently came across Truefitt & Hill Trafalgar and figured that if it was good enough for royalty, then I should give it a try. I can definitely see why this is the official royal shaving cream. It wasn't until I tried this cream and combined it with a Merkur Futur double-edged razor and badger brush that I knew what it was to have a close shave with no razor burn.

Like the previous reviewer said, most people need to realize that very little goes a long way. With just a small dab on a wet badger brush you will be able to create a warm and thick lather that will make you love shaving.

Shaving the old fashioned way will take a bit longer, but it will feel luxurious and the results are much better than anything you can get with a Mach 3 and a can of gel. I can finally go a whole day without shaving. If I go two days, I have a nice 5 o'clock shadow around 8.

This is the best bet for a shave cream. It smells very good and provides more than enough lubrication for a razor to simply glide over. A badger brush is a must though. Truefitt & Hill Trafalgar is simply fantastic.

product_name: Truefitt & Hill Trafalgar Shaving Cream 5.8 oz: Beauty
title: Excellent value and pleasureable scent  *a must buy for a wet shave*
review_text:
I recently started wet shaving (within the last two months) and have come to regard shaving as something I look forward to now.  I use a Merkur Futura double-edged razor and have bought an assortment of different shaving creams to try, including Prorasso (italian eucalyptus stuff), Taylor of Bond Street (avocado) and the Truefitt & Hill Traflagar.  My top choice is the Trufitt & Hill hands down.

While many people might see the $22 as expensive, most people need to realize that a very little goes a long way.  This is not like the Edge Gel or Barbasol that you learned to shave with.  This just requires a dab on the wet brush (a real badger hair brush) and a swirl in a small bowl sitting in a a bit of hot drawn water to create a warm and thick lather that will make you enjoy shaving again.  I would estimate this jar will last about 6 months.

In looking at the cost of my new shave method (52 blades a year ($0.50 each), two jars of shaving cream a year ($22 each) comes to about $70 a year.  Compare this to a blade every other week and a can of alcohol-based shave gel (which dries your skin) every other month for a cost of $60.  Ten bucks more a year buys a much better shave.

I've noticed that my shaves take a bit longer, but my skin has cleared up of many of the bumps that I used to have.  I also no longer have a 5 o'clock shadow at 3 in the afternoon.  Best of all the shave is the closest thing I've ever had to the shave I got from a barber in Florence, Italy using a steady hand and a scary looking straight blade.

This is the best bet for a shave cream !

product_name: HAPPY HEART For Women By CLINIQUE eau de parfum: Beauty: Clinique

review_text: I bought it as a gift for a friend. It smells ok ,not too strong.

product_name: HAPPY HEART For Women By CLINIQUE eau de parfum: Beauty: Clinique

product_name: Dr.Hauschka Translucent Face Powder, Compact: Beauty
title: THE BEST MAKEUP IN THE WORLD
review_text:
The best makeup is not French, but German, and the best German makeup is DR. HAUSCHKA.

The most important thing about this product is that it contains SAFE INGREDIENTS with little or no questionable or toxic material. You are putting makeup on your face and lips. Do you really know what most of it contains? Put your mind at ease with DR. HAUSCHKA.

I'm reviewing the powder, but this review applies to all products from this company

product_name: Bobbi Brown Sheer Finish Loose Powder: Beauty
title: Lovely powder
review_text: This powder is the softest I have ever worn, and feels lovely on my skin.  Not cakey.  Not drying.  But I gave it four stars because of the price.  I would have expected to get some discount from Amazon.

product_name: The Body Shop Tea Tree Oil: Beauty
title: Really works!
review_text: I have pretty oily skin and I break out frequently. I use it on the spot and it dries it up causing it to heal. It doesn't happen over night but there IS a difference. My sister also uses it for her teenage acne and finds it works by keeping the breakouts in check.

product_name: philosophy on a clear day blemish serum: Beauty
title: I ORDERED ONE OF THESE AND LATER ORDERED 6 MORE!!!
review_text: I have had ongoing clogged pores, and blackheads since February   of 2004, after being hospitalized for acute asthma and prior treatment including megadoses of Prednisone cortocosteroid, to diminish severe asthma .  However the huge doses of steroids destroyed my immune system and adrenal glands........resulting in hormonal cystic acne, blackheads and clogged pores for 2 years.  Was so depressed that I stopped going out, because of how badly my face looked.  However, after trying every product on the market to treat clogged pores and blackheads with results ranging from none to increasing the acne problem, making it worse than before....I begrudgingly tried one more product.......that being "On A Clear Day Blemish Serum".  Upon receiving it, I tried it for 10 days and achieved OUTSTANDNG results.  I have been using it ever since.  However, i DID have to reorder within 4 weeks; and i just received 6 bottles of it.  I cherish it.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!

product_name: philosophy on a clear day blemish serum: Beauty
title: strong!
review_text: This stuff works but you have to be careful with it. If you have sensitive skin and a tendency toward OCD it can leave you with one heck of a chemical burn. It does work and work well, but be careful not to use it more than once a day until you figure out what it does on your skin

product_name: Mally Beauty City Chick Smokey Eye Kit: Beauty
title: I love this kit!!
review_text: What can I say!! This kit has everything that it takes to make a "megastar" smokey eye.  I love that Mally includes the shadow base with the kit.  You can't go wrong with this kit, I have Skyscraper and Plum Chelsea.  Mally includes instructions on how to apply the shadows so there will be no fear when you try it out.  Wonderful product, can't wait to see what this line comes up with next!

product_name: Mally Beauty City Chick Smokey Eye Kit: Beauty
title: Great Stuff
review_text: I love these sets.  It is so handy to have all the right colors in one spot, and not have to rummage around.  Great for travel and busy days.  I have the midtown merlot (which doesn't appear to be offered here yet), and skyscraper on its way.  It's nice to have a primer included to help keep the look longer.  The eyeliner is good too.  Follow Mally's directions and you really will have sexy smokey eyes.  I want all the colors!

product_name: Clinique Stay-Matte Sheer Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: Best Pressed powder I have ever used
review_text: I wear Stay Neutral and have been using this product for years.  Doesn't clog pors and it looks flawless.  This is a really great product and work the $18.00

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Protein Rx PM Repair Strengthener: Beauty
title: Wonderful Product!
review_text: I was sent a small sample of this product, tried it and LOVED it! I used it twice in a month and it really did wonders for my hair... even my huband mentioned how shiny and smooth it was. The price is a bit much but I am buying it now and will be using it at least once a week. The sample hooked me in

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Protein Rx PM Repair Strengthener: Beauty
title: Great stuff.
review_text:
I was a bit skeptical at first, using an overnight treatment; I didn't want anything heavy, and gooey on my hair and on my pillow, and possibly traveling to my face and making me break out. This proved to be totally opposite of my fears, it was light and milky, it sank right in and I didn't feel like I had anything on my hair at all. It was very soft right after I put it on, and it had no scent, I guess you don't want it to keep you up at night! Also this is not for everything use, the instructions say 2-3 days a week, so the bottle lasts for quite some time.

I have long hair that I dye and highlight whenever Im in the mood, and this product was just what I needed. I didn't want to chop my ends, and this did a great job of keeping split hairs at bay, and it left them very soft and well groomed. Sometimes hair that gets long has this "old broom" look on the bottom and this magic potion really made the ends silky and straight.

Expensive but a small amount goes for a long long time. If you want long, shiny and luscious hair, then this is a wonderful product to purchase. I don't regret having it at all!

product_name: Dior DiorSkin Icone Photo Perfect Creme-To-Powder Makeup: Beauty
title: Perfection!!!
review_text: I'm 26 and have used every brand of foundation in search of "THE ONE". When makeup is concerned, you truely get what you pay for. I've used foundations I liked, but never loved. I want a light non-sticky consistency, medium coverage, and a cream to powder finish that doesn't look chalky. This foundation meets and exceeds my expectations. It goes on with a featherlike weight and softness. It turns to a velvety powder that looks so soft and natural, its like the skin I had as a young child. It's not "your makeup looks great", its "your skin looks great". The name is not an overstatement in the least. As for the price, well worth it. How much money do most women spend during years worth of buying and trying out foundations? This is your foundation and powder all in one. A little goes a long way. I highly recommend it!!!!!

product_name: Pure Badger Shave Brush, Chrome Handle: Beauty
title: Good buy
review_text: This is my first badger shaving brush, and I'm very satisfied with it. I don't know how it compares to the much more expensive brushes out there, but it's certainly a big improvement over the cheap bristle brush I was using in the past. I don't regret not spending more

product_name: Ojon Ultra Hydrating Shampoo: Beauty
title: Different shampoos for different people
review_text: I feel for the other people who rated this product but I have the opposite reaction to this shampoo.  I love the smell...it's not the floral scents you get from other shampoos.  Instead the smell is a bit earthy...heck, it's made with nut oils.  As far as the quality of the shampoo...I'll use it forever.  I have fine hair, but a lot of it, and this shampoo ends up being perfect for my hair...detangles but still leaves my hair full and silky.  I can't say enough about it.  Please judge for yourselves...just try the 2 oz size and see what you think

product_name: Valentino Rock 'N Rose: Beauty
title: Stop . . . And Smell The Roses
review_text:
This Spring, add some perkiness and sassiness to your everyday lifestyle without losing your elegance and charisma. Wear "Rock 'N' Rose" Eau de Parfum Spray by Valentino and be as perky and sassy as you can, but still remain elegant and charming as you are!

With its mixture of heady rose, sandalwood, blackcurrant and gardena, this beautiful scent is a knock out. I absolutely love its sweet smell and the staying power is simply amazing! Show off the "rocker" in you but still be as dainty as a pink rose with this "Rock 'N' Rose" perfume by Valentino.

So take a moment . . . and smell the roses!

product_name: Philosophy Melon Daiquiri: Beauty
title: Rich and creamy shower gel
review_text:
This is one of Philosophy's 3-in-1 products.  It can be used as shampoo, bubble bath, and shower gel.  I've only used it as a shower gel, so that's all I'm able to review here.  As a shower gel, this product is exceptional.  It's an extremely rich and thick gel, and produces a generous lather with abundant bubbles.  I find it to be somewhat moisturizing- it doesn't explicitly moisturize my skin, but it also doesn't dry it out, even in the winter.  In addition, the gel is opaque and creamy, rather than clear, like most shower gel.  The melon daquiri scent is summery and fruity.  It's a pleasant sweet melons scent.  It doesn't smell especially alcoholic; though it's part of Philosophy's line of 3-in-1s meant to smell like fruity cocktails- like margaritas and pina coladas.  The scent is more fruity melon than alcoholic melon.  That said, people who like juicy, fruity scents will likely love this.  

While I haven't tried using this as a bubble bath or shampoo, the rich lather I get from the shower gel suggests to me that it would probably work very well as the other two parts of the 3-in-1.  The one thing that may be problematic for people- the scent doesn't last beyond the shower.  I can't smell it on my skin anymore when I get out of the shower, though the scent is quite strong while in use.  Some people may find that problematic.  I like that it doesn't clash with my perfume, so it's okay for me.

product_name: Bobbi Brown Shimmer Cream Shadow Stick: Beauty
title: love this!!
review_text: I use it every time I use make-up. (which isn't very often) but I just love it. It's easy to use and also looks great. Great if you're in a hurry. And plus, it's about a pen size, so you can even just put it in your pencil case. Or evening purse. :

product_name: Calvin Klein cK One Summer: Beauty
title: 2006 Edition in the Blue/Green Bottle
review_text:
It's been awhile since I bought myself some perfume, so I stood at the counter trying several perfumes. I had tried CK Summer 2006 earlier this year, but didn't get it.

Nothing I tried compared to it that day. So I bought the spray and shower gel.

This glorious perfume has hints of Tangerine, Pineapple, Grapefruit, Frangipani, Sea Breeze, Palm Sap, Driftwood. It's clean--very fresh smelling. I LOVE it! It's a very yummy scent.

If you like citrusy, clean scents, you'll love CK One Summer 2006. It stays on me all day, which is surprising. Usually scents--especially the clean ones I favor--fade as the day goes by.

This is a limited edition, and comes in the blue/green bottle. Don't pass it up!

product_name: Too Faced Lip Injection Intensive Plumping Lip Mask: Beauty

It only takes alittle and lasts a long time, so well worth the price for the look it gives.  I love this!

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty

And when it's on, it has tiny sparkles of purple that seem to come from nowhere and then disappear just as fast.  Love it!  It lasts a long time, too!

Oh, the secret ingredient? Pheromones! Let me know if you have any look with it!!

product_name: PARIS HILTON For Women By PARIS HILTON eau de parfum: Beauty: Paris Hilton
title: Light and airy
review_text: This perfume had me skeptical of purchasing it mainly because of the name behind it...Hilton.  Anyways... I went to my local perfume store and sample it...LOVES IT!  =)   It's a very airy/light scent that isn't overpowering like most other perfumes.  I highly suggest this perfume

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: Goodbye to stray-aways!
review_text: Naturally I have dark brown hair, but I dye it blonde, so I have a lot of dead ends and stray-aways. When I first received this product, I put a little in my hands and rubbed it into my dry hair. At first, I think I put in a little too much, because it was a little greasy, but I was amazed at the results. It instantly flattened and smoothed my hair. The smell was kind of vasoline-like, but don't worry it goes away. If you have dry hair, I definitely recommend this product. I used to use a flat iron on my hair to keep the dead ends from rising, but now I don't even use my flat iron. I just blow dry my hair straight and put a little hair healthy butter on and I'm out the door! I LOVE this product

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: Great Conditioner!
review_text: I've been hearing rave reviews for CD's products all over forums, and I purchased the 8oz. Healthy Hair Butter for my dry, breaking, relaxed hair from Sephora. It has the consistency of Vaseline and when I applied it to my dried hair after washing, it felt very stiff and heavy. It was hard to comb my hair even with my wide-toothed comb and for a few minutes I regretted getting it thinking it would stay like this. I tied my hair into a loose ponytail, and wrapped it with a satin scarf for 20 minutes. When I removed the scarf my hair was unbelievably SOFT and smooth! It felt incredible. It absorbed very well into the hair. I was able to comb through it easily. It felt silky but slightly greasy, but that may have been my fault for adding too much. This is an excellent all-natural conditioner and it smells fantastic. Like lemons and mint and garden fresh. The only issues I have with it are that it's very heavy, so on relaxed hair apply it sparingly, or it will get greasy and weighty. This will be great for controlling new growth. Next time I'll try applying it to wet hair. Overall great product

product_name: Sephora Glitter All Over Color: Beauty
title: Good prodduct 4 a deep smoky eye
review_text:
These shadows are great 4 a deep smoky eye look. The pictures make the colors appear lighter and brighter than they really are when U get them at home.

The application is smooth and blends great, which is perfect for a smoky eye

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Great Products
review_text: I used Proactiv and wasn't pleased; it is very drying. I have tried over the counter and they are harsh too. This is a great product. Can be pricey but it is so worth it. I am African-American and find it difficult to indentify products right for me. This is on the money!! I use the entire line

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: best acne treatment I have EVER used
review_text:
As soon as I started using this face wash, I started seeing results very quickly, and I have had adult acne for a long time.  This product keeps them away and I don't have any at all anymore.  My skin is smooth now, no blemishes, and I will not switch to any other products, this one is the best..hands down..and believe me...I'v tried them all!!  Thank you Murad!
Stephanie

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Not just for acne prone skin!
review_text:
I'm 28 and have always had what I would call average skin, the kind that most women have. I have normal skin with a little more oiliness in the T-Zone and I get blackheads and the occasional breakout. I have tried all kinds of different product lines (Urban Defense, DDF, Dior, Philosphy, Bliss, etc.) and am the happiest with the results I get from Murad. 
I have been using Murad for about 2 1/2 years now so I have tried a lot of the Murad products and found a routine that works great for me. 

In the morning I use the AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser (love it! the gritiness gives you very smooth surface for applying makeup) then the Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel and the Skin Perfecting Lotion which I mix and apply together so that I don't use as much. Last I put on my Moisture Silk Eye Gel and I'm ready to go.  

At night I use the Clarifying Cleanser followed by the Clarifying Toner, the Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel, the Perfecting Lotion and the best product of all the Night Reform Treatment (see my review of that product for details, I love it!) and again I use the Moisture Silk Eye Gel. 

Once a week I throw in the Exfoliating Fruit Enzyme Mask and I have perfect skin if I stick to the program everyday. My skin looks and feels better than it ever has and people always guess my age to be around 23 so it must be doing something right! 

Top 5 Favorite Murad Products:
1. Soothing Lip Therapy
2. Night Reform Treatment
3. Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel
4. AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser
5. Clarifying Cleanser

Murad Products that I don't like:
1. Day Reform Treatment (too greasy and I hate the smell)
2. Purifying Face Scrub 
3. The products for combination skin - they are ok but the acne line is so mild that people with combination skin will see better results using it. (I have used both product lines)

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Try it and you might be suprised!
review_text: I've tried a full range of acne products from Proactiv to almost all of the drugstore brands, all of which have been disappointing.  Murad cleanser, however, is actually worth the money.  The cleanser imparts a tingly cooling sensation when used, a little goes a long way (need less than a dime size per use) and I saw clearer skin in less than 2 weeks.  I would recommend this product along with  Murad skin perfecting moisturizer to anyone.

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: The Best
review_text: I have tried other products such as ProActiv to help clear up my breakouts...and all have been harsh and may have helped clear my skin a little...but not enough for me to be 100% happy.  However, this product from Murad has completely cleared my skin and is so refreshing to my face.  Plus, I feel that you are definitely getting your money's worth -- this product last a lot longer than any other face wash.  I can't say enough good things about it...great smell, makes your face FEEL clean, ACTUALLY clears your skin, etc.  If you are looking for an alternative to ProActiv, try this.  It will probably take a week or two for you to see your face completely clear...but it will

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Great results from this refreshing cleanser!
review_text: I've recently started using Murad's Clarifying Cleanser as part of my daily routine and I'm very impressed with the results.  Not only does this cleanser smell fabulous, but it leaves my skin feeling clean and soft with no soapy residue left behind like some cleansers.  And I know that it's working because even after just 3 weeks, my adult acne is almost completely gone

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Best cleanser I've tried so far..
review_text: I have combination skin and this has dramatically helped my acne breakouts.  It can be drying at first, but after a week of usage, my skin adjusted.  It's very important to use moisturizer as drying out your skin can also cause breakouts.  Use this and a murad moisturizer (with SPF) and I doubt that you'll be disappointed.

product_name: Clarisonic Daily Cleanser 6 oz.: Beauty
title: Great Cleanser!!!
review_text:
This is the perfect cleanser with my Clarisonic brush. You must use the two together for maximum benefits.. What is great about this cleanser, is that it is extremely gentle, and mild to the skin, yet the brush actions cleanse deep into the pores.

Ever since I started using my Clarisonic brushwith this cleanser, I constantly get compliments on my skin. I have recomeneded this product combination to all my friends and family

product_name: Carol's Daughter Tui Leave-In Conditioner: Beauty
title: I love this stuff....
review_text: I've been using this product for over a year now...and I love it...I have naturally curly hair that i get relaxed every three months to loosen the curls...and this is the only leave in that I have found that not only smells great (I get lots of compliments)...but makes my curls look great and have bounce to it...I use the leave in as well as the Tui Oil...great products...great product line...highly reccomended...

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text: I have been using Clarins UV SPF 40 for approximately 6 months now and would recommend this product - does not leave any type of white shadow and feels great

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: This is a great product!!!!!!!!!!!
review_text: I have to admit I tried to find a cheaper sunscreen that does the same things this one does without irritating my skin, but I keep ending back on this one.  It's awesome.  It feels great on your skin, works great, and is so lightweight.  It is so easy to wear under makeup if necessary, and it leaves a flattering look to the skin.  When it first showed up I thought it was an awfully small amount, but then I realized it only takes a tiny, tiny amount to cover your whole face because it's water-light.  So it lasts (at least for me) at least a month with daily use.  In my opinion the only thing they could do to improve this product would be to make it sweat/water-proof, but then it might not feel as good to the skin as it does.  I can't find a better facial sunscreen for the money

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: Clarins UV Plus Facial Protection  is unlike other sunscreens
review_text: I stopped using sunscreen on my face, except at the beach, because all the brands I tried were too oily and heavy, and the directions were to apply UNDER moisturizer and/or foundation. The result was a greasy, shiny face with clogged pores and frequent breakouts.  And then I received a sample of Clarins UV Plus SPF 40.  What a difference!!  Clarins UV Plus is a smooth, light lotion to be applied OVER moisturizer.  (I can't even tell I'm wearing it, except for excellent protection from all the sun's rays.)  Now I wouldn't be without it!  Although the price is $36+, you only have to use a tiny bit, and it lasts a long time.

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: Protection Perfection!
review_text:
This is my first Clarins product that I've ever used.  And I honestly am very impressed.  I've always been pretty anal about sunscreen and protection against harmful UV/UVB/Everything else rays.  I've always wanted products with the highest SPF available.  But the problem that I've always run into is that if you want a moisturizer with SPF included, it's usually on SPF 15 or 20...and that is simply not acceptable for me.

Higher SPFs always tended to be much heavier and oilier than I would like, and they caused me to break out frequently - Until Clarins UV Plus!  I am totally in love with this stuff!  It's a tiny tube that will literally last forever!  It has SPF 40 - which is enough protection from practically everything! It has anti-oxidants to fend off pollution.  What more could you ask for.  Yes, it is $35...but keep in mind that you will still need a separate moisturizer.  I use Hope in a Jar on freshly cleansed skin and then I apply my Clarins UV Plus, and I'm good to go.
