product_name: Clinique Pore Minimizer Instant Perfector: Beauty
title: This is a very useful product
review_text: Large pores are not a good thing, and many products I have tried do little to help.  I used to just use the silicone gel I apply as a makeup base in the troubled area around my nose, but now I have found Clinique Pore Minimizer and find it much more effective.  I find my pores to appear much less visible when using this product, and it does not clog up my complexion and cause breakouts

product_name: Clinique Pore Minimizer Instant Perfector: Beauty
title: A great primer!
review_text:
I have tried (and been disappointed by) several make-up primers (Sephora, Philosophy, etc.) when I decided to try this. I have very oily skin with large pores around my nose and on my forehead but using this product with a tinted moisturizer makes my skin look naturally perfect! 
My skin stays shine-free well into the afternoon (I still end up using blotting tissues- it says you can use this one top of make-up, but applying it causes smearing)
Overall, I couldn't be happier

product_name: Clinique Pore Minimizer Instant Perfector: Beauty
title: Better than pricier alternatives
review_text: For years, I was paying more for an imported French mattifier and was devastated when the company stopped selling here. I tried other popular mattifiers (namely Smashbox's Photo Finish), but this was by far the best. Turns out it was a good thing I was forced to find another product. This product makes my shine and the huge pores on my cheeks just vanish.  I'm matte longer during the day, and since blush sticks to this product well, I don't need foundation. I'd recommend it to anyone that wants their skin surface to look smoother and less shiny. I'm not a huge fan of Clinique's in general, but this one product keeps me coming back

product_name: Clinique Pore Minimizer Instant Perfector: Beauty
title: It works!!
review_text: Clinique's "Pore Minimizer Instant Perfector" does indeed change the appearance of your skin.  It is incredibly light, just a touch glides on and your pores disappear in an instant.  You can wear it alone or under regular make-up for even more coverage.  I really think this is a great product and it does just what it says it will.  I recommend you use it with no more than a light moisturizer or else it won't be able to get in your pores to work its magic

product_name: philosophy razor sharp silicone shaving gel: Beauty
title: Great product!
review_text: This shaving gel is terrific! It is not for sensitive skin, as the shave it provides is very close, so it might irritate for those sensitive skin types. It doesn't clog your razor, and a little definitely goes a long way! The only reason I gave it four stars out of five, is because it goes on rather clear, so you really can't see the shave lines, so when shaving my legs, I have to feel for it, but other than that, it's absolutely fantastic, and I highly recommend!

product_name: Rene Furterer Triphasic (8 Ampules x 0.18 oz.): Beauty
title: Terrific !
review_text: I have always had thin hair.My hair and scalp were left in shambles after a temporary round of antibiotics. I decided to once again to use this product to restore my hair. My hair and scalp are in better condition than ever before. This product is perfect for the "Fix this mess" syndrome.

product_name: Marc Jacobs Perfume: Beauty
title: Does not smell sexy or alluring but does smell GOOD
review_text: Not everyone wants to smell sexy I guess, which is why I caved in and gave the 5 starts for the DELICIOUS smell...no one mentioned this but the overall smell reminds me of coconut.  I recognize this perfume on other people and it always distracts me (in a good way).  I would not wear this myself though.  Best in winter.... it'd be annoying in spring/summer.  Now a perfume in which a person NOT wear yet still give it 5 stars has got to be something special :).  Only one other perfume does that to me, Amairage I think...would never wear it, but I enjoy the smell on others

product_name: Marc Jacobs Perfume: Beauty
title: very pretty
review_text: I've been looking for a new summer fragrance and after I smelled it in the magazine I decided I had to have it. Smells like actual fresh flowers at first, dries down to a nice somewhat woodsy floral. This perfume is fairly subtle so if you have a problem with anything overpowering this one is for you

product_name: Lancome Resolution D-Contraxol Intensive Anti-Wrinkle Treatment: Beauty
title: Use twice daily for healthy looking and beautiful skin!
review_text:
I have been using Lancome moisturizers for many years and every time I try another brand I come right back to Lancome, especially the Resolution D-Contraxol Anti-wrinkle Treatment. (They have updated/renamed this product a few times over the years but apparently only to add some new ingredients - the texture and effects are consistent and I believe better). 

I havent found another moisutrizer that has the same feel as this one- its light and easy to blend and lets your skin breathe so you don't feel "coated" in a thick film. I have found that it makes my makeup go on better and more evenly since its absorbs right into the skin and makes it smoother. It truly makes my otherwise dull skin glow! 

I can't really testify to the anti-wrinkle claims because I'm too young to have wrinkles and wear SPF 60 every time I leave the house, but hopefully its working! My only complaint is that it doesn't have a high SPF protection, but I think adding it would totally change the product and make it thicker, thereby negating all its wonderful attributes. Therefore, I HIGHLY recommend using it twice daily (or once if you prefer a different nighttime one) and adding a high SPF on top to prevent skin damage.

product_name: Lancome Resolution D-Contraxol Intensive Anti-Wrinkle Treatment: Beauty
title: Excellent care, some anti-wrinkle effect
review_text: Resolution feels wonderfully luxurious on the skin and is relatively economical in that you need only a little for your whole face and neck - the regular size pot lasts me about two months.  It leaves you with super soft feeling and "pampered" skin, and you can apply makeup rightaway.  As for the promised anti-wrinkle effect, I am not too sure. I think a great deal of the effect is a kind of temporary plumping or masking of wrinkles immediately after application which fades after a couple of hours, especially with makeup on.  But overall, I think it helps keep the skin somehow glowing and I am quite satisfied with this as a nice quality day and night cream for someone my age (slightly younger-looking 37).  Maybe I should also mention that I am quite prone to allergies and sensitive reactions and haven't noticed any adversities with this products in about two years of use

product_name: ZIRH PROTECT Face Moisturizer: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text: Zirh Protect is an amazing product.  It moisturizes your face with out leaving the slippery and greasey feel that other lotions leave behind.  I higly recommend it, worth every dollar

product_name: ZIRH PROTECT Face Moisturizer: Beauty
title: ALL ZIRH PRODUCTS ROCK!!!
review_text: I've used Lauder to Chanel womens skin care. Have tried most mens lines as well. None compare in efficacy to Zirh! Their Self Tanners look very realist too

product_name: Sean John Unforgivable: Beauty
title: Smell good stuff
review_text: I bought this for my husband for Father's Day. He loves it

product_name: Sean John Unforgivable: Beauty
title: Shockingly Amazing
review_text: Upon initial word of the Sean John cologne my first inclination was to avoid it.  I figured it would be another lousy celebrity fragrance.  However, after sampling in it I was blown away.  This is by far my favorite cologne I've ever bought.  I highly recommended it

product_name: Coolaulin Hair Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: HAIR SHINY, SOFT, AND SMELLING DELICIOUS
review_text:
Ever dream of living on a beautiful tropical island?  Of course, you have.  (Well, maybe not being in residence  forever but perhaps a week away from the 9 to 5 commute would be nice).

	And since we're dreaming there's also a handsome sea captain on the island.  He thinks you're the most beautiful woman he's ever seen - he exclaims about the perfection of  your eyes , your hair, your lips, your hair, your skin, your hair, your face, your hair.

	Wait a minute, what's this fixation he has with your hair?  Ah, it must be the Coolaulin you use, that amazing fresh-from-the-tree coconut conditioner that leaves your hair shiny, soft, and smelling delicious.  

	You should have known!   Rich man, poor man, beggar man, thief, sea captain - no man can resist hair treated with Coolaulin.

        - Gail Cooke

product_name: Coolaulin Hair Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: MUSKY COCONUTTY!
review_text: Smelled like coconuts, but what kept it from sweetness, is it kind of ends up falling off with a bit of a musk.I would've preferred if it didn't have the musk mixed in.The musk unbalances the sweetness of it

product_name: Laura Mercier Cotton Squares: Beauty
title: Love these...........they are great
review_text: The only problem with these cotton squares is that once you use them you won't want to use the ones from the drug store ever again.  They are a good size so they can be cut in half to economize (depending on what you use them for). Nicely boxed

product_name: Philosophy Senorita Margarita: Beauty
title: bartender , I'll have another!
review_text: I bought this because I love the smell of lime. This didnt disappoint in THAT department! Very refreshing to bathe with...a fun, lively, summer-ific scent! makes a GREAT gift, by the way..as do all philosophy produts! My girlfriends are always tickled pink when I buy them a bath gel that I feel "matches" their personalities! Enjoy! ( and no hangover!)

product_name: Philosophy Senorita Margarita: Beauty
title: Great as a bath gel
review_text: I love this product and can't recommend it highly enough, especially if you love margaritas.  I love the whole 3 in 1 idea: however, I have sensitive skin and very dry hair so I can only use it as a bath gel.  Unless you have normal, perpetually shiny hair and perfect skin I would look elsewhere for hair and face products

product_name: Philosophy Senorita Margarita: Beauty
title: Recommendation?
review_text: Does anybody recommend this brand? I've really wanted to try a professional brand of Shampoo/Conditioner now that I've had my hair colored and style professionally the past year

product_name: The Happy Pill Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: The Happy Pill - A Foaming Ballistic
review_text:
Unlike most Lush ballistics, the Happy Pill will foam, rather than fizz.  The two halves smell like Olive Branch gel and Happy Hippy gel, orange and grapefruit.  If it's taking too long to foam, you can break it in half.

Moisturizing and calming, I enjoy this long-lasting, citrus ballistic

product_name: The Happy Pill Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: the happy pill
review_text: It smells really good and took a long time to fizz away. It's good for a rainy dreary day. The water also turned a yellow orange color.

product_name: The Happy Pill Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: YUM!
review_text:
I love LUSH Bath Bombs, and this one is a HUGE disc-shaped, awesome smelling product!

A friend in Germany sent me a package with several LUSH items and I couldn't believe how LARGE this bomb was. (I had only tried the round ones before.)

I didn't want to waste it all on one bath so I broke it in half. For those unfamiliar with Bath Bombs, they are made of sodium bicarbonate which means they're like luxury "alka seltzers" for the bath.

The Happy Pill bomb took awhile to dissolve (unlike the round ones) but I was glad for the lingering scent--a delicious fruity aroma.

Highly recommended if you want to get away from it all and have a spa experience in your own bathtub

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Apple Cider Clarifying Shampoo: Beauty
title: Fabulous!
review_text: I was browsing the Bath and Body Works store and saw it, opened up the "Tester" bottle and it smelled devine!  I know it is pricey, but I have thick, straight hair that has recently become very oily, even though I do not use any products.  The first day I used it, I washed my hair and blow dryed it, thinking the smell would not last long.  WRONG!  It happened to be raining that day and when my hair would get wet, that nice apple smell came back.  My hair is very soft and bouncy.  I purchased the 18 oz bottle (yes, sure is pricey) and so far I've used it every day (about a week).  I will try to taper off to maybe 3 days a week, in order to conserve product.  It's a keeper

product_name: Zoya Nail Polish: Beauty
title: Zoya Nail Polish "Brizia"
review_text: I came across this wonderful nail polish about 5 months ago at a health fair and I havent put anything else on my nails since nor will I..It's safe and It doesnt turn my nails a yellowish tint like so many others do..I love Brizia, I have short nails and for some reason this certain color makes them appear longer than they are..And the color stays!!!

product_name: Armani Code by Giorgio Armani for Women 2.5 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: GLAMOROUS, MYSTERIOUS, SEDUCTIVE
review_text:
Glamorous, mysterious, seductive all describe Armani Code, a captivating orange blossom based scent from Giorgio Armani Fragrance. 

As one would expect from this master couturier the bottle itself is a gem. Tapering from a weighted base the slim flacon seems to glow as lacquered shades of blue sweep from an early dawn at the bottom of the sleek holder to midnight nearing the top. Adding to the fragrance's intrigue is an oriental effect achieved by lace embroidery on the glass. 

The scent is sweet yet sensuous with a sparkle provided by orange zest. With orange blossom at its heart Armani Code is enhanced by Sambac jasmine, Madagascan vanilla and honey. The man in my life called it "delicious," and I do, too. It's now high on my list of favorite fragrances. 

     Gail Cook

product_name: The Body Shop Tea Tree Oil Facial Scrub: Beauty
title: Mighty warrior
review_text:
Even though this scrub reminds me of the teenage days, when the skin would act as if it was being attacked by my own face, trying to get away, I still love using it to fight occasional blemishes. There is nothing this mighty warrior cannot do when it comes to cleansing and purging the skin of clogged pores and dry patches. I don't suggest treating the face like a floor, scrubbing away until the polish wears off, but a good scrub at least once a week for normal to oily skin is not only beneficial but also very relaxing and let me just say that the scent itself makes me feel healthier all ready. I still get this, not only because of my fond memories but for it's ability to perk up and refresh my skin, especially before a mask on a Sunday night right before bed. I love the fresh piney scent of the scrub and its creamy consistency marred with real ground tea leaves.

Tea Tree is found in parts of South East Asia, New Zealand and Australia. The small shrub can survive in places where other vegetation fails to flourish. There are over a hundred eighty species of tea tree, only the oil steam-distilled from the single species of Melaleuca alternifolia is used commercially and it's only found in Northern New South Wales. Since it's discovery the oil has been called a first aid kit in a bottle, not used a moisturizer but as a deep cleanser and antiseptic it's also used to treat pimples, burns, stings, toot aches, gum infections and various other unpleasant occurrences.

Without cleansing and scrubs, skin would take twenty five days to wear off, not to mention the daily doses of makeup, pollution, smoke, mixture of sebum and dead skin, dust, dirt that collect on top, they trap the healthy layers and promote patches of redness and irritation, not to mention breakouts and an unhealthy environment for one part of our bodies that represents us so well is definitely a bad idea. Scrubs such as the tea tree oil one are not only natural but also gentle enough not to harm and over strip the skin when used accordingly to the skin type of the user. To get the most of the scrub, a quick steam bath is also very nice; I cover my head with a clean towel and lean over a bowl of hot water with some chamomile tea in it for five minutes. I don't put my face too close to avoid getting my skin burned but it's very relaxing and a great pore opener before the scrub and a mask. 

- Kasia S.

product_name: Avon BEYOND COLOR Line Softening Mousse Foundation: Beauty
title: Good foundation, but not a miracle worker
review_text: This is the first foundation I have ever bought that actually matched my skin color EXACTLY.  I seriously can't see it at all on my skin!  It goes on velvety smooth and isn't greasy at all, and after a minute or two, it feels totally natural, with a soft matte finish.  I don't even have to use powder on it to set it.  My only complaint is that is very light and sheer, so it doesn't really cover up a lot of flaws (I have freckles around my mouth that it doesn't cover), but it works fine with a little concealer.  I haven't noticed much in the way of line reduction at all,either, I'm sorry to say.  But still a good foundation in itself

product_name: Avon BEYOND COLOR Line Softening Mousse Foundation: Beauty
title: Can't beat this foundation..
review_text:
I will start with my age, I am 56 years old and this product is the best I found for covering the problem spots as well as the non-problem spots. 
This Line softening mousse is perfect for our age group who has not only lines to cover, but brown spots and other imperfections that seem to develope. This cream is very soft and you don't even know you have it on. I
I highly reconmend this product

product_name: Creamy Candy Bath BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Ohhhhhh so good!
review_text:
I'll admit after reading reviews on how "small" the soaps where i was bit hesitant but i did it AND I'M SO HAPPY THAT I DID!  I got the rock chick set and fell in love before i even opened it!  The smell is to die for!  I can not explain it except YUMMMM and girls it's monday my bathroom still smells like it from a bath on friday evening!
There was no need for lotion after this bath either!  My skin was so smooth!  The bubbles never stopped!  And the shipping while a bit higher than norm well all i can say is you get what you pay for!  Well worthe it!  I think from now on i'll do a BIG order to save on shipping or what not but after one bubble bath and used the soap once i'm in love love love!  I haven't stopped telling people about this since i got it!
Definitely recommend to ANYONE!
No rings in my tub from the creamy bath or the soap!  And they gave me freebies in w/ my order!  This seems like a company that really cares and knows that word of mouth is what it's all about

product_name: Creamy Candy Bath BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Pure bliss!
review_text:
If I could have a lifetime supply of these, I would take a bath with one every day. 

People keep saying that you can cut a bubble bar in half and get plenty of bubbles, but I felt indulgent and I used the entire thing. I don't think I've ever seen so many bubbles in one bath! They stayed until the end. The smell was deliciously sweet, and the water was so soft and silky that afterwards I shaved with no shaving cream or anything. 

This may sound silly, but if someone ever made a bed as soft as those bubbles, I'd want one. I was playing with them, kind of patting them between my hands (which didn't pop them), and I just could not get over how soft they were.

When the water got cold, I just turned the faucet back on and added more hot water. Three times. I had so much trouble dragging myself out of that tub that I thought someone was going to have to come in after me!

I still smell like candy several hours later. I even conditioned my hair with a totally different scent, and my hair definitely smells like the bubble bath.

I'm addicted to Lush now! This month has been really stressful, and I'm getting through it by taking a bath every evening with something Lush. The massage bars are also wonderful

product_name: Creamy Candy Bath BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Mmmmmm....
review_text: I love Lush - have always ordered it from Amazon as we have no local store.  This means that it is hit and miss for me as I cannot preview scents.  This one was a hit!!  This is one of their smaller bubble bars, but still plenty for two baths in a jacuzzi tub.  The smell is yummy and hollywood style bubbles - you know the kind in Pretty Woman!!  Lush is pricey, but I have never bought any other product that makes me feel like I didn't have to fight to get bubbles - like pouring in half the bottle.  If you haven't tried Lush before, this one is a great starter!

product_name: Creamy Candy Bath BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Sugary treat
review_text: This smells of bubble gum or cotton candy and makes lots of bubbles. It is especially nice MIXED with the Butterball bath bomb, which has a vanilla-chocolate scent and the two make a very decadent mix in your bath. If you love sweets, this is a calorie-free way to indulge your senses

product_name: Creamy Candy Bath BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: YUMMY!
review_text: I usually add salts and bath oil to my baths as well as bubbles to add skin softening properties....but with this bubble bar, I don't have to!!  It's pink, it smells SO good, and the water and bubbles feel so soft against my skin!!  I absolutely LOVE this one~and I have tried many, LUSH brand and others~so much that I got the rock star soap in the matching scent.  I will say, however, that I have found it necessary to keep it in the fridge during the summer months although it arrives solid-I live in Florida so the humidity makes it soften a bit more than I'd like in the cabinet.  Overall?  20 stars!

product_name: Creamy Candy Bath BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: sweet smelling goodness
review_text: I hated to use this bubble bar because it smelled so incredibly delicious!  It is easily divided into two or three chunks for two or three baths.  It does bubble a lot, leaves the bathroom smelling yummy, and leaves my skin very soft and moisturized.  I ended up ordering two more as replacements, I liked it that much.  A worthwhile indulgence to soothe the stress of life away in a tub of candy bubbles

product_name: Pur Minerals 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Makeup: Beauty
title: Great, Consistent Coverage With No Mess
review_text: I just started using Pur Minerals' 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Makeup, and it is a wonderful product. It provides great coverage - even under my eyes, where I have terrible dark circles - and is not as messy as other mineral makeup cosmetics like Bare Essentials. When I used Bare, I used to have to use an additional concealer, too, but not with the Pur Minerals foundation. It was also really easy to find a good color to match my skin tone - and I am Italian, so I have yellow undertones, and it has always been hard for me to find good matching foundations in the past. Best of all, the makeup does not seem to clog my pores. I am not getting as many breakouts as I did in the past, and all I did was switch to Pur Minerals. I highly recommend you try it

product_name: China Glaze Nail Lacquer: Beauty
title: Amazing Colors
review_text: You won't find these unusual nail colors with any other brand of nail polish.  These colors are long-lasting, durable, and offer great shine

product_name: China Glaze Nail Lacquer: Beauty
title: LOVE IT!!!
review_text: I just had my toes done today and picked the color off the wall without giving it a second thought. After I got it on my toes though I just went crazy for it. I had to find the bottle so I could figure out what it was it. It ended up being China Glaze number 71, Sangria. Then my hunt began I went to all the beauty supply shops in my town and no one carried China Glaze. Thank god for Amazon and its vast and every expanding line of products... I can now have a bottle of my own!!! I LOVE THIS STUFF!!

product_name: China Glaze Nail Lacquer: Beauty
title: Excellent product!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review_text: Thanks to Amazon for helping me to find a China Glaze color that I have been searching for.  The service was wonderful!!!  And I received the product within a matter of days--what service!!!!  The product is terrific , great color, long lasting, no chipping, and to top it off a beautiful shine!!! Thanks again I will be using your website more frequently!!!

product_name: China Glaze Nail Lacquer: Beauty
title: China Glaze Nail Lacquer: Shocking Pink Neon
review_text: The person from whom I purchased China Glaze Nail Lacquer in Shocking Pink Neon packaged my product safely and beautifully.  She even gave me a free, sample sized lotion.  My purchasing experience was very pleasurable, and I would gladly do business with this person again.  The polish application is a bit streaky, but this probably has to do with the manufacturer and not the seller

product_name: China Glaze Nail Lacquer: Beauty
title: good polish
review_text: good polish just didnt think the color matched up great with the polish i received. at any rate its good polish that lasts a whil

product_name: Bare Escentuals Tutorials - Lesson 1: Smoky Eye: Beauty
title: Was leary, but glad I bought!
review_text: I am a fair skinned strawberry blond and was worried about the smokey eye look being too dark on me.  But this kit is great!  You can apply it with a heavy hand or lighter hand and get different effects.  The colors are great and would be great on any skin tone.  BE really did a nice job putting this together

product_name: Bare Escentuals Tutorials - Lesson 1: Smoky Eye: Beauty
title: finally a real smokey eye kit i can use!
review_text: Bare Escentuals created the best smokey eye kit i've ever seen!! i love the colors in this kit and the brush is wonderful for eye makeup application of any kind

product_name: Ocean Salt Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great facial scrub .....
review_text: The Ocean Salt Scrub by Lush is one of the finest products I've ever used.  It has a wonderful scent and leaves my skin feeling fresh, smooth, and very clean!  It is a product that I won't do without in the future

product_name: Ocean Salt Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Vodka? Who would have thought...
review_text:
If at first you don't succeed...play around until you get a better result- different approaches seem to work for individual Lush users.  Like most Lush products, Ocean Salt Scrub may take a little getting used to (and may behave differently depending on what type of water you have) but it is lots of fun to play with and delivers a good result.  Probably not for people who want a streamlined beauty routine that can be accomplished fast, but if you like to play... The scrub smells and looks amazing and the vodka/citrus combination definitely helps dry up blemishes.  I have sensitive skin and this has been helpful with once a week usage- any more than that and my skin gets tight and irritated and begins to flake.

One final note of caution: this scrub is serious when it says 'salt', so don't use it on or near broken skin.  Bath & Body Works started using sugar in their scrubs for this reason, but salt has a great effect on clearing up problem skin and tends to help where things aren't seriously broken

product_name: Ocean Salt Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Absolutely invigorating!
review_text: This has to be the most invigorating facial/skin product I have ever purchased.  It's gentle enough to use on your face and will leave it polished and smooth (note: use only once a week if you have dry skin!).  If you've had a long day at work, or have been at the mall X-mas shopping all day, grab the ocean salt scrub.  Rub it all over your feet for an instant foot massage and don't forget to rub your hands, as well!  You will soon decide this is another Lush product you cannot live without..

product_name: Ocean Salt Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: I'm such a Lushie...
review_text:
Love, love, love the Ocean Salt. I have very, very dry skin, actually I have psoriasis. I use this to exfoliate my rough patches on my knees and elbows (haven't tried on my face as a cleanser), and it works great at removing all my dead skin. I then moisturize with Dream Cream (another wonderful Lush product) and these 2 products alone help keep my psoriasis under control without using my prescribed lotions.

If you are contemplating purchasing any Lush product, I say go for it. I have been a Lushie for about 3-4 years now (since my trip to the UK), and I have very rarely been disappointed in their products. Be aware that all internet purchases for Lush are shipped from their manufacturing facility in Vancouver, so unless you are willing to pay a bit for expedited shipping, expect a long wait time for delivery.

PS: And, no, I do not work for Lush, I just love their products and their business ethics

product_name: Ocean Salt Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: A great product!!!
review_text: I have been using Ocean Salt for years and have had to start purchasing it in a larger size, as it provides a great all over exfoliating experience.  I have tried similar products for my face, and nothing compares to the way my skin looks and feels after using it.

product_name: philosophy shear splendor weekly hair marinade: Beauty
title: really works!
review_text: This is a great product to restore dry brittle hair.  Unlike a silicone that coats hair this oil restores moisture. give it a try, you have nothing to lose except dry frizzy hair

product_name: Shiseido Pureness Gentle Cleansing Sheets 30 Sheets: Beauty
title: I love this!  Smells great! Works awesome!
reviewer: Tina Leonard "Multi-published Waldenbooks and Bookscan bestselling author"
review_text: If you're in a hurry--or you're like me and you tend to fall asleep before you take your makeup off--keep these by the bed!  They're so wonderful and soothing, not too dry/wet, and not thin.  Makes you look forward to your new nighttime routine!  Clean skin--fast

product_name: Bourjois Lengthening & Curving Mascara: Beauty
title: love, Love, LOVE it!
review_text:
I tried this mascara a loonngg time ago at Macy*s and remembered it making my eyes really pop.  So after seeing it at Sephora I just had to buy it and test out my memory.  OMG it's just like how I remember it! With just a couple strokes of the wand my lashes are *instantly* lengthened and curled -- it's wonderful! Especially since I have STICK-STRAIGHT lashes that you can't even see unless I have mascara on (it's so irritating -_-;;).  

I think my favorite part about this mascara is that not only do you see my lashes but you see my whole eyes! They really pop with this mascara on, which is quite relieving considering I was told that it wouldn't help me unless I curled my lashes beforehand with an eyelash curler.  I'm sure pre-curling would instensify my look, but I honestly don't think it's necessary.  Besides, I like how natural my lashes look with this mascara on -- it really tricks you into believing that you were born with naturally beautiful lashes... it's so subtle yet defined!

I would HIGHLY recommend this mascara to any girl who needs an "uplift" with their lashes

product_name: Mask of Magnaminty Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Deep Cleansing Green Clay Type Mask/Scrub
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
Most masks made with clay seem to dry out so fast you hardly have time to put them on your face before you need to wash them off. They also only seem to serve one purpose, drying out your skin or removing oil. There are some that leave your face feeling nourished and this is one of the healing clay masks. I have sensitive skin with a tendancy towards being either dry or oily - guess it is that lovely combination skin problem. So, this mask seems to deal with both issues at once - removing dry skin and deeply cleansing the pores. 

Mask of Magnaminty is made with Bentonite, water, kaolin, honey, Phaseolus Angularis Seed powder, Evening Primrose seeds, peppermint oil, flower extracts, vanilla fruit extract and a chlorphyllin-Copper complex. 

This is fun to use in the bath or in the shower while you are shaving. Put it on for a few minutes, let it dry slightly and then rub off dead skin cells. The seeds provide the exfoliating power. 

Almost immediately upon looking in the mirror after leaving the tub, I could tell this mask had healing powers. Along with Dreamwash, my skin looked especially cleansed and calmed. I can recommend both to you if you have a need for skin brightening and calming. These two products seemed to work well together to create a radiant complexion. You may also want to try Prince Shaving Cream and the Dream On bath bomb. The Figs and Leaves soap is also very moisturizing. 

~The Rebecca Review 

P.S. If you can find someone to rub this all over your back, 
it feels so good and is easy to wash off by yourself later (unlike some clay masks I've tried).

product_name: Mask of Magnaminty Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: One of my favourite Lush products
review_text: I can't get over how amazing this mask is! It smells wonderful (like mint chocolate chip) and it feels wonderful on my skin

product_name: Mask of Magnaminty Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Perfect Mask (for my normal-sensitive skin)
review_text: I got this for Christmas and waited a whole 20 minutes before I indulged!  Split seconds after I began the application, my skin felt energized, my pores were singing Magnaminty praises.  Aside from the incredible feel of having this mask on, what I loved the most was it's dual personality - its an exfoliating scrub as you wash it off.  I use a variety of masks on a weekly basis and sometimes they are too strong on my skin.  Some feel like they are sucking the life out of my pores, others are very irritating, I can hardly wait for them to dry before washing off.  This mask is an all around great rejuvenator!  I would definetly buy again

product_name: Mask of Magnaminty Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Super good cleanser and exfoliator... Love it!!   :)
review_text:
I bought this Lush product due to the high reviews by other Lushies and couldn't wait to get home to try it.  

When I opened the pot, the first thing I noticed was the color - it is a little turn-offish, but don't let that stop you from slathering your entire face with it.  The smell is amazing and not too minty or strong.  Like the previous review said below, it smells like mint chocolate chip ice cream.  I put the mask all over my face (you can put it on your neck and back as well), lie down for 15 minutes to get the full spa feel, then wash it off in the shower with warm water.  I find it is much easier in the shower because when the mask dries, it takes some rubbing to get it off.

When the mask is on, your face tingles from the mint and feels so refreshing!  When the mask is rinsed off, your skin feels even better.  Great cleanser and exfoliator in one!

Be sure to keep an eye out on the 'Best by' date because this only has a shelf life of 4 months

product_name: Mask of Magnaminty Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Fun stuff
review_text: I loved this stuff- it was nice and cool and minty.  My face felt tingly and clean afterwards and the stuff smelled great.  It didn't seem to overly dry my skin.  I loved it and I would buy this again.  It really wasn't around long enough to worry about it's 4 month shelf life.

product_name: Pumice Smoother with Handle: Beauty
title: Works well
review_text: This smoother works better than I'd hoped.  My only complaint is that the handle isn't the most comfortable to hold when you really have to rub hard on a callous

product_name: Lovely by Sarah Jessica Parker for Women 1.7 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Love it  !
review_text: Its refreshing , and its not over powering. I love it.. I bought it for my friend for her birthday and we both usually wear gucci rush... but I wanted something different and this is perfect. Its light and it stays with you all day with just a spray or two.. and its enjoyable for those around you too.. After buying my friend a bottle I went and got myself one and have gotten nothing but compliments... This is a must have !

product_name: Lovely by Sarah Jessica Parker for Women 1.7 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Review: Lovely
review_text: "Lovely" by Sarah Jessica Parker is hot right now and comes in a beautiful pastel pink bottle.  The scent is flowery, fruity, light and delicious.  The only downside is that the scent doesn't last!  It smells great when you apply it, but is almost completely gone after a few hours.  A great buy for young and old who don't mind reapplying every few hours:-

product_name: philosophy blackberry shampoo, shower gel, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: Blackberry heaven!
reviewer: Kimberly A. Hicks "Cricket on the Hearth"
review_text: I love this shower gel, and coming from me, that is high praise, since I do not LOVE to shower, and am especially crabby when this activity must be done in the morning.  You see, I much prefer to languish in a warm bath, letting the bubbles do the work of getting clean for me, and instead devoting my energy to a good book.  Yet when I'm standing in the shower, enveloped in clouds of delicious blackberry steam, I am miraculously transformed from a crabby morning shower girl into a very happy girl who then goes about her merry way and walks up to friends at work offering an arm and encouraging them to "smell me". Lovely!!

product_name: philosophy blackberry shampoo, shower gel, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: Delicious!
review_text: I was expecting it to smell like blackberry jam but it smells like ripe, fresh crushed blackberries! I love it, it's sweet, juicy, just very mouth watering. Of course it's a great shampoo, I have fine hair and I don't have to use conditioner everyday. It doesn't weigh my hair down or make it frizzy. Great stuff!

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Glossing Cream with Pure Olive Oil: Beauty
title: A HOUSECALL FOR HAIR
review_text:
Southwest sun can take its baking toll on hair unless you're wise and usually wear a hat. (I'm not wise and I don't really care for hats. Every once in a while there's an errant breeze during the summer months, and it feels good touching and lifting your hair) Now, I've accepted the blame for often dry lackadaisical locks, what's the solution? 

For me, Fekkai's Glossing Cream with its addition of pure olive oil delivers shine, hydration and manageability. It comes in the trademark Fekkai tube (easy to squeeze with wet hands). 

Since my hair is fine and fly-away it works best for me if I rub a small amount between my palms on towel dried hair and stroke through. Then I repeat the process after blow drying and before styling. 

It's incredibly light yet effective. Fekkai is simply the finest

product_name: L'Occitane Shea 24 Hours Ultra Rich Face Cream 1.7oz: Beauty
title: GREAT PRODUCT
review_text: IT GIVES CREME DE LA MER SOME COMPETITION AT A FRACTION OF THE COST

product_name: Chanel Inimitable Multi-Dimentionnel Mascara: Beauty
title: Love this mascara
review_text: I was given a sample at the Chanel counter at Macy's - this is by far the best mascara I've ever used.  This one goes on like a dream and my lashes actually look like they should be in a magazine ad

product_name: Chanel Inimitable Multi-Dimentionnel Mascara: Beauty
title: Love it!
review_text: I have sinsitive eyes and this stuff doesn't bother me at all.  I even got through an eye exam without any tearing or smudging.  I havn't worm mascara for a few years because everything else available irritated my eyes.  This stuff is great and well worth the price

product_name: Clinique Liquid Facial Soap: Beauty
title: Squeaky Clean
review_text: I use this cleanser in the morning as a primer for other cosmetics.  At night I use the rinse off foaming cleanser, followed by the liquid mild facial soap, clarifying lotion 2, and Dramatically different lotion.  This soap works very well, delivering a very clean, open pore feeling.  It doesn't take mascara off that well, but that's why I use the rinse off foaming cleaser at night first!  Very good all purpose cleanser

product_name: Sephora Double-Ended Blemish Extractor: Beauty
title: A good tool for extracting blemishes.
review_text: You use it by putting the little metal loop around the blemish, then sort of gently pushing and raking it in one direction. Good for extracting white-heads or soon-to-be white heads. If I were to buy it all over again, I'd probably go for the one with the "lance" or little pin at one end instead of the blackhead extractor, sine that side is fairly useless

product_name: DuWop Lip Venom 2nd Sin: Beauty
title: It worked for me...
review_text: The first time I put this on, I noticed that the texture was a little thinner than regular Lip Venom.  The flavor is more... I don't know... medicinal I guess. The tingle of the "Maxi-lip" is nice, and it lasts quite awhile.  I put it on a few times the day I got it and was slightly disappointed that I didn't see or feel a difference -- until I woke up the next morning.  There was a noticeable difference in my upper lip and cupid's bow.  I still prefer Lip Venom over 2nd Sin as far as flavor and texture, but this works

product_name: Burt's Bees Queen Bee Kit: Beauty
title: Pampering
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
"Cleopatra, renowned for her beauty, bathed in milk and almonds to keep her skin silky smooth and well nourished. Modern day goddesses can also enjoy the relaxing and cosmetic benefits of herbal bathing, a simple ritual almost forgotten in these tense and hurried times." ~Burt's Bees Herbal Milk Bath

The hand woven Abaca bag creates a little mystery because you can't quite see all the treats in the bag. What you will find when you open this luxurious Burt's Bees sampler bag is the following surprises: 

A Lavender Mask - Blocks out all the light so you can relax. A delicate and very natural lavender fragrance is subtly relaxing and not overpowering. The silk is quite luxurious and this is a comforting item that will last for years. 

Burt's Bees Pore Refining Mask - Ingredients (they have changed the ingredients to make it work even better than before): French green clay, bentonite, fragrance, peppermint leaf, shavegrass herb, calendula, rosemary leaf and sage. This mask is a lovely avocado green and will make you feel more calm. I loved how the powder can also be mixed with my favorite moisture mask or with natural ingredients for variety. 
I've rarely seen a product clean pores this well. You can simply pour some of the green powder into your hand and mix in a little water. After applying, let dry and then rinse. 

Burt's Bees Royal Jelly Eye Crme - A rich eye crme that is more like the consistency of a salve. You may be tempted to use this on hands and feet for a little healing luxury. The ingredients are delicious and include apricot kernel oil, aloe, grapefruit extract, royal jelly and vitamin E. Tempting to use as a lip gloss. 

Burt's Bees Moisturizing Herbal Milk Bath - If you were addicted to the Burt's Bees Baby Buttermilk bath, this is a nice grownup alternative. It contains milk powder, buttermilk powder, lavender oil, eucalyptus oil, rosemary oil and peppermint oil. Very relaxing and you may find yourself reading a little longer as you soak away your cares. You may notice your skin being especially healed and moisturized. 

Burt's Bees Calm Balm - A yummy lemon balm made from sweet almond oil, olive oil, beeswax, lemon oil, vitamin E, comfrey root extract, rosemary leaf, lavender, lemongrass oil and lemon verbena. You may start to imagine you are very close to a lemon meringue pie and wonder if you should probably make one. A delicious relaxing scent of lemony bliss. 

Burt's Bees Calming Candle - The tiny candle in this kit is super relaxing and can take you from stressed out to especially calm in a matter of minutes. I tried this candle when I was stressed and it definitely works. Would be a wonderful item to take with you when traveling as it has a lid. 

Burt's Bees Repair Serum - This product supports skin repair and renewal and works to reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Borage and Evening Primrose oils help to promote healthy skin. The oils absorb quickly and soothe and heal the skin. Ingredients: Rosehip seed oil, jojoba oil, lavender oil, vitamin E, evening primrose oil, borage seed oil, wheat germ oil, hazelnut oil, neroli oil, rose oil, calendula extract, green tea extract, beta carotene, tocopherol, vitamin C, vitamin A.

Burt's Bees Shea Butter Hand Repair Crme - A luxurious blend of shea butter and cocoa butter, not to mention lavender, calendula, rose oil and rosemary. Not only will this heal and soothe your skin, it is emotionally calming and beautifully scented. 

As a gift, this is filled with healing ingredients that will create a very memorable experience. If you want to sample some of the best of Burt's Bees, it is also an ideal introduction to the world of natural skincare. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: ZIRH ANTI-AGING KIT: Beauty
title: ZIRH Is My Favorite Skin Care Line!
review_text: I've been using ZIRH for 3 years and I get a lot of compliments on my skin.  Most guys will think the product is a little pricey compared to drug store brands but it's worth it

product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Original: Beauty
title: Fabulous product
review_text:
I have used this product daily since 1984 and it is worth every cent.  Do not, however, mistake this for a moisturizer.  That it is not.  But it seems to seal in the moisture on your face, and creates a smooth surface for the moisturizer to stay on.

I was told it was not recommended for the eye region, however that's where I use it regularly, and I have a minimum of fine lines & crows feet for my age.

Use it drop by drop.  A little goes a long way!  Follow with a good moisturizer

product_name: Kai Perfume Oil: Beauty
title: Iinstantly transports you to your own tropical paradise
review_text: This is a great sexy, intoxicating blend of gardenia mingled with white exotics.  It's lush and heady.  Whenever I wear this people always ask what I'm wearing.  The only downside is it's expensive for such a tiny bottle, 1/8oz (way small), but a little goes a long way. I've tried a few dupes for much less.  Haute Tub makes one that's almost spot on for about half the price

product_name: Kai Perfume Oil: Beauty
title: Kai Perfume Oil is the best fragrance!!
review_text: I purchased Kai Perfume Oil and the Body Lotion through b-glowing.com and I was pleasantly surprised that my items arrived so quickly!  The floral scent is soft and feminine -- great for day/evening wear.  Also, the roll-on is a perfect size especially for small purses

product_name: Kai Perfume Oil: Beauty
title: Gorgeous, gorgeous gorgeous
review_text:
Does that sum it up for you?

How about the fact that it's small enough to tote anywhere.  Or the fact that EVERYONE asks what that beautiful smell is.

It's soft and delicious and lasts all day

product_name: Phyto Phytophanere Dietary Supplement - Hair & Nails: Beauty
title: Your hair is your beatuie
reviewer: C. Ingram "Your hair is your beautie"
review_text: Hello! I am an African American female,in my mid 30"s and I have never experence anything like this product before. About 3 months ago my stylist talked me into bleaching my whole head instead of just the striks that I usually get. What a terrible experence!!!!!!!!!! My hair started to fall out on top ( from the end of the crown to the very front of my head) and on one side towards the front. Mind you I had very long shoulder length black hair that was very much health. If I have learned anything as a women is that your hair is your beautie. Since then I was looking throuth the Essence Mag. and notice this product at the time. I order me a bottle and have been taking this product for about a month now. I have notice much change in my hair the growth, the breakage and shedding of my hair is gone. I love this product and would recommended to anyone one who ask

product_name: Phyto Phytophanere Dietary Supplement - Hair & Nails: Beauty
title: Works great!
review_text: I am a white female in early 30s with long straight hair. I had a lot of stress over the last year and my hair was shedding like crazy, reducing in volume by half and thinning especially on the top of the head. I have been using this product for about one month now and the hair loss almost stopped! Nothing else helped before. I will definitely keep taking the product. I am using it together with the Phyto lotion on the top of my head. The overall result is very promising

product_name: Phyto Phytophanere Dietary Supplement - Hair & Nails: Beauty
title: Great vitamins!
review_text: These vitamins are great for healthy hair. I've been taking them for nearly a year and have experienced tremendous results. My hair is shiny and grows pretty quickly. After growing out my relaxer over three years ago, I resorted to a press and haven't regretted it. With my bi-weekly maintenance and phyto vitamins, my hair is more beautiful than ever

product_name: Phyto Phytophanere Dietary Supplement - Hair & Nails: Beauty
title: Longer Hair
review_text: I am a black female mid 30's and noticed that my hair was thinning in the top. I ordered these and after the 1st month I was amazed at the growth. Even friends noticed the length and smooth texture after 1 month. I will be getting a second bottle soon. I hope the growth will continue as it did during the 1st few months

product_name: Phyto Phytophanere Dietary Supplement - Hair & Nails: Beauty
title: Really helped my hair grow!!!
review_text: I have been taking these vitamins for two months and already my hair has grown more than three inches!!! I can't wait to get started on my new bottle. Highly reccommended

product_name: DKNY Red Delicious Women: Beauty
title: Wonderully smelling perfume!
review_text: I had only smelled this perfume in magazine samples, but loved it then.  So I decided to order it.  It was so worth it.  It is one of the best perfumes I have ever smelled.  Very fruity and everyone compliments me on how I smell.  If you like fruity/floral, this is perfect for you

product_name: DKNY Red Delicious Women: Beauty
title: Love It
review_text: fast service, it came in a sephora box and a red sephora gift satchel. it really smells like a fresh red apple more than anything else. i put it on and went to work in the restaraunt i work in and the smell lasted all through my shift. great product

product_name: philosophy the present skin perfector: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text: I like this skin perfector. It works well on my skin and keeps the moisture locked in all day.  I would buy again

product_name: philosophy the present skin perfector: Beauty
title: Fabulous
review_text:
I have moderate acne (sometimes severe, depending on the day!), and this stuff is great.  After I wash my face and put on my lotion, I put this all over my face (all you need is a little more than a pea, maybe about the amt of toothpaste you'd use).  The key is to WAIT 2 MINUTES!  The first time I used it, I didn't wait, plus I think I used too much, and my makeup went on cakey and wouldn't spread.  So now, after I put it on, I put on my eye makeup while I'm waiting.  Also, I used to use Neutrogena liquid foundation (as I need GOOD coverage), but I didn't have much luck with liquid foundation over The Present, even after waiting 2 minutes.  I bought Philosophy's The Supernatural powder foundation, and it goes over The Present soooo well.  I didn't think a powder foundation would cover my acne well enough, but it does!  Both products together are a little pricey for me, but since I use them EVERY day, it's worth it.
Oh and I have very sensitive skin, hence all the breakouts, but The Present doesn't affect me.
The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I never tried another primer, and there may be something better out there, but I'm in no rush to search.  The Present works well for me

product_name: philosophy the present skin perfector: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text: I have acne prone skin and I hate wearing foundation.  This product makes that possible.  Your skin looks great and you don't have that heavy "made-up" look.  I recommend this for everyone

product_name: philosophy the present skin perfector: Beauty
title: The One and Only
review_text: The Present is in a class by itself!  I have never seen a facial product do more!  After applying sunscreen and/or moisturizer, apply The Present.  This product will make your foundation (preferably philosophy airbrush canvas) go on smoothly, and makes it adhere to your skin.  Your skin is smoothed out filling in lines and wrinkles, as well as large pores.  It is just the greatest product ever. Sharon Perkins, Cordele, G

product_name: philosophy the present skin perfector: Beauty
title: Porcelain Smooth
review_text:
I've used this product for about a year and couldn't be happier.  I am not a 'makeup person' and this product is just what I need to smooth out my complexion AND moisturize my oily skin.  Fine lines and large pores appear less noticable, skin remains shine-free, skin tone appears more even and skin feels softer.

One recommendation.....the directions tell you to wait 2 minutes to allow the product to 'set'.  To get the best finish, especially if applying powder (like I do) or foundation over the primer, you need to wait the full 2 minutes.  This can't be stressed enough.

product_name: philosophy the present skin perfector: Beauty
title: Perfect makeup base
review_text:
I've been using this product for a couple of years, and I can't imagine ever being without it.  The first time I put it on, however, I used too much and my Chanel foundation refused to spread - it just sat as a blotch on my face.  I took "the present" back to the makeup counter where they told me to use an amount equal to the size of half of a pea - for my ENTIRE face!  I was doubtful, but spreading it super-thin worked, plus each bottle lasts a long, long time.

Here are my favorite things about this product:
-Foundation glides on supersmooth
-Fine wrinkles are less visible
-Makeup stays put all day long
-Keeps oily skin shine-free
-Works great as an eyeshadow base to keep it from creasing
-Makes skin feel soft

The one downside is if I don't wash my face at night, I break out, probably because it really is like a "sealant" for your face.  Other than that, I love it, and will probably never switch to another base.

product_name: philosophy the present skin perfector: Beauty
title: great skin perfector
review_text: This product is amazing.  I use it under my eyes and on my cheeks where I have enlarged pores then wait 2 minutes and apply makeup and lines and pores are gone.  It makes makeup last longer too.  My daughter breaks out every once in a while and if she has something important then we put this stuff on over the pimple then apply makeup.  It makes a huge difference and again, it helps the coverage to last longer.

product_name: Aquis Adventure Microfiber Towels - Large 19x39: Beauty
title: A Variety of Uses
review_text: Whether you need a great towel for you, your dog, or your sailboat, this one will serve your purposes perfectly.  It dries quickly without that moldy smell

product_name: philosophy amazing grace fragrance: Beauty
title: Awesome perfume!!
review_text: I just got this today and I immediately put it on.  I absolutely love it!  I have at least 20 different perfumes, all of which I loved at one time, but I could actually see myself wearing this one all the time.  Usually I will not wear a perfume more than once a week, but I think I have just changed my ways!  It is the best

product_name: philosophy amazing grace fragrance: Beauty
title: LOVE it!
review_text: Well as you can tell from previous reviews, not every scent is for everyone, but philosophy Grace is definitely for me!!  I love this scent.  I got the Grace trio as a gift last Christmas and I'm hooked.  Amazing grace is my personal favorite, I like baby grace but it does smell babyish, and pure grace is too 'soap and water' for me to wear by itself.  But I like to layer it with the other graces and mix it up a bit.  After I'd been wearing this scent for a few months I tried to wear another one of my perfumes, and I as soon as I put it on I felt like I needed to take a shower. I realized how overpowering other perfumes can be, and now I'm spoiled, I'm definitely a philosophy girl!  I also highly recommend the shower gel and lotion, helps the scent stay a little bit longer

product_name: Marie Belle Aztec Hot Chocolate - Dark 10 oz.: Beauty
title: What a wonderful gift...
review_text:
I recieved this as a christmas gift from my mother. I don't generally like to try or experiment with new chocolates as I am very picky about taste and texture. But as my mom gave this to me and raved about its taste so I thought I'd give it a try. I am so glad that I did!! 
At first I had an issue with the texture but I discovered that if you melt it in a couple of tablespoons of very hot water, then add the rest of the rest of the boiling water (or heated milk if you prefer)it makes the texture smooth and delicious!! I have even made the pudding and it came out fabulous! 
This hot chocolate is definately worth a try!

product_name: Marie Belle Aztec Hot Chocolate - Dark 10 oz.: Beauty
title: If you like dark chocolate you'll love this...
review_text:
If you like dark chocolate you will love this cocoa.  It is rich and smooth and a real treat.  The pudding receipe is also yummy!  
The dark is not tart like some dark chocolates.  I have to say I now prefer this over the Marie Belle Regular Hot Chocolate and will continue to order it from Amazon b/c with shipping it is cheaper than direct from Marie Belle Site.

product_name: Vincent Longo Liquid Canvas Healthy Fluid Foundation: Beauty
title: I adore this foundation!
reviewer: Tina Leonard "Multi-published Waldenbooks and Bookscan bestselling author"
review_text:
I bought this foundation in Light Beige.  After trying on every single foundatin in Sephora, I asked the sales assistant for something that would match my skin tone, look natural, and not be cakey.

She suggested this, and for forty-five dollars, I was leery.  It was a dewy finish, she said (dewy didn't interest me), and it didn't have a lot of pink in it.

I let her try it on me, but I have bought so many foundations over the years where I get home and it either doesn't look the same as it did in the store or I don't apply it the way they do in the store.

This makeup was different.  Very nice for my dry skin, the dewiness of which the sales assistant spoke actually doesn't leave a shiny, greasy finish.  The foundation goes on naturally, evening out my skintone and making my skin feel soft.  I love this makeup.  I'm just so glad I accidentally found it

product_name: I Love Juicy Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: Say goodbye to hairspray buildup...
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
Dear Gail (see frisky review): 

I have a secret to tell you. I tried the shampoo you recommended, but don't tell anyone else because if the word gets out on this one, there won't be any shampoo left for the two of us. The lemon oil really did make my hair feel frisky and with the papaya juice, not a single strand felt the weight of hairspray buildup. Thank you for showing the way to silky clean hair. I felt like a kid again who was running around in a lemon orchard, my hair loves this shampoo. As an added bonus, it also lightened my Lush henna experience, just slightly, so now I have the perfect hair color. 

Smiles,
Rebecca 

~The Rebecca Review

P.S. 
Try the Veganese conditioner with this shampoo because it also has a lemony scent and seems to be a nice lightweight conditioner. 

P.S. II 
While you are doing the citrus thing in the shower, why not try the Happy Hippy body gel with grapefruit too. I think it really does balance your aura. I feel cleansed.

product_name: I Love Juicy Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: Pretty good stuff
review_text:
My favorite thing about I Love Juicy shampoo is how little is needed to do the job. A dime's worth fabulously lathers my long hair. This would be great to travel with. 

I also found it cleans my oily hair exceptionally well. It smells good to boot. The scent, to me, is like grapefruit candy -- almost, but not quite, too fruity for my liking. 

I'm ordering more

product_name: I Love Juicy Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: Smells OUTRAGEOUS!!
review_text:
The thing I like the best is the awesome fresh fruit smell. Not overpowering at all and not tacky like department-store brands. Actually smells like yummy fruits blended together. Not to mention that my hair looks amazing after.

The only thing I don't like: I Love Juicy smells so great, I never want to use any conditioner in my hair after because I want the smell of the shampoo, however I NEED to use conditioner on my hair. I found that using American Cream conditioner makes you smell like a delicous fruit smoothie! YUMMY

product_name: I Love Juicy Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: I LOVE JUICY ! JUICY ME LONG TIME!!
review_text: Smells like tart fruit.My hair smelled like sweet fruit juice  until my next washing. If I wasn't trying so many different smelling shampoos, this would be a rebuy

product_name: Sephora Indulgences - Chocolate Body Glosser: Beauty
title: Nice Luxury
review_text: I got this product today and I put it on right away. I have had it on for a little over 5 hours and it stills smells after my workout. It is very subtle but it made my skin feel silky with a touch of shimmer. I do know that your body chemistry has a lot to do with how long it will last so it's not the same for everyone. It's just a nice product to carry in your purse for a little shimmer and glow oh and a wonderful smell of chocolate. It made me hungry though

product_name: Sephora Indulgences - Chocolate Body Glosser: Beauty
title: Not bad at all
review_text: I was very excited when this product arrived. I immediately opened it and put it on. It smells really nice and it has a very cute shimmer. I will definetly put this on while I am wearing a skirt or a low cut shirt. And the size of this is not bad either. Should last me a while. The only this that I did not like was the amount of shipping I had to pay ($5.95) but it's definetly worth it.

product_name: Sephora Indulgences - Chocolate Body Glosser: Beauty
title: yummy!!!!!!
review_text: this is hands down my new favorite body indulgence product. smells delightful, just like yummy chocolate, has vitamins to condition your skin, in a convenient roll-on form, easy to travel with, & leaves your skin with just the right amount of golden glow to it. not tacky or over the top, but not noticeable either, just perfect, also arrived on time & the very best, it doesn't leave skin sticky at all!!!!!!!!

product_name: Sephora Indulgences - Chocolate Body Glosser: Beauty
title: neat..chocolate+light shimmer
review_text: chocolate smell..light shimmer..just like a deodarant but u can just rub it over ur arms n legs n it shimmers,moisturizes,and smells good...good price..i like it :

product_name: Sephora Indulgences - Chocolate Body Glosser: Beauty
title: Smells Delicious!
review_text: The Chocolate Body Glosser goes on smooth and is long lasting.  The chocolate fragrance is something you can enjoy for the whole day.  It has a subtle shimmer that's great in the summer and gives a nice warm appeal to a cold winter's day

product_name: Sephora Indulgences - Chocolate Body Glosser: Beauty
title: the best looking skin i have ever had!
review_text: this product is so satiny smooth and gives my skin a rich, moisturized feeling. it goes on slick and cool, and my skin soaks it up. i love the light cocoa butter scent and slight sparkle and the glow my skin has. I LOVE THIS STUFF!

product_name: Tommy Girl by Tommy Hilfiger for Women 2 Piece Set Includes: 3.4 oz Cologne Spray + 3.4 oz Perfumed Body Lotion: Beauty
title: Ceraintly not too little, but a little too late
review_text:
Product was in tip-top shape, and is itself a wonderful fragrance, but I ordered in hopes of getting it here by a certain date and it did not arrive by the time I had hoped.  The gift-wrap was very lackluster and could have been MUCH better.

Good product, bad delivery

product_name: Bobbi Brown Creamy Concealer Sand: Beauty
title: Creamy and Good For A little coverage
review_text: I bought this after reading an interview with Ms. Brown where she said this one of the pieces of makeup she considered indispensable for herself. She uses it for a bit of coverage on her cheeks or where needed instead of full foundation. So, I got it in Sand and used it on my cheeks, nose and chin, feathering it out to blend with my skin. Sometimes I'm a bit ruddy in those areas and this provided a bit more coverage than my usual tinted moisturizer. I like it and will use it

product_name: Zoya Armor: Beauty
title: great!
review_text: This is new for me.  I have been trying to switch all of my nail products to Zoya due to the formadahyde free formulas.  So far so good

product_name: philosophy the fragrance eau de parfum: Beauty
title: PERFECT FRAGRANCE
review_text: I HAVE ONE WORD TO DESCRIBE THIS FRAGRANCE: WOW--IN MY 40 YEARS, THIS IS THE FIRST FRAGRANCE I KNEW FROM THE FIRST SMELL WAS PERFECT FOR ME..I LOVE IT...IT MAKES ME SMILE ALL DAY LONG

product_name: philosophy the fragrance eau de parfum: Beauty
title: uplifting and simply inspiring
review_text: we received a sample of philosophy's newest fragrance and it is absolutely uplifting and inspiring! they are correct, no words can describe this fresh, clean and mood enhancing scent, that truly will make your soul sing. you'll just have to experience this spectacular, wonderfully, intoxicating fragrance for yourself. this warm, energizing scent will put a happy smile on your face! a ray of sunshine in a bottle. try it. also, this unique fragrance can be worn by both men and woman and becomes your own personal scent

product_name: philosophy pure grace fragrance: Beauty
title: Perfect Light Scent
review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance. It smells so light and clean! I'm not usually much for perfume but when I smelled this I loved it. It really does smell like the best soap and water combination. Its a light fragrance but you dont get the strong alcohol smell like you get with other light fragrances. A really great spring and summer perfum

product_name: philosophy pure grace fragrance: Beauty
title: love it!
review_text: This is my absolute favorite.  It stays with you all day.  I will reorder this fragrance over and over

product_name: philosophy pure grace fragrance: Beauty
title: A Blessing!
review_text: I love the fragrance!  I purchase it every time I run low.  It is clean, soft, and graceful.  Not overpowering and when layered with the same lotion the scent lasts even longer.  Thank you, Philosophy

product_name: philosophy pure grace fragrance: Beauty
title: Great office perfume
review_text: This is one of my standby perfumes for the office.  It has a nice, soft, fresh scent that does not overwhelm small spaces or offend anyone.  It smells as good at the end of the day as it does first thing in the morning.  I really recommend this one

product_name: philosophy pure grace fragrance: Beauty
title: Absolutely beautiful!!
review_text: I'm a little leary of buying a fragrance online, but after reading the many rave reviews of Pure Grace, I thought I'd try it. I was NOT disappointed! This fragrance truly does smell like soap & water - you really do have a clean, fresh scent after putting it on. I layered it, so it would last longer, and that would be my one & only complaint - the spray alone does not last very long. But, it's worth it, though. It's a wonderful fragrance

product_name: The Body Shop Cocoa Butter Hand & Body Lotion: Beauty
title: The World's Best Body Lotion!
review_text: This is the best lotion ever.  It absorbs and moisturizes for a long time.  It contains plenty of cocoa butter.  It is made by the Body Shop so it is never tested on animals.  The fragrance is pretty neutral which is great if you don't want to smell like perfume-y lotion, or if you want to wear a different fragrance.  One of the best products on the market.  The Body Shop even included a free gift

product_name: Coalface Natural Facial Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: This soap has completely changed my skin!
review_text: I am COMPLETELY hooked on this face soap-as a matter of fact, I have another bar coming to me in another Lush shipment soon!  Before I had EXTREMELY oily skin-the kind of skin that needed washed multiple times a day in the summertime, but since I've started using this I can go all day and my skin still feels awesome and isn't the least bit grimy or shiny.  It works as an AWESOME exfoliator and, though previous review state that it's harsh, I haven't had any problems with it at all.  My biggest issue with this is that the smell reminds me of a "machine" shop...very "motor oil-ish" which made me VERY sceptical to use it at first but now I can't go with it.  Actually I forgot this item at a friend's house for one weekend and had to go back to using my store bought stuff and my skin was SOOOO oily-I got 8 breakouts in just that one weekend!  I will NEVER NEVER use anything else other than this on my skin again!  If the scent bothers you then I have found that some "Sexy Peel" soap will get rid of it if you use it right after you've scrubbed with Coal Face

product_name: Coalface Natural Facial Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: good body wash
review_text: I bought this and fresh farmacy, and I find that this soap works wonders on problem skin for your body. It's not too harsh on my face, but find that it works better on my back after a work out

product_name: Coalface Natural Facial Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great for exfoliating
review_text: My skin is quite oily especially the T-zone area and my face suffers from those pesky small whiteheads around my nose and mouth.  Previously, the only thing that worked for me were regular facials to slough them off.  Not anymore...Within two days of using it, my face is much cleaner and no more visible dirty pores.  I did have to be a bit careful with the drying factor and used it only once a day or every other day.  I don't think this is for everyone but great for those with oily skin.  Ask for a sample if you have a store near you

product_name: Coalface Natural Facial Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great for oily faces
review_text: My husband has very oily skin and this soap is great for him.  It doesn't dry his skin out and leaves his face clean and mosturized.  He also says, "It doesn't smell girly."  It can be messy and leave black bits in the sink, so rinse well and don't use white towels with it.  It is a bit expensive but lasts a very long time.  My skin is combination, and I find the dry spots don't do well wtih this soap, but it really helps with the oily bits.  I use it when I run out of other products, but it isn't my favorite for me

product_name: Coalface Natural Facial Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: I LOVE it!!!
review_text: I got a sample of Coalface with another Lush product that I ordered.  The smell kind of turned me off at first, but I figured I would give it a try.  This is the best facial cleanser that I have ever used!!!  Just five days of using it and my face is more clear than it's been for ages!  I'm also a lot less oily, so my makeup stays on longer.  I will be using this cleanser exclusively

product_name: Aquolina Chocolovers: Beauty
title: I love Aquolina!!
review_text:
I'm in love - Aquolina have done it again!!!

'Chocolovers' is the darker, sexier, naughty but nice sister of the sugary 'Pink Sugar'. Sort of like Dannii Minogue to Kylie.

Not as sweet as 'Pink Sugar', when first applied I got the rich aroma of the lemon and orange, combined with coriander, preventing it from being zesty. I could also smell roasted nuts.

After a few hours the vanilla base comes through and mingles with the hazelnut, with the result being a work colleague commenting on the smell of my hot chocolate (no, I didn't have any).

Enjoy!

product_name: The Body Shop Cocoa Butter Hand & Body Lotion: Beauty
title: The World's Best Body Lotion!
review_text: This is the best lotion ever.  It absorbs and moisturizes for a long time.  It contains plenty of cocoa butter.  It is made by the Body Shop so it is never tested on animals.  The fragrance is pretty neutral which is great if you don't want to smell like perfume-y lotion, or if you want to wear a different fragrance.  One of the best products on the market.  The Body Shop even included a free gift

product_name: Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani for Men 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Wonderful Fragrance
review_text: Light and refreshing. Different from all other colognes I've used before. Discovered this cologne over Christmas and my wife bought it for me for Valentines Day!  Love it and have used it every day since. Although she bought the bigger bottle. I've been a fan of Calvin Klein fragrances but will have to look into more of Armani's now. This is a great change of pace

product_name: Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani for Men 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: A WARM, INVITING FRAGRANCE
review_text:
There's something about Armani!  His fragrances are as stylish and classic as his designs.  Acqua Di Gio is a case in point with its virile, mysterious, intriguing scent.  It's fresh and at the same time sensual.

	Notes include Calabrian bergamot, neroli, and the zest of green tangerine, each warming and giving vitality to the fragrance.

	Mr. Armani has said that the inspiration for this scent came from the shoreline of Pantelleria island, a body of land which lies in the Mediterranean Sea between Sicily and Tunisia.   Pantelleria is one of a kind, a rarity as is Acqua Di Gio

product_name: Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani for Men 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: essential cologne
review_text: okay first of all im not really a kid im 16 years old and while other people my age are trying to impress chicks with Axe and Tag, I am taking the smarter route and using some real stuff. I bought this cologne because everyone I heard about who has this cologne loves it. Yes it may be too popular now for optimal use but it is still one of the best colognes on the market today. When I was checking out Acqua di Gio I didn't think it smelled as good as some of the other colognes and I thought it was too expensive at over 50 dollars, but I bought it anyway. I have not been disappinted at all. Its fragrence is so casual but classy, its so subtle that people who are around go out of their way to smell you and be around you without even realising you're wearing a cologne. The bottle is very good too, its very simplistic and classy which describes the contents to a tee. The bottom line is this is an essential cologne

product_name: Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani for Men 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Very good cologne
review_text: It's one of the best colognes I've ever bought. It smells very good and in my country, it isn't so known. Very few has it. I think that they should publish some real photos of the actual siz

product_name: Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani for Men 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Love it
review_text: I bought this for a birthday gift for my husband. He likes it, and I love it. Expensive perhaps, but worth it. Now I just need to wait for him to finish the bottle of that old stuff he has.

product_name: Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani for Men 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: the best smelling fragrace for men
review_text: As a women this is my favorite cologne on a man.  Awesome scent.

product_name: Prada Intense Deluxe Eau de Parfum: Beauty
title: Best version
review_text: The concentrated version (Prada Intense Deluxe Eau de Parfum)of this perfume is by far the best version as the 2.7 oz refillable version can smell a bit cheap at first and wears off after about 6 hours.  This one smells strong first thing out of the bottle but never cheap, and certainly not overpowering.  This the best option for the money.  Don't be fooled by the picture used by the retailers to differentiate the Intense Delux from the 2.7 oz refillable; the bottle is not actually purple, that's simply the cardborad cover.  The actual bottle is simply a smaller version of the 2.7 oz refillable

product_name: philosophy falling in love body souffle: Beauty
title: Love Love Love It
review_text: Falling in Love by Philosophy is my favorite.  It is so subtle, yet makes you feel so attractive and sexy.  If you're looking for something to give you a boost and make you feel good about yourself, this is it

product_name: philosophy falling in love body souffle: Beauty
title: Love this scent!
review_text: I absolutely love this scent. I originally got the perfume and the 3 in 1 as a gift set and loved it so much I bought the lotion. The scent is a very light sort of cotton candy smell. I have a huge sweet tooth and just love the sweet smells. If you like cotton candy or a sugary smell then you'll love this

product_name: philosophy baby grace perfumed fragrance solid: Beauty
title: Beautiful scent and a great way to refresh during the day
review_text:
I love Baby Grace!!  It's so pretty and mellow and girly.  I usually spray in the AM and I keep this solid in my purse to refresh during the day.

It's long lasting and doesn't stain clothing or make you sticky

product_name: Bourjois Khol & Contour Eyeliner Pencil: Beauty
title: quality liners
review_text: I recommend these eyeliners.  Stong color, stays on as well as any.  Good to smudge if you prefer.  A nice assortment of colors, too

product_name: L'Occitane - Lavender Harvest - Lavender Foam Bath: Beauty
title: HEAVEN in a bottle!
review_text: First off, I'm a lavender snob.  I like it fresh and grow several types in my garden and so friends/family often gift me with lavender products...but it's rare to come across something with a true, full lavender scent like this product.  It's a great bath product and a little goes a long way.  Just love it! It's so sweet to take a big bubble bath and then go to bed in a cloud of lavender...ahh

product_name: Roger & Gallet Signature Mini Guest Soaps - 0.9 oz.: Beauty
title: Luxury for practically nothing
review_text:
This is the ultimate touch when hosting guests at your home. A fresh white hand towel and a new Roger & Gallet soap makes your guest feel so welcome. 

The soaps are French-milled, meaning they are aged and milled under some pressure to make the soap long-lasting. The fragrances are elegant:

Bouquet Imprial  
Extra-Vieille  lemon with orange blossom 
Carnation 
Green Tea 
Lavande Royale  
Ginger  
tea Rose
Fern  
Lily of the Valley 
Magnolia  
Gardenia
