All the fragrances are complex mixes with blends of woods, spices and florals. Keep a dozen on hand for your guest bath (and some brand new white towels; these can be bleached and kept fresh and pretty--colored towels tend to fade, so I use white for my guest towels.

product_name: Clarisonic System Kit: Beauty
title: Great skin care aid
review_text: I've had the Clarisonic brush for one year now and I love it.  My skin feels really clean and looks very smooth.  Because of the price tag I haven't given any as gifts, but I recommend it to everyone.  Customer service has been great the two times I contacted them.  First because my skin broke out the first week I used it.  They offered to take it back, but I persevered and have not had a break out since.  I also thought the brush had stopped holding a charge, and customer service gave me a number to call, but I was mistaken so I never did make the call. I highly recommend this brush

product_name: Clinique Total Turnaround Visible Skin Renewer Cream: Beauty
title: Love, love, love...
review_text: Does my subject line say it all?  I use this product before I use Clinique's Dramatically Different Face Lotion in the morning and it works beautifully.  I can notice a difference in my skin immediately - it looks brighter and smoother.  A definate recommend

product_name: Bobbi Brown Bronzing Powder: Beauty
title: Best bronzer I've ever used
review_text:
This is the first bronzer I actually finished. This gives the most natural finish and blends really well. I like that it's matte because I'm not a fan of sparkly bronzer. Ever since I started using this, I'm just addicted and can't live without it. It gives the skin a really natural, healthy-looking flush.

I've got medium/olive skin and I use "Light". My skin doesn't look orangey or dirty. Try it and I'm sure you'll like it. Make sure you use a really good brush.

product_name: Salux Nylon Japanese Beauty Skin Bath Wash Cloth/Towel - Yellow: Beauty
title: Exfoliating Bath Towel
review_text: Perfect exfoliation can be found in this great bath towel.  If you use a nylon scrubber when you shower, you'll switch to this after just one try

product_name: Burt's Bees Repair Serum 1 oz.: Beauty
title: Rosehip Seed Oil
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
"Through the ancient process of steam distillation, the fresh petals of a million roses yield just sixteen ounces of the precious essential oil known as attar of rose." 

Attar of Rose is featured in the Burt's Bees Repair Serum. A tiny trial size bottle (5 ml) can now be found in the Healthy Treatment Facial Care Kit, but after you try this product you might want a larger size for daily use. 

This product supports skin repair and renewal and works to reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Borage and Evening Primrose oils help to promote healthy skin. The oils absorb quickly and soothe and heal the skin. 

Ingredients: Rosehip seed oil, jojoba oil, lavender oil, vitamin E, evening primrose oil, borages seed oil, wheat germ oil, hazelnut oil, neroli oil, rose oil, calendula extract, green tea extract, beta carotene, tocopherol, vitamin C, vitamin A. 

Recently I tried this in the bath in addition to 
a bath oil and it seemed to enhance skin softness. 

~The Rebecca Revie

product_name: Burt's Bees Repair Serum 1 oz.: Beauty
title: Wholesome Affordable Pampering for Your Skin
review_text:
*****
This is a natural facial repair serum from Burt's Bees, and it is excellent for this use.  However, I rarely use it on my face, except at night sometimes, because it is so intense and heavy.  The rest of the time I use it EVERYWHERE else!  I mix it with my overall body moisturizer (which is pure sesame oil) and rub it all over my body.  I use it full strength on my hands.  I use it anywhere on my body that needs attention, healing, moisture.  For special occasions, I use it as an all-over body moisturizer full strength.

I go through probably a bottle a month, so it is "expensive", but I enjoy it so much I don't care.  A little goes a long way, but I am using it for so many things. 

The smell is probably my favorite small of any "beauty" product.  It is an aromatherapy-type smell, earthy, not perfume-y at all. All of the oils are natural, and blend together to create a perfect lovely fragrance.  It is subtle, but unlike anything else I've tried.

The ingredients are: Rosehip seed oil, jojoba oil, lavender oil, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E), evening primrose oil, borage seed oil, wheat germ oil, hazelnut oil, neroli oil, rose oil, calendula extract, green tea extract, beta carotene, tocopherol, ascorbyl palmitate (vitamin C), retinyl palmitate (vitamin A).  They are all natural and wonderful!

I like the bottle size too, as it is easy to travel with. At the price, I consider Burt's Bees Repair Serum an affordable luxury that I can't do without!
****

product_name: Murad Skin Perfecting Lotion - Blemish Prone/Oily Skin: Beauty
title: it works -- and no breakouts!
review_text: My skin gets really aggravated by almost every product I try. This moisturizer is an exception! I use Aveeno's ultra calming cleanser, and follow up with Murad's skin perfecting lotion when my skin feels dry. I am 39 with sensitive/combination skin and occasional blemishes. This lightweight moisturizer does not cause my sensitive skin to break out -- hallelujah! Thanks, Dr. Murad, for a great product

product_name: Bullie Refinement Normal/Oily Skin for Men: Beauty
title: Good Stuff
review_text: Saw this product recommended in a couple of magazines as good, and it lives up to its name.  It's somewhat costly, but will last for a while.  Consistency is that of rubber cement which might not sound appealing, but it goes on easy with your finger and after 15-20 minutes peels off easily

product_name: Merkur Futur Adjustable Double Edge Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Fear not!-- a great first shave. . .
reviewer: R A A. 111 "Pastor R. A. Abernethy"
review_text: I've been exclusively wet shaving for several months, using a Merkur Trac II style razor.  Having decided to take the plunge to a DE safety razor, I ordered the Merkur Futur Adjustable.  For my initial shave I set it on "1" (least aggressive), and got an absolutely wonderful shave, with no nicks, razor burn, or any discomfort at all.  Even around my jaw line and the point of my chin (notoriously touchy areas) there were no problems whatsoever.  At fifty cents a blade this is a wonderfully economical way to shave after the initial investment in the razor, which barring earthquake, fire, or apocalypse should last a lifetime

product_name: Merkur Futur Adjustable Double Edge Safety Razor: Beauty
title: A Shave So Nice, I Shaved Twice
review_text:
This is without a doubt the best razor I have ever owned. Combined with a badger hair brush and cream, it is perfect. In addition, this particular razor is constructed of solid stainless steel. So when it is run under hot water, it gets warm and the thermal mass keeps it warm, an extra nice touch. It is of excellent German craftsmanship and quality and worth the price.

The shave from this razor is so spectacular that I almost get carried away and shave my whole body.

product_name: Merkur Futur Adjustable Double Edge Safety Razor: Beauty
title: razor
review_text: i got this for my boyfriend for xmas and he absolutely loves it. he says it's the best razor he's ever had and his face is as smooth as ever. he likes shaving now

product_name: Merkur Futur Adjustable Double Edge Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Great Razor
review_text: Awesome Razor. I save a lot of money of razor blades now too! No more over priced packs of blades were I would spend $15 for 8 blades

product_name: Merkur Futur Adjustable Double Edge Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Excellent razor, but requires proper technique
review_text:
This is an excellent razor.  You can get a very good shave without any nicks or cuts if you use proper technique.  Consult the "Art of Shaving" for how to prepare your face.  With this razor you should use short strokes and do not apply extra pressure.  Allow the weight of the razor to to do the work, a couple of light strokes is better than one heavy stroke and is much less likely to cut your face.  After shaving with the grain you can re-lather and shave against the grain if desired.  This razor allows you to have more control over your shave, but requires more effort from the user than cartridge razors.  For instance, a cartridge razor will pivot to adjust to your face to some extent.  A safety razor is fixed and therefore you have to change the angle of the blade (by raising or lowering the razor's handle in relation to your face) to accomodate the undulations of your face.  This is less of a pain than it may sound, after you use the razor for a week or two it will become second nature.  I have used it for about two week and have not cut my face since the second shave.  If you follow this technique and keep your face properly lathered you will enjoy a nick free and comfortable shave.

One more thing, you will need to experiment with the "closeness" setting of the razor to find what is best for you.  Start with the lowest setting and increase it if necessary.

product_name: Merkur Futur Adjustable Double Edge Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Smoothest Shave
review_text: I took the plunge and bought a Merkur Futur Razor, after years of shelling out for expensive Gillette Sensor blades. The problem with my old razor was that it ALWAYS gave me skin irritation and didn't allow me to shave often enough. With a Safety razor like Merkur's my face gets an easy shave that is smoother than any razor I've used before. My fiance agrees as well. The only problem is that I do take much longer to shave now than I did before. The reason is this: Since there is no lubricating strip on the razors, I have to constantly use more shaving cream to keep the face lubricated if I want to get that perfect shave. I also have a hard time defining my goatee since I go for very straight and clean lines

product_name: philosophy strawberry milkshake shampoo, conditioner, & shower gel: Beauty
title: It smells pretty good! Mixed with the other flavors in the line!
review_text: Just mix it with Coconut Cream Pie! It's yummy!!

product_name: Clinique Facial Soap with Dish: Beauty
title: A Gentle Soap
review_text: This extra mild soap is very creamy and gentle.  If you have very sensitive skin, this soap will cleanse your face without irritating

product_name: Clinique Facial Soap with Dish: Beauty
title: great product
review_text: I went to the clinique counter and the lady got me all the make up,remover and the 3 step. I love all of them. You should probably use the 3 step for it to be effective. My face feels very smooth after i use all the steps

product_name: Clinique Facial Soap with Dish: Beauty
title: very mild, excellent soap!
review_text:
I bought the extra mild soap and the #1 toner, after breaking out with the mild soap and the #2 toner. the extra mild soap is much creamier and gentle. It gets rid of makeup and dirt and my face feels clean. Using it with the #1 toner and the lotion in the 3-step system, my skin is finally healing from my breakout with the mild soap and #2 toner.

this soap is great, and it lasts a long time. well worth the 11 bucks.

product_name: Lancome Renergie Microlift Eye Cream 15g/0.5oz: Beauty
title: Great eye cream
review_text: I had been looking for a good under eye cream and stopped at the Lancome counter one day and this is what the saleslady recommended. I really love this eye cream and swear it works in reducing fine lines and firming my undereye area.  Although it is a bit pricey, it is well worth it! It has a nice feel when I put it on and a nice smell. I love and highly recommend lancome products. I will purchase it again once I have used the last drop

product_name: Lancome Renergie Microlift Eye Cream 15g/0.5oz: Beauty
title: good stuff
review_text: I used it like the instructions said and the most visible results were that my eyes had a more "awake" appearance and a tightening of the under-eye area. I've had it for over a yr now and there's a tiny bit left so I need to restock. It's a dense cream and you only need a tiny bit.I have ultrasensitive eyes and it didn't irritate my eyes and it did not have a greasy feel at all. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that it is not usable on the lids. I tend to get dry eye-lids.

product_name: Lancome Renergie Microlift Eye Cream 15g/0.5oz: Beauty
title: Results seen immediately!
review_text:
First of all, I do not work for Lancome.  
Among the name brand eye creams I have ever used, this is by far the best.  
Finelines are much less visible right after I tapped it around my eyes. 
I recommend this product to anyone looking for good eye cream.

product_name: Bliss High Thighs Cellulite Fighting Serum: Beauty
title: Does what its supposed to...
review_text: This gel firms up the skin on your butt, thighs, and hips (and anywhere else you need firming) so you don't have as much of that orange peel/cottage cheese look.  It won't make you fit into smaller jeans, but gives you a more toned appearence

product_name: CARGO 10th Anniversary Signature Collection ($108 Value): Beauty
title: birthday present
review_text:
the person who received this present loves the item and is going
to switch her brand of cosmetics to CARG

product_name: CARGO 10th Anniversary Signature Collection ($108 Value): Beauty
title: first and LAST makeup kit
review_text: i thought this kit was a steal since it is a credible brand and it included all the basic needs that i use everyday for an extremely reasonable price. i don't use the lip gloss as much as the others because for me, the colors of the lip gloss don't match the natural look im going for. all the other products are out of this world though, they are very light and the liquid powder is like none ive seen before. you can put it on underneath or as a final layer and both work. i definitely recommend this kit because it works with EVERY skin tone.

product_name: CARGO 10th Anniversary Signature Collection ($108 Value): Beauty
title: Great deal if you've never tried Cargo before
review_text: I've tried Cargo's lipgloss in Soho before, and loved the nude shimmery color, but haven't tried its other products, so I loved that they put this collection together, and the price is right. For seperatly, just the Cream to Powder foundation, its $22 and Beachblush is $26, you're saving money right there...

product_name: His Tweezerman Deluxe Shaving Brush 2801-H: Beauty
title: AWESOME
review_text: I shave at least once a week and having brush makes it a nice sperience

product_name: His Tweezerman Deluxe Shaving Brush 2801-H: Beauty
title: Good Inexpensive Badger Brush
review_text: Most pure badger hair brushes on the market sell for at least $50, so this is a bargain compared to most.  For the first week, my brush shed a little; however, this stopped after the first week.  I have been happy with the brush, especially considering the price.  I would recommend this brush for anyone who thinks they want to start using a shaving brush.  This is a good, inexpensive way to "test the waters".  Then, if you find that you will continue using a shaving brush, I would recommend buying a higher-end brush.

product_name: Armani Code by Giorgio Armani for Men 2.5 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: favorite cologne in years
review_text: I absolutely love this cologne. I am very picky about what scent I like to wear, it can't be overpowering or too feminine (seems like too many cologne's now days are either/or), but this one is just right.

product_name: Armani Code by Giorgio Armani for Men 2.5 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: I love this stuff
review_text: This fragrance is wonderful!  I purchased a gift set for my husband and it smells even better on him than it did in the bottle.  I didn't know that was possible.  WARNING: THIS FRAGRANCE IS VERY SEDUCTIVE!!! :

product_name: Lancome High Resolution Intensive Recovery Anti-Wrinkle Eye Cream 15ml/0.5oz: Beauty
title: A Little Goes A Long Way      Lasts All Day
review_text: Moisturizing but not greasy. Absorbs well, but give it a little time before you put on mascara. The skin under my eyes is more supple, and crows-feet appear less noticeable, I think because of the moisturizing. Stings a little if you get it too close to your eyes.

product_name: Dark Circle Remover: Beauty
title: Dark Circle Remover from Leigh Valentine
review_text: This is a great, light and soft creme that really helps my under eyes

product_name: Rehab Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: Fantastic shampoo,  not so fantastic price.
review_text:
I absolutely love this shampoo!  The small amount of product it takes to make a mass of lather is incredible.  Which is nice because you won't go through the bottle that quickly.  It did a great job of gently cleansing my hair without making it feel like straw afterwards.  Now the scent...  Utterly addictive!  Now I'm not a big fan of mint smells,  but the way this was blended with the other scents is amazing.  You can definitely smell the mint, but it's not by any means overpowering.  Mixed in with the mint is a wonderful fruit scent,  that literally smells "juicy".  In the background, very lightly is a touch of herbal.  I happen to HATE anything herbal,  so I was surprised that I even liked this.  The smell is very unique and delicious!

Ok,  all that being said though - it did just as good a job as most any other Lush shampoos (including some of the solids).  I also use their Trichomania and Big and they do the same kind of lovely job Rehab does.  The price just kills me.  I know that real oils, juices and herbs are used, but unfortunately I can't afford to make this item a staple.  Still,  if you don't have a problem with the price,  definitely pick up a bottle (start with the smallest size though!) and give it a try.

product_name: Rehab Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: i like it
review_text: i bought this because i love the name i got it and i like it a lot it is pretty pricey $35+ for the big bottle ...i got a big bottle and a small bottle..i like them look a little funny n could definetly smell better but a good produc

product_name: Rehab Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: A little pricey, but worth it
review_text:
Let me start by saying that, yes, I am a LUSH fan, and no, I am in no way affiliated with LUSH (wish I was... employee discount!).

LUSH has done it again.  Another great product that is safe (no chemicals, all natural prodcuts) and actually works better then name brand items.  Rehab Shampoo smells great, a really nice citrus smell, and is perfect for damaged (or not) hair.  My hair isn't damaged that much, but I found Rehab to be a great preventative shampoo also.  Washes out very clean and when followed with Retread or American Cream, my hair has never been better.

Like the other review said, LUSH products take some time getting used to because they don't use chemicalls to make your hair 'feel' soft.  They actually use ingredients that help the damage, rather than hide it.  Please keep that in mind when you try their products.  Give it some time before you make a final discision

product_name: Seanick Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Shampoo like a pirate...
review_text:
I am a first time Lush customer, but this shampoo alone has me convinced to try more of their products. Recently, I have noticed that my "good old" Matrix shampoo has left my naturally wavy hair limp and dull. I read about Lush solid shampoo in Lucky magazine, and thought I'd give it a try. I ordered Seanick through their website.

The box arrived today, and I eagerly ripped it open. Seanick arrived wrapped in tissue paper and I could already smell it. It smelled great, not girly, but like the ocean. I was so taken by this that I hopped in the shower to try it out. The bar itself is just like the picture shows--bright blue and studded with seaweed. I could see how some people wouldn't like the "plants in my hair" aspect, but I like it. The bar lathered up quickly with lots of bubbles. I actually kind of had fun washing my hair for once. I put a little conditioner on as well, about half of what I normally use. As I towel-dried my hair, it actually squeaked. Pretty clean!

As my hair dried, it was nice and fluffy. Believe it or not, it was actually curlier and my sister said it was a little lighter. All good things. I use a lot of product in my hair, so maybe it cleaned all that off. Anyway, my hair feels silky, shiny, and soft. I even used it as a body soap! What a nerd... 

I love the whole idea behind a solid shampoo and think it would be great to travel with. I highly recommend this to anyone, especially if you have limp and boring hair. My only complaint is that the awesome smell doesn't last..

product_name: Seanick Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: best solid shampoo by lush
review_text: this is the best lush solid shampoo they have. best sent. the others are ok. but this one is my favorite.

product_name: Seanick Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: My blue heaven.
review_text: LUSH is famous for scent, and this one is unforgettable. Check the ingredients of this one -- great for soft water shampooing

product_name: Seanick Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Smells wonderful and lathers up great... perfect for traveling!
review_text:
I've noticed that products IN the LUSH stores almost always smell different when you get them out of the store.  In the store, I didn't like the smell of this shampoo bar at all, but I bought it because of the awesome softening benefits of the seaweed.  When I got home to try it out, the smell was much nicer and subtle.  I guess all the smells in the store take over and you can't smell the actual product that accurately.  

This shampoo was wonderful.  Only needed three strokes of the bar down my below-the-shoulder length hair and my hair lathered up really nicely.  Just be sure to keep this shampoo bar (as with all the shampoo bars) out of water when you aren't using it or it will turn into mush.

Took off a star because a traditional bottled shampoo is much easier and convinient to work with and store.  Really nice take with you on trips, though.  If you want a shampoo and conditioner bar, try Hybrid or Godiva

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Smooth Hair: Beauty
title: LOVE IT!!!
review_text: I have super dry, frizzy hair which has driven me crazy all my life. After trying about a billion products, I think this is the best. It actually controls the frizz without giving me helmet head. It also works well in humid conditions. Smells nice too.

product_name: philosophy empowermint shampoo, shower gel, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: wow, i love it.
reviewer: Pamela J. Rice "I read too much LIKE WHOA."
review_text:
I bought this a while back and used it primarily as a shampoo/shower gel. I recently put my hair through a lot of processing and was worried about what this would do to my perm/color.

Well, one day I ran out of shampoo and used this.

Not only did it not ruin my hair, but it made it look and smell great. No more heinous perm smell. w00t

product_name: Zhen Professional Detail Curler: Beauty
title: Best lash curler
review_text: It is the best lash curler I ever bought in my life! It is easy to use and you can quickly curl all parts of the lashes in a couple minutes. I am thinking about purchasing some for my sisters

product_name: Relastin Skin Revitalizer, 1.7 oz, 50 g: Beauty
title: Smooth Your Skin
review_text: Tighten your pores and create smoother, firmer skin with this amazing cream.  You'll see results after only ten days of use

product_name: Relastin Skin Revitalizer, 1.7 oz, 50 g: Beauty
title: Relastin Revitalizer Cream
review_text: This is a good and effective cream for creating smoother and firmer skin.  It feels good going on and tightens your pores, creating a smooth feel and look.  Use it with a moisturizer on top.  Even though it is a little expensive, a little actually goes a long way.  I actually felt that my skin felt firmer after 10 days

product_name: Relastin Skin Revitalizer, 1.7 oz, 50 g: Beauty
title: Relastin Really Works!!
review_text: I have always used, what I thought, the best skin products. But after using Relastin for only a few weeks, I was pleasantly surprised to see how amazingly this product has revitalized my skin! At this point I am sold out to Relastin and will only use this product

product_name: Clinique High Impact Mascara: Beauty
title: Finally, a mascara that stays on but washes off with simple soap and water...
review_text: This mascara is almost impossible to screw up putting on... it keeps my lashes separated and with a few coats really emphasizes my natural lash length.  It stays on all day without rubbing off under the eyes or causing black circles, even if you have to use eyedrops or if it's a super hot day -- AND -- it comes off with simple soap and water... no hard-core scrubbing until your lashes fall off, no need for expensive "eye makeup removers."  Overall awesome product.  Received a sample as a gift and now I'm hooked

product_name: Clinique High Impact Mascara: Beauty
title: Good but one big flaw as far as I'm concerned...
review_text: This is a great mascara really. It does make you lashes lush and doesn't get really clumpy like some midrange mascaras. The one issue I have is that after a couple hours of wear I notice that black gunk begins to accumulate in the corners of my eyes...not so attractive. Maybe I'm a rare case. I do recommend trying it but just know you might end up with that

product_name: Clinique High Impact Mascara: Beauty
title: GREAT MASCARA!
review_text: I do not have the most luxurious lashes so finding a mascara that will give me the thickness and length that I want is hard. This mascara however exceeds my expectations, the only thing is that I wish it came in waterproof. Other than that, fully satisfied.

product_name: Lancome Amplicils Mascara Waterproof: Beauty
title: The only Mascara my wife will wear.
review_text:
Many years ago, I worked in sales management in the beauty industry, and at that time I saw that in some products there was a great difference in the quality of products.

My beautiful wife was a model at that time, but somehow she never learned that fact. For years one of my wife's rituals was to sit in the sink, put on cheap mascara, and spend an hour separating her lashes with an open safety pin. After waiting through this ritual for many, many years, I went and bought her a tube of Lancme Waterproof. After refusing to try it until she ran out of her drug store brand, she finally broke down and tried it. She has refused to use anything else ever since. It makes her day easier, and I get more of her time...

product_name: Philosophy On A Clear Day h2o2 1oz: Beauty
title: Well worth the cost
review_text: Philosphy's On A Clear Day h2o2 may seem a bit overpriced at $20 for a 1 oz. jar, but it's worth the expense. This tiny jar has a tremendous amount of applications, since only the minimal amount needed to cover the skin is enough to see results. I've had problem skin for years now. For the most part my skin is clear, but I frequently get one or two large cysts that won't go away. This cream has resolved those problems and has smoothed out my skin more in general. It also acts as a gentle moisturizer, without adding extra oil to the skin. I apply a tiny amount to my face every evening before bed, all over--and in the morning I exfoliate with St. Ives Apricot Scrub in the shower. I cannot tell you how much of a difference it has made for me. My skin glows now and is more evenly toned; this was not the case when I was just using the apricot scrub. If you try it, I hope you have the same results as me

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: THE BEST!!
review_text: This is truly the best in highlighting products and I have tried many high end and cheaper products out there.  This is so light and just doesn't get all cakey and greasy.  I have tried so many brands that claim to look natural, but they just don't.  This really does and don't let the price fool you either.  It only takes alittle and lasts a long time, so well worth the price for the look it gives.  I love this!

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: !! Loooove This Product !!
review_text: I've been using Touche Eclat ever since it came out. I still love it. Cannot believe how rested I look after I put this on. My dark circles are minimized & I look radiant. Till now, no other concealer can beat YSL's Touche Eclat. Can't live without this product!

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Touche Eclat is EXCELLENT!
review_text: I am 51 and recently visited an upscale retail store in Manhattan.  The Yves St Laurent gal behind the cosmetic counter noticed my complexion was a little sallow - put this product about an inch on each side of my nose and blended it in..what a difference it made...a worthwhile investment..I use it under my eyes and just about all over my face for a nice touch-up, concealer and brightener..covers freckles and sun spots, too

product_name: Philosophy Frozen Lemon Custard Lip Shine: Beauty
title: Great lipshine and great taste
review_text: Philosophy has great products, including this Lemon Custard Lip Shine. It's a great product and tastes great too! They have matching shower gel and body souffle too

product_name: Philosophy Frozen Lemon Custard Lip Shine: Beauty
title: Tastes and smells like lemon cookies!
review_text: I love the taste of this, it's so yummy. Tastes like lemon cookies and cake. Looks good too. I would give it 5 stars except the only downer about Philosophy glosses are that they are pretty sticky, so if you have animals, you get fur stuck on your lips sometimes, or whatever. You know what I mean, sticky gloss attracts things. But it looks good and tastes very good

product_name: Philosophy Mint Chocolate Chip Ice Cream: Beauty
title: It's OK
review_text: Smells good, but probably would not get it again, almost like a novelty gift really, made a great stocking stuffer over Christmas

product_name: Philosophy Mint Chocolate Chip Ice Cream: Beauty
title: My new fave!
review_text: I recently got this for my birthday and it is sooo life-like. In my opinion, it smells just like the real thing. It's not really strong, as the person before me wrote in her review, but I don't believe its supposed to be. If it was too strong, it wouldn't be refreshing and believe me, this stuff is

product_name: Dior DiorSkin AirFlash Spray Foundation: Beauty
title: Expensive - though  may be the only one worth it!
review_text:
I saw them use an airspray type of foundation on America's Next Top Model (not sure which brand) But I was impressed with this technique and wanted to try it - the only one I found was Dior.

By far the best foundation i've tried! I like the other Dior tint foundation - but thought it was too heavy.
The mist feels light...maybe a little too light. Yet once you apply, it does the job perfectly - you really do get an even airbrushed look.

I won't give 5 stars simply for the price - sorry but $60 is too much for a 2.3oz can

Good news is if you apply it right it can last a while

product_name: Dior DiorSkin AirFlash Spray Foundation: Beauty
title: DiorSkin AirFash Spray Foundation
review_text: Great coverage -It is so lightweight that you feel like you aren't wearing any makeup at all! I was a little worried that the "spray" would get all over, but it's really easy to apply. It actually makes your skin look flawless

product_name: Dior DiorSkin AirFlash Spray Foundation: Beauty
title: Excellent foundation, but very pricey for what you get
review_text:
The DiorSkin AirFlash is very easy to apply, and gives a light matte finish that wonderfully evens out skin tone.  Once applied, it's very lightweight- you can't feel it on your skin at all.  Not much is needed, HOWEVER, there's barely any product in the can.  I used it off and on for about a month, perhaps 15 applications in my estimation, and the can was bone dry after that.  For $60, this is unacceptable!  And I wasn't piling it on or anything, I would just do a light mist over my nose and cheek area.

If this was half the price, I would give it 5 stars, it's really a great product, but for a can mostly filled with compressed air, I have a hard time shelling out that kind of cash

product_name: Kinerase Lotion 40gm: Beauty
title: I really love Kinerase
review_text: It is non-irritating and works. Although not as effective as a tretinoin product in keeping hyperpigmentations at bay, I do notice it helps keep my skin plump. It is emollient without being overly so and is light enough to wear every day. The Cream is a little more emollient if your needs require it. I do use this every day after cleansing my face

product_name: Eau Des Merveilles by Hermes for Women 3.3 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Excellent fragrance, fast shipping, great service.
review_text:
This is a clean-smelling, refined fragrance that stays on all day long. 
I recommend it to everyone loving fragrances such as "Costume National" and the like. The package has reached Italy in a couple of weeks by standard shipping, suitably packed up, with free samples included. Besides, European shoppers may rely on a profitable exchange rate.
As far as I'm concerned, I advise everyone to trust Beautiful Perfumes and Amazon.com

product_name: Eau Des Merveilles by Hermes for Women 3.3 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Works for me!
review_text:
This is a day-time fragrance that I can't live without. I'm the type of person who doesn't like things smelling too florally or girly-girl (e.g Paris Hilton or Maria Sharpova fragrances, which don't suit me at all). At the same time, I don't want something that's too " mature" and leaving me smelling like an old lady (too strong and musky). Eau Des Merveilles is somewhat of an in-between fragrance that's hard to describe and very unusual. It's woodsy but it has amber, pepper, and  citris notes. It's refreshing, modern, and chic. 
You don't need to overspay this stuff either. It's potent and you'll probably be mistaken for wearing cologne if you overkill it. 

People like how I smell with this fragrance, and some even say that I smell like "clean laundry," which is a good thing (for me atleast). You should try this stuff at sephora or at a fragrance dealer before buying it though. People's body chemistrys ( amount of perspiration, oil production, foods they eat, etc.) can make perfumes smell differently. Spray it on and seell it after a few hours.

product_name: Eau Des Merveilles by Hermes for Women 3.3 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Unique and Modern
review_text: I don't know who writes the descriptions, but this perfume is definitely not sweet. If you find yourself drawn to fragrance notes commonly found in men's cologne you will love this fragrance. It is unique in that it is feminine but with a strong woodsy (I think it is oak or cedar) tone to it. It isn't heavy though, in fact it is very light, very clean, subtly floral, subtly spicy and oaky. All in all, a modern and unique fragrance

product_name: Urban Decay XXX Slick Pot Gloss: Beauty
title: Best gloss, although slightly pricey!
review_text:
This is by far my favorite lip gloss I've ever tried.  It's not gooey or gloppy, as one previous reviewer mentioned. Each color is unique, but blends well with most skin tones (I am a freelance makeup artist, so I have used these colors on varying people).  If you use just a dab, it can even last through my hours in the gym, and definitely adds just the right shine for a photo shoot. 

It may be a tad expensive but worth it.  My one gripe -- did they really discontinue my favorite flavor & color, Sin?

product_name: Urban Decay XXX Slick Pot Gloss: Beauty
title: My Favorite Lipgloss
review_text: I adore these cute little pots and as with all Urban Decay products, the colors! They're very smooth and creamy which I like,because if I wanted lipgloss to be opaque I'd get lipstick instead. I have no problem with it staying on. In fact I put some on before work today and seven hours later I could see in my car mirror that I still had it on my lips on my way home.My only complaint is price which is a thing with all UD products, but one gets the assurance that the product isn't tested on any woodland critters, and that the pigments are high quality

product_name: Tweezerman Whitehead/Blackhead Remover: Beauty
title: Love this item
review_text: After watching my dermatologist use a tool like this on me for whiteheads, I decided to buy one for myself and save a trip. Love this item. In fact, this is the second one I'm ordering, lost the first one in the move from CA to TX. I don't have blackheads, but it works great on whiteheads

product_name: Philosophy Vanilla Birthday Cake: Beauty
title: Very sweet!
review_text:
I agree with the previous commenter that the scent doesn't continue post-bath (which may be a good thing if you wanted to apply a different scent, or a bad thing if you were hoping to smell like vanilla afterwards) also, I wouldn't reccomend just shampooing with this to be the only step in your hair care regime (extremely convenient 3-in-1 is great for travel but not for everyday.) definitely use a conditioner!!!

But all in all it is a very lovely scent, makes a great bubble bath and leaves skin silky smooth & clean

product_name: Retread Hair Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Really works.
review_text:
This stuff really works. This is the only product that I have ever used in my life that gives me this shine and soft texture. I always use salon brand products, hot oil treatment, treatment at salons and they were never this noticeable. 

I like the smell. It's nothing familiar or fruity. It's a natural scent. I like it. I would definitely buy this brought again. I wish the product was a little bigger though.

product_name: Retread Hair Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Even the unruliest, naughtiest of curls are tamed by this delight!
review_text: I could not be without Retread. From the thick custardy texture down to the violety sexy scent, this uber-conditioner is a curly haired girl's dream. From the very first use, my wild tresses were tamed into beautiful glossy locks of loveliness

product_name: Retread Hair Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: The Best
review_text: This is THE best conditioner you will ever try.  I have coarse, dry, very straight asian hair and this makes my hair unbelievably, ridiculously, shiny and soft.  I don't know about the smell though, . . my husband isn't to fond of it, but boy oh boy this stuff works.  I kid you not!!!  I have tried almost everything out there from the least expensive to the stuff that I have to ask "How much!?"  none of them come close to this.  The only down side is that LUSH takes FOREVER to ship.  I don't know if it would be faster to order direct.  I'm tell you girls, . . try it.

product_name: Retread Hair Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Throw out all your other conditioners!
review_text:
I have dry, fine, difficult hair and have tried (no kidding) just about every product claiming to add volume and body to hair like mine. From specialty stores to prescription items - I've found a few that do work somewhat.  I depend on conditioners to be the most important product in my hair regime because the conditioner you use has the greatest impact on how your hair turns out that day....trust me - I know.  I've got this hair product thing down to a science.  I used the two Lush products this morning: Big Shampoo and Retread.  Holy **** - what a difference.  I am so happy right now - you should see how good my hair looks today - I used this for the first time this morning and here are some of the key points:

1.  You only have to use a very little bit (I have hair past my shoulders and I only used about 2 teaspoons).

2.  The product smells like Heaven. It's got that affluent expensive natural smell - not that perfumey dimestore smell. 

3.  The frangrance lingers on and on - I've had GUYS tell me how good I smell.

4.  After using with the other product "Big Shampoo (or Hair)" - my hair was thick, soft, shiny, silky, with lots of movement - no static. 

5. This conditioner gives me the perfect moisture balance (for my hair anyway - I have very thin, fine, dry hair).

As far as lush overall:

Let me first state that I am in no way affiliated with Lush - I placed an order for over $100 worth of Lush products and this was one of the products in the order. The only negative thing was the shipping turnaround (little over 3 weeks) but when my Lush items came in - I didn't care. The scent of all the products is gorgeous!!! It's made with all natural products that actually smell awesome and last throughout the day. Not too perfumey at all but definitely recognizable to others. I had guys commenting all day on how good I smell!!!!! The packaging is delightful, the product presentation is adorable, and the quality is better than I've EVER experienced. Better than Benefit, better than Philosophy, etc. I buy and try just about every new product line that comes out - some I like some I don't. I can tell you that this line is my new favorite! I'm going to stock up on everything they have because not only do the products work, they are so pretty to look at that I will use them as decorations in my bathroom!!!

Customer service is extremely responsive and doesn't reply with form letters to your concerns and questions. They said they are working to improve their shipping times and were very accomodating. They also gave me some nice coupons with my order!

10 stars out of 5

product_name: Lovely by Sarah Jessica Parker for Women 1.0 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Great for layering
review_text: Nice, soft perfume that's not so overpowering that you could mix it with layers of lotion, powder and even other perfumes.  Love it

product_name: Smith's Rosebud Salve - 0.8 oz.: Beauty
title: Moisturizes with being heavy
review_text: Rosebud Salve--what a find!  I wanted it because it was something that I had heard about and knew had been around a long time.  It goes on my lips every night, and is something I will keep around the house and with me.  I've been a long-time user of Daily Conditioning Treatment from Blistex, going through many little pots of it, but Rosebud is replacing it.  I'm ordering extra tins of it today

product_name: Smith's Rosebud Salve - 0.8 oz.: Beauty
title: This stuff is AMAZING!
review_text: I have recently bought this product to try and I'm already a little obsessed. I'm a lip product junkie, but nothing compares to this salve. It leaves my lips soft, supple, but not greasy or sticky. And unlike other lip balms (like softlips), it doesn't make my lips flake or peel. It may be a little expensive, but it is well worth the cost.I can see why this has been such a staple for so many people over the years. I'm already in love with it

product_name: Smith's Rosebud Salve - 0.8 oz.: Beauty
title: works very well, nice rose scent
review_text: Smith's rosebud salve does a good moisturizing job, I use it every night before bed and it does not leave my lips dried out the next morning.  It would be perfect if it had some SPF for day use as well.

product_name: Smith's Rosebud Salve - 0.8 oz.: Beauty
title: Rosebud Salve
review_text: I am pleased to recommend Rosebud Salve.  My children call it the "miracle salve".  My mother always had Rosebud in the 60's when I was young.  I purchased a jar in Gatlinburg Tennessee, but because I live in Ohio to replace the jar was difficult.  I was thrilled to find it online.  I bought 4 jars for my daughters who are now young ladies with homes of their own.

product_name: Lancome Tonique Clarte: Beauty
title: Great for combination skin
review_text:
I recently started using this toner again; I used it for a while in college but my post-college budget didn't allow for non-drugstore facial products. Thank goodness I'm able to use it again! 

Tonique Clarte keeps my combination skin in control despite the North Carolina humidity, and feels good both right after application and several hours later. I've tried numerous toners and this is definitely the best

product_name: Sephora Paddle Brush: Beauty
title: Exceptional Quality
review_text: I received this brush as a gift.  It works like a dream.  The wood is of very high quality and is polished to a smooth finish.  The brush feels substantial in the hand.  The bristles grip my hair very well without any static or tangles.  I love this brush and would recommend it to anyone

product_name: Chanel Teint Fluide Universel: Beauty
title: Wonderful
review_text: I have been using this product for a few years now. It is the first foundation that has ever matched my skin tone (very fair) and it doesn't even look like I am wearing foundation. Yet my skin tone looks even and glowing. I love it and highly recommend it. I have gotten many friends hooked on it as well :) It is good for people with problem skin. Since I have been using it I RARELY break out. It is oil free and water based

product_name: H2O Plus Total Body Exfoliation Spa Gift Basket: Beauty
title: exactly what I expected
review_text: My order arrived swiftly. The packaging was nice, and the product looked exactly how I thought it would. H2O makes quality products, and my friend, who received this as a gift, loved it

product_name: Salux Nylon Japanese Beauty Skin Bath Wash Cloth/Towel - Pink: Beauty
title: Best Exfoliator Ever!
review_text: I was given one of these great bath towels by a friend, and have been nothing but impressed. It is by far the best exfoliation product I have ever used. On my first use, I must say that the salux is a bit scratchy if you are not used to exfoliating.  However, by the second or third use, you've become accustomed to it. The best part about this product is how absolutely smooth and soft my skin is after using it. I feel like silk! It's even managed to take care of the dull rough skin on my elbows, knees and feet. I'm not sure they'v ever been so smooth! The salux also lathers well, dries quickly and does not mildew or mold.

product_name: Prada Prada: Beauty
title: Excellent Fall/Winter fragrance!
review_text: I wear this perfume in the fall and winter (Philosophy's Amazing Grace is my summer and spring scent) and I get so many compliments on it! Everyone loves it (including my boyfriend) and now my sister wants it, too. The description it gives of the scent is pretty accurate. It smells kind of spicy and and warm and fresh all at the same time. A very nice effect. It's strong enough that you don't need a lot to get the desired effect (Translation: don't use too much or you'll knock out your coworkers)

product_name: Prada Prada: Beauty
title: Beautiful fall/winter scent
review_text: This fragrance packs a strong punch, so use it lightly, and spray it on your legs or abdomen, not around your neck.  This may be why some reviewers aren't fond of the scent.  You'll definitely pick up on patchouli, amber, and sandalwood.  I love wearing this when I have a big event.  I can't add anything about the atomizer; I got a normal spray bottle.

product_name: Prada Prada: Beauty
title: Almost as expected
review_text: The Prada perfume was authentic and the packaging was genuine. The only problem is the picture shown on the website was not what I received.  I expected to receive the bottle with the atomizer, but it was not.  There was no way to know this from the picture or the description provided.  I highly recommend the perfume good value and smells divine.

product_name: Prada Prada: Beauty
title: One of my all time favorites!
review_text: I work as a fragrance associate and this is one of my favorites! All of the items are a treat. The body cream is heavenly... The intense is to die for!! If the fragrance is a little too "daring" for you ust the regular lotion with it and it will tame the smell. If you love this other frangrances you'll love are Cartier: Le Baiser du Dragon, and Thierry Mugler: Angel. I love them all!

product_name: Prada Prada: Beauty
title: Lovely
review_text: I'm going to be cheap and get the larger refillable because it's the same price as a small with the spray. I figure I can just dab it on. I was going to spend a fourtune on the one with the atomizer though seeing all the negative reviews about it, I'm glad I didn't! I'm rating it a 4 for now just based on the scent. We'll see how it works out

product_name: Prada Prada: Beauty
title: Complex & Mysterious = Seductive
review_text: A very sensual scent.  Non-floral, not cloying, warm and sweet and spicy without being overpowering.  Amber and sandalwood...like wearing incense from another land

product_name: Prada Prada: Beauty
title: The Perfect Perfume for the Migraine Sufferer
review_text:
I am very picky about perfumes because most of the stronger-scented ones will induce my migraines. My wonderful husband purchased this perfume for me last Christmas, after I sampled it in a magazine. I love the bottle the perfume comes in, and it comes equipped with a "foo-foo" atomizer. The smell is nice and warm, and it reminds me of a winter day spent in front of the fireplace. I always get compliments when wearing the Prada scent.
The downside is that it is expensive- $95 a bottle for the larger size. But I only use it about once a week

product_name: Ojon Ultra Hydrating Conditioner: Beauty
title: If you have processed hair prone to friziness, this is for you!
review_text: When I used to dye my hair this was the only in-shower conditioner that gave me perfect results every time!  Not too over-ladden with oil or weighed down, but perfectly moisturized!  The only thing you may not like is the scent.  It's different than the normal floral or fruity scents most conditioners have.  I personally liked it, but I can see how some people wouldn't go for the musky, almost smoky scent that comes with most Ojon hair products.

product_name: Ojon Ultra Hydrating Conditioner: Beauty
title: Great product.
review_text: I have used this with the Ojon shampoo and my hair's texture has improved tremendously. With the detrimental effects of Idaho's arid climate and turning 40, my thick hair has gotten coarse.  This product has been a pleasant surprise, leaving my hair smoother and softer, like we live on a coast and I'm barely 30. :-

product_name: Clinique Repairwear Anti Aging Makeup SPF15: Beauty
title: Full-coverage makeup with a smooth finish.
review_text: I tried this when I got it in a gift-with-purchase, and wow! This is a fantastic foundation. Repariwear Anti Aging Makeup offers full-coverage foundation with a beautifully smooth finish. It really covers blemishes and discolorations without giving you a mask-like face. It blends smoothly and evenly, and makes a perfect base for all your color cosmetics. It lasts all day without creasing, running, or just getting yucky like other brands do. I am really impressed with it! Plus, we all need to wear foundation with SPF coverage to protect us from the sun. This one offers the best in sun protection, with doctor-recommended titanium dioxide and zinc oxide coverage to prevent wrinkles. I cannot recommend this foundation highly enough

product_name: Lancome Absolue Replenishing Cream SPF 15: Beauty
title: heavenly, velvety skin!
review_text: I am a "product freak"....always looking for the best creams and lotions and such for my somewhat aging yet still "combination" skin. ( I will be 41 this spring) I got a sample of this moisturizer as part of a nifty Lancome gift-with-purchase ..and I LOVE IT!!!!!!  It absorbs quickly, isnt too watery, not too rich..not greasy feeling at ALL, and my skin just plumped right up and got VERY pink and dewy after I applied it. Very soothing feeling! Its pricey, but I highly recommend it, and will purchase this when my ( good sized!) sample runs out!

product_name: Lancome Absolue Replenishing Cream SPF 15: Beauty
title: TIME REALLY DOES TELL !
review_text:
The time had come - the time for some serious reassessment of my skin and the toll time and the elements had taken on it.

 I'd read the ads for Lancome's line - ABSOLUE - which stated it was "one product that addresses the effects of chronological aging." And, IT DOES! It not only addresses those telltale signs (think fine lines, a somewhat dull appearance) but it seems to make quick work of them. 

After use my skin actually has an imrpoved texture and a "life" that seemed lacking in the past. Daily use has made a marked difference. Granted, it is not a minor investment, but it just takes a little for comfortable coverage. My guess is this jar will last me many moons! 

     - Gail Cooke

product_name: Tweezerman Ingrown Hair Splintertweeze: Beauty
title: best tweezers every
review_text:
i absolutely love these tweezers. they are extremely sharp which allows for precision removal of splinters and ingrown hairs. i also use it for eyebrow grooming because the fine point allows for single lash removal. (helps prevent pulling out too many at a time and creating a disaster) I have just ordered my third pair of these tweezers because I can't live without them! 

as stated below, the tweezers do not come with instructions. Thank goodness my education prepared me for the complicated task of using this tool... If you don't know how to use tweezers, you should probably stay away from this product. it is extremely sharp

product_name: philosophy microdelivery peel daily peel pads: Beauty
title: An Every Day Necessity
review_text: OK, I admit the Philosophy line of products are the best I have ever used.  And trust me, I have used them all!  A self proclaimed makeup expert here!!  Just ask any of my friends.  The Philosophy Microdelivery Peel Daily Peel Pads are the best little pads to remove any lingering cleanser, and prepare your face for the Philosophy serum, and moisturizer.  These pads are just full of ingredients that help sluff off dead cells, and let your new bright cells step forward.  Once you try this product, you will never want to apply your makeup products without this first

product_name: philosophy microdelivery peel daily peel pads: Beauty
title: Love, but confused........
review_text: These pads work great and I could tell the difference in my skin in just one week.  The only problem is that they leave my face sticky after it dries.   So I have to wash my face again to take it off.  Is this the right way.....BKolterman, Onaga,K

product_name: philosophy microdelivery peel daily peel pads: Beauty
title: Great Find.
review_text: I love these juicy little pads.  I use them in place of toner at night and they seem to have cleared up my skin.  I just love the way they smell to... like oranges.  Try this product

product_name: philosophy microdelivery peel daily peel pads: Beauty
title: Great product
review_text:
I use these daily after cleansing my face. They are wonderful. You can feel the product working but there is no burning or stinging involved, just an invigorating toning feeling. The scent is very nice also. The pads are thin but generously saturated with solution, one pad is plenty to do my entire face & neck area.

I've tried Avon's micro peel pads and found them too dry. I often used 2 or more at a time as they just weren't moist enough to do the trick. The prices are comparable and I feel you get more treatments out of the Philosphy peel pads

product_name: philosophy microdelivery peel daily peel pads: Beauty
title: Excellent!
review_text: I jus recently purchased these pads.  I have been using Philosophy skin care for more than a year now, but was feeling like the line was needing a toner like product to help with exfoliation on a daliy basis.  Well, this is it!  The pads are very soft (also very thin).  I definately felt the product working and it made a difference.  I was thinking the product was a bit pricey, but then when I was looking at similar products from other lines, I changed my thinking.  I recommend this product

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Touch Me Then Try To Leave Me Cream To Go: Beauty
title: Gettin Steamy Part II - The Silky Cream
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
After the Bathina seductive body wash, this is a sexy cream that leaves your skin feeling silky soft without being overly moisturizing. 

This cream may be best in the summer months as it is not overly rich once applied. It will work well when you are putting on lighter fabrics like silk or anything where a rich body cream would be a disaster. The secret of this formula seems to be the sesame seed oil and cocoa butter. 

There is something powdery soft about this body cream. It has a "whispery don't tell" quality and seems to secretly sink into your skin, leaving only the most delicate hint of sweet cinnamon and faraway ocean breezes. 

The Bathina cream is much more seductive than the body wash, although the two work very well together. You may be amazed at how soft this makes your skin and the scent is delicate enough to allow for the layering of your favorite perfume. I'd recommend the Anna Sui "Sui Love" perfume because it seems to have hints of the same whispery floral beauty. 

The small "to go" size is probably good for two or three applications. I almost used half the container the first time. I'd go with the larger size even if you are buying the small body wash. I like using the body wash for bubble bath but it would also work well if you are going away for the weekend. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Laura Mercier Waterproof Eye Makeup Remover, 4 fl. oz.: Beauty
title: SWISH, SWIPE, AND PRESTO !
review_text:
Just dampen a cotton ball then swish-swipe, and it's gone! 

This fabulous eye makeup remover quickly removes even racoon eyes as well as waterproof and non-waterproof mascaras - quicker then "Delete" on your keyboard! 

It's the first I've found that easily erases the glitter I love to sport for special occasions. No more pulling, tugging or irritating eyes as long as LAURA MERCIER Eye Makeup Remover is handy! 

Laura, thank you!

product_name: philosophy pure grace layering set 3 piece set: Beauty
title: Clean soapy scent+ back from the beach smell=Pure Grace
review_text:
Just love it! Been searching for a scent like this forever! When you first put it on it has a soapy clean scent...while at the same time has hints of that "just back from the beach smell!!"
The foaming bath and shower cream is wonderful..creamy and leaves your skin feeling very soft...even good as a shampoo.
The perfumed shimmering body lotion is also wonderful...soft skin with a hint of shimmer..lovely. 
It's light and clean..a beautiful scent. Just bought it as a gift for my sister who like me has been searching for the perfect scent...think she will adore it when she gets it..just like I do!

product_name: Pleasures by Estee Lauder for Men 3.4 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Wonderful scent
review_text: I may be a girl, but I love wearing this. I think it is slightly lighter and not sickly sweet like the one for women

product_name: Pleasures by Estee Lauder for Men 3.4 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Pleasures ( Placeres ) for Men & Women!
review_text:
Women have always been impressed with my name (Placeres); it has attracted them like flies along with the cologne (pleasures) that they find irresistible to them, bringing their fantasies to reality and enjoying a wild adventure with me when I wear the cologne.  These women range from the serious, conservative, glamorous, feminine, sexy elite type to the leather strapping tattoo bike riding, honky-tonk and the sweet cozy ladies of the night, that just want to ride and hump you all the time until you are exhausted.
I personally think that this cologne for men is the best on the market. The name itself is attractive, inviting, intriguing and very catching. All the women that I have dated have always been exited with the smell, and at the end of the night they always thanked me by saying " It's been a great experience and a pleasure, Mr. Pleasures spending the night with you"; they insist on another wild date with me adding that my name and the fragrance have made an impression on them that have resulted in their uncontrollable desires for me! The name of the cologne and my name go very well together bringing out the passion, romanticisms, and animalism with superb ecstasies on kinky dates an experience that they will always treasure claiming what a remarkable man I am. My experience on a tour to South America a few women asked permission to use my name as an advertisement to their exotic full service pleasure agencies; so if your name is not Placeres, try at least the cologne with your mates, and when they complement you, say, Pleasures were made for men and women! Take it from me, Seor Placeres (Mr. Pleasures) yo se,una buena templada when I get one!

product_name: Lovely Sarah Jessica Parker Soft Body Lotion, 6.7 oz: Beauty
title: Smells sooooo...good
review_text: I recently purchased both the body lotion and spray perfume.  Love it - everyone tells me I smell so nice. It has such a soft clean smell

product_name: Lovely Sarah Jessica Parker Soft Body Lotion, 6.7 oz: Beauty
title: My absolute favorite
review_text: as always, this was delivered in a very timely manner and I was completely satisfied

product_name: Clinique Pore Minimizer Refining Lotion 1.4 oz: Beauty
title: This is a must for oily skin, actually shrinks large pores...
review_text: OK, I know it is gross, but if you didn't think you had a problem with your skin then you wouldn't be on reading this right now. I have tried everything, lots of stuff isn't worth 2 cents and then there's Clinique Pore Refining Lotion. This is a must in my daily routine, I even wear it when I am sleeping. How to use: Wash face, then apply after any serums that you may use, but before moisturizer with sunscreen, primer, concealor or foundation. DO NOT PUT TOO MUCH ON if you are planning on layering makeup on top of it, as it will make your makeup flake off your skin. This is not something that you would smear all over, only on your oily areas (such as nose, chin etc). If you use it on your dry areas, it will make your face look to dry. Nobody wants face dandruff on their black turtleneck. WHAT IT DOES: makes your face appear less oily, reduces the size of pores slightly the first few times you use it, but the pores will get smaller if you use it everyday. It also feels pretty nice when you rub it on (warm and tingly). It does contain salicyclic acid, so it prevents pores from clogging. The size of the tube is huge, it will at least a month or two with daily use. I think this works better than any clean-and-clear product, better than biore pore strips, thus the more expensive price. The only bad thing about this product is that it may dry out your skin if you use it too much and cause flaky skin. One of the other benefits is that it will reduce the amount of oil that your skin produces throughout the day, thus you won't have to blot or powder pat as much as normal

product_name: Ojon Ultra Hydrating Conditioner: Beauty
title: No More Bad Hair Days
review_text: The Ojon line is the best haircare line I have tried so far. This is the best conditioner-ultimate moisture without weighing your hair down. If you chemically treat your hair, you need to start using this line today

product_name: Glow Mineral Bronzer: Beauty
title: beautiful glow - i'm hooked :)
review_text: i have been looking for a bronzer that was not too orange and just right for my complexion. this one works really well for me. every time i wear it i get compliments on my makeup...not on my bronzer which tells me that it is just adding the extra oomph i need to my complexion instead of looking like i added bronzer. i still use a little blush to give my cheeks an added pink. i'm hooked :

product_name: LOLITA LEMPICKA For Women By LOLITA LEMPICKA eau de parfum: Beauty: Lolita Lempicka
title: i love this
review_text:
i fell in love with lolita lempicka, i cannot wait for her new fragrance to hit the US. i am thinking about flying to france and buying loads of her new scent. it will be even better than this one.

this one is great everyone girl should own it

product_name: Aquis Microfiber Hair Towel - 19 x 39 inches: Beauty
title: Don't shower without it
review_text: This is a fantastic product! I cannot wash my hair without it.  I am so used to this towel sucking up all the extra water that when I just use a normal bath towel it actually feels weird to have all the excess water in my hair.  This also cuts down on a lot of blowdryer time too. I have fine, medium length hair and this works fantastic for me.  I highly, highly recommend this for anyone who wants to save time on drying their hair in the morning and get out of the door faster.

product_name: Aquis Microfiber Hair Towel - 19 x 39 inches: Beauty
title: Absolutely wonderful!
review_text: If you have thick hair, or long hair, or both as I do, then this towel is for you.  It seems a little pricey for just one towel, but believe me, it's completely worth it.  I have hair that hangs about four inches below where my bra crosses my back and it is quite thick.  After ten minutes in a regular towel turban, my hair still drips profusely.  After ten minutes in the Aquis towel, the outer surface of my hair is almost dry to the touch!  Not to mention that the towel holds in a turban perfectly - normal towels are so heavy that I must keep my head upright to keep the turban in place.  With the Aquis, I can bend over or swing my head around and the turban does not come undone or fall off.  I don't like to use hair dryers because it is extremely damaging to your hair; with the Acquis, there's less need to because my hair is half dry after a few minutes in it.  Also, I've noticed that my hair has a lot more volume when I dry it with the Aquis.  I could see how people with thin or very short hair would not get the full benefit of this towel because a normal towel works well enough for them; but if you have a lot of hair, this towel is just like magic

product_name: Aquis Microfiber Hair Towel - 19 x 39 inches: Beauty
title: A Must Have
review_text: I would never go back to using a regular towel for my hair after trying this little miracle towel. Wrap it around soaking wet hair and it absorbs amazingly. It not only cuts drying time down but makes it unneccesary to rub and rub which is damaging to the hair. They also hold up to many uses. It's really revolutionary!

product_name: Lord & Berry Smudgeproof Eyeliner: Beauty
title: Love it!!!
review_text: Goes on smoothly, no tugging, mostly stays put.  I always have a little run on my lower lid, but that's with any brand.  Lasts all day

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: Recommended by Hair Care Professionals
review_text: Tame your frizzy hair and keep it calm, smooth, and shiny until your next shampoo.  Find out what all the fuss is about and try it yourself

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: I'm hooked on this product
review_text:
I have had a 56 year quest for a product to tame my frizzy hair.  I've tried it all.  This product calms the frizz, keeps it calm until my next shampoo-something no other product has ever come close to doing before.  My hair is soft, shiny and everyone is commenting on how long my hair 
is. That is because it is so much more relaxed.  I love this stuff! Do you sell it by the gallon?  Oh, that doesn't mean you have to use a lot.  I have shoulder length hair and I use about the size of a nickel. I just don't want to ever run out!
Van C

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: Works like a dream!
review_text: This is the only product that keeps my hair from drying into a fuzzy, frizzy mess. I technically have straight hair, but it misbehaves a lot and is a bit unruly. This is called a balm, but it is more like a thick liquid that I apply to wet hair. With phytodefrisant I can really see the results after I blow dry. Even if I let my hair air dry, I still see less frizz and my hair is softer. I would not live without this stuff over the winter, especially with dry hair and static woes ahead

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: Movie Star hair 24/7
review_text:
Phytodefrisant is one of the rare products that actually lives up to the hype by everyone who uses it. I have heard of it for years but never believed that spending lots of money will ensure great results when it comes to just one styling product, but even after one use I knew there was no turning back. This product is truly amazing as even one application in mid-day turned my hair into gleaming spun silk with glossy reflection and incredible softness and bounce. I can't begin to describe my surprise and adoration for Phyto for crating such a marvel of nature and science in a seemingly inconspicuous metal tube. 

The product itself is an oozing liquidy clear gel like consistency and it disappears into the hair, as I like to put it in the morning after I wash it and brush it through. It makes my hair feel slippery and silky, and I love it. Ever since I've been using it, I get random complements form friends and strangers on my hair, and even my high lights are revived as they look fresh and summery.  This really makes me hair feel luxurious and Im thrilled that I did spend the money on it, for now no matter what I do to my hair, its always a good hair day! As an added bonus I don't need anything else in my hair, which saves more time and money, it's incredible how this one product does such an incredible turn around on my mane, love it

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: Frizzy hair? Not with Phytodefrisant!
review_text:
This is my "Holy Grail" haircare product -- I could use almost any other shampoo, almost any other conditioner, almost any other hairspray, but I could *not* ever use any other styling product on my hair, now that I've had a chance to use this. There is a Very Good Reason why Phytotherathie's Phytodefrisant has long been a mainstay of top professional models & has been voted the #1 haircare product by readers of "Allure" magazine more than once -- try it & if you have frizzy hair I guarantee you'll understand, too.

My hair is thick, naturally wavy/curly & prone to extreme frizziness in the slightest humidity, & I've spent most of my post-pubescent life trying to figure out how to straighten it & control the frizziness. Until I discovered Phytodefrisant, the most effective product I had found was Sebastian's "Laminates" (I've tried virtually *every* product promoted to control frizziness that's been on the U.S. market in the last 30 years), but the silicone eventually built up on my hair & on very humid days I had to use so much of it that my hair was weighed down by the coating & felt "dirty". It "looked" reasonably good (for most of the day), but it certainly didn't feel very good to the touch. However, letting my hair go "curly" was a non-starter because the "curls" became nothing but frizz unless the humidity was close to 100% & if I used the "Laminates," it only destroyed my hair's ability to curl & simply made my hair look "dirty" & unstyled.

By contrast, just a teaspoon of Phytodefrisant allows me to blow-dry my hair to soft, sleek, straight smoothness, with no residue detectible at all to the touch. The first time I used it, what struck me the most was how "natural" & "bouncy" my hair felt to the touch (I know, I know, I sound like a TV commercial, but this is *really* true!). I could run my fingers through my smooth, straight hair without detecting the slightest residue of the product & even after a month of daily use there is absolutely *no* build up whatsoever. On days when I want to wear my hair "curly", a single teaspoon allows my hair to dry naturally into crisp, bouncy curls without the slightest evidence of frizziness all day, no matter the humidity.

My hair is shoulder-length & this tube lasts me for about 6 months, which breaks down to a cost of 13 cents a day. If buying a tube for this price seems daunting, Phyto includes a small travel-size tube in its "Petites" travel collection, which would allow you to try a variety of their products & which is also sold here at Amazon.com last time I checked. If you want more reviews from people who take their haircare seriously, check out the numerous rave reviews for Phytodefrisant on makeupalley dot com, where this is one of the highest rated products by a picky demographic group that takes personal care products very, very seriously! ;

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: And I thought it was just another half-assed product...
review_text: ...to my suprise though, it was wonderful!  I didn't buy this product on Amazon.com, I picked it up at Sephoria at the mall.  This product is a bit expensive, but so far, it's been worth it.  I've been using for 5 days now, you apply it to wet hair, after shampoing.  When you do, you can feel your hair becoming so smooth and shiny.  I love this product so far, it's all natural too and it really does work.  It isn't going to make your hair 100% straight, no, I gave up on that a long time ago.  What is it going to do is straighten the hair enough, make it managable, and beautiful.  For once, I don' thave to hide behind my hat :)  Will buy again

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: Even MY hair can be sleek?
review_text:
I have used this a total of 3 times so far and I can already see a difference.
My hair is kinky/curly/unruly. It's fair and I do highlight so I am prone to dryness on the ends.  And frizz?  My worst enemy. The real test will be when the hot/humid weather comes to town.  
But so far, so good.  It's worth every penny

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: This really is a wonderful product!!
review_text: I have horrible hair. And I live in Florida, where non-frizzy hair is impossible for me....until now. I am not happy about the price, but will continue to buy. If you have frizzy unmanageable hair, this product will help you out a lot

product_name: Philosophy Amazing Grace To Go: Beauty
title: Love this product
review_text: It arrived on time and in great shape, very protected mailing, I will be buying more

product_name: Clinique Exfoliating Scrub: Beauty
title: Exfoliate your way to better skin!
review_text: Love this product, with the anti-bacterial soap and cleansing toner, my skin has never been clearer! love it:

product_name: Dermablend Quick Fix - 0.2 oz: Beauty
title: Excellent coverage!
review_text:
This is an excellent product!  Just hard to find!
Does exactly what it says it will do.  Covers scars & imperfections.  I am able to get a smooth finish on my face after covering bad spots with this & then regular makeup on top.  Doesn't cake up when covering "black eyes" either

product_name: Happy by Clinique for Women 3.4 oz Perfume Spray: Beauty
title: Perfectly Happy
review_text: This is the best smelling perfume I've ever encountered--and the only one I've gotten compliments from strangers on.  It's fresh & clean--not heavy and overpowering like many other fragrances.  I keep trying other perfumes out of curiousity, but I always come back to `Happy'

product_name: Happy by Clinique for Women 3.4 oz Perfume Spray: Beauty
title: Yes!!
review_text: I got this perfume as a gift, and I'm absolutely in love with it!  It's light, refreshing, citrusy, but it's wonderfully softened by pretty floral notes. Nicely feminine, but very contemporary and sophisticated--it's not like the heavy floral perfumes of the old days. I like it so much I went out and bought the Happy body wash--it just brings my mornings alive and takes some of the pain out of getting up for work.  I also bought the Happy body lotion which I smooth on after my shower.  This gives me a fragrance foundation that I then top off with the perfume.  It's a wonderful way to set out into the world, wrapped in a beautiful, light, refreshing fragrance, and it's not overpowering for everyone else--in fact, I've gotten lots of compliments on my perfume.  It's nice to be noticed!

product_name: Bobbi Brown Eye Shadow: Beauty
title: Nice Eye Shadow
review_text: Nice eyeshadow that works as an eyeliner. I don't use it much but when I do it lasts and looks great

product_name: Kerastase Nutritive Bain Oleo-Relax Shampoo - 8.5 oz: Beauty
title: Best Shampoo Ever
review_text: I have thick wavy hair that frizzes at the drop of a hat.  This shampoo work great.  My hair is softer and smoother than I have ever been ever to get it.  Love this product!!

product_name: Estee Lauder DayWear Plus Cream: Beauty
title: daywear plus
review_text: a great moisturizer and sunscreen--necesary in the New Mexico climate. Goes on like silk; not greasy

product_name: Chanel Levres Scintillantes Lip-gloss: Beauty
title: Miracle lip gloss!
review_text: This is excellent lip gloss. I agree with the previous reviewer. It lasts for a very long time, doesn't feel sticky or liquidy, and doesn't taste bad. Unfortunately, the price is painful at which to look and on the wallet, but it's worth it. I've only tried one color (because of the price) and I think it works very well with my natural skin tones (I use 'Cry Baby'). Next time you're looking for a new lip gloss, check out this one. It's definitely worth it

product_name: Chanel Levres Scintillantes Lip-gloss: Beauty
title: Luxurious
review_text: This lip gloss is so wonderful, I don't know where to start.  Long lasting shine, perfect color, goes on smooth-doesn't feel sticky or gummy like some glosses do, mild fruity flavor.  I HIGHLY recommend this lip gloss to anyone-the expense is worth it 100X over

product_name: Blinc Kiss Me Mascara: Beauty
title: amaziingggg
review_text: Kiss me Mascara does exactly what it tells you. try it you'll LOVE IT. its totally worth the $25!!!

product_name: Blinc Kiss Me Mascara: Beauty
title: The best mascara I have ever used
review_text: This mascara truely is smudge and flake proof.  It is also waterproof.  The best part is you don't need to buy make up remover.  An amazing product and you will love it.  I have been using it forever.  Try it and you will love it.

product_name: Blinc Kiss Me Mascara: Beauty
title: Really stays on.
review_text: This stuff was great. It wasn't too thick going on, so it separated my lashes really well. I forgot to wash it off and went to bed, and I didn't have any smudges on me in the morning

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana Pour Homme: Beauty
title: I AM WEARING IT RIGHT NOW!!!!!!!
review_text: I love this cologne.It has a great first spray smell and smells even better when you let it sit for a while. I like to were it when i work out cause when i start to sweat the smell gets stronger. I'm no scientist but this is the only cologne that has ever done that for me. I honestly come out of the gym smelling better then when i went in. I love this colonge and it drives girls crazy!!!!!!!!!!

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana Pour Homme: Beauty
title: Have you ever been in heaven?
review_text: If no, then you will definitely experience this feeling with Dolce&Gabbana Eau de Toilette..
