product_name: Dior Fahrenheit: Beauty
title: Good Stuff
review_text:
I admit I have not used a ton of different types of cologne, but out of all of them, Fahrenheit is the greatest. I purchased a small bottle of this stuff about 4 or 5 years ago. I still have some left, I just can't bring myself to finish it off, I think I might have 20 or so sprays left.

Sure it is masculine, but it is not by any means musky. It has a somewhat sweeter scent than average, when it comes to stuff like this geared for a dude. It just smells awesome and thats what counts

product_name: Lancome Juicy Tubes Lip Gloss Ultra Shiny Spring Fling: Beauty
title: Big a Beautiful
review_text: ~These really fill out your lips, and give them good color and shine. But you have to constantly put it on, if you are on a dinner date type thing or just eating and drinking, then I wouldnt recomend it. Dancing or just hanging out, it's perfect for it

product_name: Lancome Juicy Tubes Lip Gloss Ultra Shiny Spring Fling: Beauty
title: Sun Bronze and Miracle are the Best!
review_text: These glosses are so beautiful. They coat in the most lucious way and another plus is they don't leave you feeling like you have tar on your lips. Another thing is the colors don't look artificial. So many times does a gloss make you look like a clown if you pick the wrong color. However this just looks awesome. It stays with you for a while too. The only thumbs down is on the taste factor. I expect glosses to be flavorful and these aren't. But with all the grandeur of the product, I can't give it less than 5 stars. A note to buyers: the colors on here aren't the actual colors. Like Sun Bronze is a lot lighter and glistens. Miracle also is a pale shade of sparkling pink. On the bright side every color looks good on everyone so buy buy buy! A little pricy but worth it compared to how long it lasts compared to all the other duds out there.

product_name: Pre de Provence Shea Butter Enriched 250g Bath Soap - Milk: Beauty
title: Excellent!
review_text: Love this soap. No residue and keeps you nice and clean! I am a lover of natural products, and this one is on the top of my list

product_name: The Body Shop Cocoa Butter Lip Care Stick: Beauty
title: Smells good and works.
review_text: I get really dry and chapped lips in the winter and this completely fixed them.  It protects from the cold dry weather and it is a good moisturizer even in warm and sunny conditions.  Plus I love the cocoa scent

product_name: SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic - 1 oz: Beauty
title: You will see a difference!
review_text:
I just discovered this 3 weeks ago. A woman with perfect skin told me when she first tried it she saw a huge difference. I didn't like the way my skin looked for the first couple days. It felt a little greasy and heavy (and kind of has a bacon grease type scent) but I stuck to it and am now getting compliments on my radiance!
Though that might be partly due to my yoga program!
I like that this helps protect the skin from sun. I use it under skinceuticals spf 20 which I love also

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns shampoo, conditioner, & shower gel: Beauty
title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT....
review_text: MY DAUGHTER AND I LOVE THIS PRODUCT.  WE BOTH LOVE THE SCENT AND THE WAY IT LATHERS AND I LOVE THE WAY IT FEELS ON MY SKIN.  I WILL USE IT AGAIN AND AGAIN

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns shampoo, conditioner, & shower gel: Beauty
title: Smells great, but...
review_text: This stuff smells great, but I don't use it as a shampoo because it's very drying. I don't see any conditioning effects, either. But, as far as a shower gel, it's wonderful

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns shampoo, conditioner, & shower gel: Beauty
title: Cinna buns 3 in 1
review_text: Can't get enough of that smell! I think it should be a 2 in 1, just shampoo & shower gel b/c there's no real conditioning.  Still love it and use if mainly for shower gel and occas shampoo b/c i color my hair.  Doesn't fade dark color

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns shampoo, conditioner, & shower gel: Beauty
title: Yummy
review_text: Smells fantsatic.  Exactly like cinnamon buns fresh out of the oven.  Also lathers well and produces a wonderful bubble bath.  This is one of my all time favorites

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns shampoo, conditioner, & shower gel: Beauty
title: YUMMMY
review_text: This smells so good. I love the Philosophy line and my favorites are Cinnamon Buns, EggNog and blackberry. Dont use this if you are in a hurry, becuz you will want to linger as long as you can in the shower! The only downfall is the scent does not last for more then a few mins on your skin, but lasts awhile engulfing your bathroom in a yummy cinnamon buns scent

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns shampoo, conditioner, & shower gel: Beauty
title: Cinnamon Buns is GREAT
review_text:
LOVE this stuff!  It smells wonderful, it lathers up rich and thick and works just as well as a shampoo as it does a body wash.
Fantastic!

product_name: RALPH LAUREN BLUE For Women By RALPH LAUREN eau de toilette: Beauty: Ralph Lauren
title: Classic
review_text: I keep coming back to this one; lovely fragrance, very fresh, but not girly in my opinion.  Never gets old, and you don't smell it on a lot of people.  Ralph Lauren knows his stuff, fragrance-wise.

product_name: RALPH LAUREN BLUE For Women By RALPH LAUREN eau de toilette: Beauty: Ralph Lauren
title: This Smells  Clean & Fresh I Love it
review_text: I love the smell of this it's fresh a new smelling (a young lady type perfume) I get compliments from it a lady once smelled it on me and went straight back out of line and came back and bought it because she liked it soooo much (I work at a dept store) If you like watery fresh clean with a touch of flower type sent u will love this

product_name: RALPH LAUREN BLUE For Women By RALPH LAUREN eau de toilette: Beauty: Ralph Lauren
title: Absolutely First-Class
review_text: I have a habit of stopping by perfume counters way too often, and have a fair collection to show for it. However, about a year and a half ago I came across Blue. I had done my usual trick of not wearing any perfume to the mall, then stopping by to sample a scent or two, then wander around to do my shopping..this way I can tell what the scent is like on me after a bit of time. Blue had me hooked immediately. It has now become my absolute scent of choice...I have had complete strangers, both men and women literally stop me in the grocery store, at the mall, at work, EVERYWHERE just to ask me what I am wearing. It is light, not overpowering...I am not a fan of the heavy florals, and so this is ideal for me. I personally love it, but the staggering amount of compliments from friends and total strangers alike has confirmed that this perfume is beautiful, light, elegant and fresh, and yet most definitely makes a statement.  I cannot recommend this highly enough...just try it on for the day the next time you go to a department store. I can virtually guarantee  that you will head back to pick some up...it is truly that lovely

product_name: RALPH LAUREN BLUE For Women By RALPH LAUREN eau de toilette: Beauty: Ralph Lauren
title: Ralph Blue is Floral Bliss!
review_text: This scent is amazing! Ralph Blue has a floral scent, it smells like a exotic bouquet of flowers. It is sexy and fun. I think people of all ages will enjoy this scent. What is neat about this fragrance is that this is a scent that uses surface area, moisture and body heat to achieve its maximum bloom! so all of these factors considered, this scent is going to vary from person to person, so no two are going to smell exactly alike :) Also the blue bottle is gorgeous!

product_name: MenScience Advanced Face Lotion (Ultralight. Oil Free. Matte Finish) 4oz. Normal or Sensitive Skin.: Beauty
title: Great product.
review_text: I've used many other facial lotions before but none compare to this one. Such a high quality product

product_name: MenScience Advanced Face Lotion (Ultralight. Oil Free. Matte Finish) 4oz. Normal or Sensitive Skin.: Beauty
title: Moisturizing and not greasy
review_text: Great for moisturizing dry and rough skin. I live in a humid area, so it's important for me not to have to put a heavy lotion or cream on my skin. This lotion leaves my face feeling good, and not greasy or slimy at all.

product_name: MenScience Advanced Face Lotion (Ultralight. Oil Free. Matte Finish) 4oz. Normal or Sensitive Skin.: Beauty
title: Awesome for humid weather...
review_text: This Face Lotion is the best; it doesn't leave my face greasy. I even use it on my hands and elbows. It's Great

product_name: MenScience Advanced Face Lotion (Ultralight. Oil Free. Matte Finish) 4oz. Normal or Sensitive Skin.: Beauty
title: Face Lotion for Winter
review_text:
This product works wonders over the winter months.  I didn't realize how it prevents dry skin until after I stopped using it for a few days during the winter.  From my experience, this product doesn't leave an oily film on your face or make you shine for hours under the lights.  Unlike other products, I don't feel like a teenager going thru acne again.

The price for the quality is worth it and the amount you need to apply makes the cost per application comparable to other products

product_name: MenScience Advanced Face Lotion (Ultralight. Oil Free. Matte Finish) 4oz. Normal or Sensitive Skin.: Beauty
title: This is the best moisturizer I've used
review_text: This is an amazing product. It is probably the lightest product I have used, providing a lot of moisture but basically leaving no residue and just a soft, matte feel. This line makes really advanced skincare products and the ingredients on this product such as hyluronic acid and alpha/beta hydroxy acids are usually only found on the best skincare lines. I really like the fact that the product has no added fragance and comes in a generous 6oz bottle, when most of the other men's moisturizers come in 2-2.5 oz containers. I will definitively try other products of this line

product_name: Eclipse Halo Lighted Wall 5X Mirror: Beauty
title: Eclipse Halo Lighted Wall 5X Mirror
review_text: Great Mirror, my wife loves it, she even installed it herself.

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: Liqud Gold!
review_text: I love this stuff!  Too bad it is so PRICEY (for my pocketbook, anyways).  I have long, fine hair that TANGLES so easily.  This stuff works magic on it.  Changes the texture of it to soft.  You dont need to use that much of it--a dimes worth, so even if it is expensive, you know its gonna last you a long time.  Def worth it

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: excellent product!
review_text:
I have long, straight hair. I am not really big on using hair products, but I use just a half- dime size of this stuff. I love it because it is light (it is like i didnt add anything extra to my hair), leaves my hair very silky soft, helps control some of that extra static, and smells great! :) 
The bottle lasts a pretty long time- I have had mine for over a year now and it a small size.

product_name: Mustela PhysiObebe: Beauty
title: Great for baby acne
review_text: My son had some baby acne and his face was a little dry.  They said not use soap on his face and I didn't think it ever felt as clean as I wanted it to.  So I tried this and the Mustela Bebe face lotion and the acne cleared and his face is nice an soft now.  It has a nice scent as well, not the usual baby scent that everyone knows and loves though.  But is still nice

product_name: Mustela PhysiObebe: Beauty
title: excellent cleanser for sensitive skin
review_text:
I am thrilled with this product, which is great for diaper changes and wipe ups (face, nose area, hands).  It truly requires no rinsing and has been wonderful when used on both my sensitive skin daughters aged 2 and 10 months. We have never experienced a negative reaction to this product and its light, clean scent is divine.

Chris in Cherry Hill, N

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics 10: Beauty
title: I look fabulous Darhling...
review_text: I love this stuff!  The pink on the high of the cheek bone really lifts your whole face and the darker line beneath, gave my face a fantastic elegant look. A definite for that red carpet feel, although I wear it everyday.  No-one can quite work out why I look so good, I'm sure everyone thinks I've had botox....

product_name: Fair Trade Foot Lotion by LUSH: Beauty
title: Pink Pepperminty Cream for Feet
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
LUSH continues to amaze with each and every item I try lately. This Fair Trade Foot Lotion works perfectly as a daily foot lotion or is perfect in combination with the Volcano Foot mask for occasional pampering. 

Almond oil, cocoa butter, spearmint, peppermint and Tagetes Minuta flower oil blend perfectly together in this delicately pink lotion. The results are pretty impressive and the moisturizing benefits last overnight. The lotion soothes and moisturizes and leaves your feet with a little pepperminty tingle. I'll be using this a lot in the summer! 

Quite possibly my favorite foot lotion find! If love this, you will totally fall for "Smitten." 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Fair Trade Foot Lotion by LUSH: Beauty
title: one of my favorites!
review_text: It feels all tingly and cold on my feet. Perfect after a hard day of walking or shopping. It's perfect for people who are on there feet all day likes sales associates and moms too who are chasing kids all over the place all day long. This is one of my favorite products. It also helped my rough callouses to become smoother. Highly recommended

product_name: Fair Trade Foot Lotion by LUSH: Beauty
title: A really wonderful foot cream
review_text: This cream is loaded with cocoa butter (obtained by Fair Trade) and scented with spearmint, my favorite mint. It is soothing and cooling. It is nice rubbed all the way from foot to knee and really works well. The scent is strong--LOTS of SPEARMINT. That's the best part of it, as this is cooling for the feet and keeps them smelling clean and nice long after you bathe

product_name: Fair Trade Foot Lotion by LUSH: Beauty
title: Excellent Treat For Rough And Tired Feet
review_text:
I honestly thought I was going to have to give this one a lower star rating. Upon receiving this item in the mail, I dove right in. The one drawback that immediately hit me was the smell. It basically smells like mint toothpaste. I knew it was going to be minty, just not quite so minty. So I smoothed some on and rubbed it up to my ankles. The sensation was very cool and I was surprised how oily and slippery my feet were. I'm used to most feet creams sinking in and kind of dissapearing. 

So, my initial thought was pleasant, but kind of wierd. Now I have to say though, that as a soother and moisterizer it works great. My feet are are very soft and it works at the rough parts of me feet very well. I'm excited to try this with an exfoliater of some sort. 

I took away one start for the toothpaste smell, but really this is an awesome product. In the summer I'll probably keep this stuff in the fridge. I imagine it would feel great when really really cold after a long day of work

product_name: Fair Trade Foot Lotion by LUSH: Beauty
title: Quick to absorb and smells wonderful!
review_text:
I have been using Fair Trade Foot Lotion for about a week now and have really noticed a difference.  I live in Hawaii and constantly wear slippers (flip flops, thongs, etc.) so my feet are exposed to the elements 24/7.  

For the past several months, I have been having very sore feet (aches when I walk on them).  I have since discovered LUSH's Fair Trade Foot Lotion and their foot mask Volcano (see my review).  Even though I just started using the lotion, with continued use of both, I have noticed a decrease in soreness and my feet look WONDERFUL!  I've always had cracked, scaly, callus feet, but not anymore.

I would get pedicures just to help with the appearance of my feet, but I haven't gotten one in months now!  Fair Trade Foot Lotion absorbs quickly as long as you don't use too much and makes your feet feel so refreshing.  I just put a little on at night and my feet are good to go the next morning!

Definitely give this one a try

product_name: Fair Trade Foot Lotion by LUSH: Beauty
title: ARE YOU A SCANDAL IN YOUR SANDALS?
review_text:
If you're a scandal in your sandals due to winter neglect better hot foot it out and buy some Fair Trade Foot Lotion.  Pedicures are wonderful but somehow the effect is lost if the season's hottest color is applied to toes topping rough, unsightly feet.  

	Fair Trade is every bit as pretty as your tootsies will soon be - it's pink and pepperminty.  However, we wise ones know you can't tell a lotion by its color.  The ultimate sole salve, Fair Trade moisturizes with cocoa butter, almond oil, glycerine and lanolin.   Plus, spearmint and peppermint are circulation aides with antifungal properties.  (Foot fungus is a definite turn-off, even if he has a foot fetish).

	Now, after a week or two you'll know the true meaning of sole support, arch support, and fabulous feet.  Why, your now elegant extremities may even put those new Jimmy Choo's to shame.

        - Gail Cooke

product_name: Fair Trade Foot Lotion by LUSH: Beauty
title: Refreshment for tired feet
review_text: My husband and I take a pot of then when we go on holiday, and after a long day of walking around, we come home with sore feet and massage each other's with Fair Trade until we feel that we can stand up again. It's brilliant stuff, and probably the only way we've made it back out of the hotel for dinner some nights

product_name: Pink Sugar by Aquolina for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: A tale from a Pink Sugar addict...
review_text:
After years of searching I've finally found the perfect perfume. Pink Sugar makes me feel fabulous when I wear it; it's so light and `warm' with a base of sensual vanilla. I have the large bottle, body mousse & deodorent at home, and the smaller bottle in my handbag. I don't get bored with this fragrence, like I do with everything else I've tried over the years.

The first time I wore Pink Sugar to work one colleague commented on the aroma of drinking chocolate as I was in the lift with her. The next time I was in the lift, everyone commented on my lovely vanilla perfume. After I applied a freshen up spray, another colleague said she could smell cakes! Yet another colleague demanded to know what I was wearing, and where she could get some. Strangers come up to me in the street to ask what scent I'm wearing...

No this isn't a cheesy ad, it really happened!! 


What do I sense first? Liquorice, a rich aniseed scent that gradually settles into a middle note of caramel. Marshmallow is the first word that springs to mind to me. 

If you like Angel, Fantasy or Princess you need to give this a try!



 *Aquolina needs to make Pink Sugar available to the U.K. - Postage and packing costs a fortune!!!

product_name: Laura Mercier Mineral Eye Powder: Beauty
title: AN EYE SHADOW WITH A "WOW" FACTOR
review_text:
Yep, this is an eye shadow, but one with a WOW factor.  It's a fine silky powder that applies easily (with Laura's Wet/Dry Definition Brush) and stays from  crow of the rooster to  coach turning into a pumpkin.

	The Mineral Eye Powders collection comes in six shades ranging from a soft almost nude to a midnight hue with blues and greens in between.  My current favorites are "Milky Way" - a moonlit sheen and "Eclipse."	

	When used dry these powders deliver a subtle shimmer all over  the eye; wet is your choice for added definition or to be used as a liner.

	Love the packaging - a small pot with an opening for brush and a snap lid - no mess no fuss, only great looking eyes!

        - Gail Cook

product_name: Laura Mercier Mineral Eye Powder: Beauty
title: So Much Fun; What Beautiful Looks!
review_text:
Think of it as loose eye shadow and eyeliner . . . with a kick. Laura Mercier Mineral Eye Powders are so incredibly versatile and can be applied wet or dry, as shadow or as liner, that it's possible to create endless different looks that range from casual and pretty to stunning and dramatic. Choosing to apply wet or dry will not only change to application but will give you beautifully different textures and definitions and degrees of sparkle.  

Using the mineral eye powder wet will make the color and look more intense and defined but will give it less sparkle. You'll also get an increase in the wear and the added option of using the powder as a liner. Using the powders dry will give them the most sparkle punch.

Laura Mercier Mineral Eye Powders come in six different shades -- two light colors: Milky Way & Galaxy and two intense colors: Meteor, Eclipse, Constellation, & Asteroid.

All Laura Mercier eye products are ophthalmologist and dermatologist tested.


Color Notes:

Milky Way - a very light, barely pink, opalescent color that will not only add silver toned sparkle but will lighten the feature or eye shadow color on which it is applied. Choose this color if you want to highlight and lighten.
 
Galaxy - a very light, barely grey-taupe color that will add gold tone sparkle but will otherwise blend into all but the darkest skin colors. Choose this color if you want the starstruck look but don't otherwise want to change your eye shadow color. This color will also work well on other areas of the face. Try putting just a dab in the inside corner of each eye for a real, yet subtle, eye pop.

Meteor - an intense color of green in the forest family with silver toned sparkle. Makes the most amazing eye liner color. 

Eclipse - an intense color of black with silver sheen. Makes a classic looking eyeliner color but with the updated twist of star struck sparkle.

Constellation - an intense color of purple that's similar to Laura's famous Black Violet Kohl Pencil. The sparkle on this one is gold tone. Women with green or hazel eyes will love how Constellation makes their eye color really pop. 

Asteroid - An intense color of dark blue with silver sheen. Makes a beautiful eye liner for brown and blue eyes and will help remove redness from the eyes of any shade. 


Basic "how to use" tips:
    * To line the eyes: dampen Wet/Dry Definer Brush with water, dip into one of the four darker shades, and mix to desired consistency. I like to use the back of my hand as a `palette' to mix the powder. To increase the shimmer, apply more powder on top of the eyeliner but this time use the brush dry. To further lengthen the wear of the powder as a liner, first line the eyes with one of Laura's Kohl Eye Pencils and then apply the powder on top.  This will also give your liner extra sheen.
    * To use as eye color: dampen Wet/Dry Definer Brush with water, dip into a darker shade and mix to desired consistency, once again using the back of the hand. Apply to eyelid and blend color with Ponytail Brush or apply directly to the eyelid with the dry brush- using wet leaves a sheen finish, using dry leaves a sparkly finish.

Fun "how to use" tips:
-Try Meteor as a shadow, lined with the Eclipse, and smudge Constellation all around for that smokey smudgy look.
-Cover your entire eyelid with Milky Way and line with Asteroid.
-Put dots of Galaxy in the inside corners of your eyes and just apply mascara

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: FOR A SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy! 

Gail Cook

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Vanilla scent not so bad!
reviewer: Lindsey Justice "MAC addict, and reader of many things"
review_text: I'm REALLY anal about scented/flavored lipglosses- especially ones scented or flavored with vanilla, but MAC LipGlass isn't that vanilla-ish at all!  It's got very pigmented color, it stays on a LONG time for a gloss, and each tube lasts a long time...  Don't let what the other reviewer said about the vanilla scent throw you off

product_name: Tweezerman Thin Loop Skin Care Tool: Beauty
title: It's a great tool if you know how to use it!
review_text: As a cosmetologist this tool is amazing! If you don't know how to use it, I could see how it would be frustrating. It works wonderfully and does not abrade or damage the dermal layer like using your fingers. It's a great way to remove comedones in a sterile and effective way

product_name: Marc Jacobs 3 Ways to Wear Marc: Beauty
title: Daughter's Must have gift
review_text: My daughter saw this and just had to have it for Christmas. I ordered it on Dec 22 and had it by Dec 26th. I was pleased to get it so quickly by reqular shipping. My daughter was very pleased

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: FOR A SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy! 

Gail Cook

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: A MIRROR SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy!

product_name: Calvin Klein cK One: Beauty
title: love this one!
reviewer: Katie Sachetti "just a girl in her mid-20s!"
review_text: this has been MY SCENT since high school...almost 10 years ago!  i still love it now!  i still get compliments on it!  definitely my favorite

product_name: Calvin Klein cK One: Beauty
title: Smells So Good!
review_text: I love cK One! It has a very sweet, subtle, citrusy fragrance; and on me, friends and family just rave about it!! (Even my orthodontist had complimented it once). Too bad the scent doesn't last very long. After a couple of hours, a re-touch is neccessary. That's my only pet-peeve, but no star is deducted. This is not a perfume and I don't expect the scent to be long-lasting. I think this fragrance is great for everyday use. If cK One complements with your body chemistry, then don't hesitate to buy it

product_name: Calvin Klein cK One: Beauty
title: Nice relaxed fragrance
review_text: This is a nice, light daytime fragrance that's pleasant to wear on weekends and other casual times. (For evenings, nothing comes between me and my Must de Cartier!) It's citrusy but has a little more depth and balance to it so you don't go around smelling like the fruit stand at the store.  This was the first unisex fragrance I ever tried and I was surprised that I liked it, though it's a bit "soft" for my husband's taste so I'll never get him to try it. That's probably for the better, I'd hate to start sharing fragrances with him.

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana Pour Femme: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text: I asked a lady in airport what her perfume was called. I found this perfume in my travels and I get stopped all the time. What a great find

product_name: Ralph by Ralph Lauren for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: I still wear it
review_text: This was the first gift my then boyfriend now fiancee, ever gave to me. That was over 4 years ago, and I still love the scent. Especially since it's not too strong for casual every day wear, but noticeable enough to get compliments.

product_name: Ralph by Ralph Lauren for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Ralph Lauren, Ralph, AMAZING
review_text: Ralph Lauren's Ralph is one of the best perfumes i have EVER bought! It not only smells GREAT but the bottle is absolutley charming.  It is worth every penny because it really DID stay on all day! I reccomend you buy it as soon as possible

product_name: Lancome Hypnose Mascara: Beauty
title: Lives up to the Hype
review_text: So I read all the reviews here before purchasing it and decided I'd give it a go due to all the good feedback...And I'm so glad I did! I've been a regular Lancome mascara user for awhile- started with Definicils, went to L'Extreme, but this is what I'm sticking with.  My lashes look loooong...and that's saying a lot because I have some pretty puny lashes.  Not only does it lengthen, but it seperates and thickens.  I also bought the Cils Booster (I think that's what it's called - it's the Lancome mascara primer) and my lashes just pop.  Great product

product_name: Lancome Hypnose Mascara: Beauty
title: People from other counters even want to buy it!!
review_text:
I first purchased Hypnose for my wedding last summer and I absolutely loved it!  I should be a spokesperson for Lancome because I refer this product to everyone when they talk about my beautiful, thick lashes.  I recently went into Bath and Body shop and a saleswoman was trying to get me to buy their mascara.  That day I didnt have any on, so I told her that I already had a product that would make her go shop at Lancome.  I told her to stand on the side of me while I applied it.  She was in shock.  "Oh my gosh-Look at how your lashes just grew!  She had me stop while she grabbed another store clerk and a customer.  She went on break and we walked to the Lancome counter and she bought some right then!

My only problem with this mascara is that it is so thick, you must use a creamy makeup remover to get it off.  Using a liquid will just frustrate you because it will do nothing.  Also, never accidentally fall asleep with it on because it will be there in the morning! It lasts through tears, sweat and even the pool.  Truly a wonderful produc

product_name: Lancome Hypnose Mascara: Beauty
title: True love!
review_text:
I'm the type of girl who has always been searching for that perfect mascara, and I finally found it! I wont switch to anything else, ever! I have long lashes, but thin and when wearing this mascara I get compliment after compliment, who wouldnt want that? 

To add a little oomph and a pop I also use Defencils mascara primer. Lashes to die for

product_name: Lancome Hypnose Mascara: Beauty
title: Absolutely Amazing.
review_text: I am a 19 year old Cosmetology student, so trust me, I've tried out probably 100 different mascaras in the past 2 years. Lancome's Hypnose is my absolute favorite, hands down the best all-around mascara. It does it all for your lashes. It really brightens your eyes, and brings out your beauty :). It is especially good if you are looking for a thickening mascara

product_name: Herbalism Vegan Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great green stuff!
review_text: I've only used this twice so far (last night and this morning) but already I've noticed my skin is not as oily and it's really soft after I rinse it off.  I'm intrigued by the entire Lush product line - glad I stumbled upon this.  I've got some samples on the way (won off an auction site) and I can't wait to try them.  Also, this seller was awesome when UPS for some reason thought I moved.  When I called Lush a live person answered the phone and called UPS for me.  UPS called me within 30 minutes and offered to bring it out that night.  Wonderful!!  My skin is oily with lg pores and blackheads - go ahead and give this a try if this sounds like your skin.  The only drawback is it's a little on the messy side but not too bad

product_name: Herbalism Vegan Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great for oily skin
review_text:
Works great for combination skin!
Herbalism is meant for oily skin; however I find it perfect for my combination skin.  It never leaves my skin dry or patchy, and throughout the day my skin has a nice matte look, thanks to the rice bran in the cleanser.  

I tried this as a sample and although it worked really well, I didn't care for the strong herbal scent of Herbalism and I didn't like the rose petals in the cleanser because they `got in the way' or just fell in the sink as I cleansed.  I prefer a cleanser with a more uniform consistency (like LUSH's Angels on Bare Skin; see my review), so I only buy Herbalism in small quantities (less than $5 amounts) and use it when my face is really feeling oily.  Other wise I use LUSH's Ocean Salt or Angels on Bare Skin as my nightly cleanser.

Still an overall great product!

product_name: Herbalism Vegan Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: Changed my facial skin
review_text: I have oily asian skin and I have tried the other lush facial cleansers (fresh farmacy, angels on bare skin, and aquamarina) and this is the one that has greatly improved the quality of my facial skin. I use it once a day after coming from work and before going to bed. It has just taken care of my skin. I've had late nights, stressful times, lack of sleep, sometimes I haven't been able to wash my face at all. To top it off, I'm a smoker. Since using this product, I've gone through those and I've only gotten 3 pimples. When that happens to me, my face is usually peppered with blackheads and pimples. Herbalism has really taken care of my facial skin. This stuff is exquisite and a keeper

product_name: Herbalism Vegan Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: The only thing that's worked for me
review_text:
I dont know what they put in it, I just know that it works. Within three days of getting this product from the Chicago LUSH store, my face had cleared up beautifuly.

I've had really awful skin, blackheads, whiteheads, deep cystic acne, since I was around 14, and I've tried anything I could get my hands on to take care of it (Proactive, and everything else)   I had a problem finding a product that would clean up my super oily skin without irritating it because its very very sensitive. This did the trick beautifuly (and followed up with some Celestial mosturizer after some hardcore exfoliation) Made my face feel very soft and smooth after washing instead of all itchy and flakey.  My pores also looked noticably smaller as well.

Plus it smells great

product_name: Herbalism Vegan Skin Cleanser by LUSH: Beauty
title: worked wonders for me..
review_text:
I have combination skin prone to little breakouts. Since using this, my skin feels far more balanced, and I've kissed my breakouts goodbye. 
The product is a fairly thick paste which smells green and fresh and sort of pine-y. I find the best way to use it is to dampen my face, put a little lump (dime-size) on my fingertips and rub it all over like I was washing with a teeny tiny bar of soap. :) It exfoliates really gently and when I rinse off I find I have smooth soft skin that is already moisturized, neither oily nor dry. I use it daily and love it, love it, love it

product_name: Creamy Candy Bath Melt by LUSH: Beauty
title: Yum!
review_text:
The "Creamy Candy Bath Melt" is what turned me on to LUSH in the first place. In addition to vanilla, I absolutely adore sweet candy-type fragrances and this is no exception. The melt moisturizes your skin without leaving it feeling greasy and the smell is yummilicious! I try to order multiples of these at a time so that they are always on hand since I never know when the mood to use one will strike me (I'd use them just about all of the time if I could).

If you like super sweet and girlie, then go for it and try Creamy Candy! :

product_name: Creamy Candy Bath Melt by LUSH: Beauty
title: Very rich moisturizing bath for those with very dry skin
review_text:
This is a super-rich bath for those with very dry skin. The melt is basically oils, a luscious scent, and some soaping or foaming agents to make the oils disperse into the bathwater and not float on top like they would otherwise. It can sometimes be a little too rich for my skin, but I love the scent so I use it occasionally anyway and just rinse off afterwards with some Rock Star soap.

The scent is the lovely Rock Star scent, a vanilla-y candy scent that kids also love.

product_name: Clarins Energizing Morning Cream: Beauty
title: Pretty good stuff
review_text:
I tend to be beauty-frugal, so I tend to expect a modern-day miracle when I spend more than 25 dollars on a beauty product.  
I really like this moisturizer, which feels good and gives my skin a nice, supple feeling for not-too-much product.  

However, no miracle, just a nice skin cream

product_name: Clarins Energizing Morning Cream: Beauty
title: fabulous morning moisturizer
review_text: I love this day cream. It smells great and hydrates beautifully without looking greasy. The only downfall is that it doesn't have SPF, so you have to apply additional sunscreen over it. As for its treatment qualities, I do think it made my skin somewhat more radiant and smoother, and it didn't make me break out. It's a great product for the price

product_name: MD Skincare Men's One-Step Daily Facial Pads 45 Pads: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text: I can't describe how incredibly clean my face feels after using just one pad.  I use one every night before bed, and my skin is noticeably clearer

product_name: Mustela Extra Thick Cleansing Cloths - Wipes Pack of 70 wipes: Beauty
title: BEST wipes!!
review_text: I disagree with the negative reviews. These wipes are the softest and softer than the Kirkland wipes. My husband couldn't use the pamper wipes since they would cause sever redness on my 1st born's butt area. It was raw. Once we switched to Mustela, no matter how hard my husband wipes, our baby's skin is still nice and soft. We have used this since our 1st born and we are on our third. The smell is nice and not powerfull. I love the wipes

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Full Volume Shampoo: Beauty
title: Great volume
review_text: This is quite a good shampoo for fine hair.  I did get a lot of volume, but it also made my hair feel a bit dry at the ends.  I've found LUSH's Big shampoo to give me the volume and it makes my hair feel healthy and silky as well.  This is still good, but not quite as good

product_name: Dior DiorSkin Sculpt Line-Smoothing LIfting Makeup SPF 20: Beauty
title: A little goes a long way
review_text: This stuff is costly but a little of it goes a long way. The texture of this is perfect. It's creamy but not overly moist. It sets nicely and has a natural dewy finish with a medium coverage. It never looks cakey or overly done like other medium formulations. I can use a dallop the size of a quarter for almost a week. At that rate I think a bottle should last a very long time. Its also the only brand that perfectly matches my very fair skin (of course how it matches you depends entirely on you!)

product_name: Dior DiorSkin Sculpt Line-Smoothing LIfting Makeup SPF 20: Beauty
title: Voluptuous Foundation - Facelift in a bottle
review_text:
While in Sephora looking for a new Nars lipstick, a pretty Dior rep approached me.  I would have normally declined her offer of a mini-make-over, but I was feeling rather adventurous and wanted to update some of my make-up items, so I followed her to her chair where she went to work on me.  

I have to say, in the past, I have been nonplussed and unimpressed with makeovers like these.  But when the rep handed me the mirror, I gasped.  Even under the harsh lighting, my complexion looked pretty darn flawless for a youthful grandmother trying to hold on to any vestige of good looks.  

I bought the foundation, along with the finishing powder and a few other Dior goodies.  I figured I would probably use it a few times and realize it didn't really look as good on me at home or in the office as it did when the Dior rep did my makeup in the store.  Then I would experience buyer's remorse and continue my quest for the perfect foundation. 

Lucky for me, I was wrong.  This product has become one of my top choices for foundation.  It doesn't settle in the fine lines around my eyes, or in my pores.  Instead, it does what it says -- smooths out my complexion. The color chosen for me looks natural with no lines of demarcation. And the coverage is what I prefer at this stage in my life.  

I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I am still searching for this type of lush coverage that gives my combo skin less shine by mid-day.  But for now, I will finish using the bottle, and probably purchase another, which is something I haven't done with other foundations in some time.  

My biggest tip with this foundation is a little goes a long way.  The Dior rep used a make-up brush and that tends to give more of a sheer, even coverage.  At $50, it wouldn't seem to be a bargain, but if you use it as I've described, it should last you several months.

product_name: Dior DiorSkin Sculpt Line-Smoothing LIfting Makeup SPF 20: Beauty
title: Best foundation ever!
review_text: I am 42 years old. This is the best makeup I have ever used. It is a bit more expensive than most but worth every penny! I have always used a top quality makeup. I have tried others and never found one good enough to switch till now.

product_name: Dior DiorSkin Sculpt Line-Smoothing LIfting Makeup SPF 20: Beauty
title: WOW! Amazing
review_text: This foundation is worth every penny.  It DOES make your face feel firmer and look younger on the first use. Don't ask me how it works, I don't know, but the tiny lines around my eyes disappeared.  ALSO, it holds up against heat, sweat, tears.  It doesn't rub off on your clothes, either.  The only way I'll ever leave this foundation is if Dior themselves come up with a new improved formula, which I can't see happening.  Try it at the counter, walk around a look at yourself in the mirror.  You'll say, "WOW, Amazing!" TOO

product_name: Karma Kream Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: True story!
review_text:
Walking through airport security just last week, I was stopped by a TSA employee who asked "Who's wearing cologne?!"

I said "Not me!" before realizing that I WAS wearing some karma kream. I said so, and she asked where I'd gotten it. Phew! I was thinking someone had allergies or something and I was one of those people who was wearing too much perfume/lotion/whatever, oblivious to the fact that everyone around them was holding their nose. But she was actually really curious, and followed me past security so she could get the name of the store (Lush!) that sells this great stuff. 

Seriously, it's great! I've never in my life had anyone remark on any perfume or scented lotion I was wearing until I found karma kream, which I received as a sample in a recent order of Lush goodies. Now strangers, relatives, and friends are all asking me where they can get some of this stuff. 

The karma scent is really, really great - citrusy, with a tiny hint of lavendar, pine, and patchouli. You won't smell like a dirty hippie, though, trust me. The patchouli and pine are just bass notes to the main players - orange flower water, citrus, and lavendar scents. So fresh! It's great. Really wakes me up in the morning, and refreshes me during the day if I put some on.

This lotion won't leave your skin feeling greasy, either, like so many moisturizers can. My skin is really thanking me for discovering Lush products. If you want a subtle perfume but don't want something as strong as a concentrated perfume, this lotion is great, and as an added benefit, it will moisturize your skin while you're wearing it! And if you want a light perfume, you can put some karma kream on your neck, arms, or legs to have just a hint of scent.

product_name: Karma Kream Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: KARMA KREAM'S A DREAM
review_text:
Karma might be loosely described as destiny.  It's a  fate that  occurs as  an effect following a cause.  Okay, since we may have some control, what would you like to bring about? (Let's save the arrival of Prince Charming for another time).  If you'd like the effect to be beautiful, soft, touchable, kissable, skin, just smooth on Karma Kream.

	One other effect caused by Karma Kream is a delightful lingering fragrance.  Those nearing  the nape of your neck with notions  of nuzzling  may not be able to identify the subtle bouquet - they'll only know it's irresistible, this blend of Orange Flower Water, Lavender Oil, Lemongrass, Patchouli and other good scents.

	It's said that more people in the world believe in karma than do not.  Hmmmmm, don't know about that.  But, I do know that all of us want good karma and that's  Karma Kream.

	There now, apply Karma Kream before bedtime and rest well secure in the knowledge that your skin will be softer in the morning, and some day your Prince will come.

product_name: The Body Shop Patchouli Perfume Oil: Beauty
title: Wonderful and long lasting
review_text: I love patchouli. Unfortunately, it is very hard to find in pure form.  Often it is mixed with other perfume scents.  The Body Shop offers wonderful products and this perfume oil is no exception. I only hope that they continue offering this scent.  Try it, you won't be disappointed

product_name: Estee Lauder Perfectionist Correcting Serum: Beauty
title: Smoother skin
review_text: This product makes my skin smoother and reduces those irritating little 'age spots'.  I'm 51 and no product is going to make my skin look like I'm 25.  I've used Lauder products for years and this new one is great

product_name: Estee Lauder Perfectionist Correcting Serum: Beauty
title: Great For wrinkles
review_text: I got this item and love it. It really does a great job on wrinkles near my eyes. I am glad Amazon has this amazing item in case I cannot make it to the store come this winter..I will be buying it here..thanks Amzon for letting us buy this wonderful item .

product_name: Lancome Hypnose Mascara: Beauty
title: Literally the BEST mascara!
review_text: Lancome Hypnose mascara is simply the best. I have long eyelashes, but they are blonde and thin on the ends. This mascara makes them look Hollywood Glam and I will never use another mascara

product_name: philosophy exfoliate kit: Beauty
title: WOW! KEEP IT SIMPLE-An Active 37 Year Old Male Says ADIOS ACNE and HELLO FRESH & NEW SKIN!
reviewer: Peter V. Cannice "Peter Vincent Cannice of Scottsdale Arizona"
review_text:
Although most every fitness magazine I read has at least 2 articles about "Health and Beauty/Grooming", I'm still pretty certain that we're, Most Men in General, still in the woods in regard to proper skin care. The times are changing, more rapidly than ever before, and the need for separating the good, the bad and the ugly is HERE!

I'm a fairly active 37 year old male with fairly nice skin, although my Italian heritage prediposes my olive skin to being much oilier than I'd like. I have small areas of "Combination Skin", in addition to my generally oily skin type, which has often been more difficult to manage than anything else. Gone are the days of Vaseline and generic cleansers and moisturizers. Welcome are the days of skin products designed for treat and maintain almost any possible skin type. 

My review is submitted, as I, too, had no idea that "Philosophy" was anything other than one of the hardest classes I ever surived through in College! When I told my close friend, an aspiring and very beautiful female model and actress, that she REALLY had a youthful glow and joked about her having "Some cosmetic work done!", she accepted it quite well and with a big southern smile. She told me that it wasn't plastic surgery and it wasn't any high-tech laser procedure or over-priced exfolliant scrub. Instead, she said she was on the run and would stop by to visit with myself and my spouse after dinner.

Karin came over with a bag full of goodies, everything from home-baked chocolate chip and almond cookies to a gift certificate for a nice eatery in town (since I had mowed her lawe and few times)! But that wasn't the end of the gifts. She proceeded to give us 2 Philosophy Skin Care Products. My spouse had heard of them in a recent review in a popular magazine, but it was all brand new to me. Karin said that it was a gift for both of us and she wanted us both to use the exfoliator AND the moisturizer too. My spouse was thrilled to death with the new "products" and I was more thrilled (at that time) with the warm chocolate chip cookies.

Before bed we started to use the 2 products. Applying quality products was not new to me and over the years I've spent a few thousand in quality products to reduce my oily skin that often lead to acne-even after I turned 30. I didn't expect anything other than the ordinary smoothe and clean feeling after exfoliating, combined with the relaxed and cooling feel of the moisturizer. BOY-What a surprise I was in for!!

This is not a joke and I am not here with any special interest-other than to give a totally honest review of these products. My skin, in just 3 weeks, went from oily (with some combination areas) to normal and from shiny to glowing. Most impressive of all, was that (without any sort of drying effect on my skin) my facial acne is 90% gone. And I'll be truthful in telling you, in this review, that when my face is clear and looks good, I FEEL GOOD TOO!

I didn't have severe acne, but it was enough to consistently bother me and surprise me when I least needed an "outbreak!"
I'm sold on these products and am online to purchase products for my Mom and her 2 Sisters in New York. I used to work as a professional actor and model, mostly doing television commercials and some print work. So I've tried just about everything and I've had some luck with other products-but NOTHING like the overall masculine and finsihed look that Philosophy Products brought to me. I'm 100% sold and I hope that this review was helpful to you. It's from mmy heart and it's the truth. I hope and pray that you have similar or even better results that I have experienced. Good Luck To You! You won't be unhappy with these products, all of which are under a great satisfaction guarantee (another reason I tried them)!

Let me know how it works out!

Peter Cannice
Phoenix, Arizon

product_name: Clinique Superdefense Triple Action Moisturizer SPF 25 - Normal to Oily Skin 1.7 oz: Beauty
title: Wonderful product!
review_text: This is without a doubt one of the best items I've ever bought.  I have very fair, very dry skin.  I need a moisturizer that will give me SPF protection that's over 15 (this has 25) and something that will absorb into my skin, and not feel liked I just smeared Vaseline on my face.  One jar (1.7oz) lasts for a long time, a good 6 months at least!  (A little goes a long way)  Some lotions have an obnoxious smell; even when it does say "fragrance free," this lotion has a clean smell, not bothersome at all.  I really feel like I'm doing something healthy for my skin when I put this on, like I've armed my face with what it needs to get through the day.  "Super Defense" is the right name for this moisturizer!  I do not go out into the day without wearing it.

product_name: Sandalwood Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Excellent Product - Cologne Spray & Shaving Products
review_text:
I discovered the Caswell-Massey line by accident; having bought brushless Burma shave from another internet provider.  When I ran out I searched "Amazon" first and discovered this product.

At any rate, I believe that the scent is accurate.  In addition, the preshave oil followed by their sandlewood shaving cream gives one as close a shave as I have ever experienced.  Used to suffer from 5:00 "shadow", being in sales this is unsightly; after using the C.M. product that is a thing of the past.

This excellent product is expensive.  However, a hot, wet lather shave for this reviewer makes this mundane chore pleasurable.  The badger hair shaving brush is a nice addition or it makes a great gift.  

A British concern, Truefitt and Hill also are of interest to shaving and personal care customers

product_name: Sandalwood Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Under-rated?
review_text: I am also a fanatic of sandalwood products and have searched the world (literally) for same. I have found this brand to be slightly different than one might expect from sandalwood, but still very pleasing. A little pricey, but not more than to be expected for sandalwood. I've also tried their after shave, soap, and shampoo. I've been very satisfied with all of these sandalwood products and will continue to purchase them until I find something better.

product_name: H2O Plus Oil Control Blotting Tissues: Beauty
title: Don't Leave Home witjout them
review_text: Buy several and keep them in all your purses.  They are so handy for keeping you face fresh looking

product_name: Davidoff Cool Water: Beauty
title: One of the Best!
review_text: One of the best fragrances that you could ever buy or give a gift to.  I usually use this for very special occasions or events. It has a cool, refreshing and invigorating scent,yet sophisticated to the touch. Definately a treasure

product_name: Roger & Gallet Gentle Nature Oat Milk Soap with Shea Butter - 7 oz.: Beauty
title: Best soap I have ever used
review_text: This wonderful soap from Roger and Gallet has a great fragrance and lathers very quickly.  It is long-lasting as well with each bar lasting about a month with daily use.  I recommend it highly

product_name: Sea Vegetable Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Not sure at first
reviewer: kitjank "History Buff, artist and lover of all things English"
review_text: The first time I used this soap I didn't like it at all until I got out of the shower and felt my skin.  It was really soft and smooth.  I can't quite agree with the others about the smell though.  I found it kind of medicinal, but it could be just the bar I got.  However it lathers really nicely and everytime I use it my skin is so soft.  So I will buy it again, maybe the next batch will smell a little better

product_name: Sea Vegetable Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Very clean and  refreshing scent
review_text:
This soap is great! It smells like the ocean, really! Seaweed and sea salt gently exfoliate your skin, and pine, lime, and lavendar give it a really fresh scent that leave you feeling clean and rejuvenated after washing with it. 

I'm going to buy a big old chunk of this stuff next time I go to Lush, then cut it myself into a chunk of soap that's mostly seawee/sea salt, to use for scrubbing in the shower, and another that's mostly glycerine, just for washing my hands at the kitchen/bathroom sinks. The smell is great, so I can't limit myself only to using it once a day in the shower, right? Right!

This stuff lathers up better than most other Lush soaps I've tried. The scent is perfect for women OR men - very unisex, which is nice. I really don't like most flowery, female scents. Even my husband used this stuff

product_name: Sea Vegetable Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Very refreshing and a great exfoliator in one!
review_text:
LUSH's Sea Veg soap is one of my favorites.  Perfect for men and women because the scent is more refreshing then anything else.  That's because of the loads of lime in the soap.  This soap gets you super clean and the top of the bar is covered with real seaweed (super mineral rich) and sea salt grains that are great for exfoliating away dead skin.

Though it is a glycerine based soap, it doesn't 'melt' away as fast as I thought it would.  My half-an-inch thick slice has lasted me more then a month and I still have a lot to go.

Highly recommended

product_name: Sea Vegetable Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: HE LAUGHED WHEN I SAID IT WAS SEA VEGETABLE SOAP
review_text:
Yep, my mate grinned when I told him one of my new favorite soaps was Sea Vegetable.  

	He's no longer laughing, he's using MY soap!  Neither masculine nor feminine the scent of Sea Vegetable is  totally refreshing, laced with lavender and lime oils.   Do believe he's thinking of becoming a pirate as he sings away in the shower, sudsing with MY soap.  Remember what it's like to walk along a beach when the day is fresh and new?  That's reminiscent of this fragrance.

	Deep blue in color the soap is topped with a wave of Atlantic sea salt crystals - so invigorating!  It gives the skin a bit of a tingle and softens at the same time.

        There he goes again - singing at the top of his lungs.  Well, I have a refrain for him: "Yo, ho, ho, matey!  Forget that bottle of rum and buy me another wedge of Sea Vegetable!

product_name: Sea Vegetable Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Love the ocean? you will love this soap
review_text: Its blue, its salty, its seaweed-y... What's not to love?  Men in particular will enjoy this soap

product_name: Mustela Ultimate Hydration: Beauty
title: GREAT TO PREVENT STRECHMARKS AND HYDRATE SKIN!
review_text: I have tried this product as well as others by Mustela and I think they are fenomenal.  I gained 60 pounds with my first pregnancy and did not get strechmarks.  You must be very disciplined and put it on everyday.  Although this cream is a bit pricey, it does wonders at hydrating your skin so why not pamper your body!!!

product_name: Cris Notti Green Kimono Dome Cosmetic Bag: Beauty
title: loved it!
review_text: beautiful the I love the bright blue inside and there is plenty of roo

product_name: White Linen by Estee Lauder for Women 2.0 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: wonderful
review_text: Estee Lauder is the primary cosmetic line us middle class American can access and enjoy with out spending a fortune.  Estee is all American and all clas

product_name: Papier Poudr Oil Blotting Papers - Rachel: Beauty
title: Best blotting sheets!!
review_text: I've tried a lot of different blotting sheets and these are the best. These definitely blot the oil off your face and leave just a little bit of powder so you look fresh. I've tried the Body Shop's and the powder free ones don't work as well, and the powder ones leave too much powder on your face. I love these things

product_name: Pop In The Bath BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: E.A.'s Review
review_text: Another top Lush product.  My husband and I used this in our hot tub on vacation and had so many bubbles that they overflowed the tub!  I also like the idea that if you travel a lot, that you don't have to worry about bottles leaking.  It's kind of fun to see what colors you get, as it is a suprise.  Well worth the money.

product_name: MenScience Eye Rescue Formula 1oz. Ultralight. Oil-Free. Matte Finish.: Beauty
title: I usually don't get much sleep...
review_text: So this has literally gotten rid of the circles around my eyes without leaving my face oily. It's AMAZING!!

product_name: MenScience Eye Rescue Formula 1oz. Ultralight. Oil-Free. Matte Finish.: Beauty
title: Really does rescue!
review_text: I thought this product was all hype, but my wife made me try it.  I never used "eye care" products before and was AMAZED at the result.  My wife says I look younger and healthier and no longer have shadows under my eyes.  It also feels great

product_name: Tend Skin: Beauty
title: Great product
review_text:
I used to shave my bikini area regularly and got so tired of the razor bumps and ingrown hairs that came along with it so I decided to give Brazilian bikini waxing a try. The results are much more precise, longer lasting and smoother. But I was still getting those big ugly ingrown hairs. So the wax technician gave me a couple sample bottles of TendSkin. There was a noticable difference after 24 hours but I still had quite a few bumps remaining. I don't know if it was because I'm so suspectible to ingrown hairs or because I had so many to start with but it took a couple of months for my bikini area to completely clear up with twice daily application of TendSkin. I also exfoliate my bikini area several times a week - exfoliation will go a long way in preventing ingrown hairs. With the exfoliation and the daily application of TendSkin, the ingrown hairs are completely gone. I now use TendSkin only once a day and that is sufficient. My bikini area has never looked better. My only gripe with TendSkin is the cost - I put off buying a bottle for the longest because it's so expensive. I have one of the small 4 ounce bottles that I found at the less expensive price of $13 but that's still a bit much for this product. I'll continue to buy it because it works but it'd be nice if it were a little cheaper.

And for those who are wondering about the rubbing alcohol smell, I found that on me it disappeared as soon as the TendSkin dried. So don't let the smell of it deter you - if you are prone to ingrown hairs, TendSkin is the product for you. And to help it along, it's also a good idea to exfoliate the area regularly. :

product_name: Lucky You by Lucky Brand for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: love it!
review_text: I haven't had this for about 3 years. It is such a great scent and the bottle is larger then I thought! Love it

product_name: Lucky You by Lucky Brand for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: my favorite
review_text: I have been wearing this purfume since jr. high and a love it. AS a college student it can be tough to find a scent that lasts long but, is not over powering and everyone always says whats that you smell so nice. I love it  Brian

product_name: Lucky You by Lucky Brand for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: The best scent around
review_text: This perfume is absolutly delicious! I have been wearing it every single day for a couple of years now and you can wear with casual jeans or if you're going out.  it is the best all-around scent, and one of my favorite scents i have ever found. highly reccomend this to anyone.

product_name: Lucky You by Lucky Brand for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Nice, youthful!
review_text:
I've been wearing Lucky You for several years now.  I really like it a lot!  I can't even tell you exactly what kind of scent it is...  It's not flowery, it's not fruity and it's definitely not "old lady!"

It's fresh, like clean laundry and it makes me feel youthful!  In fact, for some reason, it always reminds me of that Debbie Gibson perfume from the 80s, Electric Youth...  With the neon pink spring in the bottle!  Ah, the good ol' days!

product_name: Bobbi Brown Moisture Rich Foundation SPF 15: Beauty
title: AMAZING COLORS...makes your skin look radiant
review_text: I LOVE this foundation. I have Warm Sand Moisture Rich Foundation. It is incredibly smooth, long wearing and the color makes my skin look bright and radiant. Bobbi Brown makes very natural foundation colors and there is a range of colors for all different skin tones. When I'm shopping it seems that most lines cater to lighter and medium skin tones, but Bobbi Brown really does come through with flattering options for all skin tones. The only draw back is that this foundation does not provide adequate SPF protection, even though it says SPF 15. Therefore, you will still need to wear a sunscreen underneath of at least SPF 15. I use this foundation every day and I wear sunscreen from Paula's Choice (which I love). I think that the color options available, the long lasting color and the smooth texture make this foundation worth the price.

product_name: HSuan Wen Hua Hair Treatment by LUSH: Beauty
title: Love the smell!
review_text: I really like this product. It does leave your hair quite soft and shiny. I have very thick, curly hair so anything that can make my hair softer is great in my book. I applied the treatment, wrapped my hair up in a plastic bag, and put a hot towel on it. I microwaved the towel every few minutes to make sure it would stay warm. I left the treatment in for about 40 minutes. When I first recieved this product, I thought the scent was actually pretty gross. But it does smell better after you wash it out.

product_name: HSuan Wen Hua Hair Treatment by LUSH: Beauty
title: Smells Fantastic!
review_text: I used this product for the first time over the weekend and the smell is amazing! Just like fresh baked gingerbread cookies. I have very thick, medium length, naturally curly hair - I left the product on for about 45 minutes and my hair turned out soft and shiny. It's 2 days and 2 shampoos later and I can still catch the faint smell of gingerbread. Wonderful

product_name: Me! Shower Sherbets - 16 oz.: Beauty
title: Nice Shower Scrub
review_text: I had the opportunity to experience the Peaches 'n' Cream Shower Sherbet at an exclusive resort in Pennsylvania in November.  The scrub smells good, but most importantly, makes my skin feel awesome.  I would highly recommend this

product_name: Polo Black by Ralph Lauren for Men 4.2 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Excellent
review_text: Okay, I am a bit biased because I have a soft spot for Polo products but the Polo Black is arguably the best I have used in years. And I use and finish a new cologne every month. The after smell is great, it is not overpowering, it is great in the morning and in the evening. Plus it doesn't hang on your clothes, so if you wear your shirt again, it doesn't have this "hanging" smell. For the first time in years, I am going to use the same cologne for 2 consecutive months! A great product

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lip Balm SPF 15: Beauty
title: Balmy
review_text:
I love the consistency of this lip balm.  It's light, and not sticky.  The smell of this balm reminds me of lemon bars, and I love it.

The reason for the 4/5 stars is two things.  Sometimes the smell is a little overwhelming.  This is entirely a personal preference, and is only something that happens some of the time.  The other reason is that the balm tends to not last very long on me, and I find that a little annoying.  I usually just reapply, but that means that I end up using this up faster than a lot of glosses that I have used.

I definitely am going to buy this again, but knowing full well that I'm just going to be buying it again sooner than I'd like

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lip Balm SPF 15: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text: This lip balm is amazingly rich for a stick lip balm or for any other other lip blams as a matter of fact. It has great satying power and nourishes my lips deeply.

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lip Balm SPF 15: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text: Although this lip treatment costs a fair amount as far as lip balm goes, I don't know how my lips would live without it! It smells like lemon cookies and has a velvety finish... and it has SPF 15, too. The ceramic tube is easy to find in your purse and doesn't break easily. After using this lip balm for a week, my lips were already less chapped. I reccomend this lip treatment for everyone

product_name: LORAC Cheek Stamp: Beauty
title: great travel blush.
review_text: I love the stamp blush. I'm able to carry it with me in my make-up bag. it makes for easy touch ups and the stamp delivers just enough pigment for a natural look.

product_name: Trichomania Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Dreamy Coconut
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
Imagine pouring creamed coconut and vetivert oil on your hair, now imagine this was made into a bar and it foamed into lush moisturizing bubbles. This shampoo bar is pretty amazing in how it deep cleans and moisturizes like a dream. Your hair will feel super clean and shiny and I like following this with the American Cream Conditioner. 

Mmm, I can't stop running my hands through my hair, it is just amazing! The last time I remember my hair being this soft was when I was about 10! I rarely say wow, but WOW. If you love this, "Godiva" is calling your name. The shampoo bar, I mean...

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Trichomania Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: I will buy it again
review_text: I'm not really excited about the coconut scent. I can take it or leave it. The shampoo itself is good, though. I have very long thick hair, and this leaves it feeling soft, yet clean and not weighted down. I'm left with a lot of body afterward. I haven't had any trouble getting it to lather, but if you're new to Lush products, give them a few tries before giving up. They don't have silicones and other products to weigh your hair down, so you will see some changes in your hair as it is getting healthier

product_name: Trichomania Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: interesting and fun as a gift
review_text:
I bought this on a trip to Canada ... my hotel shampoo was very drying.  

The shampoo is weird to use the first time, I lathered it in my hands like soap and then worked it through my fine long hair. Not too oily for me and I really like the smell. It took care of the dry fly away feel the cheap stuff in my hotel had left.

I brought several different sized chunks back to friends who all thought it was fun.

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 1 - Delicate/Thin Hair: Beauty
title: I like it!
review_text: I purchased the index 1 kit from [...] for [...].  I asked my hair stylist to apply to my hair.  She agreed to relax my hair with this product just out of curousity.  My scalp did not burn in the process.  It smelled like any other relaxer.  It straightened my hair.  I would continue to use but the price is too steep for a stay at home mom like me, but I wanted to try it after reading about in Essence magazine.  Vanessa L Williams said she uses it and her hair feels terrific.  I have very fine hair.  It had been nearly a year since I relaxed my hair.  I was giving my hair a break.   I usually relax my hair every 3 months.  My hair stylist said she would not buy it.  She added it's like any other no-lye relaxer

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 1 - Delicate/Thin Hair: Beauty
title: Choosing the correct Phyto Index
review_text: I have read all the Phyto Index 1 reviews to date...most negative ones sounded as if they either chose the wrong Index or needed a hair professional to apply the product properly (one must be highly skilled to apply this professional product by one's self and work quickly in application) and be able to judge how to gauge the proper relaxing time...as a trained cosmetologist, esthetician and registered nurse I have used both Index 1 and 2 on friends and relatives with great satisfaction...as a woman of Native-American and Afro-American heritage who has thyroid dysfunction (which can negatively effect the quality of one's hair and scalp) I have used the Index 2 with tremendous satisfaction

product_name: Murad Acne Spot Treatment: Beauty
title: Murad Acne Spot Treatment is the best
review_text: I absolutley love Murad's Acne Spot Treatment. As soon as you feel a spot coming up just dab a little on and its gone in 1-2 days.  Murad Acne Spot Treatment works without making the spot look scaley and dry and it helps reduce the redness of the pimple.  I would recommend Murad Acne Spot Treatment to anyone who has a small breakout problem to the most severe breakouts

product_name: Murad Acne Spot Treatment: Beauty
title: BYE BYE PIMPLE!!!
review_text:
This stuff is AMAZING!!!
If I feel a pimple popping up I put it on and it is GONE!!!
LOVE IT

product_name: Murad Acne Spot Treatment: Beauty
title: Blemish Be Gone
review_text: I received a free sample of this and although I don't have acne it comes in very handy for the occasional blemish that I used to just cover with concealer until it went away. I had once tried Mario Badescu's formulation of basically calamine lotion which you would not want to wear out in public. I got a blemish recently and after just a few applications of Murad's Spot Treatment it was banished. It's clear with no dry feeling and doesn't show up on your face. It works and works fast

product_name: Murad Acne Spot Treatment: Beauty
title: Great product
review_text: I've tried a lot of spot treatments and this one really works. I like that I can wear it during the day as well as at night

product_name: Marc Jacobs Perfume Solid: Beauty
title: TERRIFIC FOR TRAVEL!
review_text:
Marc Jacobs" the fragrance is young, fresh, and sensuous. It's pure, understated, simple, and unforgettable. 
Somehow he has done things with gardenias unheard of before. Remember granny's favorite gardenia perfume, a bit cloying, heavy? Uh-uh forget that. This interpretation of gardenia is cutting edge, it complements without overwhelming the wearer. 

Notes of Sicilian Bergamot and Tagete mingle with the top note, as accents of White Pepper and Egyptian Jasmine enrich. 

This is a fragrance for confident, unconventional young women.

product_name: Komenuka Bijin 10-Product Trial/Sample Set from Rice Bran: Beauty
title: Skin Balancing
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
Perfect for a weekend vacation or as larger sample sizes, the natural products will make your skin feel moisturized and pampered. Rice Bran is the secret to these products and the results are immediately apparent in the texture of your skin. After just one to two uses, you start to notice a sense of calm and order descending upon your formerly sensitive skin. 

If you have oily or combination skin, you may be amazed at how balanced your skin is and how you no longer experience the shine breakthrough in your makeup due to the initially drying aspects of other cleansers. 

1. The Komenuka Bijin Facial Cleansing Foam is very economical and an eighth of a teaspoon is enough for a wonderful face cleansing experience. The ingredients include: Rice Germ Oil, Rice Bran, Coconut Oil, Seaweed, Aloe Algae, Ginkgo Biloba, Matricaria, Yeast, Perilla Ocymoides, Honey, Lithospermum and Fountain Water. 

2. Follow the cleanser with the Komenuka Bijin Skin Lotion and you may wonder why you are suddenly catching the scent of SAKE. In fact, this cleansing toner does contain SAKE along with Rice Bran, Seaweed, Aloe, Yeast, Glycyrrhizate, Orange, Lemon, Matricaria, Algae, Luffa Cylindrica and Fountain Water. The toner completes the process of removing impurities and also has the added benefit of contracting the pores so they look smaller. Men may also enjoy this as an aftershave lotion. If the toner is not included, they normally include the NS-K Special Toner with even more healing ingredients. 

3. The Moisture Cream goes a long way. The main oils are Rice Germ Oil, Jojoba Oil and Olive Oil. Vitamin E, Rice Bran and Aloe make this a skin-healing treat. 

4. Eye Moisture Jell - Also contains apple acid, lemon, seaweed and loquat leaf. Smooths the delicate eye area. 

5. Makeup Remover - A fragrance-free cream that removes makeup and mascara. Based on olive oil. 

6. Two Cleansing Powder Packets - Deep cleansing grains turn silky and creamy when you add water. 

7. The UV Cream is slightly tinted and waterproof. This sunblock also seems to even out skin tone. Could be used as a makeup base if you are looking for a more natural look. The cream is easy to apply and absorbs easily into the skin. You can apply this on its own or after the moisture cream and skin essence. 

8. Skin Care Cream - A body cream that is very healing with jojoba oil. 

9 & 10. Hair Shampoo & Conditioner - Thickens fine hair instantly. Removes buildup and leaves your hair feeling luxurious. 

If you are looking for an easy way to try out the skincare system or you just want to take these products with you wherever you go (they are addictive), then I can highly recommend this and any of the Komenuka products. I love how calm they make me feel. These products cover all bases and whether you live in a cold, dry or humid climate, your skin will feel protected. 

Other products to fall in love with: 

The Skin Essence contains Mulberry that naturally lightens discoloration from sun damage and aging. The antioxidants help to revitalize the skin. This is applied before the cream. 

Moisture Cream Silver - Super hydration with aloe, vitamin E and Rice Bran. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Iman Cream To Powder Foundation .3 Oz.Earth #2: Beauty
title: Iman Cream To Powder Foundation
review_text: I looooove Iman Cream to Powder Foundation.  I especially like how well it matches my skin color (which is typically the biggest challenge in selecting a foundation).  I like the coverage - - most people don't even know that I'm wearing makeup. I will continue to order this product

product_name: Hard Candy Super Shine Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Flirt's awesome
review_text: I just got this super shine lip gloss in Flirt (pretty pink color).  Smells amazing and the color is beautiful on my lips.

product_name: Hard Candy Super Shine Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Your average lip gloss colors with a little more
review_text: Almost all the colors that this lip gloss comes in are very ordinary. Very light pinks, frosty pinks and oranges, and browns are the basis of the colors. Flirt, Pixie, Babydoll, Whimsy, Fantasy, and Piglet are not a very wide range of colors, but they are still nice. I'm not so sure about Oxygen, though. I have never really seen silver lip gloss, so I don't know how it would look on me. Hello, people, why not make a shade of red? Red is a classic in any lip color, so that's a color to try. What about a dark pink? Or a bright orange? If you were thinking of coming out with these colors already, great. But is not, those are some suggestions

product_name: Bvlgari Eau Parfumee Green Tea: Beauty
title: great for everyday use
review_text: This is a very complex scent, and mellows after wearing for awhile, but still leaves a subtle scent for quite a while.  Especially effective worn with the body lotion and shower gel

product_name: Bvlgari Eau Parfumee Green Tea: Beauty
title: My Favorite Perfume
review_text: Everybody wears sent diffrently, for me I love this perfume and it lasts forever, I can still smell it even after eating in restraunts that usally leave me smelling like their food. For me this is my favorite and I would recomend trying it

product_name: Classic Detachable Head Long Handled Bath Brush: Beauty
title: Learned Something New
review_text: Purchased this brush and actually READ the instructions that came with it.  Tried the dry brush technique described in the instructions right before the shower and loved it.  My 54 year old skin feels no older than 30.

product_name: Mustela Facial Cleansing Cloths With PhysiObebe: Beauty
title: I love these!
review_text: My daughter has very sensitive skin and these are great.  They clean her face and hands in between baths, and don't irritate her skin at all.  I really like the scent too.
