If you don't like the way other Mustela products smell you won't like these, but if you do then you'll love them.  My only complaint, and the reason they didn't get 5 stars, is the packaging.  The package tends to not stay closed after a few days.  So if you aren't using the wipes regularly they can dry out

product_name: Mustela Facial Cleansing Cloths With PhysiObebe: Beauty
title: I actually use this for cleaning my face.
review_text: I actually use this to clean my face each night.  I have sensitive skin and even my facialist has noticed a difference.

product_name: AVEDA Be Curly Curl Enhancing Lotion 6.7 fl oz/200 ml: Beauty
title: great product... why the inflated price?
review_text: i have wavy hair and apply "be curly" to my wet hair before blow-drying with a diffuser.  it makes soft, non-frizzy, non-crunchy waves and has a fantastic herbal scent.  what i don't understand is why this website charges 4 dollars more per 6.7 oz bottle than the aveda store or aveda website.

product_name: H2O Plus Tango Mango Shower & Bath Gel: Beauty
title: A treat for your entire body!
review_text:
This H20+ Tango Mango Shower and Bath Gel is wonderful.  The gel is so thick and supple with bath beads that your body will thank you for it.  The mango aromoa will lift your senses first thing in the morning and get you ready for the day!  I have to hide this stuff or my children will use it all up  -  they like to squeeze the gel out and pop the beads inside.

I suggest this bath gel if you want to give yourself a shower or bath treat.  It's well worth the money and would be a great addition to a "relaxation" gift basket for a friend

product_name: Kai Body Glow: Beauty
title: Refreshing Fragrance - Clean, Revitalizing!
review_text: Great way to start the day. The soapy-fragranced sponges are a great way to wake-up & get the body buzzin' out the door in a fine frame of mind. Clean, fresh, airy & light.

product_name: Kai Body Glow: Beauty
title: FABULOSO.....
review_text:
Looking for a tropical smell to take you back to your summer vacation in Maui?  This is it... all packaged in a bottle and a heck-of-a-lot cheaper than the airfare it took to get you there!  The exotic gardenia fragrence will put you in a trance as you float through your day... imagining yourself next to the Four Seasons pool instead of in a carpool with your children and their friends!  

I purchased this in Tiburon, CA on our way home from Napa last year and I've found myself reliving that initial moment when I first sprayed it on in the boutique.  My friends and I all melted at the aroma.  I've used it everyday since and have purchased more for myself and some as gifts for others!

I love to take my morning shower, towel dry and spritz this all over!  My senses are heightened and I'm off for a day filled with whatever -- it really wouldn't matter what took place b/c I feel so fresh and flirty -- ready to take on the day!

I highly suggest you make the purchase now and stop waiting for something to push you over the edge!

product_name: NeoStrata Oily Skin Solution - AHA 8 3.4oz: Beauty
title: Good refiner for acne-prone skin
review_text: I have been using this product for 3 weeks now. It has definitely helped my acne-prone oily skin look more refined and toned. The only caveat to the product is that it mildly stings after you put it on. I have found that it does control oil production throughout the day. Overall, a good product! Works well with the Glycolic Foaming Cleanser

product_name: Bobbi Brown Pot Rouge for Lips and Cheeks: Beauty
title: Bobbi Brown Pot Rouge
review_text: I happened to go to Neiman Marcus over my lunch break to check out some new lipgloss at the Yves Saint Laurent counter and ended up at the Bobbi Brown Counter.  The sales lady talked me into letting her put the rouge on my cheeks in the color - pale pink.  Wow it made me look so good. It made me look like I was glowing or flushing from the inside there was no telltale marks of blush on my face. I bought it on the spot. This did not have as great effect on my lips, it looked like I had lipstick on, but I'll just use it on my cheeks. I highly recommend this product.

product_name: Blue Skies BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Blue Heaven!
review_text: This is absolutely my favorite bubble bar. They did not skimp with the patchouli, and the result is divine. Blue Skies' fragrance combines wonderfully with several of the bath bombs, so experiment. I have to admit, I am addicted to LUSH

product_name: Blue Skies BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: A little goes a long way.
review_text:
Woo, the bubble bar that I got must have been really fresh! It was enough scent for 3-4 baths, but that wouldn't have been enough bubbles, so I used it for 2 baths that smelled VERY strongly! 

Not really a very relaxing scent, more of a refreshing, up-and-at-'em morning scent. It will definitely wake you up. The patchouli smell, which I love, is stronger in this bubble bar than in other Lush products. 

Suggestion: I would combine this with a karma bath bomb (also has a hint of patchouli scent) for a great combination of smells! 

The blue skies bubble bar WILL turn your bath water a scary blue color, but that's ok, because it smells good and leaves your skin silky smooth with its essential oils

product_name: Blue Skies BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Best of Them All!!!!
review_text: I've been using this bar for at least 7 years...the absolute best color, best smell, and most relaxing bath.  I don't know what I'd do if it was discontinued!

product_name: Blue Skies BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Favorite bubble bar
review_text: Smells wonderdul and not masculine at all.  It is woody but light and intoxicating; I can't stop sniffing it after a bath.  The price is high but it is a large bar.  I usually cut it up and still have plenty of bubble/scent power

product_name: Murad Acne Complex Kit ($80 Value): Beauty
title: Try it...you will NOT be disappointed!
review_text: I ordered the 30-day supply of the Murad Acne Complex--just to see what it was all about.  I have always had oily skin and those little bumps on my forehead--but my biggest problem was blackheads on my cheeks/nose and those painful red bumps that always show up when I shave.  After only a week or so of being on the Acne Complex, I IMMEDIATELY noticed a reduction in the post-razor bumps as well as the little red bumps on my forehead.  And the refining mask is AMAZING!  Let it sit on your face for 10 minutes and you'll be amazed at how it makes blackheads DISAPPEAR.  Plus, Murad's formula doesn't have any of that drying benzoyl peroxide, which means no irritation, no drying, and no bleaching the collars of your expensive shirts.  If you've got acne problems, you owe it to yourself to give Acne Complex a try

product_name: Murad Acne Complex Kit ($80 Value): Beauty
title: THIS PR0DUCT ISZ THE GREATEST
review_text:
MURAD IS REALLY W0RTH Y00R TIME.
AL0T 0F PE0PLE C0MPLAIN THAT MURAD BR0KE THEM 0WT. BUT THAT ISZ WHAT MURAD ISZ SUPP0SED T0 D0. IT CLEANS 0WT THE INSIDE Y00R SKIN [WHERE THE DIRT ISZ HELD] THEN CLEANSZ 0WT THE 0WTSIDE. S0METHING LIKE PURGING. AND S0ME PE0PLE C0MPLAIN THAT Y00R SKIN ITCHESZ, WELL WHAT PR0DUCT HAVE Y00H USED BEF0RE THAT D0ES ALL THAT IN 3 SMALL STEPSZ. Y00R FACE HAS T0 GET USED T0 IT BEIN CLEANED 0WT.
AFTER MY EXPERIENCE WITH MURAD I TRULY RECOMMEND T0 ALL PE0PLE.
--TATIANNA BLA

product_name: Carol's Daughter Tui Hair Oil: Beauty
title: Great Moisturizer
review_text: I recently washed my hair with all of Carol's Daughter Tui products and after I blow dried my hair and put a little oil in it, it was very soft, manageable and easy to wrap.  Overall, I think it's a great product

product_name: Carol's Daughter Tui Hair Oil: Beauty
title: love it
review_text: This oil smells so great, everyone will want to know where you got it.I use it on my body also. I order quite a few
